story: Our campaign is to improve the major sanitation and health problems in the rural majority population in Papua New Guinea. For this we are building improved rural fibre glass toilet facility to suit the rural communities. Our makeshift shelter is in Alotau, Papua New Guinea. We have gone through the trial & error phase of manufacturing the fibre glass toilet facility to the correct precise product. We have been producing these products for a little over 3 years now but at a small scale or on request. But we have found out that it is a great need in the large rural population communities especially the children that are vulnerable to diseases. We have the expert and capable workforce from the workshop to the administration to produce this product in large quantities to be distriubuted throughout the need areas in Papua New Guinea. This sanitation and health issue has pushed to campaign for US$50,000.00 to start maximising our production. This should be able to boost us to manufacture continously in large quantities in the next 3 years.

story:
Introduction

Triking is becoming very popular because of the enjoyment of moving on these 3 wheeled vehicles. They mix together comfort, mechanical  simplicity of bikes and that cool go-kart feeling.  They make possible to go again into cycling those who find hard to ride their normal bikes. Also trikes are great platform for tourers, pedal voyagers, commuters, recreational cyclists and avid aventurers. There are many good commercial trikes in the stores, unfortunately they come at a price. While they are well built and nice, there is also a customer’s request for a quality trike that performs just as well as any other but much more pocket friendly. It all seems to be a calling for a design and production challenge.



While the design and prototyping phases shows that a good trike at the right cost is feasible, the vision of the project has become much wider, as automotive suppliers have joined us to the vision.  These companies were producing motorbikes frames for main world brands 24 hours a day. Recently these big names  moved production to other suppliers elsewhere, and so the managers of the Spain factories have changed the way they think and work. Designers, engineers and production professionals are happy to offer their in-house high-volume production capabilities directly to the end user. Now is time to work together for the benefit of the customer, creating relevant products at its right cost, away from traditional complex business structures. Is a democratization of the means of production.

In the end it all relays on the real demand, so if you want the best value trike, we will gladly produce it for you.



What you get

Perks are for the actual purchase of products. Time and money have been already invested in development and production tooling. From now funds go to arrange and run production. There may be slight differences in the final product due to improvements of details. We will enjoy to publish all the work progress since you are part of it. At any time the purchased perk can be cancelled, we respect your right to change your mind. Just consider that due to all the fees applied to receive payments and send them back, 15% may be deducted to cover all these costs.



Saeta trikes are based on straight forward design, simple, robust, and long lasting.  We provide a base product, fully functional, reliable, very modular and customizable. Due to its great value, it can be used as the starting point of a more complex vehicle, like velomobile, utility cargo trike or electrified commuter. Also are a good deal as rental vehicle fleet that will have high ocupation because of the novelty and fun factor, with a quick return of the investment.



Turning is made through direct steering system, by long lever underseat handlebars that are easy, comfortable and precise. The innovative T-shape frame design makes possible to fit very from short riders like teenagers to the tallest adults. High adjustability of seat's inclination, like comfortable vertical seat, very aerodynamical laid back, or anywhere in between. Multiple seat mounting positions, front - back positioning, complete the fine tunning for best individual fit.

Seat is molded polyamide glass-fiber reinforced, with the right balance between stiffness and flexibility. Fits ergonomically so perfect that doesn't need cushions, unlike all other hard shell recumbent seats.



Recumbent trikes take some space. To make it easier to transport or store away, all components are flat once the main parts are disassembled, so is easy to store under the bed or transported into a small size car.

We offer 3 products:

  • FRAMEKIT: Frame and all other key parts to built your customized trike from scratch. Perfect for DIY. From slim speed trike to fat tyres, anything is possible. It just needs wheels, gears and brakes.  Front wheel axles included,  recommended hub for assembly is Shimano M475 for best fit.                                                                                                 
    SPECIFICATIONS
    Frame made of high grade aerospace european aluminium alloy. Superior strength than 6061 and 7005 aluminiums.
    Front wheels compatibility: 20" or 24"
    Rear wheels compatibility: 24", 26" 700C, 29", also extra wide clearance for 4" tyres.
    Seat inclination adjustable 20º-40º
    Front track width 75cm | 29.5"
    Wheelbase 102cm | 40"
    Framekit weight 9.6kg | 21.2lb - With lightweight components the trike can be as light as 15kg | 33lb
    Max. cyclist weight 120kg | 265lb
    Adjustability to fit from XS (8 years old kids) to XL adult riders


  • GAZELO: Versatile road trike. Commuting and leisure rides made easy.
    Very modular and customizable. Can be disassembled in its main parts and stored flat under the bed or transported into a small size car.
    SPECIFICATIONS
    Frame made of high grade aerospace european aluminium alloy. Superior strength than 6061 and 7005 aluminiums.
    Transmission of 27 speeds, 3x9 Shimano Acera / Altus
    Front brakes Shimano disc
    Front wheels Ryde Cyber silver color 20” - Shimano M475 hubs
    Rear wheel Ryde Zac silver color 26”
    Tyres Urban 20x1.75” - 26x1.5”
    Seat height 34cm | 13"
    Seat inclination adjustable 20º-40º
    Pedals height 44cm| 17”
    Track width 75cm | 29.5"
    Wheelbase 102cm | 40"
    Weight 17.8kg | 39.2lb
    Max. cyclist weight 120kg | 265lb
    Adjustability to fit from XS (8 years old kids) to XL adult riders



  • KAPRO: Push the limits and ride over rough off-road terrain.
    Very modular and customizable. Can be disassembled in its main parts and stored flat under the bed or transported into a small size car.
    SPECIFICATIONS
    Frame made of high grade aerospace european aluminium alloy. Superior strength than 6061 and 7005 aluminiums.
    Transmission of 27 speeds, 3x9 Shimano Acera / Altus
    Front and rear brakes Shimano disc
    Front wheels Ryde Killer 24” - Shimano M475 hubs
    Rear wheel Ryde Bull 26” - Shimano M475 hub
    Tyres Knoby wide 24x2.125” - 26x2.35”
    Seat height 39cm | 15"
    Seat inclination adjustable 20º-40º
    Pedals height 49cm| 19”
    Track width 75cm | 29.5"
    Wheelbase 102cm | 40"
    Weight 19.8kg | 43.6lb
    Max. cyclist weight 120kg | 265lb
    Adjustability to fit from XS (8 years old kids) to XL adult riders

*Helmet and rocks not included :-)     

       7 YEARS WARRANTY !!!

    Frame parts are covered by 7 YEARS WARRANTY for the original purchaser of any structural failure that can be related to production.
    Shipping costs, labor or any other compensations are not part of the warranty. Aesthetical damages in paint, corrosion, normal wear of components, falls, accidents, improper use, unauthorised modifications, inappropriate assembly or failures due to bad maintenance are not covered.


Shipping and taxes

Shipping cost is 90€ to Europe, and 250€ elsewhere. You can choose the shipping Perk to cover shipping cost.



Taxes. Saeta Trikes are managed by established companies required to apply VAT tax. Only for purchasers inside European Union (Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Denmark, Estonia, Greece, Spain, Finland, France, United Kingdom, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Malta, The Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia) must add Spain VAT to the sum of the trike and shipping, which currently is set at 21%.

Custom's office fees. Only for purchasers outside European Union. There may be some import fees applied from your government during the delivery process.

You can wait and pay taxes (if applicable) and shipping at the last moment, when your trike is packed for transportation. We will contact you when it is ready.
If you make multiple purchases for the same address and receiver, we will arrange the best shipping cost for you right before sending, to offer discounted cost for bulk shippment. Shipping cost per unit can drop for several trikes' order.




Values

Is not just about the product. The values on these trikes are more than the thing itself. We value the people behind it. We are opening new ways of doing things, from the people for the people. Supporting good profesionals along way and hiring amployees to perform the handling tasks. We see how destructive is money when is made more important that people. For this reason we don’t produce overseas. We work in close collaboration with leading automotive industrial companies. Their expertise is put at your service because in this way we support our local community. Trikes are produced at european industry standards with german quality aluminium and proprietary design inspired in Barcelona, and then we export worldwide. In the same way, we encourage you to support your local shop for expertise help when required.



We believe in compromised, honest and professional job.

We belive in debt-free life. For this reason our trikes are designed from scratch to have the maximum value for the cost.

We believe in healthy life. Saeta trikes provide mobility solutions that increase our physical activity.


Risks and challenges

The tasks to develop by the persons involved in this project are just their daily work and their field of expertise, and they excell in it. So, there is nothing beyond reach. We will gladly dedicate our efforts to surpass your expectations.

Consider that during the fabrication of products some delays may happen due to all the operations involved. In any case, most of the work is made in-house or in related suppliers where we work as part of their team. So, we will push it and shorten times whenever possible to avoid delays.



How to help

If you like this innitiative but are not itching for a trike, the best thing you can do is just spread the word. Use Indogogo tools to share.

story:
One single idea can change your future

Hello, my name is Yana Georgieva and I am a pharmacy student. I am from Bulgaria one little precious country, unfortunately not so well known to the rest of the world.

I am one proud daughter of my father`s accomplishments. He`s one great person. He always says "I have gathered from nature to give to the human kind".  Actually he is Hosanna Medicine-man. He has been involved in the field of herbal treatment for over 35 years. So here is me walking in his footsteps to bring man a gift from nature. You can find more information about him and the product on www.yarg95.com .

       


“YARG-95” is a herbal product, whose tea is extremely effective in coping with the renal crisis, as well as quick excretion of the stone, which caused the crisis. But so far its production is small in quantity, so this campaign is about growing in size and being able to supply more people in need. My dream is to build a factory for bigger production, first in Bulgaria and then all over the world.




How does YARG-95 work?

People suffering from renal diseases must be aware of the following: a stone in the kidney in the most serious cases can be operated or it can be broken by means of lithotripsy, while pyelonephritis cannot be operated, it must be cured in time, otherwise it ruins the kidney. Furthermore, if a small stone is found in the kidney, it must be “attacked” immediately because a small stone after a certain period of time becomes big, then an operation follows, and sometimes it drives to the kidney removal.


Renal crisis

Renal crisis causes feeling of pain, which is one the strongest in the human pathology. In principle, the treatment of a renal crisis is the same as it was 150 years ago. The difference is that now we have more remedies, among which there are antispasmodic and analgesic remedies for basic  treatment so that the pain is relieved.


Methods for prevention of stone formation in the kidneys

There is no a remedy in the world, which can stop the formation of stones in the kidneys. Once the organism has started their formation, the process cannot be diverted. Evidence of that are patients, who are operated several times for stones in the kidneys. This is where the methodology of the Hosanna medicine-man works. It is highly efficient but unfortunately, it is little known. After an operation of a kidney stone, after lithotripsy of a kidney stone, after a successful treatment of a kidney stone with herbs, after the application of this technique, the problem with stones in the kidneys is resolved once and for all.

Cases

K. S. from Sofiya– There was found a stone in the left ureter with size 20/13 mm. The medical specialists explicitly recommend surgery.
After two months of herbal treatment, the man excreted the stone of 20/13 mm. Incredible but true.

P. Z. from the town of Pazardzhik – The child underwent a surgery for removal of stones from the left kidney at the age of 12 months. Only after 6 months there was found a stone in the left ureter with size 18/6 mm. The medical specialists from Pazardzhik, Plovdiv and Sofia explicitly recommend surgery.
After three months of herbal treatment, the child excreted the stone of 18/6 mm. Incredible but true.

S. K. – town of Troyan – The renal crisis was put under control after the third dose of the YARG-95 herb tea was drunk. Two stones were excreted.
Y. R. – town of Plovdiv – Having a renal crisis for 10 days. The urine is bloody and cloudy.
After the intake of the first 250 ml of YARG-95 herb tea the pain stopped. A stone was excreted, the urine was cleared. 


You can be the pillar that supports my dream

I need your help. I need your support. I want to build a factory to produce herbal product YARG-95. Having our own factory would give us brand security. I would be able to produce high-quality products at low prices.



What we need :

  • high quality materials in order to pass all healthcare and quality requirements
  • get marketing expertise
  • to get proffecionalist who systematically de-risk our idea
  • technicaly advanced shredding and packing mashines (only one costs $150 000)
  • biulding specialized storage with low humidity for keeping the production and ingredients

Even if I don't reach the entire goal every dollar will be invested in my idea. I will start with small steps and eventually reach my goal.

Every dollar YOU donate is a step further to helping people all over the world.

Only people who have felt the pain and struggle to get their normal lives back can relate how important  is more and more people to have access to this product. Yarg-95 is licensed and helped many over the years. My dream is to make its access easier, because I have seen with my own eyes the real power of the product- people coming to my father helpless in their suffering and going home healed.

As we go into a new year many of us are focused on setting new goals, defining new  paths, but I have always had one single path - I wanted to help people.


               


“What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.” - Ralph Waldo Emerson

It is true that a rough road stand before us, but I am certain that I have the power and motivation to complete the challenges and come out victorious. I know I have to do it not only for me but for those who suffer.

I refuse to let a dream, a legacy go to waste. I know I won`t be alone. I know I won`t face the challenges by myself. I have my family and all of YOU to support me. Together we can see it through the end and be proud of ourselves what we have accomplished.

I am not blinded by my dream. I can see clearly the risks of my actions, but if you ask me "Is it worth it?", "Would you do it again?" my answer will always be " Yes! Yes! "

There always lies the possibility of failiure, but should we stop trying? Don`t we deserve brighter furture? What do you think?


Other ways you can contribute to my cause :

If you like my campaign and think it`s something worth fighting for you, can spread the word to your friends, your collegues, share and like it on facebook and other social media. Spread the word what we are trying to do!

If you have business partners that might be interested in contributing, let them know.

Use Indiegogo share options to help our idea reach more people.



Thank you from the bottom of my hearth for your support.


******************************************************************************


Една единствена идея може да промени бъдещето ни

Здравейте,казвам се Яна Георгиева и съм студентка по фармация.Аз съм от България, една малка, но прекрасна страна, за жалост не толкова известна на останалата част от света.

Аз съм една горда дъщеря- горда от постиженията на баща си. Той е прекрасен човек. Винаги казва "Взел съм от природата, за да дам на хората". Всъщност той е билколечител. Занимава се  с билколечение повече от 35 години.И така ето ме и мен,вървейки по неговите стъпки, за да дам на хората, дар от природата. Може да намерите повече информация за него и продукта на  www.yarg95.com .

 

"ЯРГ-95" представлява билков продукт, отварата на който е изключително ефективна при овладяване на бъбречната криза, както и ускореното изхвърляне на камъчето, предизвикало кризата.За сега обаче продукцията му е ограничена, така че тази кампания е за увеличаването на продукцията и осигуряване възможността продукта да достигне до повече  хора в нужда. Моята мечта е да построя фабрика за производство първо в България, а после защо не и по света!



Как работи YARG-95?

Всеки страдащ от бъбреци трябва да знае следното:
  Един камък в бъбрека в най тежкия случай може да бъде опериран или разбит чрез литотрипсия, докато един пиелонефрит не може да се оперира, той трябва своевременно да се лекува, в противен случай разрушава бъбрека, респективно бъбреците,малкото камъче трябва да бъде атакувано незабавно, защото в противен случай,след време , малкото камъче ,може да се превърне в голямо,тук е и мястото на употреба на ЯРГа , когато камъчето е с размери 2-3 мм,


Бъбречна криза

Предизвиква усещане на болка, която е една от най-силните в човешката патология*. По принцип лечението на бъбречната криза е същото, каквото е било преди 150 години. Сега имаме по-голям арсенал от медикаменти, при които основното лечение са спазмолитичните и аналгетични средства с цел овладяване на болката.


Методика за предотвратяване
на образуването на камъни в бъбреците

На световно ниво няма определено лекарство, което да спре образуването на камъни в бъбреците. Веднъж организмът започнал образуването им, процесът е непрекъсваем. Доказателство за това са оперираните по няколко пъти за камъни в бъбреците.  Тук е мястото на методиката на Хисарския лечител, която е с доказана ефективност, но за съжаление малко или почти неизвестна като факт. След операция на камък в бъбрека, след литотрипсия, след успешно билколечение, след прилагането на тази методика, проблема с камъните в бъбреците се решава веднъж завинаги.

Факти

Д.М., гр. София: Близо 2 години е с болки в левия бъбрек. Живее почти на обезболяващи. От многобройните изследвания не е установена причината за тези оплаквания. След проведения разговор изказах съмнение за камък в левия уретер, при което Д.М. ми каза, че диагностиките са правени от водещи специалисти, така че моето съмнение било абсурдно. След проведеното билколечение изкарва камък 6/3 мм. Няма болки.

  Р.Т., гр. София: Установен е камък 5 мм. м долната част на левия уретер. Направени са 5 литотрипсии без резултат. След едномесечно билколечение изкарва камъка.

  Н.Г., гр. Стара Загора: След остри болки в дясно - операция на апендикса. Болките продължават. След двуседмично билколечение вади камък 4 мм. от десен уретер. Няма болки.

   К.С., гр. София: Установен е камък в десния уретер с размери 20/13 мм. Специалистите са категорични - операция.
  След проведено двумесечно билколечение той изкарва камъка с размери 20/13 мм. Невероятно, но факт.

   П.З., гр. Пазарджик: На 12 месеца детето е оперирано за отливъчен конкретемент (камък в левия бъбрек). Само след 6 месеца е установен камък в левия уретер с размери 18/6 мм. Специалистите от Пазарджик, Пловдив, София са категорични - операция.
  След проведено три месечно билколечение детето изкарва камъка с размери 18/6 мм. Невероятно, но факт.

   С.К., гр. Троян: Бъбречната криза е овладяна след третото приемане на отварата от "ЯРГ-95".Изкарва два камъка.

   И.Р., гр. Пловдив: С бъбречна криза от 10 дни. Урината е кърваво червена и мътна. След употребата на първите 250 мл. от от отварата на "ЯРГ-95" болките спират. Изкарва камък, урината се изчиства.  

Можете да бъдете основата за изграждането на моята мечта

Нуждая се от помощта Ви. Нуждая се от подкрепата Ви.Искам да построя фабрика, за да произвеждам билковия продукт ЯРГ- 95. Имайки моя собствена фабрика, ще ми даде сигурност и стабилност на марката и продукта като цяло. Ще мога да произвеждам продукти с високо качество, на нормални цени.

От какво се нуждаем :
  • висококачествени материали, за да отговаряме на всички необходими изисквания
  • да получа маркетингова експертиза
  • да назнача професионалисти, които да намалят риска от грешки до минимум
  • машини за рязане и опаковане, отговарящи на всички изисквания(само едната струва $150 000)
  • построяване на специално оборудвани складове, в които да е възможно поддържането на определена влажност
Дори да не достигна крайната сума, всеки долар, който дарите, ще бъде включен в проекта ми.Ще започна с малки стъпки, по пътя за достигане на крайната ми цел.

Всеки долар, който дарявате, е стъпка напред, в сбъдването на една мечта.

Само хора, които са почувствали истинската сила на болката, биха имали представа колко важно е повече хора, да имат достъп до продукта.Yarg-95 е патентован и е помагал на много хора през годините. Мечтата ми е да направя достъпа до продукта по-лесен, защо не ,да бъде на крачка в аптеката до Вас, тъй като съм виждала със собствените си очи, истинската му сила- хора идвайки безпомощни с болката си при баща ми, си тръгват излекувани.

Когато преминаваме през годините много от нас си поставят различни цели, избират нови пътеки, но аз винаги съм искала един ясен път -да получа възможността да помагам на хората.

       

“Това, което стои пред нас и това, което е зад нас, е само малка част, от това, което е в нас.” - Ralph Waldo Emerson

Вярно е ,че пред мен стои стръмен път, но съм сигурна, че имам силата и мотивацията, да бъда победител накрая на пътя!. Знам, че трябва да го направя не само за себе си, но и за тези, които страдат.

Отказвам да оставя мечтата, наследството , да потъне в забрава. Знам, че няма да бъда сама. Знам , че няма да се сблъсквам с предизвикателствата сама. Семейството ми и всички Вие , ме подкрепяте. Заедно можем да достигнем до края и да видим резултата от това, което сме постигнали!

Не съм заслепена от мечтата си.Виждам ясно рисковете от моите действия, но ако ме попитате "заслужава ли си?", "би ли го направила отново?"моят отговор винаги ще бъде  " Да! Да! "

Винаги има възможност да се провалим, но трябва ли да спрем да опитваме? Не заслужаваме ли по-светло бъдеще? Какво мислите?

Други начини по които може да допринесете за каузата :

Ако харесвате кампанията ми и вярвате, че е нещо , за което си струва да се бориш,може да разкажете за нея на своите приятели, колеги, споделете я и я харесайте във фейсбук и другите социални медии, може да харесате и страницата ни във фейсбук  https://www.facebook.com/yarg95/.Кажете на света какво се опитвам да направя!

Ако имате бизнес партньори, които биха се заинтересували от идеята, моля , нека научат за нея.

Използвайте опцията на Indiegogo за споделяне, за да може информацията за продукта да достигне до повече хора.


Благодаря Ви за подкрепата от цялото си сърце!
story_txt:
One single idea can change your future
 Hello, my name is Yana Georgieva and I am a pharmacy student. I am from Bulgaria one little precious country, unfortunately not so well known to the rest of the world. 
I am one proud daughter of my father`s accomplishments. He`s one great person. He always says "I have gathered from nature to give to the human kind".  Actually he is Hosanna 
            Medicine-man. He has been involved in the field of herbal treatment 
            for over 35 years. So here is me walking in his footsteps to bring man a gift from nature. You can find more information about him and the product on www.yarg95.com .
        

 “YARG-95” 
              is a herbal product, whose tea is extremely effective in coping 
              with the renal crisis, as well as quick excretion of the stone, 
              which caused the crisis. But so far its production is small in quantity, so this campaign is about growing in size and being able to supply more people in need. My dream is to build a factory for bigger production, first in Bulgaria and then all over the world.



How does YARG-95 work?

                People suffering from renal diseases must be aware of the 
                following: a stone in the kidney in the most serious cases can 
                be operated or it can be broken by means of lithotripsy, while 
                pyelonephritis cannot be operated, it must be cured in time, 
                otherwise it ruins the kidney. Furthermore, if a small stone is 
                found in the kidney, it must be “attacked” immediately because a 
                small stone after a certain period of time becomes big, then an 
                operation follows, and sometimes it drives to the kidney 
                removal.



                
                Renal crisis 
                
Renal crisis 
                causes 
                feeling of pain, which is one the strongest in the human 
                pathology. In principle, the treatment of a renal crisis is the 
                same as it was 150 years ago. The difference is that now we have 
                more remedies, among which there are antispasmodic and analgesic 
                remedies for basic  treatment so that the pain is relieved.


Methods for prevention of stone formation in the kidneys


              There 
              is no a remedy in the world, which can stop the formation of 
              stones in the kidneys. Once the organism has started their 
              formation, the process cannot be diverted. Evidence of that are 
              patients, who are operated several times for stones in the 
              kidneys. This is where the methodology of the Hosanna medicine-man 
              works. It is highly efficient but unfortunately, it is little 
              known. After an operation of a kidney stone, after lithotripsy of 
              a kidney stone, after a successful treatment of a kidney stone 
              with herbs, after the application of this technique, the problem 
              with stones in the kidneys is resolved once and for all.


Cases

K. S. from Sofiya– There was found a stone in 
                                the left ureter with size 20/13 mm. The medical 
                                specialists explicitly recommend surgery.After two months of herbal treatment, 
                                the man excreted the stone of 20/13 mm. Incredible 
                                but true. 
                              P. Z. from the town of Pazardzhik – The child 
                                underwent a surgery for removal of stones from 
                                the left kidney at the age of 12 months. Only 
                                after 6 months there was found a stone in the 
                                left ureter with size 18/6 mm. The medical specialists 
                                from Pazardzhik, Plovdiv and Sofia explicitly 
                                recommend surgery.After three months of herbal treatment, 
                                the child excreted the stone of 18/6 mm. Incredible 
                                but true.
S. K. – town of Troyan – 
                          The renal crisis was put under control after the third 
                          dose of the YARG-95 
                          herb tea was drunk. Two stones were excreted.Y. R. – town of Plovdiv – Having a renal 
                          crisis for 10 days. The urine is bloody and cloudy.After the intake of the first 250 ml of 
                          YARG-95 herb tea the pain stopped. A stone was 
                          excreted, the urine was cleared.  


  You can be the pillar that supports my dream
I need your help. I need your support. I want to build a factory to produce herbal product YARG-95. Having our own factory would give us brand security. I would be able to
 produce high-quality products at low prices.



What we need :

high quality materials in order to pass all healthcare and quality requirements
get marketing expertise
to get proffecionalist who systematically de-risk our idea

technicaly advanced shredding and packing mashines (only one costs $150 000)

biulding specialized storage with low humidity for keeping the production and ingredients

Even if I don't reach the entire goal every dollar will be invested in my idea. I will start with small steps and eventually reach my goal.
 


Every dollar YOU donate is a step further to helping people all over the world.

Only people who have felt the pain and struggle to get their
 normal lives back can relate how important  is more and more 
people to have access to this product. Yarg-95 is licensed and helped 
many over the years. My dream is to make its access easier, because I 
have seen with my own eyes the real power of the product- people coming to my father helpless in their suffering and going home healed.
As we go into a new year many of us are focused on setting new goals, defining new  paths, but I have always had one single path - I wanted to help people.


                



“What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.” - Ralph Waldo Emerson

It
 is true that a rough road stand before us, but I am certain that I have
 the power and motivation to complete the challenges and come out 
victorious. I know I have to do it not only for me but for those who 
suffer.
 I refuse to let a dream, a legacy go to waste. I know I 
won`t be alone. I know I won`t face the challenges by myself. I have my family and all of YOU to support me. Together we can see it through the end and be proud of ourselves what we have accomplished.
I am not blinded by my dream. I can see clearly the risks of my actions, but if you ask me "Is it worth it?", "Would you do it again?" my answer will always be " Yes! Yes! " 
There always lies the possibility of failiure, but should we stop trying? Don`t we deserve brighter furture? What do you think?




  Other ways you can contribute to my cause :
If you like my campaign and think it`s 
something worth fighting for you, can spread the word to your friends, your
 collegues, share and like it on facebook and other social media. Spread 
the word what we are trying to do!
If you have business partners that might be interested in contributing, let them know. 
Use Indiegogo share options to help our idea reach more people.Thank you from the bottom of my hearth for your support.****************************************************************************** Една единствена идея може да промени бъдещето ни
 
Здравейте,казвам се Яна Георгиева и съм студентка по фармация.Аз съм от България, една малка, но прекрасна страна, за жалост не толкова известна на останалата част от света.
Аз съм една горда дъщеря- горда от постиженията на баща си. Той е прекрасен човек. Винаги казва "Взел съм от природата, за да дам на хората". Всъщност той е билколечител. Занимава се  с билколечение повече от 35 години.И така ето ме и мен,вървейки по неговите стъпки, за да дам на хората, дар от природата. Може да намерите повече информация за него и продукта на  www.yarg95.com .
  
 "ЯРГ-95" представлява билков 
          продукт, отварата на който е изключително ефективна при овладяване на 
          бъбречната криза, както и ускореното изхвърляне на камъчето, 
          предизвикало кризата.За сега обаче продукцията му е ограничена, така че тази кампания е за увеличаването на продукцията и осигуряване възможността продукта да достигне до повече  хора в нужда. Моята мечта е да построя фабрика за производство първо в България, а после защо не и по света!


Как работи YARG-95?

                Всеки 
                страдащ от бъбреци трябва да знае следното:
  Един камък в бъбрека в най тежкия случай може да бъде опериран или 
                разбит чрез литотрипсия, докато един пиелонефрит не може да се 
                оперира, той трябва своевременно да се лекува, в противен случай 
                разрушава бъбрека, респективно бъбреците,малкото камъче трябва да бъде атакувано незабавно, защото в противен случай,след време , малкото камъче ,може да се превърне в голямо,тук е и мястото на употреба на ЯРГа , когато камъчето е с размери 2-3 мм,




                
                Бъбречна криза
 
                Предизвиква усещане на болка, която е една от най-силните в 
                човешката патология*. По принцип лечението на бъбречната криза е 
                същото, каквото е било преди 150 години. Сега имаме по-голям 
                арсенал от медикаменти, при които основното лечение са 
                спазмолитичните и аналгетични средства с цел овладяване на 
                болката. 


Методика за 
          предотвратяване
          на образуването на камъни в бъбреците


              На световно ниво няма 
              определено лекарство, което да спре образуването на камъни в 
              бъбреците. Веднъж организмът започнал образуването им, процесът е 
              непрекъсваем. Доказателство за това са оперираните по няколко пъти 
              за камъни в бъбреците.  Тук е мястото на методиката на Хисарския 
              лечител, която е с доказана ефективност, но за съжаление малко или 
              почти неизвестна като факт. След операция на камък в бъбрека, след 
              литотрипсия, след успешно билколечение, след прилагането на тази 
              методика, проблема с камъните в бъбреците се решава веднъж 
              завинаги.

Винаги има възможност да се провалим, но трябва ли да спрем да опитваме? Не заслужаваме ли по-светло бъдеще? Какво мислите?



Други начини по които може да допринесете за каузата :
Ако харесвате кампанията ми и вярвате, че е нещо , за което си струва да се бориш,може да разкажете за нея на своите приятели, колеги, споделете я и я харесайте във фейсбук и другите социални медии, може да харесате и страницата ни във фейсбук  https://www.facebook.com/yarg95/.Кажете на света какво се опитвам да направя!
Ако имате бизнес партньори, които биха се заинтересували от идеята, моля , нека научат за нея. 
Използвайте опцията на Indiegogo за споделяне, за да може информацията за продукта да достигне до повече хора.

Благодаря Ви за подкрепата от цялото си сърце!

story:
MEGA " Medical Evacuation General Aviation" Project Summary:

Mega comes to  aid people in distress, providing swift, professional medical assistance by air. In order to do this, We intend to employ state-of-the-art operating resources, such as helicopters and air-ambulances. Mega’s  planned workforce comprises qualified, experienced staff.

In the service of its patients

Mega will act according to medical necessity and in the service of its patients. We intend to liberate medical rescue through a privately run, non-profit foundation, which operates independently of the State, gov or of financial interests. Mega's task is to rescue, not to pass judgement on right or wrong, guilt or innocence...

Mega will be supported and funded by crowd funding & charitable campaigns. In grateful acknowledgement of this support, Mega will waive the costs of rescue missions carried out in MENA & AFRICA.

MEGA in more detail:

  • MEGA will employ international trusted legal firms, funds will be used to acquire medical equipment's, lease planes through a transparent online transactions.
  • Everyone needs medical air rescue one day somewhere!
  • Funds will be placed in escrow accounts till we achieve our target, in the event we where unable to reach into our 5 million USD target we will switch into leasing solutions as an interim solution.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • MEGA will spread peace and unity as a global charitable campaign for a better world.
  • We are a team if professional's with a successful track record in aviation industry.
  • MEGA will break political boundaries, no discrimination policy, we are here to rescue not to place judgements.
  • MEGA will add organs transportation.
  • MEGA will paint its Jets with customized paint to reflect what we do.

Risks & Challenges

  • Aircraft registration lengthy process might be a burden however we are thinking to register Mega aircrafts under current approved trustable European operators as an interim solution.
  • High insurance coverage.
  • Networking & operational coverage will be one of the major challenges. we are currently working with market leaders to overcome certain operational obstacles.
  • Fuel purchase strategy, due to price fluctuations.

Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone can contribute:

  • if you are a flight dispatcher you can contribute some of your efforts.
  • if you are a doctor you can surely help us.
  • Accountants, admin, can still contribute by working with us.
  • It is my first time using a crown funding tool as like indiegogo, my first crowd funding project must be of a humanitarian nature to support the world for being a better place, a place where you feel that you are protected, a place where we all work in unity regardless of our race, religion, believes !

Please support us to make our world healthier and peaceful

story:
Try it for free?

Holy smokes!Ah that time of the month. It’s such a pain. Metaphorically and literally. If you find yourself chugging your way through a couple of packets of Nurofen every month when aunt Flo comes to stay, you should  try  this clever New Technology gadget , painkillers not required.

You can select to get a sweetman free .But If you don't get the chance.You can also select to get  a Sweetman and a Sterling Silver Pendant Diamond Necklace which is selling at $79 each on Amazon from a jewelry company .It  means that you can almost use the Sweetman for free with their help. 

The new solution for instant pain relief from your period - no more pills, no more nonsense.  

 We've been working on a high tech solution for years, and we couldn't be prouder to present Sweetman

Sweetman is the reliever for your menstrual pain.With one single touch, the tiny device considerably reduce it by relaxing the contracted uterine and blocking pain signals from passing the brain . Sweetman is safe, non-invasive, drug-free, and therefore has no side effects. Better still,it can be worn comfortably while engaging in normal activities. 

Menstrual pain is caused by increased prostaglandin secretion from the endometrium causing abnormal uterine contractions leading to reduced uterine blood flow and ischaemic pain.Sweetman’s technology is based on “Acupuncture And Moxibustion”therapy .

“Acupuncture And Moxibustion”, a traditional Chinese therapeutic technique, has been put into pain relief and management practice for more than 4000 years .Billions of people have been cured by them In hospital in Japan, Korea and other Asian countries .

Sweetman attachs to your lower tummy to target the area you get the cramps. The sticker send pulses that stimulate the nerves, blocking pain receptors and preventing pain messages from travelling to the brain. ,we feel pain, thanks to pulses from our brain, so the clever little gadget works by stopping the brain’s pain signals right at the source. Sweetman also improves abnormal uterine contractions by stimulating points around the uterus. 

"My menstrual pains are really very bad,I always take large amounts of painkillers.
Now I don’t need any pills at all.”
Dara  28
A HR manager in HongKong

 “It’s very small and light ,Nobody notices when I wear it all days at school”
 Becky  21
 A student from HongKong University 

“I have been using the device regularly for 6 months.It doesnt intervene with my cycle, hormonal balance or anything like that.”
Wendy 26
                                       A Waiter from Restaurant in HongKong                                                                         
"Over 50% of women suffer from primary menstrual cramps, for which they consume large amounts of painkillers.Sweetman uses two pain relief therapies that does not involve drug consumption. Our clinical study have shown that the sweetman is very effective and has none of the side effects,such as nausea and drowsiness, which are commonly associated with drugs used to relieve period pain.I strongly recommend the use of the device to relieve PMS pain at any time."
Kendra
Women's Hospital in HongKong

 

The Sweetman diverse team is passionate about lifestyle,health and innovation.But most importantly,we truly believe that together we can change the lives of women for the better.

Abbott
CEO
An entrepreneur by nature ,with a diversified global background,who lives with a goal to create innovative products that make a difference in people’s lives.A leading expert in the field of scent marketing ,Working with companies who are passionate to leverage the most powerful and emotional scent in new innovative ways,to deliver brand-enriching experiences cultivate enhanced consumer loyalty. 

Kendra 
Medical Advisor 
A doctor in Women’s Hospital in HongKong.Acupuncture And Moxibustion and Transcutaneous electric Nerve stimulation has been used by Kendra for several decades in the treatment of menstrual pain.Now,Doctor Kendra is the woman behind Sweetman’s clinical research.

Hayden
Electronic Engineer
Is an experienced Medical Electronic Engineer with a passion for harnessing technology to solve health problems that people face in life.Hayden develops some pain relief devices that are specially used by Hospital .Now,He is the brain behind Sweetman’s technology .

Jessica
Industrial Designer
Sweetman’s head industrial designer.With over 10 years of experience in industrial design,
Jessica brought her expertise of translating the Sweetman idea into a real life awesome product.

               You know someone that needs The Sweetman          
Sharing is caring - Share The Sweetman with your friends and family!

The basics
Q: Is it effective for all type of menstrual pain?
A: Yes.The sweetman is indicated for the relief of primary menstrual pain.Sweetman may also help to relieve the pain of secondary menstrual pain due to conditions such  as  endometriosis,  fibroids  or  pelvic inflammatory disease. However if there is a question as to the reason for the pain then you should seek medical advice to establish the cause and identify the correct treatment.

Q: How long does it take for me to feel the effects?
A: No time at all. Once you attach the Sweetman pulse sticker you feel an instant pain relief.In cases of severe pain, Sweetman provides a significant relief, reducing pain by about 80 percent.

Q: Would I still need to take pills if I use Sweetman?
A: Nope. The purpose of Sweetman is to provide a drug-free solution for menstrual pains. The Sweetman considerably reduce it and even could completely eliminate the pain through stimulation, so it removes the need to take painkillers.

Q: During which part of my period should I wear Sweetman?
A: There is no recommended optimal time to use Sweetman. You can wear it whenever you want. Just put it on when you feel some pain, and take it from there.

Q: What is the difference between tens device and Sweetman ?
A: No,Sweetman’s technology is based on “Acupuncture And Moxibustion”and”Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation”. it's frequency and wave shape are unique and optimized especially for menstrual pain.

Q: Can I use it when I work or do other favourite activities ?
A:Its small size makes it convenient to wear all day and this allows you to get on with your normal life, without pain.

Q: Are there any limitations to use Sweetman?
A: Yes. If you have a heart pacemaker or have a heart rhythm problem,You should not use Sweetman.
 
We take health and safety very seriously
Q: Is it safe to use?
A: Yes, Sweetman is completely safe to use. We strive to meet the most stringent International standards and are near completion with the FDA and CE-Mark approval process.

Q: Was this tested with people?
A: Yes. sweetman was clinicly tested on 132 women. The clinical trial was conducted by  from Women’s Hospital - HongKong to very successful results.

Q: Can it affect my fertility?
A: Absolutely not. The sweetman process is external and doesn’t intervene with your cycle, your hormonal balance or anything like that.

Q: Are there any side effects?
A: the Sweetman has none of the side effects,such as nausea and drowsiness, which are commonly associated with drugs used to relieve period pain.

Operation
Q: How do I use it?
A:Simple,you take sticker attach it to where hurt and turn Sweetman on.there is even adjustable button to control the pulses according to your pain, and the whole thing is totally discreet.

Q: Will I need to change batteries?
A: No. Sweetman operates on internal batteries. You charge it by plugging it into any USB cable.

story:
Waterproof testing of eNoTrack

Testing nano waterproof capability of eNoTrack for 4min, you may watch video below (5x faster)

Main functions and features

Real time tracking and positioning. Using advanced GPS technology with 5~10m accuracy.

Two way calling and communication. You can call the device’s number,the device holder can answer or hang up.

Remotely voice monitoring. You can call the device’s number, the device will answer automatically, only admin or authorized number can operate the device.

SOS alert. When the device holder in a emergency, he/she can press the SOS button for 3 seconds, the device will make phone calling to the admin number and authorized numbers one by one. At the same time, a SOS alarm SMS will be sent to this numbers.

GEO-fence. You can set a safe area by SMS or APP. When your device holder will move out of the area, the device will send a alert SMS to the administrator number and the authorized numbers.

Over speed alert. You will receive a alert message via the APP and SMS when the device holder’s speed is higher than default speed set. More convenient for you to know your kids’ or parents’ actual situation.

Movement alert. You will receive a alert message when the device detect vibration by G-sensor.

Fall down detect and alert. Suitable for elderly lonely at home. Device will send alert message by APP or SMS after detect a fall down.

SMS checking location and parameters. If you don’t have access to your smart phone APP or web platform. We have SMS channel for you. You can know where are your kids or other relatives by sending a very simple SMS command and you can receive a SMS with their address. You can also check the device’s other parameters like IMEI, admin numbers, etc.

Support AGPS fast positioning. Using newest Ublox7 GPS solution, even in a place with weak GPS signal, the device can get location very fast.

Historical route checking. You can see where your kids/parents/pets in the past times in the APP or web platform.
 

One Tracker For All

Long time battery life. 4~6 days while moving, 8~10 days stand by time and low battery alert.

Remote Operations. Support remotely restart, remotely shutdown, remotely disable power off button, in case of faulty operation.

GSM Blind area report. When the device enter into a area without GSM signal, it will collect GPS data, after out of this area, it will uploading all GPS data packet together, more convenient for your management.

Smaller size but with a better performance. A professional team’s appearance design and numerous times of antenna tuning, to make it with a better GPS and GSM signal in a smaller size(43mm*43mm*12mm/14mm). It can fast and precise positioning even with weak GPS and GSM signal. Also with a good battery working time.

Available colors are Black, white, blue.

Support Mobile Apps (Android and IOS) and Web tracking

 

FAQ

Q. What is eNoTRack?

eNoTrack is advanced personal tracking device that can be attached to any belongings, keys or can be used as locket.

Q. What will happen if there is no GPS coverage.

When the device enter into a area without GSM signal, it will collect GPS data, after out of this area, it will uploading all GPS data packet together, more convenient for your management.

Q. Who can use it and what minimum age is required

Any age group can use this device, It can be used by Autistic or Alzheimer's Patient.. can be put on any belongings such as wallet or even pets.

Q. What type of SIM card it requires?

ENoTrack supports Micro Sim Card

Q. How it is suitable for special needs or Dementia or Alzheimer’s patient

It is two way communication device with sim card so you may call this device to talk to device holder or simply send an SMS to know the current location of device. It is such a small device that can be used as locket, It also detects if device holder falls down.

you can track it without interaction of device holder or device holder can call you

Q. Can I use it on 3G or 4G network?

Yes eNoTrack works on 3G or 4G network in fallback to 2G network mode as it uses 2G network.

Q. Is eNoTrack network locked device?

No It is not network locked device and can be used on any network in any country.

Q. What network and Bands eNoTrack uses?

eNoTrack uses GPS/GPRS at 850/ 900/1800/1900Mhz bands

Q. Can i determine area so I will be alerted if my Pet/Kid will move out of it?

Yes eNoTrack allow to set safe area via SMS or Mobile APP.

Q. Can i check history of device?

yes you can check historical record of your device any time.

Q. What is weight of eNoTrack?

Total weight of eNoTrack is 25grams

Q. What technologies eNoTrack uses?

eNoTrack uses fall down detection, AGPS, SMS, Web, mobile APPs and GPRS

Q. What is A-GPS?

A-GPS is Assisted Global Positioning System that enables fast positioning even in weaker coverage area

Q. is eNoTrack a bluetooth tracker

No eNoTrack is purely GPS and GSM tracker  and can be tracked globally unlike bluetooth tracker.

Q. What if it fails down in water?

eNoTrack is water proofed with nano water proofing technology which fully protects eNoTrack inside out so it is safe to be in water you may watch above video

Q. How The Funds Will Be Used

All the money collected from this crowd funding will go towards the production and shipping of eNoTrack

What technologies eNoTrack uses?eNoTrack uses fall down detection, AGPS, SMS, Web, mobile APPs and GPRSQ. What is A-GPS?A-GPS is Assisted Global Positioning System that enables fast positioning even in weaker coverage areaQ. is eNoTrack a bluetooth trackerNo eNoTrack is purely GPS and GSM tracker  and can be tracked globally unlike bluetooth tracker.Q. What if it fails down in water?eNoTrack is water proofed with nano water proofing technology which fully protects eNoTrack inside out so it is safe to be in water you may watch above videoQ. How The Funds Will Be UsedAll the money collected from this crowd funding will go towards the production and shipping of eNoTrack

story:
Atenção: 

Para facilitar para as pessoas que estão no Brasil, temos uma conta no Banco do Brasil para efetuar as contribuições. Ag 1189-4 Conta Poupança 180781-1 variação 51. Fernando Gonçalves de Almeida. CPF 298312368-58.

Claudia já fez todos os tratamentos convencionais para combater um câncer que, inicialmente foi diagnosticado na clavícula esquerda como Sarcoma de Ewing, em 2008, e que infelizmente resultou em uma metástase pulmonar. Nestes 7 anos de tratamento, já foi submetida a 5 cirurgias, 2 tratamentos de radiotarapia e 1 transplante de medula óssea autólogo (ela doou a medula para ela mesma), sem contar os percalços do tratamento que somam três tromboses, um AVC, colite neutropênica, e incontáveis sessões de quimioterapia. Porém, nem isso foi suficiente para acabar com sua alegria contagiante e vontade de viver. Atualmente, Claudia vive à base de remédios constantes e utiliza adesivos de opióides para amenizar suas dores. Quando os médicos nos informaram que nossa única esperança é um tratamento que só existe nos EUA (para o tipo de Sarcoma dela) e que é feito com anticorpos monoclonais, não tínhamos idéia de que custava tão caro. Quase perdemos as esperanças, porém achamos que não seria uma humilhação tão grande se viéssemos pedir ajuda para que essa jovem de 30 anos, recém casada, tenha mais uma chance de viver e continuar espalhando seu brilho por onde passa. Neste sentido, viemos por meio desta campanha levantar a quantia necessária para que ela possa fazer este tratamento de última geração.

Desde já agradeço.

Fernando Almeida, marido de Claudia.


Claudia has been taking all conventional cancer treatment. Her first tumor, in 2008, was located in left clavicle, but she had metastasis in both lungs. During this 7 years of treatment, she was submitted to 5 surgeries, 2 radiotherapy treatments and 1 autologous bone marrow transplantation. She also had three thrombosis, one cerebrovascular accident, colitis, uncountable chemotherapy sections, and many other consequences of the cancer treatment. However, none of these were enough to make she decide not to live. Nowadays, Claudia has to take daily medicines and uses transdermal patch for her pain relief. The physicians told us that our last hope now is travel to USA and try this monoclonal antibody treatment, but we didn't have any idea about the cost of this. When we find out the cost, we almost gave up. However, I thought better and decided to come here and ask to all of you a little help, in order to give my wife another chance to live. She is 30 years old, we are married less than 2 years and we would like to live many other years together. So, we came through this campaign ask you to help us to get the enough amount of money to perform this last generation treatment. 

Thank you in advance.


Fernando Almeida, Claudia's husband.

story:
Short Summary

Invented in 2009 by Michael and Christopher Hoskins, the Surf Skooter was created to fill the niche between surfing and bodyboarding. Each year thousands of beachgoers find themselves caught in the void of, “struggling to become a good surfer or settling for bodyboarding.” Unable to find a product that fills this middle ground, 10-year-old Michael and his father Chris, went to Home Depot, purchased some basic materials and invented the Surf Skooter.

Despite our humble beginnings, we wanted to ensure the Surf Skooter was a product we could be proud of. With this in mind, we spent the last 6 years refining the entire design. Moreover, we knew that if the Surf Skooter was truly going to be the world’s next great water sport, it had to be a blast in fresh water and snow!

Today we are excited to announce the culmination of our hard work! With your contributions through donations and social media, you will soon be able to see these beauties shredding on a wave near you!

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make the Surf Skooter a reality, we need your help in funding the expensive tooling required to begin manufacturing (approx. $13,000). We also need enough capital to purchase Skooter components at a volume discount! (approx. $15,000) If we achieve our funding goal, we will be able to accomplish both of these objectives! That’s why we are offering incredibly aggressive pricing on Surf Skooters! Please see the list below -

  Perk #1 Big Thanks! - $1
  Perk #2 Skooter Swag - $7
  Perk #3 Early Bird Surf Skooter – $35
  Perk #4 Early Bird Surf Skooter River Addition – $49
  Perk #5 Surf Skooter – $49
  Perk #6 Surf Skooter River Addition - $59
  Perk #7 Surf Skooter Family - $135
  Perk #8 Surf Skooter Dealer - $ 180

The Impact

The impact the Surf Skooter is going to have will be unlike any other ocean sport! Since the beginning of the development phase, we have had countless people with physically and mental disabilities ask where they could get their very own Skooter. Thanks to the boards unique design and retractable handle bars, thousands who once had limited too no access to the water will now be able to shred and have a blast! This ability to enable people through our product is one of the most important things that drive us at Surf Skooter!

Risks & Challenges

Developing injection molds, establishing a manufacturing supply chain, and coordinating global logistics can all be daunting tasks. Despite this, our team is uniquely qualified to handle the challenge! With a combined staff expensive exceeding 20 years in import/export and product design, we are confident in our ability to perform under pressure.

Moreover, we have already contracted with a highly qualified manufacturing firm that has years of experience in the ocean sports industry. We have also enlisted the help of a global logistics company that manages shipments for fortune 500 companies! Once our campaign is funded, we are ready to hit the ground running!

Ways to Help

Love the Surf Skooter and want to do more than financially contribute? Help us spread the word on social media! Tell your friends about the Surf Skooter on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and others! Get the press involved! The more people that know about Surf Skooter will result in more contributions!

Member of the Press?

If you are a member of the press and want to talk, send us an email or give us a jingle– michael@surfskooter.com | 714.987.1220

story:
Fingernails grow about 0.7-1.2mm per week;

1g finger nail produces 4 billion bacteria;

You can avoid bacteria by manicuring twice a week;

However, you may injure the nerve and skin and flesh due to poor lighting and visibility;

Poor finger nail leads to cracking and bleeding;

You need the automatic safety nail-trimmer!

After the invention of electric shavers we can shave decently at any time and in any area; Similarly, the invention of electric toothbrush has enabled us to brush more efficiently. However, we still cannot manicure safely. This curiosity drove us to bring a different feeling to mankind. Therefore, the automatic safety nail-trimmer was invented….

Sleek, compact design that you can carry anywhere with you.

Uses advanced German technology to trim each fingernail in mere 13 seconds. 

It collects all the nail bits in the form of powder in a tiny compartment which can be discarded easily

As you can see, the tradition nail clipper clips in a very uneven manner whereas the Automatic Nail-Trimmer, trims and files fingernails making them look like they're straight out of a manicure session. 

In the view of the deficiencies mentioned above, a technical problem solved by this invention is to provide an automatic and safe manicuring tool which is applied to fingers of different size and is safe to use.

 

The Automatic safety nail-trimmer was invented in collaboration with top german industrial design institute of Bergische Universität Wuppertal as first of its kind in the world and dedicated to bringing different enjoyment to the mankind. The founder and inventor of the company is dedicated to the research of individual nursing and has won more than 20 international patents successively.

To assure durability of each product and each blade, advanced design concepts, steel and blade processing processes, first-class production process control technologies in the world were undertaken

BERGISCHE UNIVERSITÄT WUPPERTAL

The Automatic Nail-Trimmer has been tested to check its durability, sturdiness, and water resistance capability. 

The enterprise has passed the Europe CE accreditation and ISO9001 accreditation

12 Global patent technologies

It has owned 12 global patent technologies; it enjoys patent protection in EU, USA, Japan and Korea
