story:
"Finally Lose Your Weight"

The Silver Bullet Approach(TM):

Lose 10 to 40 Pounds +   "Then Keep It Off" 

 

We have drawn upon the world's leading M.D.'s, Ph.D.'s & Health Care Professionals

* Use a natural supplement with an appetite suppressant so you are not hungry. It burns fat, provides critical digestive enzymes, and probiotics for health and weight loss. Recommended by a leading M.D.

* Omega 3 of exceptional quality for health & digestion

* AVOID the Four Key Foods which are keeping the weight on you and destroying your health

* Eat and drink the foods that keep you full all day and that are healthy. SIMPLE

* Walk 20 minutes + daily

* Optional Steps are included below 

* We Add Basic Coaching to Help You

 

THAT'S IT:  THE SECRET TO WEIGHT LOSS is The Silver Bullet Approach(TM)

 

Get The Silver Bullet Approach(TM):

1) In Written Form - easy to follow text in less than 12 pages + Basic Coaching

2) Or Discuss With Us and we will tell you the Secrets and Formula

3) WANT COACHING:  Sure. We can provide personal online coaching and guidance anywhere in the world using Skype Video or Call or by other means

Additional Items to HELP:

4) Get our ODC Diet Success Plans(TM) to really understand weight loss and to help you win

5)Get our ODC Weight Maintenance Plan(TM) to keep the weight off for life

5) Get our ODC Meal Plans(TM) to help daily

6) Get our ODC Cookbook(TM) to prepare the right foods and learn what foods to buy

7) Food Delivered. Need help with food - Get Your Food Delivered to keep it simple

WANT BETTER HEALTH:  We can provide Simple Information and Coach You to succeed

 

CONTACT US:  TheClinicsOnline@gmail.com

Contact us directly before purchasing Items to ensure it's right for you.

 

The Silver Bullet Approach STEPS(TM):

We have drawn upon the world's leading M.D.'s, Ph.D.'s & Health Care Professionals

1. We will provide information so you can purchase the natural supplement that takes the weight off you naturally - while improving your Gut Health.   It has an appetite suppressant that's natural so you won't be hungry - you simply eat less.  Without starving you will burn fat and improve your digestion and gut health.  Recommended by a leading M.D.

2. There are Four Foods which are literally destroying your health and keeping your weight on - we tell you what they are and how to Avoid Them.

3. Take a high quality Omega 3 for so many health benefits, digestion and weight loss.  But it must be the right product else it can be a waist of time.

4. You need not starve - who wants to do that?  There are key foods to eat that keep you full and are healthy.  Plus, Drink 50 oz. of fresh water daily (not tap water). We simply give you the secrets on what to eat.

5. Walk 20 minutes + daily to help balance your blood sugar and get active.  Its so healthy.  Do more activity - absolutely if you can.  But you don't need to go to Boot Camp.

6. Optional: We show you a free App to count calories daily with recommendations on Daily Net Calories.  Do that for 6 Weeks (or more if required).  No need to starve - just eat right and use the Supplement above so you frankly are not hungry and you are burning fat.

7. We can Coach You to Succeed.  Discuss your options.

Those are The STEPS.   Everyone makes this far more complicated than what it really needs to be!

Avoid Failure (and fear not) for a change by using this unique and easy to follow Approach.

 

Wayne Gretzky, LeBron James, Lindsay Vaughan, Ronaldo are world class athletes that all have a Coach (or had one).  Chances are you need a Coach too.  

We Coach & GUIDE You Online using Skype video or other means to achieve your goals.

 

BETTER HEALTH:  Contact us to discuss How To Achieve Better Health.  We provide the easy to follow information and can coach you online personally to succeed.  

VITALITY:  Get your VITALITY back and live a life of LONGEVITY.

ONE BENEFIT:     Leaky Gut Syndrome managed and a better Endocrine System:  A main cause of your weight issues are caused by gut health issues. Most of us, especially if overweight, have what's called Leaky Gut Syndrome - where toxins leak into our body from our small intestines and harm us greatly.   You don't digest foods properly, caused by several factors, but primarily from a bad diet over the years.

Cut out the bad foods that are harming you and follow the ODC Silver Bullet STEPS above to not only get healthy again but let the weight fly-off you naturally.  While assisting with leaky gut syndrome and improving your gut health.  That leads in part to avoiding Endocrine Disorders - where the glands in your body do not function properly and lead to weight gain and disease (the Thyroid is one prime example, if not functioning properly, then weight issues are often inevitable).

GUT HEALTH.  New accepted theory is:  that your GUT is perhaps the engine of your body.  If its not working properly you get fat, don't function properly, get brain fog, low energy and you get diseases like diabetes, heart disease, cancer and so on.

So Keep It Simple: Get Good Gut Health now and feel great. Improve Your Health!

 

HOW:   We draw upon world leading M.D.’s, Board Certified Specialists, Ph.D.’s,, Institutions & World Leading Clinics, Disease Societies, Health Care Professionals plus the number one products used in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) for centuries by physicians - which are now used within Asian hospitals and are also now supported by certain M.D.'s and Ph.D.'s in North America.

We generally provide evidence based alternative strategies and ones currently used by renowned private clinics – or generally all major items must be supported by medical professionals who are either M.D.’s or Ph.D.’s.  So it may be an alternative therapy but it must make common sense, be accessible and be endorsed by healthcare professionals or Ph.D.'s.  

This total combination of experts is unique by many standards.  You could spend years trying to connect the dots in this deadly health maze - only to pick the wrong approaches.  Let us save you the time, energy and stress. And get it right. In most cases time is not on your side and you may need guidance now.  We are here to help you.

We make the information available to you for consideration only and list the top strategies to consider for your specific concern.  And summarize the ones deemed to achieve best results in your adapted Strategy Approach. 

Then provide these strategies in easy to follow steps – so you can WIN.

 

CONTRIBUTE to our cause and with the proceeds we will help others less fortunate Overcome Obesity.  Together we can help many families overcome this disease.

https://www.xandershopping.com/  https://discountluxuryshopping.com/  https://patelshopping.com 

CLICK FOR:  Pop-Up Ad    Pop-Up 2    Pop-Up 3    Pop-Up  4   Pop-Up 5  Pop-Up Ad 6 POP 7        POP-UP Ad 8   Pop-Up 9

 

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION on WEIGHT LOSS

 

Diet & Activity Can Help You Lose The Weight That’s Harming You!  But the magic supplement speeds up the weight loss process to keep it SIMPLE.

 

GOALS: Use our Goal & Plan sheets and set your weight loss goal for a “new you” and be determined to win.

Obesity is a major problem in the industrialized world, and while the growth in obesity rates has been generally leveling off, the fact that obesity has doubled worldwide since 1980* is troubling in and of itself.  Obesity is  defined as anyone with a BMI greater than 30 - that is now about 1 in 3 Americans.

What has changed in our daily routines since the 80’s?

    Children spend more time in front of a screen than any other single activity (In the US, it’s 7.5 hours per day).

   This is almost at epidemic proportions; children need to become active and reduce their time on smartphones, computers/ tablets, and TV’s, or else obesity is a forgone conclusion when combined with the over-eating of bad food choices,

    Consumption of added sugar has doubled and is consumed in excess. Virtually 3 of 4 packaged foods (74%) include sugar (Quote per Dr. Frank Lustig, MD)

    Dinner, made with whole foods, and eaten at the table is a long-forgotten memory, while bringing home fast, convenience food is commonplace,

    The number of families where both parents work has doubled – and adults are working longer hours,

    For many, there are simply not enough hours in the day to prepare quality whole foods (Or, is it a matter of setting priorities?),

    Physical education in schools has been dramatically reduced (In the US, only 6 states require physical education in every grade, Kindergarten–12),

    In the US, only one in three children are physically active every day (and we wonder how many of these children reside in the states where activity is mandated in their schools?), and

    Fast food outlets are virtually everywhere and offer convenience to time-starved families - leading to terrible food choices.

 

Hint: Prepare your daily meals in advance and warm them prior to serving.  Freeze them if you must. NEVER use a microwave as they are very unhealthy – the body can’t digest microwaved foods properly.

 

Adult obesity rates for selected countries are shown in the chart below:

World Rank Country Adult Obesity Rate

12.   United States of America 35.0%

24.   New Zealand 30.6%

25.   Canada 30.1%

26.   Australia 29.9%

27.   United Kingdom 29.8%

So, if you, a friend or family member is obese, we really mean it when we say, You are not alone!  

       Of course, the question is: "What should people do to lose weight?"

 

Use The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) is one great step.  

Avoid Failure for a change and do something you can actually maintain and complete easily.

In many cases generally, our advice is clear: (1) Make an appointment with your Doctor and seek his/her recommendations; also meet with your trusted Health Care Professional for additional advice and information, (2) Create and follow a healthy diet and activity program, and (3) Have perseverance and patience.

Important: You must discuss the issue of balancing your blood sugar and the effect that insulin levels have on your body with your Doctor and Health Care Professional. This is a key problem, which may lead to obesity.

Blood sugar levels and insulin are related. Insulin helps balance your blood sugar levels.  Here’s how, as explained by endocrineweb: 

“The cells in your body need sugar for energy. However, sugar cannot go into most of your cells directly. After you eat food and your blood sugar level rises, cells in your pancreas (known as beta cells) are signaled to release insulin into your bloodstream…

If you have more sugar in your body than it needs, insulin helps store the sugar in your liver and releases it when your blood sugar level is low or if you need more sugar, such as in between meals or during physical activity. Therefore, insulin helps balance out blood sugar levels and keeps them in a normal range. As blood sugar levels rise, the pancreas secretes more insulin.

If your body does not produce enough insulin or your cells are resistant to the effects of insulin, you may develop hyperglycemia (high blood sugar), which can cause long-term complications if the blood sugar levels stay elevated for long periods of time.”

In addition to this website endocrineweb, there is an interesting book, The Obesity Code, written by Jason Fung, MD, which explores this subject in depth.

You need to remember that people do not become overweight or obese overnight; neither should they expect to lose their excess weight rapidly either.  

Slow and steady wins the race.

 

Weight Loss Shows:    Weight-loss television shows may be entertaining, but they are often not reality. Certainly, one will likely lose weight by exercising hard and consuming relatively few calories each day in a controlled environment, but who can adopt such an approach into daily life?

We should point out that many of these shows’ contestants gain weight after they leave the show and that explains the real problem: For many, the barrier to sustained weight-loss is being left on one’s own to tackle it. Chances are you need regular help.

 

A Recipe For Disaster:

If we were having a conversation about this, we would advise you (with your doctor’s permission and endorsement) to start by simply counting your calories and being aware of the normal adult levels to give you a sense of making better food choices. Then, “step down” your daily caloric goal, week by week.

We can tell you about a free App for your Smartphone or computer to Count Calories easily to stay on-track.

Once your daily calories are at normal adult levels for a few weeks, begin restricting them further and start to follow the OOC Diet Success Plan(TM).  We can provide that to you - discuss please.

The normal calories consumed daily are as follows:  For women at 1,600 calories and for men at 2,200 calories daily.  Try and get there over time - then go lower.  Over a 6-Week Period you could drop pounds quickly by simply counting your calories and eating the right foods to stay full and satisfied.  We can provide this magic formula to you - Contact Us.

BUT if you are eating the wrong foods and have leaky gut syndrome you will not optimize your weight loss results.  Get the right food choices and use our Approach to win.  Most folks who are obese are consuming in excess of 4,000 to 6,000+ daily calories.  Most people who are over-weight are consuming over 3,000+ calories daily.

Combined with terrible food choices, no activity, poor gut health and it is a Recipe For Disaster.

Severely overweight or obese people should lose weight during our suggested “step down” period and the rate of weight loss should increase once they begin the OCC Diet Success Plan because it is based on sound principles. When incorporated for overcoming obesity also adopt these good habits:

    We will inform you of the key foods to eat to stay full and healthy

    Eat whole foods only; avoid processed foods and junk foods

   AVOID: Soda drinks (diet and regular) and sugary drinks - they are your enemy

    Understand that FOUR Key Foods are Your ENEMY!  They are literally killing you and keeping the weight on.  Eliminate them and the weight starts to fly-off you.

    Generally eat all the fruits and veggies you like.  Unless you are diabetic then special foods need consideration.

    Drink lots of fresh water - not tap water.

    Light activity to start (walking 20 minutes daily and stretching, for instance); increase your activity with time. Activity is your friend.

 

For those who are burdened with lots of extra weight, I’d ask you to remember these 4 points:

1. Stop Over Eating.  And make better food choices. Using whole foods only. You are currently taking in too many calories each and every day to maintain your weight; to lose weight you must reduce your caloric intake.  BUT if you eat the wrong foods it does not matter how little you are eating.  This is key to understand.

2. It will take time to lose the weight; you need to be persistent and patient.

3. The ODC Diet Success Plan can help you succeed while being ACTIVE.

4. JUST START!

 

ONE THEORY:

One theory is that being over weight or obese is, at least in part, a result of a slow, under-performing thyroid gland according to some obesity associations or support groups.  We can inform you how to improve your Thyroid Health.  You see there is something called the Endocrine System - the glands in our body that supply hormones (thyroid gland and pancreas for example are key).

Poor Gut Health including Leaky Gut Syndrome can lead to Endocrine Disorder which can lead to disease and being over-weight (amongst other issues).  BUT this is crucial to understand.

That is why The Silver Bullet Approach is so important - because it takes gut health and the endocrine system into great consideration.  BUT WE KEEP IT SIMPLE - do you need to understand all this or just get on an approach that works ?  That is really up to you - we can explain this all to you in coaching sessions or simply give you the STEPS to succeed at weight loss and overcoming obesity.

Google “obesity” and start reading.  You will find other potential items that can lead to obesity. Getting out of any mental rut you may understandably be in is often a key part towards overcoming obesity or losing weight.  

By setting goals and having a plan to achieve them daily will certainly help your mental attitude. And treat yourself nicely – walks in the sunshine or by the water or in the woods are all helpful to our mental health. Stay busy and get your mind off your problems.

VITAMIN D received naturally from sunshine is now considered to be crucial to our health by many health care professionals.  30 minutes daily of sunshine without sunscreen is important to good health on so many levels.  It will help with your Gut Health and your metabolism in most instances.

We are of course focused primarily on diet and encourage you to get active. But be aware of these other issues related to obesity and weight loss and try your best.

 

A Personal Note From Our Founder:

If you are very over weight then I am sure you have faced some very difficult times in the past. Maybe it was bullying in the schoolyard, embarrassment or the suffering associated from certain health conditions. If this is happening to your child – there aren’t many other things that can affect us so negatively. I wish I could reach out, touch you, and say, “you will be OK.”  To a great extent we have written our information and approach with you in mind. And, I want to “feel” for you.  

However, my job is to help you.  So I must remind you that everything that may have happened to you previously – is now in the past.  You can’t change it. So let it go.  

What you can do is live in the present moment and be determined to change your life from this very point on.  Right now. This period of time you can definitely control. So, please do anything to set your weight goals and JUST START.

One “first step” should be this: Go to your fridge and kitchen cupboards right now and remove all the bad foods. What You Eat Matters, we can include a list of foods to avoid for you. Get rid of these foods from your home immediately and you will be forced to start making better food choices.

I wish you well on your health journey and truly hope that we can help you succeed and become THE NEW YOU."

 

Parents or Guardians of Over-Weight or Obese Children

Sorry, but this is tough love for you.  YOU need to change your lifestyle and understand how to eat better using whole foods, not to over-eat, and to get active. And, support your child to overcome obesity or to lose weight.  You need to become the teacher.

In most cases, you are enabling your children.   This may be because you don’t know better – and that’s OK, you are reading this information for insights to help you.  

Also, you are not alone, as many Americans are in the same boat.

If you watch the television shows about the lives of obese people, look at the food that parents bring home for their children:  

A big bucket of fried chicken

French fries

A big bottle of soda pop

Maybe, a pizza for later

Leftovers are microwaved later that night as a snack

 

These parents may have the best of intentions (to feed their children), but they are choosing the wrong foods. There are probably 3,000 calories+ alone in the foods listed above, and these food choices are full of all the foods we want you to AVOID; they are fried and processed foods. Please, stop doing that!

Stop going to fast food restaurants and start cooking whole foods at home.  

Start today by preparing this dinner for your child (and don’t use your microwave ever again):  

    A baked chicken breast, spiced with herbs (not sauces)

    Salad

    Fresh vegetables

    Fruit for dessert

    Fresh Water (not tap water), before and after dinner

After dinner, go for a walk with your child or get them active anyway you can.

Limit their “screen time” to 3 or 4 hours per day and get them outside being active with the “extra time” created by limiting their use of smartphones, tablets and TVs.

 

All the strategies and principles to help your overweight child (or children) are contained in our information that is available.  Please use them for yourself and your family. Consult our Cookbook for how to prepare your foods and for what foods to buy – The Shopping List is there.

This is your chance at a new start. We know you love your child and that’s why you are reading this information – to help him/her change.  So, please, take responsibility and learn how to make good food choices for your child.  Consider The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) for both you and your child.

"Remember: You Are Not Alone"

 

CONTACT US: TheClinicsOnline@gmail.com

 

ABOUT US

Our Founder & Managing Director

Mr. Mason has previously controlled and operated 25 Medical Clinics with a small team that had over 70 M.D.'s plus over 75 support staff on payroll. Certain clinics also offered pharmacy, laboratory, imagining, dental, physio, psychiatry, and other services in addition to family medicine and walk-in care.  He has been involved with projects including cardiovascular monitoring over the internet, PRP / Stem Cells, and Electronic Medical Records.  Also controlled previously with a small team 100 optical stores with optical lab.  He has previously been an author, broadcaster and public speaker.

He understands the medical business, how it functions and how the new delivery model to help others truly needs to be online - to save the health care system extensive costs and to be practical in today's evolving world. Plus after working with doctors for over the past 30 years knows the importance of only using medical professionals to provide and prove any strategies before providing the same for information purposes.

He is approaching the age of 60 and has the experience, drive and ability to lead the Online Diet Clinics onto greatness.  He is not a doctor rather an experienced businessman. He has great vision and compassion for others and knows how to treat all team members with respect and to give them the confidence so they can personally excel.  And truly wants to help others.  Previously he has been involved with extensive real estate development projects - if you can build buildings you can get thru many business issues at all levels.

A Personal Note from Our Founder:

"My personal weight loss journey started over 8 years ago - initially I lost about 35 pounds over a few months.  But more importantly I discovered how to keep the weight off for life.

Today I am about 40 pounds below where I started and doing a good job of maintaining my weight.  More importantly I have discovered that disease is directly related to our nutrition.  We will share many of these insights with you.  However no one needs to be perfect.  I certainly am not!  I have ups and downs like so many of us.  Life just is not perfect.

Initially we started out to create an online medical clinic to help others - only to realize that doctors can not generally provide their services outside of their jurisdiction of governance or not even online in most jurisdictions.  However, we know that the future of health care must be delivered online.

Accordingly, we have developed our delivery model, systems and processes - they really are unique and will help change the world. So when challenged with not being able to have doctors directly on staff - we turned to perhaps something better.  We decided to draw upon world leading medical professionals and authorities to help others - and not to be restricted to just any one physician. 

We have spent the majority of our time not on marketing; rather on development and research (as one can only imagine how consuming that must be).  So when we say we can potentially save you years of research to understand how to deal with obesity or weight loss - we mean it.

I was perhaps one of the several pioneers in developing walk-in medical clinics many years ago.  Today walk-in medical clinics are very common.  We anticipate that our style of online clinics will also become common within 15 years.  For now we are unique - but our strategies are based upon the years of experience and studies of certain medical professionals.

We truly are here to help and will do our best by you.  I wish you well on your health journey and really hope that we can assist you or your loved ones. 

Our Vision is to revolutionize how we ALL manage or prevent disease and to enhance LONGEVITY."    

In our case, it will be, "One Client at a Time."

Associate Coaches                      Medical Advisers

Natural Health Advisers             Research Associates

And get it right. In most cases time is not on your side and you may need guidance now.  We are here to help you.We make the information available to you for consideration only and list the top strategies to consider for your specific concern.  And summarize the ones deemed to achieve best results in your adapted Strategy Approach. Then provide these strategies in easy to follow steps – so you can WIN. CONTRIBUTE to our cause and with the proceeds we will help others less fortunate Overcome Obesity.  Together we can help many families overcome this disease.https://www.xandershopping.com/  https://discountluxuryshopping.com/  https://patelshopping.com CLICK FOR:  Pop-Up Ad    Pop-Up 2    Pop-Up 3    Pop-Up  4   Pop-Up 5  Pop-Up Ad 6 POP 7        POP-UP Ad 8   Pop-Up 9 ADDITIONAL INFORMATION on WEIGHT LOSS Diet & Activity Can Help You Lose The Weight That’s Harming You!  But the magic supplement speeds up the weight loss process to keep it SIMPLE. GOALS: Use our Goal & Plan sheets and set your weight loss goal for a “new you” and be determined to win.Obesity is a major problem in the industrialized world, and while the growth in obesity rates has been generally leveling off, the fact that obesity has doubled worldwide since 1980* is troubling in and of itself.  Obesity is  defined as anyone with a BMI greater than 30 - that is now about 1 in 3 Americans.What has changed in our daily routines since the 80’s?    Children spend more time in front of a screen than any other single activity (In the US, it’s 7.5 hours per day).   This is almost at epidemic proportions; children need to become active and reduce their time on smartphones, computers/ tablets, and TV’s, or else obesity is a forgone conclusion when combined with the over-eating of bad food choices,    Consumption of added sugar has doubled and is consumed in excess. Virtually 3 of 4 packaged foods (74%) include sugar (Quote per Dr. Frank Lustig, MD)    Dinner, made with whole foods, and eaten at the table is a long-forgotten memory, while bringing home fast, convenience food is commonplace,    The number of families where both parents work has doubled – and adults are working longer hours,    For many, there are simply not enough hours in the day to prepare quality whole foods (Or, is it a matter of setting priorities?),    Physical education in schools has been dramatically reduced (In the US, only 6 states require physical education in every grade, Kindergarten–12),    In the US, only one in three children are physically active every day (and we wonder how many of these children reside in the states where activity is mandated in their schools?), and    Fast food outlets are virtually everywhere and offer convenience to time-starved families - leading to terrible food choices. Hint: Prepare your daily meals in advance and warm them prior to serving.  Freeze them if you must. NEVER use a microwave as they are very unhealthy – the body can’t digest microwaved foods properly. Adult obesity rates for selected countries are shown in the chart below:World Rank Country Adult Obesity Rate12.   United States of America 35.0%24.   New Zealand 30.6%25.   Canada 30.1%26.   Australia 29.9%27.   United Kingdom 29.8%So, if you, a friend or family member is obese, we really mean it when we say, You are not alone!         Of course, the question is: "What should people do to lose weight?" Use The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) is one great step.  Avoid Failure for a change and do something you can actually maintain and complete easily.In many cases generally, our advice is clear: (1) Make an appointment with your Doctor and seek his/her recommendations; also meet with your trusted Health Care Professional for additional advice and information, (2) Create and follow a healthy diet and activity program, and (3) Have perseverance and patience.Important: You must discuss the issue of balancing your blood sugar and the effect that insulin levels have on your body with your Doctor and Health Care Professional. This is a key problem, which may lead to obesity.Blood sugar levels and insulin are related. Insulin helps balance your blood sugar levels.  Here’s how, as explained by endocrineweb: “The cells in your body need sugar for energy. However, sugar cannot go into most of your cells directly. After you eat food and your blood sugar level rises, cells in your pancreas (known as beta cells) are signaled to release insulin into your bloodstream…If you have more sugar in your body than it needs, insulin helps store the sugar in your liver and releases it when your blood sugar level is low or if you need more sugar, such as in between meals or during physical activity. Therefore, insulin helps balance out blood sugar levels and keeps them in a normal range. As blood sugar levels rise, the pancreas secretes more insulin.If your body does not produce enough insulin or your cells are resistant to the effects of insulin, you may develop hyperglycemia (high blood sugar), which can cause long-term complications if the blood sugar levels stay elevated for long periods of time.”In addition to this website endocrineweb, there is an interesting book, The Obesity Code, written by Jason Fung, MD, which explores this subject in depth.You need to remember that people do not become overweight or obese overnight; neither should they expect to lose their excess weight rapidly either.  Slow and steady wins the race. Weight Loss Shows:    Weight-loss television shows may be entertaining, but they are often not reality. Certainly, one will likely lose weight by exercising hard and consuming relatively few calories each day in a controlled environment, but who can adopt such an approach into daily life?We should point out that many of these shows’ contestants gain weight after they leave the show and that explains the real problem: For many, the barrier to sustained weight-loss is being left on one’s own to tackle it. Chances are you need regular help. A Recipe For Disaster:If we were having a conversation about this, we would advise you (with your doctor’s permission and endorsement) to start by simply counting your calories and being aware of the normal adult levels to give you a sense of making better food choices. Then, “step down” your daily caloric goal, week by week.We can tell you about a free App for your Smartphone or computer to Count Calories easily to stay on-track.Once your daily calories are at normal adult levels for a few weeks, begin restricting them further and start to follow the OOC Diet Success Plan(TM).  We can provide that to you - discuss please.The normal calories consumed daily are as follows:  For women at 1,600 calories and for men at 2,200 calories daily.  Try and get there over time - then go lower.  Over a 6-Week Period you could drop pounds quickly by simply counting your calories and eating the right foods to stay full and satisfied.  We can provide this magic formula to you - Contact Us.BUT if you are eating the wrong foods and have leaky gut syndrome you will not optimize your weight loss results.  Get the right food choices and use our Approach to win.  Most folks who are obese are consuming in excess of 4,000 to 6,000+ daily calories.  Most people who are over-weight are consuming over 3,000+ calories daily.Combined with terrible food choices, no activity, poor gut health and it is a Recipe For Disaster.Severely overweight or obese people should lose weight during our suggested “step down” period and the rate of weight loss should increase once they begin the OCC Diet Success Plan because it is based on sound principles. He has great vision and compassion for others and knows how to treat all team members with respect and to give them the confidence so they can personally excel.  And truly wants to help others.  Previously he has been involved with extensive real estate development projects - if you can build buildings you can get thru many business issues at all levels.A Personal Note from Our Founder:"My personal weight loss journey started over 8 years ago - initially I lost about 35 pounds over a few months.  But more importantly I discovered how to keep the weight off for life.Today I am about 40 pounds below where I started and doing a good job of maintaining my weight.  More importantly I have discovered that disease is directly related to our nutrition.  We will share many of these insights with you.  However no one needs to be perfect.  I certainly am not!  I have ups and downs like so many of us.  Life just is not perfect.Initially we started out to create an online medical clinic to help others - only to realize that doctors can not generally provide their services outside of their jurisdiction of governance or not even online in most jurisdictions.  However, we know that the future of health care must be delivered online.Accordingly, we have developed our delivery model, systems and processes - they really are unique and will help change the world. So when challenged with not being able to have doctors directly on staff - we turned to perhaps something better.  We decided to draw upon world leading medical professionals and authorities to help others - and not to be restricted to just any one physician. We have spent the majority of our time not on marketing; rather on development and research (as one can only imagine how consuming that must be).  So when we say we can potentially save you years of research to understand how to deal with obesity or weight loss - we mean it.I was perhaps one of the several pioneers in developing walk-in medical clinics many years ago.  Today walk-in medical clinics are very common.  We anticipate that our style of online clinics will also become common within 15 years.  For now we are unique - but our strategies are based upon the years of experience and studies of certain medical professionals.We truly are here to help and will do our best by you.  I wish you well on your health journey and really hope that we can assist you or your loved ones. Our Vision is to revolutionize how we ALL manage or prevent disease and to enhance LONGEVITY."    In our case, it will be, "One Client at a Time." TEAM and TEAM MEMBERS TO DEVELOPManaging Director                      Senior CoachesAssociate Coaches                      Medical AdvisersNatural Health Advisers             Research AssociatesCommunications Director         Operations DirectorOperations Staff                            Marketing & Client Support  CONTACT US:   TheClinicsOnline@gmail.com  IMPORTANT DISCLAIMERWE ARE NOT DOCTORS.  OUR SERVICES CAN NOT BE CONSTRUED AS MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS, MEDICAL TREATMENT, OR CURE OF ANY DISEASE, OR AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR THOSE SERVICES, WHICH CAN ONLY BE PERFORMED BY A LICENSED PHYSICIAN OR DOCTOR. THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES OFFERED RESPECTING OUTCOMES OR RESULTS OF OUR SERVICES AND PLANS. WE CAN ONLY PROVIDE INFORMATION TO YOU AND ENCOURAGE YOU TO CONTINUE TO TAKE YOUR DOCTOR'S ADVISE. ADDITIONAL DISCLAIMER AND INFORMATION WILL BE PROVIDED.

story:
Hey guys!!

 

My name is Andy, and I'm looking to change the Global Fitness Industry.

Bold statement yes, but with your help, we will achieve it together. 

Flex Protein was born from the fallout of a late evening arm session. I'd got home from the gym and opened up my colossal bag of generic strawberry protein and dreaded having to swallow the same boring generic flavour for the tenth time this week.

Fumbling through the powder to find the scoop i glanced over at my cupboard full of half used bags of whey I'd already got bored of and ditched and wondered how much id spent on unused protein, only to jump back online and order more, telling myself that this time ill finish the whole lot.

 How many times have i needlessly lined the pockets of protein companies for unused protein? 

Protein intake should not be a chore neither should it be wasteful. It was then that Flex was born.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need £25,000 to acquire the stock of all the supplements Flex will supply (Protein powders, BCAA's, Creatine, Vitamins, Pre workout etc), stock of our premium brand gym wear, Packaging, Website and online store construction and online marketing campaigns to start our journey to being a global game changer in the supplement market.

All backers, however small, will receive a 25% off their first order with Flex Protein, excluding apparel.

 

Your contribution will change the way the world buys its supplements.

story:
Ben and I enjoy working out and living a healthy lifestyle, but hate the inconvenience and cost behind taking the proper supplementation. One day we decided enough was enough, no more paying crazy money for supplements or going to a supplement store where companies give cash incentives to push there products.  It was time for a change!

Our team is on a mission to make buying supplements convenient and affordable with an advanced website that educates the consumer, free shipping, crazy affordable prices by selling directly to the consumer (all pill products cost $7 & powder products cost $15), and never having to deal with a supplement store again!   

Scroll Down For More Details.....

Nickel & Dime Supplement Club has built a team with years of experience developing ingredient list for major supplement companies (They were sick of the industry and wanted to make a change as well!). The team has members with Ph. D's developing simple, but effective formulas for our members. The goal is to remove all filler ingredients and never hide our ingredients behind "proprietary blend"... EVER. 

 

 

 

 

 

         

The supplement industry has been charging a FORTUNE for products you need to take in order to live a healthy lifestyle. Nickel & Dime Supplement Club is making healthy living affordable, all pill products cost $7 & powder products cost $15. 

What makes us different from any other subscription company? FIRST OFF, this is a club. You are a member. We do not consider ourselves a "subscription" company. Second, we sell our own Nickel & Dime supplements. We are not the middle man between you and a supplement company, you are buying straight from the source and seeing the savings because of it! 

Stop wasting your precious time by driving to the store every week. We ship your custom membership box to your door monthly (or whatever frequency your select) with free shipping on ALL orders. You buy one can of multivitamins? Free Shipping. You buy all 6 products? Free Shipping.  

You can set your reorder schedule for whatever frequency you would like. You can get your box monthly, bi monthly, etc. Also, you can change what items you would like shipped whenever you would like. No limits! 

 

 

We only use the highest quality ingredients! All products go through an intense testing process to assure product safety. 

Do you have hours to research and study every ingredient in all the products you consume? Probably not, so let us help! We will make sure you understand what you are taking before you click buy. 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Risk? No risk here because we are awesome....

Just Kidding!

We have worked extremely hard to ready this product/concept for Indiegogo. Full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment is ready for launch, but here are a few potential challenges:

MANUFACTURING: We have found a great manufacturer for the supplements and our custom boxes for fulfillment. The production time on a first order is 8-12 weeks, product testing is very intense especially the first time our formula is created. Production could take longer to guarantee our members are getting only the safest products.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: Once our campaign ends and we prepare to start production, we will evaluate feedback and make necessary adjustments to our formulas if needed. Outside of that, we are ready to start production on our supplements and boxes.

FULFILLMENT: Our supplement manufacturer will handle all fulfillment, which will allow us to send products immediately once production is complete. We need to anticipate some issues initially when trying to sync our online store with our manufacturer or any other small issues that can happen during the launch of a new company. We have already setup our fulfillment and feel comfortable all potential "challenges" have been discussed, but this is a very complicated product to fulfill because of all the variations. Fulfillment should not cause any delay because our manufacturer is fulfilling in house.

 

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us fix the supplement industry and change it forever by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

THANK YOU for your help! Please share our story and campaign with all your friends via Facebook or word of mouth. It helps tremendously!

story:
Short Summary

After spending years in a high-stress tech job, struggling with low level inflammation for most of my life, I finally got really sick. But according to the endless doctors I visited, there was nothing wrong with me, even after months of tests and missed work and discomfort. When my illness finally mysteriously went away, I left tech, went to health-supportive culinary school, and then founded and managed a health-supportive food company in DC for about 5 years (Postmodern Foods).

Once I realized the most satisfying part of running a food business was watching my loyal customers gradually eat better, improve their lives, leave bad marriages, move up the ladder at work, and just generally look/feel/act better, I knew I wanted to develop systems that would scale larger than me, or my customer base in DC, or any one dietary paradigm. I realized over years of counseling people regularly, that no one diet works for all people - not even for the same person from hour to hour, day to day, or year to year. You see, our environment is constantly evolving (morning is sunny, evening is dark, for example), and our bodies are evolving both as a result of internal and external factors (e.g. I got in a fight with my spouse today).

I, and a small team, want to bring to market an app that will incorporate everything I've learned, both formally in the classroom at the world's best-known health-supportive culinary school (Natural Gourmet Institute), and in real-world practice for 5 years. I want to bring together eastern and western insights, like expansive/contractive and DNA analysis, to provide a world-class nutrition coaching app that will suggest ideal foods for you no matter where you are, respond to your biofeedback, adjust, provide robust tracking, and make it fun through social support and competitions!

Your contribution will not only provide you first-adopter access to the app once it's built, but it will also open the door to the most-affordable, most-predictive, most-customized healthy eating app on the market.

Plus, not only will you be helping yourself by eating better, you'll also be helping someone in need: for each yearly subscription, we'll give one away to someone who otherwise wouldn't be able to afford or access any type of nutritional coaching. If good nutrition is the cornerstone of good health, this is how we begin to level the playing field between the classes in our country, while also making a dent in health care costs: about 20% of the US GDP is spent on healthcare, about 80% of which is spent on chronic diseases which are preventable through better diet and lifestyle choices! Let's make those choices smarter, easier, and more accessible.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $50,000 to develop, market, and release Panacea! Most of this will be going to custom development work and integrations necessary to make a unique nutritional algorithm and allow integrations with food providers like Instacart.

For the interested: For $1 you can get access to all our latest updates, before the general public.

For the early bird: For $80 you can get free access to the app for 1 year after launch.

For the future user: For $100 you can get free access to the app for 1 year after launch.

For the early bird who's on board: For $180 you can get free access to the app for 1 year, including DNA testing results and analysis.

For the individual who's on board: For $200 you can get free access to the app for 1 year, including DNA testing results and analysis.

Family Pack: For $1,000 you can get free access to the app for 1 year, including DNA, for 6 people.

Office Pack: For $10,000 you can get free access to the app for 1 year, including DNA, for 55 people, and an optional in-person demo.

Superstar Pack: For $100,000 you can get free access to the app for 1 year, including DNA, for 520 people, and an in-person meeting and meal customized by our founder, Denise Hicks.

If we don't meet our entire fundraising goal, we'll figure out how to make the absolute best possible version of the app with a few corners cut!

The Impact

I want to help people live better lives:

- minimize inflammation and chronic disease
- stop calorie counting
- stop guessing how to follow complicated diets
- bring the best of east/west nutritional models together
- make it easy
- make it fun
- compete and share successes to provide motivation!
- democratize good nutritional knowledge through sponsored subscriptions
- make a dent in global health care costs related to preventable diseases of diet/lifestyle

Risks & Challenges

The greatest risks to our project are stringent App store rules - we have to make sure the app is built well and beautifully to get accepted and marketed. The biggest challenge will be getting the nutritional algorithm right... I think this will be a living breathing process, but we'll begin by layering all the wisdom we can gather from well-known Eastern models and emerging Western research; we'll validate results through users and constantly refine it, both collectively, and individually.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially, no worries! Here are some other ways you can support the mission! 

  • Please share to help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Contact your local media to see if they'd like to cover our story!

Thanks for your support.

In good health,
Denise

story:
The Forearm Dumbbell:

The forearm dumbbell is the leading tool for training forearms.  This inexpensive user-friendly tool will revolutionize the way anyone trains their forearms.

To build stronger forearms for functional training, rehabilitation or looks this is the tool you will need to get the job done.

Story

While working as a carpenter I discovered that swinging a hammer all day will build very strong forearm muscles.  If you know any construction workers for that matter you will notice that they have very strong forearm muscles, just shake their hand.  The constant movement of swinging a hammer gave me the idea of designing a tool that can be used in the gym to train your forearms similar to the way you would swing a hammer. 

The forearm dumbbell will increase the size and strength of your forearm muscles in a very simple and user friendly way.  

Just watch the videos and read the articles about forearm training on my website and you too will soon have strong forearms.

Short Summary

Hello, my name is Matt Scudieri and I am from Haledon, New Jersey.  In the past I have worked as a Marine, Garbage man, Machinist, Manufacturing Engineer, Carpenter and Teacher of Special Education, History, GED and English as a Second Language.  Currently I am working as a Carpenter, Real Estate Agent and entrepreneur. 

The project I am currently working on is the Forearm Dumbbell. The Forearm Dumbbell is a new and unique tool for training our forearms. 

I have completed prototypes.             -           Facebook / social media pages.

Explainer Video.                                       -           Publishable training articles.

Website.                                                      -           Photos for marketing.

Zero debt.                                                  -           No investors / partners.

                A Provisional Patent that expires February 2020.

                A desire to succeed that is unstoppable.

What We Need & What You Get

I have sunk every penny I earn into getting to the point we are with the forearm dumbbell and am nearly out of money.

We need funding for marketing, increasing our inventory and a non-provisional patent.

The cost for the Non-Provisional Patent Application process will be approximately $3,000 to $7,000.

Marketing cost will be approximately $3,000 to start.  

We will also need as much as we can get to increase our inventory.  Currently it costs $1,000 to make a fixed set of forearm dumbbells (6 pairs plus a rack).  This price will be greatly reduced when manufactured in volume.   And $100 to make a pair of adjustable dumbbell.

I would like to increase or inventory of fixed set of forearm dumbbells (6 pairs plus a rack) to 5 sets.  This will cost approximately $5,000

I would also like to increase our inventory of adjustable forearm dumbbells to 10 pairs.  This will cost approximately $1,000

Total cost of $12,000 to $16,000

I would appreciate every penny.  Currently I am in the process of making t-shirts and will be giving away one t-shirt to all donors who donate over $45.00.  Donations of over $100 will receive a pair of adjustable forearm dumbbells.

I am also willing to negotiate a portion of my company to investors.

The Impact

This product is the first tool in the fitness industry used to train the forearms in over a generation.  This is a great opportunity to change the fitness industry and the way athletes train their forearms. 

I am very passionate about becoming a successful entrepreneur.  The reason why?  I never want to be broke again.  This is my first attempt to become an entrepreneur and have dedicated a lot of time educating myself about what it takes to be successful.  I have sunk nearly every penny into this and will not stop doing whatever it take to make this work.

Risks & Challenges

The fitness industry can be a little more risky then many industries.  There are a handful of mega corporations that dominate the business.  I don’t fear this but I do understand that in can make our goals a little more challenging.  Also the gym industry is dominated by big franchise companies that often do not allow independent owner operators to purchase equipment that is not authorized.  This can make it challenging to get our foot in the door. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Advice from entrepreneurs, industry experts, design, manufacturing and marketing experts is always greatly appreciated.   Please help spread the word to anyone in your network who is interested in investing in gym equipment, fitness, strength and conditioning or a challenge.

https://www.facebook.com/ForearmDB/?modal=admin_todo_tour

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3EncHY8HnE2BEkJvcS5Lrg/?fbclid=IwAR2_xHmZQr4F6Q0L0PvVaz9W31wwq465uooutky_zhTfP5qpKnOOJ0SYHZk 

https://forearmdb.wixsite.com/mysite?fbclid=IwAR2uNcQ31ZdklZ2CBe1OLQ0Yg8esjqSWiNUZoXZU6BKph_LYnLhKDhtGoUc

Marketing cost will be approximately $3,000 to start.  
We will also need as much as we can get to increase our inventory.  Currently it costs $1,000 to make a fixed set of forearm dumbbells (6 pairs plus a rack).  This price will be greatly reduced when manufactured in volume.   And $100 to make a pair of adjustable dumbbell.
I would like to increase or inventory of fixed set of forearm dumbbells (6 pairs plus a rack) to 5 sets.  This will cost approximately $5,000
I would also like to increase our inventory of adjustable forearm dumbbells to 10 pairs.  This will cost approximately $1,000
Total cost of $12,000 to $16,000
I would appreciate every penny.  Currently I am in the process of making t-shirts and will be giving away one t-shirt to all donors who donate over $45.00.  Donations of over $100 will receive a pair of adjustable forearm dumbbells.
I am also willing to negotiate a portion of my company to investors.

The Impact
This product is the first tool in the fitness industry used to train the forearms in over a generation.  This is a great opportunity to change the fitness industry and the way athletes train their forearms. 
I am very passionate about becoming a successful entrepreneur.  The reason why?  I never want to be broke again.  This is my first attempt to become an entrepreneur and have dedicated a lot of time educating myself about what it takes to be successful.  I have sunk nearly every penny into this and will not stop doing whatever it take to make this work.

Risks & Challenges
The fitness industry can be a little more risky then many industries.  There are a handful of mega corporations that dominate the business.  I don’t fear this but I do understand that in can make our goals a little more challenging.  Also the gym industry is dominated by big franchise companies that often do not allow independent owner operators to purchase equipment that is not authorized.  This can make it challenging to get our foot in the door. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Advice from entrepreneurs, industry experts, design, manufacturing and marketing experts is always greatly appreciated.   Please help spread the word to anyone in your network who is interested in investing in gym equipment, fitness, strength and conditioning or a challenge.
https://www.facebook.com/ForearmDB/?modal=admin_todo_tour
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3EncHY8HnE2BEkJvcS5Lrg/?fbclid=IwAR2_xHmZQr4F6Q0L0PvVaz9W31wwq465uooutky_zhTfP5qpKnOOJ0SYHZk https://forearmdb.wixsite.com/mysite?fbclid=IwAR2uNcQ31ZdklZ2CBe1OLQ0Yg8esjqSWiNUZoXZU6BKph_LYnLhKDhtGoUc

story:
We want to bring the production of respirators
and surgical masks back to the USA 

 


 

In a crisis where the biggest trade partner of the US, China, is unable to provide the country with the necessary health environment for American citizens, we decided to take care of the people by producing maximum protection face masks ourselves.

As you might know, most of the healthcare items  that we use are produced in China. Unfortunately, though, you won’t get any new supplies from them because they need them for themselves and are not going to export anything for the next little while. So, before more and more people get infected with the virus because most hospitals and pharmacies have run out of face masks and won’t get new supplies, we have to step up and produce new supplies here and not wait for them to come.

Face mask production inside the USA

FFP3/N99 masks (Filtering Face Piece) will be exclusively produced to protect people from the new deadly epidemic that is rapidly spreading all over the world. The masks offer protection from toxic and health-damaging dust, smoke and aerosols.

Facemasks with an FFP3/N99 protection level provide the best possible protection from breathing air pollution. With a total leakage maximum of 5% and the necessary protection from a minimum of 99% of particles up to 0.6μm in size, FFP3/N99 masks are capable of filtering toxic, radioactive and carcinogenic particles.

The masks offer protection to risk groups when dealing with viruses and bacteria such as coronavirus.

We feel like we have a duty

... to serve the country in this, and future, situations. We will have to help each other.

We want to buy special machines that are able to produce these FFP3/N99 masks, which will prevent you from getting infected by deadly diseases, toxic dust, radioactive and carcinogenic particles.

The machine is able to produce 30 masks per minute (1,800 per hour/43,200 per day ~1.300.000 per month and machine!). We have pre-contracts with the producer himself, and will order the first machine immediately upon reaching our goal of $142,500 (prices may vary in this campaign  because we are based in Austria, but we have already established a US company for the production process). The machine/s will be delivered as soon as possible to Los Angeles, California (Glendale) where the production process will start. We will order additional machines if our bonus orders exceed 300,000 masks to be able to deliver them as fast as possible. 


Timeline

As our project is set to 14 days, after collecting the necessary money we will immediately (as soon as we reach $140k) order the machine. The manufacturer needs 25 days for production and an additional ten days for delivery. The earliest shipping of the perks will therefore be mid/late April 2020.

Of course, the bonuses to the people who help us are granted in first row, taxes and shipping included. If you agree, your name will be written on our upcoming homepage as a Zero Hour supporter.
 

Future

Of course we will continue producing the masks for hospitals and doctors in the US for future use. But we also want to bring back following health goods production - as soon as we start shipping the first masks! 

  • Surgical Masks
  • ​Latex Gloves
  • Sanitizer
 

It is time for us to help people out and take care of a big problem that is being
underestimated in the media and on social media platforms.
 

Support us to bring the production of
essential health goods back to the USA!

 

The Team

Thomas Kager            David Kager                Valod Grigorian

 

As seen on

                                                                                                                                                           

 

Risk

One risk could be that we are not allowed to enter the US because of the current ban on European travelers. In this case, we already have a team of two in Los Angeles to assemble and operate the production machine. However, we are sure there will be no problem because of the current immediate need for such machines. We will stay in contact with officials to keep you informed.

 

If you think this what we need now and in future to prevent this unwanted situation - please share our project!


Simply use the built in Indiegogo share tools!

All backers will also get a 20% LIFETIME DISCOUNT on our products!

story:
Background story

During the spread of the Corona Virus, we quickly came up with places where we could infect ourselves in everyday life:

Starting with doorknobs, the handrails and door openers in buses and trains, the self service refrigerators or bread counters in the grocery store, when paying at card terminals or using the ATM, at traffic lights, mail boxes, trash cans, the light switch, or even the soap and disinfectant dispensers in the office or gym!

Therefore, we were looking for effective protection: In the absence of a proper solution, we quickly adopted it ourselves and created our patented 6.FINGER - which touches all the nasty things instead of your own hand.

Whats great about it: No additional refilling costs & no annoying gloves to wear in summertime!

Now the only question left was:

How to store it absolute fail proof?

Our Goal - Your Goal!

We researched - invented - developed - tested - improved - reinforced & entered serial production already - self-funding 100% of our 6.FINGER | "The Defender" operation!

It is time to take bigger steps: We have proven that we can deliver without support!

But now let us climb the last summit together: Help us develop a fail-safe cover so that everyone can be sure that they will never experience cross-contamination, even if they use their 6.FINGER in dark situations (in low-light and no-light conditions)!

How?

We, the Inventors and Engineers, are busy keeping up the production of our 6.FINGER right now!

If we notice there is a demand for the Cover and we see the funds raising, we will immediately hire more Staff to take care of the logistical part - so we have time again to get back to the drawing table.

We will research and develop "the Cover": Make some Prototypes and put them under any stress condition you can imagine, until they break. This is the fun part for us :o)

In the next step we will improve the design again and repeat the process of improving&testing until a rock-solid Cover comes along that proves to be durable and offering all the features we have in mind.

As soon as this step is done, we will craft the custom tooling's and start production - everything while in funding process!

So in the final end you definitely will receive a piece of hardware again, that will withstand any condition and last you maybe a life-time!

Expect the same Standards as with our 6.FINGER "the Defender" Tool:

Made in Berlin

ISO 9001 certified Production Facility's

We only use German Federal Environment Agency certified recycled paper for all our goods

Our server & office runs entirely on Green-Energy!

 

How long to wait?

Best part of it: You don't need to wait 6 months for this campaign to finish!

Our German Engineers like to get the job done right, so expect us to deliver within a few weeks! For our 6.FINGER we just needed 4 weeks, from the drawing board until the in-Stock item.

Specs to expect

Weight: maximum 25g (0.88oz) - but we try to slimline everything and get it down to around 15g (0.5oz)

Together with 38g (1.3oz) of our 6.FINGER | the Defender, you end up carrying only a total weight of 53g or just 1.86oz!

Material: 100% Copper

Benefits: 100% Re- and Upcyclable Material

Features: Operate safely with just 1 Hand, even in no-light scenarios of complete darkness!

Climate Protection: We will incorporate a CO² Compensation for this product to 100% compensate for the damage we have done.

In addition, we will try to raise the bar to 200%: For every Product sold, 2 times the amount of CO² generated for production and shipping will be compensated!

Why copper?

A recent study from March 2020 made by the US Government has proofed that explicit the HCoV-19 Viruses are damaged on copper surfaces by various electro-chemical effects at the level of their DNA!

The reason they tested copper was because they expected this results, as ~20 studys in total have been made about copper in the past 20 years about this subject.

On dry copper, everything is decomposed after 10 - 30 minutes, not even DNA from the virus remains!
And even under the worst possible conditions, in a wet and UV-free environment, the effects work well enaugh so that half of the viruses have died after 1 hour, and after 4 hours the entire DNA has been completely dissolved!

Thus it can be safely said that a complete erasure of all viruses is ensured within 10 minutes to a maximum of 4 hours. This makes copper the best material to protect yourself against COVID-19! Also, many more studys proofed that copper is the only material with a significant effect on any kind of viruses, bacteria and microorganisms as it got tested against every major Disease out their!

At the same moment, Copper is the only official approved Material with an Effect on COVID-19 by this Study! No other metal got tested against COVID-19 in this study, and therefore no other Alloy can be safely determined to have a sufficient effect!

Can you prove this claims? Sure!

Link to our Website where you can see all the details of this Study

You 're sure only copper helps: What about Silver, Stainless Steel or Brass?

Simply said: Copper is chemically the most reactive Material of all of them. All others Alloys are less reactive - some of them by design! Even Copper Alloys, like Brass, containing high amounts of Copper do not even offer half of the performance compared to 100% copper!

Do your research and do not invest into cheap, "diluted" copper: Get the real deal and stick to the best performing material !

See this Study: Many materials got tested against the Murine Norovirus - a popular and quite nasty Virus!

Link to our Website where you can see all the details of this Study

Copper vs. Brass

Here's another Study, this time challenged by a way more complex organism than a virus: A Bacteria! Viruses are an easy task because of their small size, but Bacterias can withstand a whole lot more. And not just any Bacteria was tested: Enterococcis have a wide range of adoptions! Some of them are vancomycin-resistant like Enterococci faecalis ATCC 51299!

Nice side fact: Alloys containing even up to 89% Copper did performed significant less quick than 100% copper!

Link to our Website where you can see all the details of this Study

Copper vs. Silver

Wait, you said you got some Study proofing Silver is not sufficient enough!

Here you go, this time tested against the famous MRSA Bacteria:

Link to our Website where you can see all the details of this Study

Copper vs. Stainless Steel

This study suggest a difference between a dry and a wet copper surface, claiming <30 Minutes for complete inactivation of the Virus by alloys with high percentage of copper on a dry surface:

Link to our Website where you can see all the details of this Study

 

Risks & Challenges

1. Availability of Copper

One of our own major concerns is the availability of Copper material! Maybe it will take even the biggest suppliers in Europe some time to deliver our required materials, as the entire industry is turned up side down by this Epidemic!

Worst case that can happen? A delay - but if that is fine for you, it is fine to us!

2. What if the price for Copper will increase?

Another major concern is due to the Stock market, and the trade of copper, that the price for Copper will drastically increase. Since February, prices already went up by 30%, and there is no sign that this growth will stop anytime soon. We expect it to increase quicker, as the industry has demand for this Element, so we better like to hurry and offer a good deal!

Worst case because of this? We will try to compensate for the costs with spending our profits. If that is not enaugh, we will pass the costs 1:1 to the you, the funder, and will ask you to more.

If you are fine with this, no risk will be involved.

3. What if we do not reach our funding Goal?

You simply will get refunded. We are a legal German business and will not let your money disappear. If we would try to: Feel free to contact the German authorities, as they will prosecute every penny out of any Company trying to do shady stuff like this. Also, they will put us, the Executives, into jail ;)

Best part: It's free to take legal help in Germany. So if you are a foreigner, you do not need to spend your own money on court to receive legal help. Just contact the police or the public prosecutor of Berlin, and they will take care.

You still don´t know 6.FINGER?

Let us help you out:

Possible uses

  • Operate door handles
  • Open the door in public transportation
  • Use the stop button on the bus
  • Use as a "hook" on handrails in bus & train
  • Open self-service refrigerated counters and bread counters
  • Use the card payment terminals & operate the keypad
  • Press the elevator button
  • Use ticket or ATM machines with a touch interface
  • Open and move garbage cans
  • Use the light switch
  • Operate traffic lights
  • Use soap or disinfectant dispensers

Advantages of 6.FINGER

  • Protection against all kinds of viruses, bacteria and microorganisms!
  • active protection against the SARS-Corona Virus (COVID-19)
  • Does not inhibit the production of the required safety products for medicine. Thus, private users, the retail and wholesale trade, as well as medicine can be ADDITIONALLY equipped with 6.FINGERs!
  • small and effective
  • Mount onto retraction tether or keyring
  • Easy to maintain by the end user if surface treatment is required in the event of corrosion

Sustainability

  • No printed invoice
  • No unnecessary product packaging
  • 100% recycled shipping material
  • Short transport routes, produced regionally in Berlin
  • Durable - quality made product
  • 100% recyclable and upcyclable raw material
  • Raw material without loss of value

How do we use it?

We only recommend using GearKeeper USA products if you are looking for a retraction tether, based on our personal experience of more than 7 years. We also compared these with other high quality alternatives such as the Gerber Defender Tether: Due to the lack of a swivel, the Gerber Tether unfortunately is unsuitable for safe handling, which is why we can only recommend products with a swivel such as GearKeeper's!

Care instructions

  • Clean regularly and if necessary, so that the proper function is ensured: It should be free of grease and particles. An ultrasonic bath like users of prescription glasses frequently own helps within 1-2 minutes without spending any effort. Another way is to gently wash it by hand with water & soap, also alcohol such as Isopropanol is working fine. Do not treat with salts and other highly concentrated cleaners! Do not wash in the dishwasher!
  • Discoloration: Copper will corrode (oxidize) during use! This highly reactive property is the reason why it works so well against microorganisms! To ensure optimal functioning and to remain chemically active against microorganisms, the oxidation layer must be removed if necessary. Whenever the product has unsightly discoloration, brush them off with a copper wire brush, or use a classic metal sponge like commonly seen in the kitchen. Slight discoloration after the daily use is acceptable and does not affect the proper function.
  • Do not use on smart phones displays because of possible scratches by the copper. Instead, regularly clean and disinfect your touch interfaces!

Hygiene Instructions

Copper is not an absolute or sole protection, just an aid to reduce the fomite transmission of infectious organisms when operating facilities that are used by several people. It only offers another layer of protection.

ATTENTION: The 6.FINGER must be stored in a suitable manner, e.g. stowed free hanging, or laying on a copper surface. Pockets in jackets and pants, or the outer layer of your clothing, are very likely to be contaminated when you store your 6th Finger on your person. To absolutely prevent any contamination, we are currently developing a suitable cover for your 6th Finger! Until we can offer this solution, take care not to contaminate your hands at the appropriate contact points by practicing a careful use until you achieved a safe sequence that your muscles can memorize.

Therefore, be sure to follow the instructions of the local authorities and comply with the important rules of conduct, which, with or without our 6.FINGER, are all part of a basic daily hygiene principle:

  • Basic hygiene by washing your hands if necessary, e.g. before eating!
  • Refraining from touching the face and studying alternative methods
  • Only leave your own living quarters during an epidemic if necessary
  • Maintaining safety distances from people and material that are not urgently needed
  • Wear a face mask if directed to reduce airborne transmission
  • Regularly check again with the sources recommended by the authorities and with the authorities themselves in order to receive new instructions promptly and provide this information to people who can not help them self!

Safety notice

Copper has long been used in the jewellery industry with success. We do not know any dermatological facts so far whether contact with copper over a very long period of exposure may have a negative impact on the user.
If symptoms of an allergy appear, stop using the product immediately and seek advice from a doctor. Please also contact us so that we can publicly clarify such incidents.
The use for children is only recommended if they got instructed and supervised over a period of time and proved to handle the device properly without a doubt:

  • Only use the product as described!
  • No playful handling allowed!
  • Never leave it in your hand longer than necessary!
  • Do not perform a "function test" and, for example, lick the copper, or provoke contact with other mucous membranes!

We cannot predict whether the use for pregnant women will affect the unborn child and recommend to seek your doctors advice.

One person should always use their own 6.FINGER: Sharing is only recommended between several people if the device could clean itself between the exchange without any doubt, e.g. a period of 4 hours has passed when possibly contaminated with COVID-19, or if it was cleaned, disinfected and not contaminated again before exchanging!

Like to spread the word?

Like always, the reason for fund raising is due the need to spread the word and get people aware of our unique solution. To get the job done quickly, please feel free to recommend us to your friends!

Our journey with the 6.FINGER until here: Researching - Inventing - Developing - Testing - Improving - Reenforcing - Setting up Machines - crafting custom Tools and going into full production.
