Since February, prices already went up by 30%, and there is no sign that this growth will stop anytime soon. We expect it to increase quicker, as the industry has demand for this Element, so we better like to hurry and offer a good deal!
Worst case because of this? We will try to compensate for the costs with spending our profits. If that is not enaugh, we will pass the costs 1:1 to the you, the funder, and will ask you to more.
If you are fine with this, no risk will be involved.
3. What if we do not reach our funding Goal?
You simply will get refunded. We are a legal German business and will not let your money disappear. If we would try to: Feel free to contact the German authorities, as they will prosecute every penny out of any Company trying to do shady stuff like this. Also, they will put us, the Executives, into jail ;)
Best part: It's free to take legal help in Germany. So if you are a foreigner, you do not need to spend your own money on court to receive legal help. Just contact the police or the public prosecutor of Berlin, and they will take care.


You still don´t know 6.FINGER?
Let us help you out:
Possible uses

Operate door handles
Open the door in public transportation
Use the stop button on the bus
Use as a "hook" on handrails in bus & train
Open self-service refrigerated counters and bread counters
Use the card payment terminals & operate the keypad
Press the elevator button
Use ticket or ATM machines with a touch interface
Open and move garbage cans
Use the light switch
Operate traffic lights
Use soap or disinfectant dispensers


Advantages of 6.FINGER

Protection against all kinds of viruses, bacteria and microorganisms!
active protection against the SARS-Corona Virus (COVID-19)
Does not inhibit the production of the required safety products for medicine. Thus, private users, the retail and wholesale trade, as well as medicine can be ADDITIONALLY equipped with 6.FINGERs!
small and effective
Mount onto retraction tether or keyring
Easy to maintain by the end user if surface treatment is required in the event of corrosion

Sustainability

No printed invoice
No unnecessary product packaging
100% recycled shipping material
Short transport routes, produced regionally in Berlin
Durable - quality made product
100% recyclable and upcyclable raw material
Raw material without loss of value

How do we use it?
We only recommend using GearKeeper USA products if you are looking for a retraction tether, based on our personal experience of more than 7 years. We also compared these with other high quality alternatives such as the Gerber Defender Tether: Due to the lack of a swivel, the Gerber Tether unfortunately is unsuitable for safe handling, which is why we can only recommend products with a swivel such as GearKeeper's!

Care instructions

Clean regularly and if necessary, so that the proper function is ensured: It should be free of grease and particles. An ultrasonic bath like users of prescription glasses frequently own helps within 1-2 minutes without spending any effort. Another way is to gently wash it by hand with water & soap, also alcohol such as Isopropanol is working fine. Do not treat with salts and other highly concentrated cleaners! Do not wash in the dishwasher!
Discoloration: Copper will corrode (oxidize) during use! This highly reactive property is the reason why it works so well against microorganisms! To ensure optimal functioning and to remain chemically active against microorganisms, the oxidation layer must be removed if necessary. Whenever the product has unsightly discoloration, brush them off with a copper wire brush, or use a classic metal sponge like commonly seen in the kitchen. Slight discoloration after the daily use is acceptable and does not affect the proper function.
Do not use on smart phones displays because of possible scratches by the copper. Instead, regularly clean and disinfect your touch interfaces!

Hygiene Instructions
Copper is not an absolute or sole protection, just an aid to reduce the fomite transmission of infectious organisms when operating facilities that are used by several people. It only offers another layer of protection.
ATTENTION: The 6.FINGER must be stored in a suitable manner, e.g. stowed free hanging, or laying on a copper surface. Pockets in jackets and pants, or the outer layer of your clothing, are very likely to be contaminated when you store your 6th Finger on your person. To absolutely prevent any contamination, we are currently developing a suitable cover for your 6th Finger! Until we can offer this solution, take care not to contaminate your hands at the appropriate contact points by practicing a careful use until you achieved a safe sequence that your muscles can memorize.Therefore, be sure to follow the instructions of the local authorities and comply with the important rules of conduct, which, with or without our 6.FINGER, are all part of a basic daily hygiene principle:

Basic hygiene by washing your hands if necessary, e.g. before eating!
Refraining from touching the face and studying alternative methods
Only leave your own living quarters during an epidemic if necessary
Maintaining safety distances from people and material that are not urgently needed
Wear a face mask if directed to reduce airborne transmission
Regularly check again with the sources recommended by the authorities and with the authorities themselves in order to receive new instructions promptly and provide this information to people who can not help them self!

Safety notice
Copper has long been used in the jewellery industry with success. We do not know any dermatological facts so far whether contact with copper over a very long period of exposure may have a negative impact on the user.If symptoms of an allergy appear, stop using the product immediately and seek advice from a doctor. Please also contact us so that we can publicly clarify such incidents.The use for children is only recommended if they got instructed and supervised over a period of time and proved to handle the device properly without a doubt:

Only use the product as described!
No playful handling allowed!
Never leave it in your hand longer than necessary!
Do not perform a "function test" and, for example, lick the copper, or provoke contact with other mucous membranes!

We cannot predict whether the use for pregnant women will affect the unborn child and recommend to seek your doctors advice.One person should always use their own 6.FINGER: Sharing is only recommended between several people if the device could clean itself between the exchange without any doubt, e.g. a period of 4 hours has passed when possibly contaminated with COVID-19, or if it was cleaned, disinfected and not contaminated again before exchanging!
Like to spread the word?
Like always, the reason for fund raising is due the need to spread the word and get people aware of our unique solution. To get the job done quickly, please feel free to recommend us to your friends!

Our journey with the 6.FINGER until here: Researching - Inventing - Developing - Testing - Improving - Reenforcing - Setting up Machines - crafting custom Tools and going into full production.

story:
Many people desire more fitness in their lives, but a lack of time makes it impossible. The Go Trainer allows you to turn the gym into a wearable unit so you can train where you want, when you want.

 

WHAT IS "THE GO TRAINER"?

The Go Trainer is a lightweight, portable, wearable training suit.

Resistance bands are built into it, which provide direct resistance to your movements so you can add varying levels of difficulty to normal body-weight exercises.

That resistance applies to cardio exercises too, which means you can challenge your muscles and build strength while building cardio endurance in a safe way. 

This isn't another piece of "portable" gym gear that you can only wear on one part of your body at a time. The Go Trainer applies resistance to your entire body -- so you can consistently build strength and muscle while running, squatting, doing push-ups, or boxing.

Simply put, The Go Trainer is the ultimate fitness tool.

 

BUT DOES IT WORK?

Of course it does. Some people used it in a workout for a while.

Check out their reactions:

 
 

THE IMPORTANCE OF OUR CAMPAIGN

This is important to us because we know The Go Trainer will challenge the entire health and wellness industry.

The Go Trainer will make your workouts fully location independent.

It'll allow you to enhance any form of resistance training or cardio training, allowing you to actually take your fitness to the next level.

From being effective and efficient with your workouts to saving time and lowering injury risks, our product is the future of fitness.

 

PRODUCT OVERVIEW

   BEGINNER          INTERMEDIATE   ADVANCED                        POWER

                                               

The Go Trainer is the first wearable full-body gym. Created for and loved by professional athletes, we're now making it available to all fitness enthusiasts around the world who want to enhance their workouts and amplify their results. 

 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION IMPACT

We are so close to achieving the creation of the ideal total body wearable workout unit but we are not yet there. This is where we need YOU,  your contribution towards a few things we are missing will help us achieve our dreams. 

But WAIT! You won't just be giving a contribution, we have some really amazing perks for you for helping us get to our goal. From custom Go Trainer T-Shirts and hoodies to free online fitness and nutritional consultation. Even the Go Trainer itself we are going to make sure we show our appreciation! 

In this order, here is what your contribution will be allocated towards:  Goal $78,000

1. Ordering The Go Trainer in bulk to drive down the cost of manufacturing.

Cost: Customs, manufacturing, shipping.  $30,000

2. Recruiting a salesperson to join our team for the purpose of building brand awareness on the ground. This individual will attend different trade shows, facilities, companies and organizations in regards to introducing, pitching and selling the product to those places. $11,000 (used for event fees, travel, room and board and meals)

3. Recruiting a digital brand marketer to join our team for the purpose of creating and posting content to keep the brand relevant on our website and all social media platforms. They would be responsible for establishing online presence and increasing brand awareness . $10,000

4. Developing and producing different product samples with the purpose of continuing to enhance the product which include but are not limited to: $12,000

  • Producing the women's and kids versions of the unit.
  • Producing a weighted version of the unit vest.
  • Adding different substantial modalities to the unit.

 

5. Developing an App that will provide content for guided how to videos and workouts. $15,000

 

OTHER NEEDS:

1. Acquire trademark for company name and logo.

2. Acquiring a Limited Liability Company (LLC) for the official company name: E.P.I.C. Designs.

 

WHO WE ARE

AARON VEASLEY

Having completed a Master's degree in Health Science with an emphasis on Coaching & Conditioning, Aaron Veasley comes with over 15 years of expertise as a certified fitness practitioner. Aaron has also worked as a New York based Master Trainer for the past 10 years and has developed sound relationships with relevant individuals in the fitness industry.

ALEX BARIL

Alex Baril is a NASM certified fitness professional of 7 years with a background in engineering and fashion design. Also with experience in the strength and conditioning field, Alex understands concepts of bio mechanics as well as the intricacies of creating special preparatory equipment.

 

STANLEY FORTUNE

Stanley Fortune has an extensive background in advanced contemporary and high fashion design. Having worked in the field, Stanley has an advanced understanding of handling wholesale accounts, manufacturing as well as sourcing fabric and materials. Stanley has successfully run his own apparel companies in the past, which has equipped him with the skill sets to contribute to the E.P.I.C. brand.


Our team saw a gap in the fitness industry for an effective and efficient all in one portable workout unit so we put our minds together and created The Go Trainer.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

We understand that everyone just can't contribute, but this doesn't mean you can't help. If you are unable to contribute financially, we understand. Thank you for your consideration. 

Here are other ways you can help us: follow our Instagram page (@thegotrainer), our Facebook page (@traintobeelite), and our Twitter page (@epicgotrainer).  Subscribe to our YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com).Also like our posts and signup for our newsletter: www.traintobeelite.com.

Lastly, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and The Go Trainer anyway you can. We are grateful and want to say thank you for all of your support. 

Also one more thing, make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank You.

Stanley has successfully run his own apparel companies in the past, which has equipped him with the skill sets to contribute to the E.P.I.C. brand.

We understand that everyone just can't contribute, but this doesn't mean you can't help. If you are unable to contribute financially, we understand. Thank you for your consideration. 
Here are other ways you can help us: follow our Instagram page (@thegotrainer), our Facebook page (@traintobeelite), and our Twitter page (@epicgotrainer).  Subscribe to our YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com).Also like our posts and signup for our newsletter: www.traintobeelite.com.

story:
Brrrrr ! Winters coming, so it's time to get in the gym,  get on the treadmill, get on the turbo or just get in the car. Right ? Not anymore.

Until now commuters too had one choice...you stay home, go in the car, by bus or train to be comfortable. Or you could use waterproof layers and fleece, or soft shells etc. But these still don't cope with bigger ranges of temperature and effort. But now there's the Torka 0-60.

And summer's great isn't it ? But for three out of four seasons there's still a great outdoors waiting for you to explore and play in. Whether you walk it, run in it, cycle through it, ski down it, climb up it or sail away on it.

The end result  of years of research  and development is ready for you now. Available this autumn the first sport jacket that keeps you the right temperature while you cycle, ski, run, climb, sail or walk the dog. And yes ! It keeps the rain off. All without taking off layers and adding them back on to cope with change in weather or the amount of heat you make, yourself.

What We Need & What You Get

Would you be willing to join us and bring this fantastic product to life ?

  • We're raising £36,000 in the next month to bring the current prototypes into full production. Every  jacket costs £104 to make, meaning we'll spend  £20,800 in all for the 200 jackets promised in this round.
  • Next is protecting the Intellectual property, for which we have allotted £11,000
  • New patterns will cost £4,000  so we can go above the current range that we already have, of Small to Extra Large. That is enough for around 7 out of 10 adults but we want it available for all.  Then it will be available in Men's and Women's fit, and of course childrens' sizes too.
  • There's a good chance with economies of scale now, we'll be able to write new patterns for city and go to work wear versions too, if there is any surplus to that £4,000
  • The good news is that none of that money needs to go in our pockets. I still earn my living as a physiotherapist and Sue has her own business too. All the money raised this time goes into the project. Of course we want to make a living from it in the future. But we're not in a rush. We have time to get it right.
  • There are fantastic bargains for early birds...  as an established brand this will retail at £279 as it massively out performs waterproof and breathables, fleece and soft shell combinations, and is far more convenient. So you no longer have to carry and stow surplus gear.

The Impact

We aim to transform the way people dress when they head for the great outdoors

  • It's like the electric bike revolution that lets people exercise more, not less. Torka's 0-60 allows you to get out more, so you can commute to work and not get there in a sweat, take part in events or train all year round. It makes even the worst weather comfortable to train or exercise in.
  • Toward the end of the video you'll see real people who have been testing it. We don't want you to take our word for it. These folks have been using it for many months now and for them it's standing the test of time. It can for you too.

Risks & Challenges

We've been working on this for  a couple of years now. We see this as a disruptor to the outdoor clothing industry. So there are some risks

  • Most people who like the outdoors, have bought into the " waterproof and breathable" model. They're used to putting on more layers, taking them off ( again ) and stowing or carrying the extra (again). People do  expect it, BUT they don't yet know what they don't know.
  • So what we have is as much an  education challenge as a manufacturing project.
  • Fashion. People like to look and dress like their heroes in sport, and we can't afford to sponsor those kinds of stars. So we need to do this differently and that's a risk and a challenge
  • It's a funny thing. The one real criticism we have heard is that the jacket is a little bulky. (The material combo is half an inch thick) The same people will put on a fleece and a waterproof... which is you've  guessed it, about half an inch thick.  So it's helping people change their perception. The layering concept has been around for a long time now, and it still doesn't work. So we have to change people's thinking. There's a challenge.
  • What we need to do to solve this is make a jacket that performs so well that it's irresistible.
  • Then tell them about it. Probably more than once.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you know someone who could help us. Perhaps you know a rising star in cycling, cross country running, track athletics, sailing, climbing or skiing. In the long run we will work with well known stars, as it will help reach more people. In the meantime we can work with rising stars who will use our gear, but don't need a big fee to do it.

  • Ask friends, colleagues and club members to get the word out, and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please prompt  them to use the Indiegogo share tools !

Other Ways You Can Help

In the long run we will work with well known stars, as it will help reach more people. In the meantime we can work with rising stars who will use our gear, but don't need a big fee to do it.

Ask friends, colleagues and club members to get the word out, and make some noise about our campaign.
Please prompt  them to use the Indiegogo share tools !

story:
About our company

Triple W’s mission is to empower people with incontinence to live without worries.  Triple W develops DFree®, the first wearable device to predict when you need to go to the toilet.  DFree’s sensor uses ultrasound to continuously monitor your bladder and sends notification to your phone when your bladder is almost full so you know when to go resulting in less “accidents.”  The device is designed to not only help people with incontinence improve quality of life and enable independence, but to also help reduce the burden for the caregivers.

Help us launch the next generation sensor

We launched the first generation sensor in 2017 which has been used by people with urinary incontinence and in over 500 senior care facilities in US, Europe and Japan.  Our new sensor for urinary incontinence will be smaller and wireless!

  • We need to raise $1M to manufacture and get the product to market this year
  • For backers, we will provide early bird discount which is 40% off MSRP

Incontinence affects many people

The device is designed to not only help people with incontinence improve quality of life and enable independence, but to also help reduce the burden for the caregivers.

It can help millions of elderly and disabled people who suffer from incontinence every day.  We believe that having control of your senses is the key to independence and living your life to the fullest.

Our Challenge

For those people suffering from urinary incontinence, there are very few options to help mitigate their problem.  Current options include wearing adult diapers, taking medications or going through surgery, none of which are compelling.  We believe that our sensor technology can help these people regain their confidence and dignity.  Since there are no devices like DFree, we need backings of people who believe in our vision to make it a reality.

story:
- Do you know How much exercise EXACTLY need to offset your meal?

 

- Can you express the ACTUAL return on exercise?

 

The Anytime Anywhere AI App "JooGO Fit" tells you "How much exercise you EXACTLY need to burn off the food you eat, and How many Calories you are ACTUALLY burning.". You can do all that at home with your smartphone with 3 steps below:

  1. Tap the fitness video labeled with the food name that you just ate, 
  2. Place the smartphone front-faced on the table.
  3. Just move your body like yoga, aerobics following the fitness trainer in the video with Calories displayed.  That’s it! 

 

My name is Naoki Shibata, a founder of Android App “JooGO Fit” as well as app developer / AI engineer / video editor / marketer.

 

- 1. Why I started this project     

In February 2020, when COVID19 has started spreading in the world, I was considering to help people move their bodies at home to release some stress from staying-at-home and also to maintain the fitness, under these special circumstances.

 

- 2. Who can enjoy     

Then I’ve come up with the idea of developing a smartphone application to solve it with the concepts below.

  • Use for Free of charge.
  • Everyone can enjoy it, regardless of age and sex without language barrier, (We plan to translate into major languages in the future anyways.)
  • The users can get exercise with the app anywhere at any time with watching minutes of fitness videos.
  • The users need only smartphones, no need to buy any extra devices. 
  • Motivating people who want to keep doing exercise with easily understandable yet essential indicators.

According to the requirements above, I have started developing the app by myself as a part time project after work on the side of my full time job, then I launched the 1st version in October 2020 on the Google play store.

 

- 3. What the users can enjoy

People do not know how to burn exact calories to offset the food they eat, and people do not correctly evaluate how much they burn. I simplified definitive & evaluation indicators like "How much exercise you EXACTLY need, and How many Calories you are EXACTLY burning.", and providing them as the values that could be a true return for their exercise motivation.

  1. Firstly, The customers will realize how to burn the Calories that they should burn from the video playlist page. For example, in order to off-set the Calories 'c' gained from the food you just ate, you could know in advance that you can offset the Calories that you want to burn with ‘t’ seconds of the exercise at intensity ‘i’.  [ c = t * i ]
  2. The built-in AI algorithms convert the users’ motion to Calories in real time to visualize numerically, which means that you can evaluate the result of your exercise by the essential factor 'How much YOUR body parts ACTUALLY moved'. We do not evaluate by the substituted factors such as time length of exercise or motion of the fitness trainer in the videos. None will be returned to you if you just sit & watch videos.
  3. You can keep track of Calories you burned in the past with the visualized weekly trend chart on the Stats page.
  4. You can learn how the top calorie burners get their exercise on the Leaderboard page. Get motivated!

 

 

- 4. Challenges

The ‘JooGO Fit’ app does not work on all the smartphones in the market at the moment.

  • Calorie computation by AI algorithms needs a certain amount of computing resources like CPU, RAM. So we currently limit installation for higher grade phones only. To solve this, we will test with various kinds of phones after fund is raised and will modify like reducing the input image size or other workarounds to run on more variety of phones. And I also  believe as smartphones' specification upgrades as technology advances will help . 

 

- 5. How the fund will be used

The fund will mainly be used to accelerate the user experience by; 

  • Hiring a fitness trainer to multiply series of fitness videos to deal with more variety of food Calories. We will be the Food Calorie intake - consumption comparison database!
  • Hiring app development engineers to speed up the app development & improvement for both Android & iOS.
  • Hiring an AI engineer to improve accuracy of the calorie calculation, personalization, recommendation.

 

- 6. What you will get 

You can post your ads on our app, or please donate our project to contribute to more people to make the world healthier under this pandemic circumstances!!

  • Per-day Ads in jpg or png format, you can choose from 4 different slots and sizes. 
  • It will be booked on a first come first serve basis.
  • Ads posting right will be valid after a year after you receive an invitation email from us.
  • Our customers are likely someone who loves exercise, health-conscious persons or fitness lovers. 

 

Do you want to join this project to help people around the world healthier and stay fit?

 

Any question, please drop an email at one@joogo.io 

 

JooGO Fit on Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.joogofit  

YouTube Video (39 sec.): https://youtu.be/M8Vv-KEbXNQ

Website: https://www.joogo.io/    

LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/naoki-shibata

story:
Transforming Floor Vents and Indoor Putting

Introducing Register Range – a great new and practical way to bring your golf game indoors. Our design is a unique way to combine the air vent at your home or your office with your putting game. 


Where did it come from?

Register Range came from a strange pastime. Winter can be cold and bleak and with our hunger for golf brewing, we began looking for a way in which we could play a round of golf indoors. So we started planning golf holes around the house, using mainly our putters. We would design a Par 5 which would include a tee shot from the top of the stairs, through the kitchen, under the dining room table, through the arm chair and into the cup, which was placed in the corner of the family room. After hours of fun, we found that we could have simply used some of the 'holes' already in the home as targets, the HVAC vents - and Register Range was born.



What is included?

At its core you'll receive a single Golf Ball White range and a felt putting green. With your help we'll be able to offer additional colours, patterns and putting flags if we can meet our stretch goals.

The range comes with a putting green for hardwood and tile floors. The green slips under the range and brings the surface right to the top of the range edge.


We have designed our range to fit in a standard 4" X 10" register opening. No instructions required - simply take out the existing register and replace it with our version.



No carpet? No problem. We include a felt playing surface for hardwood floors.



What's the Faux Wood Range?

We wanted to offer an option for our backers to match the floor in their homes. We've reached out to a local firm here in Ottawa, to help with this process. We'll be offering the Range in 3 faux wood grain finishes: Light Oak, Dark Oak and Walnut. 




So where is the money going? 

The $5900 helps to cover the cost of our injection moulding tool. We're going for a dual cavity tool with the longevity that will allow us to get through a few years of production. While that makes up the majority of the goal, we have some space in there for a forming tool for the packaging, and to purchase the required minimums on the part, felt, packaging, etc.
With the stretch goals we're looking to put any and all profits back in to the product to make it even better and offer more choice to you. 



Stockpile is a hybrid team consisting of Ian Murchison, Rohan Thakar and Dennis Sakalauskas. We design innovative products that bring fun and enjoyment to homes and offices of people of all ages. Our team has years of experience in design and marketing, but also bringing products to market. We are sure that you'll love the products we offer.

We've spent over a year designing and developing Register Range for the market. There are have been endless iterations, prototypes, design and manufacturing discussions and talks with suppliers. We are finally ready to bring our little golf friend to market and we are hoping you all can help us do it. 



We finalized the design for Register Range over the winter, and have been working around the clock to iron out the logistics to bring Register Range to you. We've launched our campaign in mid-May and the campaign will end in mid-June. Once we have reached our goal, we will kick-off our production tool and begin the process of quality control as soon as our first pieces come in. We will then perfect each putting vent, with a goal of having them in your hands by mid October.

With every product we design we try to take into account every worst-case scenario. We have an action plan in place for any problems which may arise and have meticulously gone over each aspect of the project. We are confident that we can produce a quality product which you can feel safe about placing in your home. 


Shipping?

Post campaign we will be using Shopify to collect all of your address details and charge you for shipping at that time. Why? We will be using Shopify, closely tied to a fulfillment warehouse, so that orders and shipments are handled correctly.

Shipping should be no more than $5 for any single unit to the US and will be around $10 to Canada, Europe, Asia and Australia.

story:
Before you continue reading:  
please check the investment opportunities at: 
www.Firm2Find.com/invest 



Find your loved ones in the blink of an eye.


"Over 2000 children go missing every day, and that’s not all...Pets run off… Elderly and mentally disabled people get lost and how many times do we forget where we parked our car?"

This is all history now. Tool2Find is a small GPS device that helps you find it all; your children, grandfather, dog, car and even your luggage. The Tool works independent with its own GPS and GPRS connection, no need for other people's smartphones to find what you are looking for.


Tool2Finds unique silicone bumper makes the device multi applicable, protects it and makes it look and feel great.

Unlike other trackers, the Tool2Find isn’t a device depending on a Bluetooth connection, but rather uses GPS and GSM. Tool2Find is accurate, stand-alone and with it's small size you won't even know you're wearing it.



We designed the Tool2Find to solve a lifelong and serious problem: To find whomever and whatever you've lost, back in an instant. Research has shown that on a global scale, thousands of children go missing everyday. Pets leave home and never return and your elderly suffering from dementia, wander off alone leaving carers in panic when doing so.



Why we are on Indiegogo?

First we developed an App that works and put that on the market for free. App2Findhas been downloaded nearly 500.000 times and is the most popular (100% free) app to follow friends and family. App2Find is tested and proved itself for several years, so we know what you want when it comes to finding your lost precious family members and items. When we were sure of that, we started to research, develop and design Tool2Find. We eventually built a prototype, tested it, created our own secured server and produced the first samples. All done by our selves, using our own resources and own time. For specific technological things we of course hired experienced people to help us make it work.


Now Tool2Find has finished development and testing and we want to give you the opportunity to purchase a family product without you being the test-subject. After running our campaign, we'll be heading into our first production and deliver the Tool2Find to you, without delay.




Our target: one month of Indiegogo for fund raising, one month for the moulding, one month for production and give us one month to spare (just in case) and we'll deliver without delay after delay. Tool2Find is here and it works!


Second bumper: attachment clip (included with every perk).


What do you get when you go for a Perk?

- The device Tool2Find in black with it's original orange bumper to protect the Tool and help it become more waterproof.
- An integrated simcard including 365 days of global (roaming) data*
- A second (orange) bumper which enables you to hand the Tool on your neck with a lanyard, attach it to your belt and clip it on to something.
- A clip for attaching to your second bumper to wear it where you want.
- A lanyard, so you can actually hang it around your neck.
- A special USB cable for charging and if necessary upgrade the firmware.
- A quick install guide to be able to start directly.
- A lifetime gratitude by placing your name on our Hall Of Fame

* See www.Tool2Find.com to find out which 135 countries are included.


Is my location safe with you?

We'll prolong our promise to not sell data and not to share your locations with anyone (family, friends or governments) nor we will spam you with advertisements.
Our servers are renewed and encrypted, we don't log locations-data and our servers are located only in The Netherlands with a great privacy legislation. NSA can't find you with our App or Tool as long as you don't give them permission specifically by inviting them as your 'parent' (which we don't advise to do).


Tool2Find in quick buzzes:

# Geo-fence: virtual eyes will stop you from worrying.
# Spot-alarm: quick (App-controlled) virtual perimeter.
# SOS-button: when your loved one is in need of help.
# Panic mode: live tracking in case of emergency.
# Location on demand: one click to request the current location of your loved one.
# Power saving mode: save battery life.
# Child lock: overruling on/off-button and reset-button.
# Cross platform use (Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Computer).
# Customize the update speed.
# Location display on map or by Augmented Reality.
# World wide coverage.
# No periodic contract necessary.
# Simcard included.
# Global data usage included for one year.
# Secured and private data communication.
# No spam, no advertisement, no unwanted followers and no sales of e-mail!
# No data history storage (no Big Brother!).
# A Dutch design. 
# Attachment accessories included. 
# Works with our free App2FInd (Android and iOS) but also on your PC (web-based).


Too good to be true?

In the previous years we got a lot of 'complaints' that App2Find shouldn't be free, as it is too good for that. Nothing is for free... except App2Find.
Ok, we miscalculated the development and the costs of App2Find and never thought that it would come to half a million downloads. But that helped us to get the guts to dive into the deep and develop Tool2Find.

App2Find is and stays free in its full usage (no light version or limitations), and we will not sell or share your location with others.

Tool2Find has a 1-year global data coverage included, the next year it will be € 45,- for another full year of global data usage. We'll also offer extras like extra use of Panic-mode, location update etc. But you will get enough play time with all functions before we ask a small donation (mostly only needed in the second year if you really like to press buttons).


The geek part:

For those who are interested in specifications and facts we have made an overview of Tool2Find its power and capabilities.

What can you expect of Tool2Find:

  • Location update every # minutes (depends on the preference)
  • Location on demand
  • Panic Mode ( a 5 minute real time tracking  )
  • Set up to 4 safezones (geofence)
  • Up to 1 meter accuracy (in ideal situation)
  • Theft alarm
  • Child-Lock


Panic Mode
You're walking with your son in a parc and suddenly you lose your son out of sight. In these moments seconds are important and that is why we thought of the "Panic Mode". It gives you a 5 minute high speed location update so that you can find your son back in seconds/minutes.


Safezone

Ease your mind with a extra pair of eyes. You can set up safezones a.k.a. geofence which gives you a digital fence. In this safezone your child or whoever you wish to keep safe can walk freely without you being worried where they are. If they walk outside this safezone you will receive a alarm message on your phone and also their current location will be updated right away.


Tool2Find is made with only the best components to guaranty a high-end product. With a solded SIM, sensitive GPS antenna, GSM antenna, SIM900 module, gyroscope sensor and many other components. These components make it possible for the Tool2Find to locate whatever you want. 

With a battery of 400 mAh you have the possibility to use Tool2Find for about 20 hours (depending on the settings). The battery can be charged with the included power cable within 1,5 hours.

Just to be clear: Tool2Find is ready, so no long development periods but simply the production. That is where we need you for. Support us by buying your own Tool2Find.


You need to know

Like all other products, ours is best. But we want to be honest and also tell you the limitations.

If you are in a bunker, the Tool does not work.
You'll need GPS (satellite) contact and GPRS (cellular connection). The more you are in an open field, the better the GPS works, and will allow you to locate up to 1,5 meter specific.
But, of course we did think of this too. If no GPS available (e.g. inside) Tool2Find switches from GPS to location through the cellular towers. This makes it less accurate, but it is better to look in an area than somewhere in the world.

GPRS (data connection) is mostly not a problem, but for sending data back and forth to your Tool, you need a connection with any cellular around the world (in one of the 135 covered country).

Even GPS-signals are mostly good outside, but buildings can mirror the signal and confuse a little. No big problem, but that means your Tool can be some meters away from the location. This is not something we can fix without distorting all buildings and shoot a couple of hundreds satellites in to the orbit.
Trees and clouds can cloud the view also, but have much less influence than buildings and bunkers.

If you are paranoid and you really want to use the full follow options (check the geeky part), which is possible of course, with Tool2Find you are in charge the battery life will go down significantly. Same thing goes for your smart phone, but hay, this can't be new right? Luckily we thought of it and enable you to change the update frequency as you like, and if you have a slow update speed, just click one button to locate (saving lost of battery, frustration and most importantly your loved one).


FAQ

Are there monthly charges for usage of Tool2Find?
You will get a whole year of usage for free when you buy the Tool2Find. After this year you are free to choose whether you wish to continue using App2Find for another period of time. This can be done in our online shop where you can buy your own prepaid plan.
How long will the battery last?

It will last approximately 18 - 20 hours based on a fully charged battery with an average use. Meaning an average location update every 15 minutes (much like a cell phone). 

How do I charge Tool2Find?
Simply plug the USB connector into any USB port, which means your wall charger or laptop work great. A full charge while being plugged to your computer, will take you only 1,5 hours!
Does Tool2Find work internationally?
Yes, our location chip uses GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS and SBAS satellite signals, and will work in over 135 countries worldwide.
How do alerts appear on my device?
When your kid holds down the S.O.S. button for three seconds, you will immediately receive a push notification. Also, if your kid goes outside the geo-fence that you created online or on your app, you will receive a push notification letting you know. You will also receive a push notification once they enter a geo-fence area. So that you know that they arrived safely at school for example.
Is my Tool2Find waterproof?
Well, yes, at least that is our planning to make it fully waterproof, but we can't promise yet, as we have to do a real test after production. We have to tell you after we produced it, sorry.
Does Tool2Find work together with App2Find?
Yes, App2Find can be used together with Tool2Find. You can change the settings and receive information from your Tool2Find within App2Find. But it also works on your computer with the (free) online platform.
Where can I download App2Find?
You can download App2Find on the following website for Android and iOS.
When can I expect my Tool2Find to be delivered?
We plan to deliver all Tools in April or May!
Why do I have to buy the international shipping perk?
Because we have to ship the packages from The Netherlands all over the world. Sadly this can't be done for free, so we have to charge a small fee for this. Our shipment packages contain of a professional door-to-door delivery, so it is quick and save!
Does Tool2Find need Bluetooth?
No, Tool2Find works completely independent. It uses it's own GPS antenna to find it's location and GPRS to send this information to the server.
I don't own a smartphone, can I still use Tool2Find?
Yes, next to our application App2Find we have a web based platform on which you can see where your tool is/ change settings/ buy or connect new tools and many more things.

Can I see what the Phone Pouch + Sticky Cleaner look like?

Sure! You can stick it at the back or your phone and use it as 'bag' for your creditcard, traincard, debetcard, etc.

Here are some impressions of this handy thing:

# Geo-fence: virtual eyes will stop you from worrying.# Spot-alarm: quick
(App-controlled) virtual perimeter.# SOS-button: when
your loved one is in need of help.# Panic mode: live tracking in case of
emergency.# Location on
demand: one click to request the current location of your loved one.# Power saving
mode: save battery life.
# Child lock:
overruling on/off-button and reset-button.
# Cross platform use (Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Computer).
# Customize the update speed.
# Location display
on map or by Augmented Reality.
# World wide coverage.
# No periodic contract
necessary.# Simcard included.# Global data usage included for one year.# Secured and
private data communication.# No spam, no
advertisement, no unwanted followers and no sales of e-mail!# No data history storage (no Big Brother!).# A Dutch design. # Attachment accessories included. # Works with our free App2FInd (Android and iOS) but also on your PC (web-based).


Too good to be true?
In the previous years we got a lot of 'complaints' that App2Find shouldn't be free, as it is too good for that. Nothing is for free... except App2Find.Ok, we miscalculated the development and the costs of App2Find and never thought that it would come to half a million downloads. But that helped us to get the guts to dive into the deep and develop Tool2Find. App2Find is and stays free in its full usage (no light version or limitations), and we will not sell or share your location with others. 
Tool2Find has a 1-year global data coverage included, the next year it will be € 45,- for another full year of global data usage. We'll also offer extras like extra use of Panic-mode, location update etc. But you will get enough play time with all functions before we ask a small donation (mostly only needed in the second year if you really like to press buttons).

The geek part:


For those
who are interested in specifications and facts we have made an overview of
Tool2Find its power and capabilities.
What can you
expect of Tool2Find:

Location
     update every # minutes (depends on the preference)
Location
     on demand
Panic
     Mode ( a 5 minute real time tracking  )
Set up
     to 4 safezones (geofence)
Up to 1
     meter accuracy (in ideal situation)
Theft
     alarm
Child-Lock

Panic Mode 
You're walking with your son in a parc and suddenly you lose your son out of
sight. In these moments seconds are important and that is why we thought of the
"Panic Mode". It gives you a 5 minute high speed location update so
that you can find your son back in seconds/minutes.
Safezone
Ease your mind with a extra pair of
eyes. You can set up safezones a.k.a. geofence which gives you a digital fence.
In this safezone your child or whoever you wish to keep safe can walk freely
without you being worried where they are. If they walk outside this safezone
you will receive a alarm message on your phone and also their current location will
be updated right away.

Tool2Find is
made with only the best components to guaranty a high-end product. With a
solded SIM, sensitive GPS antenna, GSM antenna, SIM900 module, gyroscope sensor
and many other components. These components make it possible for the Tool2Find
to locate whatever you want. 
With a battery of 400 mAh you have the possibility to use Tool2Find for about 20 hours (depending on the settings). The battery can be charged with the included power cable within 1,5 hours.Just to be clear: Tool2Find is ready, so no long development periods but simply the production. That is where we need you for. Support us by buying your own Tool2Find.

You need to know
Like all other products, ours is best. But we want to be honest and also tell you the limitations.
If you are in a bunker, the Tool does not work. You'll need GPS (satellite) contact and GPRS (cellular connection). The more you are in an open field, the better the GPS works, and will allow you to locate up to 1,5 meter specific. But, of course we did think of this too. If no GPS available (e.g. inside) Tool2Find switches from GPS to location through the cellular towers. This makes it less accurate, but it is better to look in an area than somewhere in the world. 

GPRS (data
connection) is mostly not a problem, but for sending data back and forth to your
Tool, you need a connection with any cellular around the world (in one of the
135 covered country).
Even GPS-signals are mostly good outside, but buildings can mirror the signal and confuse a little. No big problem, but that means your Tool can be some meters away from the location. This is not something we can fix without distorting all buildings and shoot a couple of hundreds satellites in to the orbit. Trees and clouds can cloud the view also, but have much less influence than buildings and bunkers.
If you are paranoid and you really want to use the full follow options (check the geeky part), which is possible of course, with Tool2Find you are in charge the battery life will go down significantly. Same thing goes for your smart phone, but hay, this can't be new right? Luckily we thought of it and enable you to change the update frequency as you like, and if you have a slow update speed, just click one button to locate (saving lost of battery, frustration and most importantly your loved one).


FAQ

Are there monthly charges for usage of Tool2Find?
You will get a whole year of usage for free when you buy the Tool2Find. After this year you are free to choose whether you wish to continue using App2Find for another period of time. This can be done in our online shop where you can buy your own prepaid plan.


How long will the battery last?
It will last approximately
18 - 20 hours based on a fully charged battery with an average use. Meaning an average
location update every 15 minutes (much like a cell phone). 


How do I charge Tool2Find?
Simply plug the USB connector into any USB port, which means your wall charger or laptop work great. A full charge while being plugged to your computer, will take you only 1,5 hours!


Does Tool2Find work internationally?
Yes, our location chip uses GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS and SBAS satellite signals, and will work in over 135 countries worldwide.


How do alerts appear on my device?
When your kid holds down the S.O.S. button for three seconds, you will immediately receive a push notification. Also, if your kid goes outside the geo-fence that you created online or on your app, you will receive a push notification letting you know. You will also receive a push notification once they enter a geo-fence area. So that you know that they arrived safely at school for example.



Is my Tool2Find waterproof?
Well, yes, at least that is our planning to make it fully waterproof, but we can't promise yet, as we have to do a real test after production. We have to tell you after we produced it, sorry.



Does Tool2Find work together with App2Find?
Yes, App2Find can be used together with Tool2Find. You can change the settings and receive information from your Tool2Find within App2Find. But it also works on your computer with the (free) online platform.



Where can I download App2Find?
You can download App2Find on the following website for Android and iOS.



When can I expect my Tool2Find to be delivered?
We plan to deliver all Tools in April or May!



Why do I have to buy the international shipping perk?
Because we have to ship the packages from The Netherlands all over the world. Sadly this can't be done for free, so we have to charge a small fee for this. Our shipment packages contain of a professional door-to-door delivery, so it is quick and save!



Does Tool2Find need Bluetooth?
No, Tool2Find works completely independent. It uses it's own GPS antenna to find it's location and GPRS to send this information to the server.



I don't own a smartphone, can I still use Tool2Find?
Yes, next to our application App2Find we have a web based platform on which you can see where your tool is/ change settings/ buy or connect new tools and many more things.






Can I see what the Phone Pouch + Sticky Cleaner look like?

Sure! You can stick it at the back or your phone and use it as 'bag' for your creditcard, traincard, debetcard, etc.
Here are some impressions of this handy thing:

story:
The Problem.

  • Military is a hectic life
  • Overseas, at sea, or even home - gift giving is a struggle (for 91% of males)
  • Finding the right gift, at the right price, and delivering on time is near impossible


Introducing Pelorus.



Pelorus.me is the first military-only automated gifting service.

Our mission is to help service men and women give great gifts to their loved ones.  Pelorus provides superior gift selection, automated purchases, and guaranteed on-time delivery on behalf of our Members.


Build, Budget, Gift.



Pelorus Members register for free at www.Pelorus.me.  Once activated, our Members build profiles for their family and friends.

Gifting occasions are selected for each profile, and budgets are set for each occasion.

Our Gifters then analyze each profile, find the perfect gift within budget, make the purchase, and arrange on-time delivery - all from you!


Giftee Profiles.



Pelorus Giftee Profiles are designed to help us find and deliver great gifts on your behalf.

Members answer a series of questions about their Giftee, tell us what categories worked in the past, and provide intimate details shared between the member and their Giftee.

We are obsessed with perfect gifting.  It's our passion.  And delivering happiness is what keeps us going.  Our profiling methods are constantly improving with the help of collegiate Professors and market experts - we're good at this already, and we're only going to gift better. 


What are Gifters?


Pelorus Gifters are real people who love to give, gift, and shop.

Each Gifter analyzes Giftee profiles to find the right gift.  Age, gender, relationship, lifestyle, and occasions are just some of the considerations that go into our gift decision process.

Our Gifters LOVE what they do, and it shows with each delivered gift.


The Fine Print.




Pelorus gifts are always purchased within our Member's budget - to include the shipping.

Gifts are purchased automatically using the Member's preferred payment method.  Each gift selected is subject to a 24-hour Member review period (via email).  Our Member may decline any gift within the review period.

A $5 service fee is applied to each gift.  This service fee covers: operating expenses, Gifter incentive, and a $1 charitable contribution to the Fisher House Foundation.




Pelorus Does Not.


Pelorus DOES NOT use an algorithm to select gifts - EVERY gift is selected by a real life human.

Pelorus DOES NOT deliver late - Gifts arrive on time or it's free.

Pelorus DOES NOT pad prices - Gifts are purchased at advertised prices, always.

Pelorus DOES NOT take the credit - The gift is from our Member, not our company.


What They're Saying.


"I typically just get my Dad something fairly standard for Father's Day each year, but when I saw the gift that my personal Gifter at Pelorus found for him, I was truly astonished and my Dad was super happy.  I would never have thought to get him that gift, but I'm sure glad I did.  It's an awesome idea to get outside perspective on gifts, and Pelorus has never let me down."  -ENS Alex Gatlin, USN. Pelorus Member.
"Military members that deploy, and sometimes deploy with little notice, don't always have a chance to set up a birthday, anniversary, and holiday gifts.  A lot of times I'm gone in a place with little or no internet, so the ability to have them at the ready to send the well thought out gift makes these family movements all that much easier!"  -Patrick M. Miller, AWS1 (NAC/AW), USN.  Pelorus Member.
"I was the family member of the hour for two holidays in a row from the gifts Pelorus helped me choose for my father.  I love this service and my siblings and mother are jealous of my apparently new found gifting prowess..."  -ENS Devin Rojas, USN.  Pelorus Member.
[note to son]  "Just received your Father's Day gift, one of the most unique and interesting documents I've ever received.  I love history related items, thank you so much..."  -Ed, Navy Dad.  Pelorus Member Giftee.


Happiness Delivered.

The perfect gifts.



Who We Are.


Ryan E. Hogan is the founder of Pelorus, and currently serving active duty in the United States Navy.  He is a serial entrepreneur and knows what it takes to scale a business.  He was honored as Baltimore's 10 People To Watch Under 30 and his company won the 2012 Cupid's Cup business competition.  Ryan has built the right mix of partners and people to make Pelorus great.


Up and Running is an Iowa-based software development firm specializing in database in backend development.  Up and Running has provided service to major companies, such as Lee, Macy's, Sonic, Nissan, United, Southwest, AT&T and the NFL.  Peter Hanson, Up and Running's CTO, has direct oversight of the Pelorus project.


Chulado is a digital design agency in Baltimore, consisting of a small talented team of passionate individuals.  Chulado is responsible for the front-end design and UX of Pelorus.me.


HGL Productions is a Baltimore-based video and visual production company founded by brother Brian and Kevin Chilcoat.  HGL is responsible for the creation and production of visuals relating to Pelorus (including the campaign video!).


Where We Are.


Pelorus.me officially launched on 26May2015.  We have sent 25 gifts so far and are 70 Members strong.

Our software was developed with an emphasis on security, and released as a minimum viable product.


We Need You.


Our vision is larger than our pockets, and we need your help.

We're ready to start building features our Members demand; like a QuickGift button, Google address verification, and gift tracking.  We use the best and brightest software engineers, but we know a capital infusion is needed.

We also need to advertise.  Our service is useless if no one knows we exist; we need to ensure every military member knows Pelorus is here and ready to help.


Frequently Asked Questions.

What makes Pelorus a gifting expert?
Our Lifestyle Profiler™ (developed by a team of psychology, sociology, and marketing professors) ensure we ask the right questions to build your profiles. Then we turn over your profiles to our hand-selected Gifters.

Does a computer program select my gift?
No. Real live humans select each gift for your loved ones. Our Gifters are hand-selected and understand the dynamics of proper and effective gifting. Individual Gifters are matched to the lifestyles of the profiles you build to be sure that your loved ones receive gifts that fit their personality.
Where do the gifts come from?
Our Gifters search the highest rated boutiques for the most perfect gifts.  Sometimes we resort to name-brand items from well-known e-tailers, but mostly handcrafted gifts that deliver a one-of-a-kind unboxing experience.
How will they know the gift is from me?
We always note the occasion and list you as the sender.
How will the gifts arrive?
The gifts arrive via UPS or FedEx on your recipient’s doorstep. And most of the time - if your budget allows - the gifts are delivered wrapped.
Do you scour the web for the best prices as well as the best products?
We’re not going to hide it, most of our prices are MSRP. We focus on selecting the best gift at a fair value, but delighting your loved one is our top priority.
Does the recipient know that Pelorus was involved in the process?
Gifts are sent from a “Distribution Center”, never informing the recipient that Pelorus helped you select and deliver the perfect gift.
On the very small chance my recipient is not satisfied, how are returns handled?
We use a curated list of screened vendors who adhere to the best return policies in the ecommerce industry.
How much time is needed to send first gift?
Our gifting process begins about 14 days prior to the occasion. This gives our Gifters enough time to properly evaluate the profile and select the perfect gift to ensure it’s on their doorstep in time.


PLANKOWNERS
Cherice Hogan
Chipper Sprik
Collin Hust
Derrick Smith
Dusty Hefley
Gary Baluga
Jesse Iwuji
Joe Doran
Joe Minnich
Krevon Day
Lee Natividad
Matthew Steffens
Reis Gouveia
Ryan Keelty
Shane Unger
Steven Milino
Todd Hernandez

story:
Let's Put It On a Pep-Air!


Like you can see on the video, it all started with my 5 years old boy. I was struggling to bring new attractions to his life, and fell in love myself with this whole mini helicopters trend.

But there was always something missing (and I swear to god I bought almost every mini helicopter out there to find out what...). For it to not be just a cool gadget, but actually a toy that is fun to play with friends, the helicopter must communicate with other helicopters. Moreover, The battery time has to be longer, which means the craft has to be lighter in weight, and the resistance must be higher. The few helicopters that crashed and broke on their first flight proved it...

So after buying tons of mini helicopters, engines, rotors and parts and playing with it for over a year, I finally found the solution! (one of this eureka moments...)

The crash-proof body problem, and the battery time were both solved with a folded paper body that can be easily replaced, and the communication problem was solved with a brand new app, that can control the crafts but also communicate with other crafts' apps to send and receive data.

So ladies and gentlemen, I'm more than proud to introduce you to Pep-Air!


Pep-Air is a smartphone-controlled crash proof high-performance Helicopter, that is small enough to fit in your pocket and big enough to take on the skies! 

Pep-Air is uniquely designed for endless fun! Choose out of our variety of designs, print it on your home printer, fold according to the instruction and put it on a Pep-Air. Now, you can perform incredible stunts with the push of a button (and create your personalized crafts as well).

Nothing moves like a Pep-Air!
Instead of a traditional controller, you can pilot this craft and even fire missiles with your iPhone or Android smartphone. You can even steer and guide the helicopter by tilting your mobile device. All you need to do is to download the free app to control your Pep-Air. This high performance, single rotor, helicopter has a gyro technology to provide ultimate stability and control. 

Its crash resistant body will challenge you to push its limits without fear! Live to fly like a master with Pep-Air! 

And to summarize the highlights-

  • You can run air combats and fire missiles on other Pep-Airs
  • You can design your own Pep-Airs and print it in less than 5 minutes
  • Your smartphone becomes a full flight simulator 
    Want to see some more? Visit our website


Now let's make this dream come true!!!

We have the prototype, we have the printable models ready, we have the iOS and Android apps specifications documentation written by iOS & Android developers, we have the business plan confirmed ready to be executed, we have the product specification ready at the factory just waiting for the funding.... In other words, we have it all but the funding that we need to execute, and this is where your part is! 


  We invite you to be one of the Pep-Air's pioneers! 
Dear contributor, if you share the same passion we do for all kind of flying toys, if you have kids aged 3-15 that you're struggling to bring new attractions to (or want to feel like a child yourself sometime...), if you feel you've missed your life mission to be a "combat" pilot or if you just like our idea, this is the time to be a part of the first ever Pep-Air! from a small donation to a full set of Pep-Airs- contribute to this project and be the proud owner of the A series Pep-Air!

story:
At MXEL our goal has always been to provide the highest quality products in doses that actually produce results. In the interest of increasing profit margins, a lot of companies cut down on active ingredients as some can cost more than $750 a kilo. Since supplements can’t contain pharmaceutical grade ingredients, we have to increase the quantities of each ingredients, which increases the number of pills user need to take to get the desired effect.  

For example, Modafinil, which helps increase cognitive and focusing abilities just like MXEL Booster does, only a 100mg pill is required. To get similar effects, we need about 2,000mg (2g) of ingredients. Which means 4 pills instead of one tiny one. Of course, the cost of two Modafinil, assuming your doctor will agree to prescribe them to you, will cost you 24$ a pill, instead of 3$ per doses for MXEL Booster.

We are on Indiegogo because we need to acquire a automated pill machine with bottling function.  This will help us meet our production demand, reduce cost and ensure our production remain in North America.  The campaign will also give backers and existing customers the opportunity to buy MXEL supplements at an amazing discount, up to 85 % for Super Early Birds



What is MXEL Edge

MXEL Edge is a daily nootropic designed to enhance short-term recall, cognition and creativity while regulating mood. Sometimes you’re at your desk and you know you’ve forgotten something or its the late afternoon and you don’t want another coffee but you feel your thinking becoming sluggish. Edge helps avoid these pitfalls. MXEL Edge provides the brain with optimized nutrition to enhance performance. By using a host of nutrients and nootropics, the brain can maximize its potential.

How long does it take to kick it?

Generally it would take about 45-60 minutes to have the contents reach the brain. You should always take MXEL Pills with some form of fat, preferably animal fat. Whether you choose butter, fish oil, lard, a small portion of beef or chicken, an egg or possibly coconut milk- the fat will maximize the absorb of the nootropic elements.

What can I expect from MXEL Edge?

MXEL Edge is designed to clear your thinking, lighten your mood, and improve your short-term recall, cognition and creativity. Many subjects don’t report a strong hit like from coffee or energy drinks but tell us they simply can do tasks with high focus much longer than previously recorded. One author mentioned he could only focus on writing 2 hours a time but as a tester for MXEL Edge he found himself regularly writing 4.5 hours without mental fatigue.

What can I expect from MXEL Booster?

MXEL Brain Booster on the other hand will give you a real kick which you can feel as your brain begins to operate at enhanced efficiency. It is composed of different nootropics to help get the brain operating beyond optimal and into the performance zone.

How do I take it?

MXEL Edge is a 5 capsule combination. Most people are surprised at this since most other nootropics on the market are 1 or 2 pill combinations. Here’s the issue, most nootropics barely do anything. You need to take massive doses of these substances to have enough survive digestion, reach the brain and have a measurable effect on the brain. Because of this, we need to include mega-doses.

Are there side-effects?

The field of nootropics has been around for about 80 years. In that time, only handful of cases of people with extreme allergies reported negative side-effects. All ingredients in Edge and Boost are FDA approved for nutritional supplementation.  None the less, MXEL does not recommend Edge or Boost for those pregnant, nursing, with heart conditions or under the age of 18.

Can I mix other nootropics or stimulants with MXEL Edge?

In theory you could. It depends how tolerant you are. Some people can tolerate 3 cups of coffee and they’re fine, others are buzzed from half a cup. Try MXEL Edge for a week and see what it gives you before deciding if you should mix it with another stimulant.

Are there side-effects?

The field of nootropics has been around for about 80 years. In that time, only handful of cases of people with extreme allergies reported negative side-effects. All ingredients in Edge and Boost are FDA approved for nutritional supplementation.  None the less, MXEL does not recommend Edge or Boost for those pregnant, nursing, with heart conditions or under the age of 18.

Can I take MXEL Edge all every day?

Edge and Boost are designed to be taken 5 days/week. In the event of a high intensity period in your life (negotiations or exams), you can go 7 days/week but for a maximum of 3 weeks. The brain is not designed to go 100% all the time and the low periods are part of the brains natural processes.

How reliable are cognitive enhancers?

Like with most things, it depends which one and how much. Some nootropics of over 50 years of research behind them and we understand their mechanisms very well. Others have observed effects with no known mechanism. Still others don’t even have proof that they work beyond a few studies. Our approach has been to maximize the effects of known mechanisms. We know that certain micro-nutrients and neurotransmitters increase cognition so we use them. Dosing is always a tough call. In our testing some people responded to micro doses while others with different metabolic pathways developed needed doses well into the gram range to have effects. We’ve gone with doses that should work the majority of healthy people.



Why don’t you include caffeine or taurine?

We are avoiding the use of stimulants which most people are familiar with so they can see for themselves what the effects of Edge/Boost are on their own cognition, memory and creativity. Hitting someone with 1000mg of caffeine is easy. We also know the drop after that. One of the main goals we had in making Edge and Boost was to minimize the drop when it wore off. One should clearly feel that they were slower but not feel like they had run into a wall, simply fallen to baseline. This is important. Having one surge and crash takes little skill with neurochemistry, improving function with no crash on the other hand- that requires a more delicate balance.

Why should I use MXEL Edge or MXEL Booster as opposed to other products on the market?

Try it for yourself. The nootropics market is exploding and you as a consumer have many options. Also remember that supplements on the whole are not regulated like medicine and anything can be in them. Further, many popular nootropic stacks contain very little in terms of cognition or memory enhancement because their doses are either too low or contain nutrients over cognitive enhancers. We’ve striven to include both in high enough doses to make it work.

Isn’t taking nootropics like cheating?

That depends. Taking performance enhancers like anabolic steroids during the Olympics is considered cheating. Taking protein, vitamins and creatine wouldn’t be. Downing 3 cups of coffee before an exam or a major report isn’t considered cheating. Unless you are part of an organization that strictly prohibits nootropics (and we are unaware of one that exists at this time) there is no ‘rule’ violation. All you are doing is maximizing your ability to problem solve and think creatively. You are not gaining illicit knowledge or suddenly becoming a ninja. If you know of a pill that makes you a ninja- let us know, we want to be ninjas too!

What is the benefit of taking MXEL Edge or MXEL Booster?

Consider it this way, what is the benefit of eating healthy? What is the benefit of putting money away for retirement? This will help optimize your brain’s function and allow you perform at higher levels. If you can improve your cognitive performance regularly by 10% using Edge or 25% using Booster what is that worth to you? If after 2 years of finishing projects early and under budget, you get the promotion, what is that worth to you? Remember, this isn’t magic, its neuroscience.


The risks for the backers will be very limited as we already manufacture the supplements and have more than 10 years of experience during so.  If the campaign is successful, we'll buy a machine that will triple our production rate and reduce our costs.  If the campaign doesn't rise enough money to buy the machine, we can use our margin of credit at the bank to buy it or do some overtime to produce the extra pills needed to fulfill the orders from the backers.  No matter what, you will have your brain on overdrive soon!

Our vision is to continue producing in America to ensure the absolute quality of our products.  We could always go to the bank, but we felt it was a good opportunity to promote MXEL to knew customers and in return, offer super savings to backers on a product that can benefit them immensely.  

So back MXEL today and turn your dreams into reality as your brain speeds up to catch them!
story_txt:
At MXEL our goal has always been to provide the highest quality products in doses that actually produce results. In the interest of increasing profit margins, a lot of companies cut down on active ingredients as some can cost more than $750 a kilo. Since supplements can’t contain pharmaceutical grade ingredients, we have to increase the quantities of each ingredients, which increases the number of pills user need to take to get the desired effect.  
For example, Modafinil, which helps increase cognitive and focusing abilities just like MXEL Booster does, only a 100mg pill is required. To get similar effects, we need about 2,000mg (2g) of ingredients. Which means 4 pills instead of one tiny one. Of course, the cost of two Modafinil, assuming your doctor will agree to prescribe them to you, will cost you 24$ a pill, instead of 3$ per doses for MXEL Booster.We are on Indiegogo because we need to acquire a automated pill machine with bottling function.  This will help us meet our production demand, reduce cost and ensure our production remain in North America.  The campaign will also give backers and existing customers the opportunity to buy MXEL supplements at an amazing discount, up to 85 % for Super Early Birds

story:
Why HerbaFrame?

If you look around the consumer markets today, you will see a very clear trend: weight loss and health supplements are everywhere. People want to look great, they want to feel great, and they want to be attractive to others. These desires are all real, and products (many void of health benefits) have sprung up in response to them.

As a young woman and as a mother, I know just how overwhelming these desires can be. I want to feel beautiful and keep my health in check. What I do not want is false promises. When I hear that a product “can make me beautiful and slim,” I generally run far in the other direction.

At HerbaFrame we believe that “You are beautiful and charming, and you buy our quality products because you love yourself.” All our herbal products are intended to enhance your beauty, not alter it. As we debut HerbaFrame TeaTox, we are already hearing great feedback, such as inclusion on EcoKarma’s list of the Best Detox Teas in 2018 (https://www.ecokarma.net/tea/best-detox-teas/)

 

 

 

Going forward, we want to expand development and production, introducing 2-3 new products to the world every year.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are coming to you, Indiegogo community, for help raising funds. I founded HerbaFrame with my own savings, launching a website and some social media accounts myself, produced first batch of HerbaFrame TeaTox, but I know that we could be doing more. This is where you can make a big difference. With your support, we know that we can make HerbaFrame a leader in the health & wellness arena. As a thank-you, we have put together some enticing rewards for all our contributors, such as LOVE DETOX pdf e-book, samples of our products, discounts, subscriptions, and other great things.

 

The Impact

There are far too many products out there that are either void of health benefits or lack a safety guarantee. HerbaFrame will set a higher standard for health & wellness products. I take this mission very seriously, and with your all-important support, I intend to see it through to completion.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for this campaign by sharing the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of HerbaFrame, the smoother this crowdfunding campaign will go. All your contributions, monetary and non-monetary, are greatly appreciated.


Thank You!

 

WITH LOVE,

Anne, Founder of HerbaFrame

 

FAQ:

Are your products safe? Are they registered with the FDA?

Our products are designed and made from carefully selected ingredients, they are safe and beneficial to Your health.

Our detox tea we manufacture in one of the biggest and most experienced Tea manufacturers, FDA registered and certified. Detox Capsules will be made in USA in GMP and FDA certified manufacture.

Can I use your products as a substitute for food? Can I use them if I have a health problem or if I am pregnant?

These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Not to be used as a substitute for medicines or food. If pregnant/breastfeeding or have health ailments, please consult a qualified healthcare practitioner before use. 

Why do you only ship products in the USA?

Foods and supplements are very sensitive categories. Different requirements and permits for these categories are made in each country and we have to comply with them. At this time, we can only ship to the US, but we work on this as quickly as possible and we really want to reach customers in any corner of the globe.

story:
Support Kenita Placide’s Surgery - Breast Removal !!  
Friends, family, and companions I have decided after years of internal struggle to embark on a journey of self realization, bodily autonomy and self acceptance: To finally to get body affirming top surgery in the U.S. this summer. I am asking for your support in making this possible.
There is only a handful of LGBT friendly, responsible, affirming and experienced doctors performing this surgery in the U.S., none in the Caribbean. Unfortunately they are expensive. Fact is my medical coverage in Saint Lucia does not cover this. As a black, LGBT activist, face of the LGBT movement, Saint Lucian and Caribbean person, who for a very long time was not a paid activist,  not living in the US or covered sufficiently by medical insurance – I am requesting your help today.
Sometimes it is difficult for me to ask for HELP!. But today I am asking you to give what you can. I have been working for 12 years in LGBT activism to mobilise the community in Saint Lucia and the Eastern Caribbean. The countries we work with today are 7 of the 11 commonwealth countries in the Caribbean who still have buggery and gross indecency laws on the books.
Being an activist is who I am and will continue to be. But the time has come for me to also take care of myself. For this I am asking for support for me.
We last raised $8500 but still short of the target.
Asking for help to reach the actual target. The remaining costs that I need help in covering include:
$2200 for Hospital
$400 for pathologist

$2600 USD total needed
