story:
Short Summary

I asked myself a couple of questions some years ago while working out, "Why is it people don't wipe their sweat and germs off the exercise bench?  What in the world makes them think someone wants to put their head and shoulders on a soiled workstation?"   In a poll taken by Fitnessmagazine.com in April 2013 almost 40% of those polled said, they do not wipe the exercise bench down after a workout.   In 2016 at least 57 million people across the U.S. had a paid gym or fitness center membership, so that means, there are a whole lot of people leaving soiled benches behind.  My intention is to stay as far away from someone else's germs as possible.  Of course, we can't totally avoid germs while working out because studies have shown that fitness centers/gyms have more germs than a public toilet.  I've never liked the idea of contacting someone else's sweat or germs while working out, that's why I invented D Bench Jockey.  D Bench Jockey comes between the user and the sweat and germs left behind on an exercise bench.  

***

D Bench Jockey has a patented handle which allows you to place it directly on a soiled bench and after working out you can safely pick D Bench Jockey up and move on to the next exercise without ever making direct contact with the soiled side of the towel or the exercise bench.  Help me make this kind of protection available for anyone anywhere who works out and is tired of this nagging and potentially infectious situation.  D Bench Jockey also has a secondary use.  I've actually used it to cover movie theater seats and the airplane seats for me and my wife.  Yes, I placed it directly on the head of the seat and was then able to lay back and comfortably enjoy my movie/plane ride knowing my head was protected by D Bench Jockey.  During a test by Microbac Laboratories in Kentucky in 2013 D Bench Jockey was able to absorb a significant amount of moisture before soaking through to the other side.  Here is a facebook post from D.L. Stanley of Memphis, TN about D Bench Jockey:  "D Bench Jockey is the best thing since sliced bread. I use it religiously! There is no need to worry about someone else's germs from the gym when you use D Bench Jockey. I love it and would recommend it to anyone whose workout regimen requires a lot of sweat. Kudos to D Bench Jockey!"

 

What We Need & What You Get

 Right now we have a limited number of these specially made towels available and ready for shipping.   A towel of this quality would normally sell anywhere from $25.00 upwards to about $60.00.  We want you to have the same protection I have since I've been using it for a while.  If you want to see this product in various colors, (right now it's only available in black) and if you want to see this product made available all over the world you can purchase you can purchase D Bench-Jockey for the special Indiegogo price of $13.00 for one, $24.00 for two or $30.00 for three, plus shipping.  We understand that some people workout several days a week and we wanted to make it easy for you to have a clean towel for each workout.  D Bench Jockey is washable so it can be used over and over again.  We have approx 1,400 available for this Indiegogo campaign.  Mailouts will be 1 to 3 days after receiving payment.  When you purchase at least one Bench Jockey, you will also be able to vote and help pick the next color or colors for our next order.*  If you like D Bench Jockey but are not ready to make a purchase you can still vote for the next color or colors by supporting this project with at least a $5.00 donation.*  You can always donate whatever amount you desire if $5.00 is not a desirable amount. The money used will be for inventory, marketing, and shipping.  The motto of D Bench Jockey is, "Cover it up and protect yourself."

*How many new colors we have next depends on the total amount contributed to this project.

 

The Impact

Your contribution will benefit not only yourself but countless others.  You will not make contact with their germs and they will not make contact with yours.  Fungus, germs, and sweat are not going anywhere, so that means as users we need to take as many safety precautions as we can.  D Bench Jockey allows you the freedom to workout on an exercise bench you might normally pass over simply because it is soiled.  In a limited test run of D Bench Jockey, many customers testify how easy and convenient D Bench Jockey made their workout.  It doesn't fit over all the exercise equipment but it fits over most of them.  Workout with D Bench Jockey and feel safe and secure knowing that you are not directly contacting anybody else's sweat, and germs!  No more wiping, no more spraying, no more leaving your workout area to retrieve those products to clean the bench.  Remember, "Cover it up and protect yourself."

 

Risks & Challenges

There is always a struggle when introducing an entirely new product to the public, but once you see how efficiently and easily D Bench Jockey works to separate you from the sweat and germs left behind on an exercise bench, airplane seat, theater seat or any other seat or chair you don't your head to touch, you will be impressed.  With your help and my perseverance, we can and we will see this product in mass production and circulation in a short period of time.

You don't have any money and still, want to help.

  • Assist me in getting the word out and make some noise about D Bench Jockey Campaign.
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

Kudos to D Bench Jockey!"
 

What We Need & What You Get
 Right now we have a limited number of these specially made towels available and ready for shipping.   A towel of this quality would normally sell anywhere from $25.00 upwards to about $60.00.  We want you to have the same protection I have since I've been using it for a while.  If you want to see this product in various colors, (right now it's only available in black) and if you want to see this product made available all over the world you can purchase you can purchase D Bench-Jockey for the special Indiegogo price of $13.00 for one, $24.00 for two or $30.00 for three, plus shipping.  We understand that some people workout several days a week and we wanted to make it easy for you to have a clean towel for each workout.  D Bench Jockey is washable so it can be used over and over again.  We have approx 1,400 available for this Indiegogo campaign.  Mailouts will be 1 to 3 days after receiving payment.  When you purchase at least one Bench Jockey, you will also be able to vote and help pick the next color or colors for our next order.*  If you like D Bench Jockey but are not ready to make a purchase you can still vote for the next color or colors by supporting this project with at least a $5.00 donation.*  You can always donate whatever amount you desire if $5.00 is not a desirable amount. The money used will be for inventory, marketing, and shipping.  The motto of D Bench Jockey is, "Cover it up and protect yourself."
*How many new colors we have next depends on the total amount contributed to this project.
 

The Impact
Your contribution will benefit not only yourself but countless others.  You will not make contact with their germs and they will not make contact with yours.  Fungus, germs, and sweat are not going anywhere, so that means as users we need to take as many safety precautions as we can.  D Bench Jockey allows you the freedom to workout on an exercise bench you might normally pass over simply because it is soiled.  In a limited test run of D Bench Jockey, many customers testify how easy and convenient D Bench Jockey made their workout.  It doesn't fit over all the exercise equipment but it fits over most of them.  Workout with D Bench Jockey and feel safe and secure knowing that you are not directly contacting anybody else's sweat, and germs!  No more wiping, no more spraying, no more leaving your workout area to retrieve those products to clean the bench.  Remember, "Cover it up and protect yourself."
 

Risks & Challenges
There is always a struggle when introducing an entirely new product to the public, but once you see how efficiently and easily D Bench Jockey works to separate you from the sweat and germs left behind on an exercise bench, airplane seat, theater seat or any other seat or chair you don't your head to touch, you will be impressed.  With your help and my perseverance, we can and we will see this product in mass production and circulation in a short period of time.

You don't have any money and still, want to help.

Assist me in getting the word out and make some noise about D Bench Jockey Campaign.
You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Welcome to BANANACOUCH - The real Air Lounge!

Bananacouch is not a conventional filled with air seat lounge, but a significantly improved version in quality and stability towards the current offers that exist today. The Bananacouch lounge is filled with air within 8 seconds only by swaying it to and fro. It feels like being on cloud nine.

Relax and chilleasy on the land and water

There are different quality levels of the material utilized for the Bananacouch and for it´s the selection, the Bananacouch team made sure to use only high quality fabrics for it´s product.

In fact, Bananacouch doesn`t require any additional inner plastic bag (like Lamzac, Kaisr Original, Laybag etc.), hence to the special airtight inner coating. This makes it much easier to fill up the couch with air, as well as reduce the weight of the product  (approx. 30%), and makes it much easier to repair it.

Only 940 grams - fits in any backpack

On journeys, at the airport, at the beach, in the mountains, at lunch break, in the garden, on the balcony, in the living room, on the lake and in the swimming pool, open-air festivals and everywhere else. Bananacouch makes life a little bit easier. 

We are a Swiss company with our headquarters in Fribourg, Switzerland. We set our focus on air specialised products. Further developments are visible on www.airdbair.com. We are continuously developing and expanding our product range, and we always appreciate any feedback.

Additional Information
For additional information please visit our galerie on Indiegogo or our website: www.bananacouch.com

 
Guarantee
We can guarante delivery until September/October 2016 for the first 2'000 BANANACOUCH! 
 
Design comparison: BANANACOUCH vs. LAMZAC
 

How to fill up air 

How to repair

Relax & chilleasy!

 
 
 
 
 
Thank you very much for your suport!
 
Truly yours
Team BANANACOUCH, Switzerland

story:
Who is Sandy?

Sandy: Built in India with the joint efforts of i-Brain Robotics and IBrain, is set to be one of the first Intelligent and Human Sized Humanoid Robots in the world and the only one and 1st in the Indian Subcontinent.

With its 5 feet stature, and a vast network of sensors, we have created Sandy to closely mimic a human companionship.

 

True Emotion Sensor:

The True Emotion Sensors ,Capability to learn& communicate in many languages and the Artificial Intelligence that Sandy is equipped with, will make Sandy your Best and Most Intelligent Friend whom you will want for your entire life.

 

The Evolving Emotional Engaging Robot: The 3 “E”s

 

The 3 “E”s Make Sandy more Human than any other Robot. Like any Human’s Transition in Life from a Child to Adult, Sandy Keeps Evolving both Emotionally as well as in Artificial Intelligence with each update and becomes more and more engaging with you. The interesting part is; as opposed to Humans, Sandy never stops evolving and growing in its intelligence.

Sandy will interact with you like a smart and witty friend, care for you like a caring and sentimental parent and entertain you like no one other!

 

Sandy: The Super Robot

Equipped with akin to Super Powers, here is peek into what Sandy can do for you: The emotion at the heart of the robot

Sandy can make you happy if you are Sad, Can celebrate when you are Happy and Excited, Can wish you Birthday, Can Play you your favourite Songs and Videos whenever you ask Her, She can Play Chess and other Games with you, Can Sing songs, Can click your Photos or Record Videos, Can be your Health and Fitness Instructor, Can Get you any information you need about anything, Can Assist you in any of your tasks, Can Give you important notifications, Can call anyone or accept your calls, Can hand-over your calls to any-one, Can convert itself into a 200” HD red Blue 3D Projection Home Theatre System, Can be your Hi-fi Music System, Work as your Smart Computer , Can work as your own Sandipedia and many more unbeatable features which will make Sandy your Best Companion.

 

Great Features:

story:
Summary

About six months ago Mona Rocchi, a tremendously energetic female entrepreneur in Sri Lanka and I sat down to discuss the idea of starting a trend for healthy food and drinks in Sri Lanka using sustainable produce harvested in the country. We experimented for a while with recipes and included a large portfolio of Mediterranean dishes you can cook in this part of the world using a pizza oven to avoid cooking with oil and fat. The products are there, a large number of customers have enjoyed them and unanimously agree on the quality and taste. But the key to bringing the product out into the market is the concept of a fruit juice and food glass bar drive through. That is the real innovation in our model. People need to see what they get in this country and the glass bar offering our unique products with an attached pizza oven is what will make a difference!

Mona is Sri Lankan and has been in the health and food industry for over a decade. She has been a pioneer and originally set up Sri Lanka´s first beauty treatment company, which became a tremendous financial success. She has strong business acumen and is passionate about campaigning for people to live a healthy lifestyle - by enjoying what they eat and drink.

Rohith Delilkhan is of Sri Lankan origin, too, born in the UK and educated in Germany and Switzerland. He has worked as an advisor to major hotel groups, small restaurants and airlines, and run small businesses as start-up CEO until they were successful in Singapore, the Middle East and Switzerland.

We believe that our project is a vital step towards rethinking food and drink in a growing developing economy, where the young and the discerning are willing to search for alternatives to fast food. We believe there is tremendous potential for juice bars and healthy breakfast options, which we will offer from street-side drive-thru locations for people on their way to work in the morning to pick up at prices which are affordable but will allow us to make a profit with the business. Sri Lankans as eaters are discerning and if we can get the early adopters on board we are confident we can create a trend that will revolutionize the way people think about food and drinks in the country.

From our first restaurant in Battaramula, which we have taken over, to a franchise business is not a long way away -  in the context of Sri Lanka, and we want to make this an island-wide trend, as the cost of setting up drive-thru fruit juice and food bars with an adjacent pizza oven (in which all manner of food can be cooked without oil) is fairly reasonable.

If you as contributors to this project are willing to help us make it happen, you will be able  not only to recover your investment but also to help build a healthier lifestyle for people who have forgotten what it means to eat good food. This is a for-profit business, and we are confident about the financials involved, but we also feel it is a major contribution to society. Without your help we cannot do this as banks in Sri Lanka do not lend money and finance companies unless they have fixed assets to the value of the commitment required, which we do not. We have used our own funds to build and pilot the concept until we now have a working prototype, but to go the next mile we need support.

Funding Requirements & Returns

The funding we require is USD 180,000. What will it be used for?

We will take over the equipment and facilities (including pizza oven and two fully operational kitchens, as well as a long-term lease agreement of the premises, a beautiful old colonial building at a guaranteed rental rate for the first property, This takeover also includes the licenses, such as operating and alcohol licenses for a restaurant, which we need to finance. The cost for this USD 120,000.

We need a further sum of USD 20,000 to pave the drive-thru area and redo the drainage and wiring system to the property, and a further USD 12,000 for the full glass drive-thru fruit juice and food bar. Another USD 20,000 will be used to replicate the same in Marine Drive Colombo, for just a fruit-juice and healthy pizza and salad drive-thru without a full operating restaurant as in Battaramula, which is the showcase piece. Do we need a full restaurant? Yes, in the context of Sri Lanka you need a home for your franchise as people want to see how something materializes and image plays a vital role in building a brand. The restaurant will be the mainstay for our investment recovery. We will use USD 8,000 for our marketing campaign from your funds. As for ourselves as entrepreneurs, we will take on paying the staff, funding our own costs for the first year until the business is profitable, so that the enterprise can become a success.  We expect to invest about USD 30,000 ourselves for that, besides the USD 45,000 we have already used of our own funds for prototyping (recipes, equipment investments, production and tasting by customers).

The operation is expected to make around USD 9,000-10,000 a month with the main and one franchise location. Once the model is successful we will offer strictly regulated franchises to others to buy into, which we reckon will be within 24 months. Within 4 years we expect to IPO the business in Sri Lanka. 

Your investment will be injected into the business as a private placement (collectively) and we will pledge the license we have for alcohol, which is worth around USD 200,000 at the current going rate in Sri Lanka for your contribution - it is impossible to get new alcohol licenses for restaurants today (and for the past 12 months as well). Should the venture not be successful for any reason we will transfer the alcohol license we have to someone else and repay you from the returns.

However, we are confident this will be a successful venture and you can cash out at a return of 20% IRR after two years or wait for IPO, at which time we will convert your contribution at your investment plus about 20% p.a. IRR minimum value of your placement. So that means if you put in USD 100 to our project it will be worth USD 200 in shares when we go for an IPO. These you can sell and exit or you can retain and continue your journey with us.

 

Project Impact

Affordable good food needs to be eaten to be appreciated. It is available in Sri Lanka if you purchase fresh produce from the market and use traditional recipes from Sri Lanka and the Mediterranean. They are a joy to eat and people will understand that healthy doesn´t mean limitations but expansion of horizons.

We want to see less diabetes, more fun with dining, less obesity as a result in Sri Lanka.

We want to become the hip company that turned the trend and it is with our concept of drive-thru juice and food  bar that we will do it and the plethora of recipes we have tested.

Your contribution is towards a great cause, but it will be a profitable one so you can not only make something out of this venture but also do something good for a society.

    Risks & Challenges

    The main risk we face is that people will prefer unhealthy food to healthy food, even if it tastes better. It is critical that we can get our early adopters into the equation. For this reason we decided to have the restaurant in an area where people are amongst the trendsetters and early adopters.

    A secondary challenge we face is that staff for the restaurant and food business as such are not easy to come by. But we have agreed with a training institution to take their staff and have our own staff trained by them in order for us to have access to manpower so we can expand.

    Of course, a final risk is that something happens to us - but there are two us, both passionate about this business, and both in a position to carry on if one of us were no longer able to contribute for any reason.

      If you can contribute, great, if you can´t - this is how you can still help...

      Tell people what we, as local entrepreneurs in Sri Lanka, are trying to change as a trend in society. If we are successful here we can go to India and elsewhere in South Asia with our model.

        Use the indiegogo share tools to spread the word about us if you like our project. Thank you!

story:
Who and what?

We are a team of Finnish students from the best high school in all Finland: Etelä-Tapiolan lukio. Our team consists of political influencers, veteran salesmen, musicians and sports enthusiasts. Our team spirit is strong as we have worked together in countless projects including research, sports tournaments, band activity, entrepreneurship etc.

Our goal is to fight against the rapidly increasing loneliness and obesity in the world by bringing people together through the sports and activities of their choice. We don't think something as crucial as being healthy should cost you any money so we offer you teemUp! for free. By not charging you with any money we offer you endless opportunities to meet new people and try new activities wherever and whenever you decide on the skill level of your choice!

How does it work?

To start meeting new people and trying new sports you install the teemUp! app from the Appstore or from the Google Play. Create a new profile to teemUp! and fill in a little information which includes your location, interests and age. This information helps us show you people with similar interests near you. Now you are free to use our amazing features.

- Found someone interesting? Chat directly to them!

- Want to play with someone? Create an event and watch other users join you!

- Want to play but have no place to play? Check locations for any activities and sports submitted by other users!

- Want to do something but don't know what? Just scroll through events created by other users and try something completely new!

- Had a good time with your contact? Rate them five stars!

- Want to meet with your contacts again? Add them to your Teem and arrange meetings through a group chat!

The money talk

This great of an app doesn't sadly develop itself so we need some fuel to light our idea up. We have calculated our expenses and asked several computer wizards and they have estimated that to code our app we need 2000-3000€. To market our app we need 1000€. Our plan to market the app is by buying ad space in social media, by co-operating with sports clubs and by flyers at the sides of sports fields and public transportation.We also need about 600€ to maintain our app.

As unique perks you can chat with us for 5€, test the app on it's beta state for 10€, get the unique premium golden user when the app comes out and be the first one to test the new features for 100€, play around with the alpha version of the app for 200€ and get our CEO's classic ice tea sent to you for 5000€. If we don't reach the goal we are going to keep the money and try something else to come up with the rest that is needed as this is our dream. No matter the outcome of this fundraising you will get the perks you paid for.

Started from the bottom

Our team has thought about this concept for years and this we year participated in entrepreneur course at our high school and decided to reach for our dreams. Our biggest problem from the start has been the fact that none of us can code an app but still we have managed to make a pre-alpha version of the app. This fundraiser is your chance to help us out with our biggest challenge.

Can't fund?

Even if you for some reason can't help us with our campaign moneywise you can still help us out and we truly appreciate it. Best ways to help us is by sharing this campaign to your friends and co-workers and spreading the word. Also if you happen to be a capable of coding an app or know someone who is we would appreciate greatly your help in the making of the app.

story:
"OVERCOMING  OBESITY"

The Silver Bullet Approach(TM):

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION on OBESITY & WEIGHT LOSS

1 in 3 Americans Are Obese

 

Diet & Activity Can Help You Lose The Weight That’s Killing You!   But the magic Supplement speeds up the weight loss process to keep it SIMPLE.

 

GOALS: Use our Goal & Plan sheets and set your weight loss goal for a “new you” and be determined to win.

Obesity is a major problem in the industrialized world, and while the growth in obesity rates has been generally leveling off, the fact that obesity has doubled worldwide since 1980* is troubling in and of itself. Obesity is  defined as anyone with a BMI greater than 30 - that is now about 1 in 3 Americans.

What has changed in our daily routines since the 80’s?

    Children spend more time in front of a screen than any other single activity (In the US, it’s 7.5 hours per day).

   This is almost at epidemic proportions; children need to become active and reduce their time on smartphones, computers/ tablets, and TV’s, or else obesity is a forgone conclusion when combined with the over-eating of bad food choices,

    Consumption of added sugar has doubled and is consumed in excess. Virtually 3 of 4 packaged foods (74%) include sugar (Quote per Dr. Frank Lustig, MD)

    Dinner, made with whole foods, and eaten at the table is a long-forgotten memory, while bringing home fast, convenience food is commonplace,

    The number of families where both parents work has doubled – and adults are working longer hours,

    For many, there are simply not enough hours in the day to prepare quality whole foods (Or, is it a matter of setting priorities?),

    Physical education in schools has been dramatically reduced (In the US, only 6 states require physical education in every grade, Kindergarten–12),

    In the US, only one in three children are physically active every day (and we wonder how many of these children reside in the states where activity is mandated in their schools?), and

    Fast food outlets are virtually everywhere and offer convenience to time-starved families - leading to terrible food choices.

 

Hint: Prepare your daily meals in advance and warm them prior to serving.  Freeze them if you must. NEVER use a microwave as they are very unhealthy – the body can’t digest microwaved foods properly.

 

Adult obesity rates for selected countries are shown in the chart below:

So, if you, a friend or family member is obese, we really mean it when we say, You are not alone!  

Of course, the question is: "What should obese people do to lose weight?"

 

Use The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) is one great step.

In this case generally, our advice is clear: (1) Make an appointment with your Doctor and seek his/her recommendations; also meet with your trusted Health Care Professional for additional advice and information, (2) Create and follow a healthy diet and activity program, and (3) Have perseverance and patience.

https://www.xandershopping.com/  https://discountluxuryshopping.com/  https://patelshopping.com 

Important: You must discuss the issue of balancing your blood sugar and the effect that insulin levels have on your body with your Doctor and Health Care Professional. This is a key problem, which may lead to obesity.

Blood sugar levels and insulin are related. Insulin helps balance your blood sugar levels.  Here’s how, as explained at endocrineweb:  

“The cells in your body need sugar for energy. However, sugar cannot go into most of your cells directly. After you eat food and your blood sugar level rises, cells in your pancreas (known as beta cells) are signaled to release insulin into your bloodstream…

If you have more sugar in your body than it needs, insulin helps store the sugar in your liver and releases it when your blood sugar level is low or if you need more sugar, such as in between meals or during physical activity. Therefore, insulin helps balance out blood sugar levels and keeps them in a normal range. As blood sugar levels rise, the pancreas secretes more insulin.

If your body does not produce enough insulin or your cells are resistant to the effects of insulin, you may develop hyperglycemia (high blood sugar), which can cause long-term complications if the blood sugar levels stay elevated for long periods of time.”

In addition to this website endocrineweb.com, there is an interesting book, The Obesity Code, written by Jason Fung, MD, which explores this subject in depth.

You need to remember that people do not become overweight or obese overnight; neither should they expect to lose their excess weight rapidly either.  

Slow and steady wins the race.

 

Weight Loss Shows:    Weight-loss television shows may be entertaining, but they are often not reality. Certainly, one will likely lose weight by exercising hard and consuming relatively few calories each day in a controlled environment, but who can adopt such an approach into daily life?

We should point out that many of these shows’ contestants gain weight after they leave the show and that explains the real problem: For many, the barrier to sustained weight-loss is being left on one’s own to tackle it. Chances are you need regular help.

 

A Recipe For Disaster:

If we were having a conversation about this, we would advise you (with your doctor’s permission and endorsement) to start by simply counting your calories and being aware of the normal adult levels to give you a sense of making better food choices. Then, “step down” your daily caloric goal, week by week.

We can tell you about a free App for your Smartphone or computer to Count Calories easily to stay on-track.

Once your daily calories are at normal adult levels for a few weeks, begin restricting them further and start to follow the OOC Diet Success Plan(TM).  We can provide that to you - discuss please.

The normal calories consumed daily are as follows:  For women at 1,600 calories and for men at 2,200 calories daily.  Try and get there over time - then go lower.

BUT if you are eating the wrong foods and have leaky gut syndrome you will not optimize your weight loss results.  Get the right food choices and use our Approach to win.  Most folks who are obese are consuming in excess of 4,000 to 6,000 daily calories.

Combined with terrible food choices, no activity, poor gut health and it is a Recipe For Disaster.

Severely overweight or obese people should lose weight during our suggested “step down” period and the rate of weight loss should increase once they begin the OCC Diet Success Plan because it is based on sound principles. When incorporated for overcoming obesity also adopt these good habits:

 

    We will inform you of the key foods to eat to stay full and healthy

    Eat whole foods only; avoid processed foods and junk foods

   AVOID: Soda drinks (diet and regular) and sugary drinks - they are your enemy

    Understand that FOUR Key Foods are Your ENEMY!  They are literally killing you and keeping the weight on.  Eliminate them and the weight starts to fly-off you.

    Generally eat all the fruits and veggies you like.  Unless you are diabetic then special foods need consideration.

    Drink lots of fresh water - not tap water.

    Light activity to start (walking 20 minutes daily and stretching, for instance); increase your activity with time. Activity is your friend.

 

For those who are burdened with lots of extra weight, I’d ask you to remember these 4 points:

1. Stop Over Eating.  And make better food choices. Using whole foods only. You are currently taking in too many calories each and every day to maintain your weight; to lose weight you must reduce your caloric intake.  BUT if you eat the wrong foods it does not matter how little you are eating.  This is key to understand.

2. It will take time to lose the weight; you need to be persistent and patient.

3. The OCC Diet Success Plan can help you succeed while being ACTIVE.

4. JUST START!

 

ONE THEORY:

One theory is that obesity is, at least in part, a result of a slow, under-performing thyroid gland according to some obesity associations or support groups.  We can inform you how to improve your Thyroid Health.  You see there is something called the Endocrine System - the glands in our body that supply hormones (thyroid gland and pancreas for example are key).

Poor Gut Health including Leaky Gut Syndrome can lead to Endocrine Disorder which can lead to disease and being over-weight (amongst others).  BUT this is crucial to understand.

That is why The Silver Bullet Approach is so important - because it takes gut health and the endocrine system into great consideration.  BUT WE KEEP IT SIMPLE - do you need to understand all this or just get on an approach that works ?  That is really up to you - we can explain this all to you in coaching sessions or simply give you the STEPS to succeed at weight loss and overcoming obesity.

Google “obesity” and start reading.  You will find other potential items that can lead to obesity. Getting out of any mental rut you may understandably be in is often a key part towards overcoming obesity.  

By setting goals and having a plan to achieve them daily will certainly help your mental attitude. And treat yourself nicely – walks in the sunshine or by the water or in the woods are all helpful to our mental health. Stay busy and get your mind off your problems.

VITAMIN D received naturally from sunshine is now considered to be crucial to our health by many health care professionals.  30 minutes daily of sunshine without sunscreen is important to good health on so many levels.  It will help with your Gut Health and your metabolism in most instances.

We are of course focused primarily on diet and encourage you to get active. But be aware of these other issues related to obesity and try your best.

 

A Personal Note From Our Founder:

I am sure you have faced some very difficult times in the past. Maybe it was bullying in the schoolyard, embarrassment or the suffering associated from certain health conditions. If this is happening to your child – there aren’t many other things that can affect us so negatively. I wish I could reach out, touch you, and say, “you will be OK.”  To a great extent we have written our information and approach with you in mind. And, I want to “feel” for you.  

However, my job is to help you.  So I must remind you that everything that may have happened to you previously – is now in the past.  You can’t change it. So let it go.  

What you can do is live in the present moment and be determined to change your life from this very point on.  Right now. This period of time you can definitely control. So, please do anything to set your weight goals and JUST START.

One “first step” should be this: Go to your fridge and kitchen cupboards right now and remove all the bad foods. What You Eat Matters, we can include a list of foods to avoid for you. Get rid of these foods from your home immediately and you will be forced to start making better food choices.

I wish you well on your health journey and truly hope that we can help you succeed and become THE NEW YOU."

 

Parents or Guardians of Obese Children

Sorry, but this is tough love for you.  YOU need to change your lifestyle and understand how to eat better using whole foods, not to over-eat, and to get active. And, support your child to overcome obesity.  You need to become the teacher.

In most cases, you are enabling your children.   This may be because you don’t know better – and that’s OK, you are reading this information for insights to help you.  

Also, you are not alone, as many Americans are in the same boat.

If you watch the television shows about the lives of obese people, look at the food that parents bring home for their children:  

A big bucket of fried chicken

French fries

A big bottle of soda pop

Maybe, a pizza for later

Leftovers are microwaved later that night as a snack

 

These parents may have the best of intentions (to feed their children), but they are choosing the wrong foods. There are probably 3,000 calories+ alone in the foods listed above, and these food choices are full of all the foods we want you to AVOID; they are fried and processed foods. Please, stop doing that!

 

Stop going to fast food restaurants and start cooking whole foods at home.  

Start today by preparing this dinner for your child (and don’t use your microwave ever again):  

A baked chicken breast, spiced with herbs (not sauces)

Salad

Fresh vegetables

Fruit for dessert

Fresh Water (not tap water), before and after dinner

 

After dinner, go for a walk with your child or get them active anyway you can.

Limit their “screen time” to 3 or 4 hours per day and get them outside being active with the “extra time” created by limiting their use of smartphones, tablets and TVs.

 

All the strategies and principles to help your overweight child (or children) are contained in our information that is available.  Please use them for yourself and your family. Consult our Cookbook for how to prepare your foods and for what foods to buy – The Shopping List is there.

This is your chance at a new start. We know you love your child and that’s why you are reading this information – to help him/her change.  So, please, take responsibility and learn how to make good food choices for your child.  Consider The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) for both you and your child.

"Remember: You Are Not Alone"

 

If you are very obese you will need help.

Reach out and seek it. But please start somewhere.

Our Founder & Managing Director

Mr. Mason has previously controlled and operated 25 Medical Clinics with a small team that had over 70 M.D.'s plus over 75 support staff on payroll. Certain clinics also offered pharmacy, laboratory, imagining, dental, physio, psychiatry, and other services in addition to family medicine and walk-in care.  He has been involved with projects including cardiovascular monitoring over the internet, PRP / Stem Cells, and Electronic Medical Records.  Also controlled previously with a small team 100 optical stores with optical lab.  He has previously been an author, broadcaster and public speaker.

He understands the medical business, how it functions and how the new delivery model to help others truly needs to be online - to save the health care system extensive costs and to be practical in today's evolving world. Plus after working with doctors for over the past 30 years knows the importance of only using medical professionals to provide and prove any strategies before providing the same for information purposes.

He is approaching the age of 60 and has the experience, drive and ability to lead the Online Obesity Clinics onto greatness.  He is not a doctor rather an experienced businessman. He has great vision and compassion for others and knows how to treat all team members with respect and to give them the confidence so they can personally excel.  And truly wants to help others.  Previously he has been involved with extensive real estate development projects - if you can build buildings you can get thru many business issues at all levels.

A Personal Note from Our Founder:

"My personal weight loss journey started over 8 years ago - initially I lost about 35 pounds over a few months.  But more importantly I discovered how to keep the weight off for life.

Today I am about 40 pounds below where I started and doing a good job of maintaining my weight.  More importantly I have discovered that disease is directly related to our nutrition.  We will share many of these insights with you.  However no one needs to be perfect.  I certainly am not!  I have ups and downs like so many of us.  Life just is not perfect.

Initially we started out to create an online medical clinic to help others - only to realize that doctors can not generally provide their services outside of their jurisdiction of governance or not even online in most jurisdictions.  However, we know that the future of health care must be delivered online.

Accordingly, we have developed our delivery model, systems and processes - they really are unique and will help change the world. So when challenged with not being able to have doctors directly on staff - we turned to perhaps something better.  We decided to draw upon world leading medical professionals and authorities to help others - and not to be restricted to just any one physician. 

We have spent the majority of our time not on marketing; rather on development and research (as one can only imagine how consuming that must be).  So when we say we can potentially save you years of research to understand how to deal with obesity or weight loss - we mean it.

I was perhaps one of the several pioneers in developing walk-in medical clinics many years ago.  Today walk-in medical clinics are very common.  We anticipate that our style of online clinics will also become common within 15 years.  For now we are unique - but our strategies are based upon the years of experience and studies of certain medical professionals.

We truly are here to help and will do our best by you.  I wish you well on your health journey and really hope that we can assist you or your loved ones. 

Our Vision is to revolutionize how we ALL manage or prevent disease and to enhance LONGEVITY."    

In our case, it will be, "One Client at a Time."

Virtually 3 of 4 packaged foods (74%) include sugar (Quote per Dr. Frank Lustig, MD)    Dinner, made with whole foods, and eaten at the table is a long-forgotten memory, while bringing home fast, convenience food is commonplace,    The number of families where both parents work has doubled – and adults are working longer hours,    For many, there are simply not enough hours in the day to prepare quality whole foods (Or, is it a matter of setting priorities?),    Physical education in schools has been dramatically reduced (In the US, only 6 states require physical education in every grade, Kindergarten–12),    In the US, only one in three children are physically active every day (and we wonder how many of these children reside in the states where activity is mandated in their schools?), and    Fast food outlets are virtually everywhere and offer convenience to time-starved families - leading to terrible food choices. Hint: Prepare your daily meals in advance and warm them prior to serving.  Freeze them if you must. NEVER use a microwave as they are very unhealthy – the body can’t digest microwaved foods properly. Adult obesity rates for selected countries are shown in the chart below:World Rank Country Adult Obesity Rate12.   United States of America 35.0%24.   New Zealand 30.6%25.   Canada 30.1%26.   Australia 29.9%27.   United Kingdom 29.8%So, if you, a friend or family member is obese, we really mean it when we say, You are not alone!  Of course, the question is: "What should obese people do to lose weight?" Use The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) is one great step.In this case generally, our advice is clear: (1) Make an appointment with your Doctor and seek his/her recommendations; also meet with your trusted Health Care Professional for additional advice and information, (2) Create and follow a healthy diet and activity program, and (3) Have perseverance and patience.https://www.xandershopping.com/  https://discountluxuryshopping.com/  https://patelshopping.com Important: You must discuss the issue of balancing your blood sugar and the effect that insulin levels have on your body with your Doctor and Health Care Professional. This is a key problem, which may lead to obesity.Blood sugar levels and insulin are related. Insulin helps balance your blood sugar levels.  Here’s how, as explained at endocrineweb:  “The cells in your body need sugar for energy. However, sugar cannot go into most of your cells directly. After you eat food and your blood sugar level rises, cells in your pancreas (known as beta cells) are signaled to release insulin into your bloodstream…If you have more sugar in your body than it needs, insulin helps store the sugar in your liver and releases it when your blood sugar level is low or if you need more sugar, such as in between meals or during physical activity. Therefore, insulin helps balance out blood sugar levels and keeps them in a normal range. As blood sugar levels rise, the pancreas secretes more insulin.If your body does not produce enough insulin or your cells are resistant to the effects of insulin, you may develop hyperglycemia (high blood sugar), which can cause long-term complications if the blood sugar levels stay elevated for long periods of time.”In addition to this website endocrineweb.com, there is an interesting book, The Obesity Code, written by Jason Fung, MD, which explores this subject in depth.You need to remember that people do not become overweight or obese overnight; neither should they expect to lose their excess weight rapidly either.  Slow and steady wins the race. Weight Loss Shows:    Weight-loss television shows may be entertaining, but they are often not reality. Certainly, one will likely lose weight by exercising hard and consuming relatively few calories each day in a controlled environment, but who can adopt such an approach into daily life?We should point out that many of these shows’ contestants gain weight after they leave the show and that explains the real problem: For many, the barrier to sustained weight-loss is being left on one’s own to tackle it. Chances are you need regular help. A Recipe For Disaster:If we were having a conversation about this, we would advise you (with your doctor’s permission and endorsement) to start by simply counting your calories and being aware of the normal adult levels to give you a sense of making better food choices. Then, “step down” your daily caloric goal, week by week.We can tell you about a free App for your Smartphone or computer to Count Calories easily to stay on-track.Once your daily calories are at normal adult levels for a few weeks, begin restricting them further and start to follow the OOC Diet Success Plan(TM).  We can provide that to you - discuss please.The normal calories consumed daily are as follows:  For women at 1,600 calories and for men at 2,200 calories daily.  Try and get there over time - then go lower.BUT if you are eating the wrong foods and have leaky gut syndrome you will not optimize your weight loss results.  Get the right food choices and use our Approach to win.  Most folks who are obese are consuming in excess of 4,000 to 6,000 daily calories.Combined with terrible food choices, no activity, poor gut health and it is a Recipe For Disaster.Severely overweight or obese people should lose weight during our suggested “step down” period and the rate of weight loss should increase once they begin the OCC Diet Success Plan because it is based on sound principles. When incorporated for overcoming obesity also adopt these good habits:     We will inform you of the key foods to eat to stay full and healthy    Eat whole foods only; avoid processed foods and junk foods   AVOID: Soda drinks (diet and regular) and sugary drinks - they are your enemy    Understand that FOUR Key Foods are Your ENEMY!  They are literally killing you and keeping the weight on.  Eliminate them and the weight starts to fly-off you.    Generally eat all the fruits and veggies you like.  Unless you are diabetic then special foods need consideration.    Drink lots of fresh water - not tap water.    Light activity to start (walking 20 minutes daily and stretching, for instance); increase your activity with time. Activity is your friend. For those who are burdened with lots of extra weight, I’d ask you to remember these 4 points:1. Stop Over Eating.  And make better food choices. Using whole foods only. You are currently taking in too many calories each and every day to maintain your weight; to lose weight you must reduce your caloric intake.  BUT if you eat the wrong foods it does not matter how little you are eating.  This is key to understand.2. It will take time to lose the weight; you need to be persistent and patient.3. The OCC Diet Success Plan can help you succeed while being ACTIVE.4. JUST START! ONE THEORY:One theory is that obesity is, at least in part, a result of a slow, under-performing thyroid gland according to some obesity associations or support groups.  We can inform you how to improve your Thyroid Health.  You see there is something called the Endocrine System - the glands in our body that supply hormones (thyroid gland and pancreas for example are key).Poor Gut Health including Leaky Gut Syndrome can lead to Endocrine Disorder which can lead to disease and being over-weight (amongst others).  BUT this is crucial to understand.That is why The Silver Bullet Approach is so important - because it takes gut health and the endocrine system into great consideration.  BUT WE KEEP IT SIMPLE - do you need to understand all this or just get on an approach that works ?  That is really up to you - we can explain this all to you in coaching sessions or simply give you the STEPS to succeed at weight loss and overcoming obesity.Google “obesity” and start reading.  You will find other potential items that can lead to obesity. Getting out of any mental rut you may understandably be in is often a key part towards overcoming obesity.  By setting goals and having a plan to achieve them daily will certainly help your mental attitude. And treat yourself nicely – walks in the sunshine or by the water or in the woods are all helpful to our mental health. Stay busy and get your mind off your problems.VITAMIN D received naturally from sunshine is now considered to be crucial to our health by many health care professionals.  30 minutes daily of sunshine without sunscreen is important to good health on so many levels.  It will help with your Gut Health and your metabolism in most instances.We are of course focused primarily on diet and encourage you to get active. But be aware of these other issues related to obesity and try your best. A Personal Note From Our Founder:I am sure you have faced some very difficult times in the past. Maybe it was bullying in the schoolyard, embarrassment or the suffering associated from certain health conditions. If this is happening to your child – there aren’t many other things that can affect us so negatively. I wish I could reach out, touch you, and say, “you will be OK.”  To a great extent we have written our information and approach with you in mind. And, I want to “feel” for you.  However, my job is to help you.  So I must remind you that everything that may have happened to you previously – is now in the past.  You can’t change it. So let it go.  What you can do is live in the present moment and be determined to change your life from this very point on.  Right now. This period of time you can definitely control. So, please do anything to set your weight goals and JUST START.One “first step” should be this: Go to your fridge and kitchen cupboards right now and remove all the bad foods. What You Eat Matters, we can include a list of foods to avoid for you. Get rid of these foods from your home immediately and you will be forced to start making better food choices.I wish you well on your health journey and truly hope that we can help you succeed and become THE NEW YOU." Parents or Guardians of Obese ChildrenSorry, but this is tough love for you.  YOU need to change your lifestyle and understand how to eat better using whole foods, not to over-eat, and to get active. And, support your child to overcome obesity.  You need to become the teacher.In most cases, you are enabling your children.   This may be because you don’t know better – and that’s OK, you are reading this information for insights to help you.  Also, you are not alone, as many Americans are in the same boat.If you watch the television shows about the lives of obese people, look at the food that parents bring home for their children:  A big bucket of fried chickenFrench friesA big bottle of soda popMaybe, a pizza for laterLeftovers are microwaved later that night as a snack These parents may have the best of intentions (to feed their children), but they are choosing the wrong foods. There are probably 3,000 calories+ alone in the foods listed above, and these food choices are full of all the foods we want you to AVOID; they are fried and processed foods. Please, stop doing that! Stop going to fast food restaurants and start cooking whole foods at home.  Start today by preparing this dinner for your child (and don’t use your microwave ever again):  A baked chicken breast, spiced with herbs (not sauces)SaladFresh vegetablesFruit for dessertFresh Water (not tap water), before and after dinner After dinner, go for a walk with your child or get them active anyway you can.Limit their “screen time” to 3 or 4 hours per day and get them outside being active with the “extra time” created by limiting their use of smartphones, tablets and TVs. All the strategies and principles to help your overweight child (or children) are contained in our information that is available.  Please use them for yourself and your family. Consult our Cookbook for how to prepare your foods and for what foods to buy – The Shopping List is there.This is your chance at a new start. We know you love your child and that’s why you are reading this information – to help him/her change.  So, please, take responsibility and learn how to make good food choices for your child.  Consider The Silver Bullet Approach(TM) for both you and your child."Remember: You Are Not Alone" If you are very obese you will need help.Reach out and seek it. But please start somewhere. CONTACT US: TheClinicsOnline@gmail.com ABOUT USOur Founder & Managing DirectorMr. Mason has previously controlled and operated 25 Medical Clinics with a small team that had over 70 M.D.'s plus over 75 support staff on payroll. Certain clinics also offered pharmacy, laboratory, imagining, dental, physio, psychiatry, and other services in addition to family medicine and walk-in care.  He has been involved with projects including cardiovascular monitoring over the internet, PRP / Stem Cells, and Electronic Medical Records.  Also controlled previously with a small team 100 optical stores with optical lab.  He has previously been an author, broadcaster and public speaker.He understands the medical business, how it functions and how the new delivery model to help others truly needs to be online - to save the health care system extensive costs and to be practical in today's evolving world. Plus after working with doctors for over the past 30 years knows the importance of only using medical professionals to provide and prove any strategies before providing the same for information purposes.He is approaching the age of 60 and has the experience, drive and ability to lead the Online Obesity Clinics onto greatness.  He is not a doctor rather an experienced businessman. He has great vision and compassion for others and knows how to treat all team members with respect and to give them the confidence so they can personally excel.  And truly wants to help others.  Previously he has been involved with extensive real estate development projects - if you can build buildings you can get thru many business issues at all levels.A Personal Note from Our Founder:"My personal weight loss journey started over 8 years ago - initially I lost about 35 pounds over a few months.  But more importantly I discovered how to keep the weight off for life.Today I am about 40 pounds below where I started and doing a good job of maintaining my weight.  More importantly I have discovered that disease is directly related to our nutrition.  We will share many of these insights with you.  However no one needs to be perfect.  I certainly am not!  I have ups and downs like so many of us.  Life just is not perfect.Initially we started out to create an online medical clinic to help others - only to realize that doctors can not generally provide their services outside of their jurisdiction of governance or not even online in most jurisdictions.  However, we know that the future of health care must be delivered online.Accordingly, we have developed our delivery model, systems and processes - they really are unique and will help change the world. So when challenged with not being able to have doctors directly on staff - we turned to perhaps something better.  We decided to draw upon world leading medical professionals and authorities to help others - and not to be restricted to just any one physician. We have spent the majority of our time not on marketing; rather on development and research (as one can only imagine how consuming that must be).  So when we say we can potentially save you years of research to understand how to deal with obesity or weight loss - we mean it.I was perhaps one of the several pioneers in developing walk-in medical clinics many years ago.  Today walk-in medical clinics are very common.  We anticipate that our style of online clinics will also become common within 15 years.  For now we are unique - but our strategies are based upon the years of experience and studies of certain medical professionals.We truly are here to help and will do our best by you.  I wish you well on your health journey and really hope that we can assist you or your loved ones. Our Vision is to revolutionize how we ALL manage or prevent disease and to enhance LONGEVITY."    In our case, it will be, "One Client at a Time." TEAM and TEAM MEMBERS TO DEVELOPManaging Director                      Senior CoachesAssociate Coaches                      Medical AdvisersNatural Health Advisers             Research AssociatesCommunications Director         Operations DirectorOperations Staff                            Marketing & Client Support  CONTACT US:   TheClinicsOnline@gmail.com  IMPORTANT DISCLAIMERWE ARE NOT DOCTORS.  OUR SERVICES CAN NOT BE CONSTRUED AS MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS, MEDICAL TREATMENT, OR CURE OF ANY DISEASE, OR AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR THOSE SERVICES, WHICH CAN ONLY BE PERFORMED BY A LICENSED PHYSICIAN OR DOCTOR. THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES OFFERED RESPECTING OUTCOMES OR RESULTS OF OUR SERVICES AND PLANS. WE CAN ONLY PROVIDE INFORMATION TO YOU AND ENCOURAGE YOU TO CONTINUE TO TAKE YOUR DOCTOR'S ADVISE. ADDITIONAL DISCLAIMER AND INFORMATION WILL BE PROVIDED.

story:
My name is Georgi. 36 years old, originally from Plovdiv, Bulgaria, living and working in London, UK in the last 12 years. I have a wide range of interests and experience in different fields of work. With background in psychology and martial arts, I've done years of art and therapeutic work with children and young people in London, UK, leading various workshops and activities, keywoking, fundraising for charity, making art and taking part in some major exhibitions, some of which in the Royal Academy of Arts, The Southbank Centre, The Banqueting House, and many others.

It's really exiting to be here and introduce the Comet game to You!

The campaign is about sharing the Comet game with as many people as possible all around the world, because it's fun, because it's colourful, because it brings joy and peace to everyone who plays.

The inspiration to create Comets with different colourful country flags and other designs was a Comet sewn with the colours of the Bulgarian flag. It was years ago, one summer afternoon at Koral Beach on the Black sea coast, southeast Bulgaria, where I saw this beautiful game in action for the very first time. On the beach, in the sun, a few people playing, passing to each other, chatting and laughing, the Comet flag flying in the air......it was a truly beautiful sight and a moment to remember! I fell in love with the game there and then. Learned to play in minutes, played until sundown and made many new friends!

After living in London for a while and getting to know people from all over the world from many different nationalities, a feeling came to me, that it would be awesome if everyone had a Comet to play with in the colours of their country! And here we are!

With Your support for this idea You make a dream become a reality.

More people playing the Comet game, spending quality time together, all around the world. Enjoying the beautiful colours of Your countries' flags!  Celebrating our diversity through playing with people from different nations and learning something new about their countries and culture.

People from all ages can play together.

Creative conversations with the other players happen when you play.

The Comet game gets you into the Zone!

Help us spread it all around the globe and get more people to play and feel good! 

Summer is just around the corner and the Comet is your perfect companion for this beach, park, mountain or any other trip that you're planning to have. Easily fits in your pocket,  and is ready to play 24/7, no batteries needed :)

Traveling abroad? Get a Comet flag of the country you're travelling to, play with people there, make friends!

 

Funds from the campaign will go towards:

  • Materials - Fabrics, balls, thread
  • Graphic design services
  • Printing services
  • Professional Machine and hand sewing services
  • Postage and packing expences
  • Indigogo and Bank/PayPal taxes
  • My time
  • Creating an even bigger campaign with more stories and videos from people playing the Comet in different parts of the world.
  • Taxes

 

The Impact

By pledging and supporting this campaing, You can give yourself, your friends and your family the live experience of the Comet game and all the benefits that come with it.

The value of this project lies in its many positive outcomes that it may bring almost instantly after you start playing. Experience shows that your mood lifts up, your coordination skills gradually enhance the more you play, it feels relaxing to spin the Comet, let it fly high above and watch its flight. Passing and catching among each other creates a sense of fun between people, but also trust and exitement when the others develop their moves, throws and catches.

The Comet game is great for kids as well as adults, but also elderly people as well, because it doesn't expect much effort to play and yet it's revitalizing and refreshing. My grandparents love the game and we play with them too sometimes, and they're in their 80's :)!

So far we've created, with the help of my amazing team, nearly a hundred different Comet designs, most of which are country Comet flags, but also some alternative and company designs.

Produced nearly a thousand Comets most of which have been already sold out by word of mouth, in some shops and through our website and online shop at www.cometgame.co.uk


Challenges:

The vast number of world countries (nearly 195 according to Google) plus the additional Comet designs we've already made, prevented us from producing mass quantities of every design and have them ready in stock, so....

Now here at Indiegogo You have the chance to Pre-order:

  • Any country flag Comet from the 195 world countries list - Unlimited quantities
  • Some of the other alternative Comet designs already created by us - Unlimited quantities
  • Your own line of Comets designed and produced by us with options to have your Logo/Image/Company name/Contact details/etc. - Unlimited quantities

 

One more challenge during this campaign is the difficulty to present all those more than two hundred different designs as individual perks.

If you pledge for different Comet flag designs or the five other alternative Comet designs, please also send me a message to specify which flags/alternative designs you'd like with your pledge and how many of each. I'll then be able to make those right ones for you and send it along!

If you would like us to create you personal or company line of Comets with your own images, colours, logos, etc., please send me a message or email and I will send you details with the image requirements to create good quality Comets!

There are many ways you can help this campaign, even if you can't contribute, please make some noise about it and share it around!

 

Thank you!

I'll then be able to make those right ones for you and send it along!If you would like us to create you personal or company line of Comets with your own images, colours, logos, etc., please send me a message or email and I will send you details with the image requirements to create good quality Comets!There are many ways you can help this campaign, even if you can't contribute, please make some noise about it and share it around! Thank you!

story:
In the modern world, the load on the human brain is constantly increasing, the amount of incoming information and the complexity of tasks are steadily increasing. Often a person cannot cope with the incoming load: it is difficult to remember the most important thing from overvoltage at work, the constant switching between different cases does not allow concentrating, and the head is so full of various concerns by the end of the working day that the brain can no longer cope with the tasks. According to statistics, around the world, about two billion people face similar problems, and the number of such people is steadily increasing.

To solve the problems associated with poor brain performance, we created the Brainstorm Neurostimulator, which allows us to improve many of the most important cognitive abilities.

MECHANISM OF ACTION
Our brain is a real command center. Different areas of the cerebral cortex are responsible for thinking, learning, attention, movement, hearing, vision, and more. By changing the activity of these zones, one can improve many parameters of the brain. This is how tDCS works - transcranial stimulation with direct current.
Through two electrodes, a specially modulated current (direct current of 1-2 milliamperes) is applied, which changes the excitability of nerve cells, in other words, their ability to transmit a nerve signal. A positively charged electrode (anode) increases the excitability of neurons, while a negatively charged electrode (cathode) reduces it.
By suppressing the work of some areas of the brain, and by increasing the activity of others, many mental abilities and emotional state can be improved.

SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH
The tDCS method has been studied for over 30 years by leading neuroscientists around the world. Initially, it was considered as exclusively medical technology and was successfully used to treat depression, chronic pain, and recovery from a stroke. Gradually, scientists have discovered that tDCS can also be used to improve the cognitive abilities of perfectly healthy people. In 2008, the US military - DARPA conducted a study in which tDCS accelerated the training of volunteers 2.1 times. Subsequently, the benefits of tDCS were manifested in the areas of improving memory, a concentration of attention and mathematical and linguistic abilities, and learning sports.

To eliminate the placebo effect, there is a control group in tDCS studies. People in this group imitate tDCS so that they are sure that they are also being stimulated. All the positive effects of tDCS are shown only in comparison with the control group!
The impact parameters of the Brainstorm Neurostimulator fully coincide with those used in the scientific and medical literature "

We collect funds for mass production, so that the device would be accessible to everyone, from student to pensioner.

To eliminate the placebo effect, there is a control group in tDCS studies. People in this group imitate tDCS so that they are sure that they are also being stimulated. All the positive effects of tDCS are shown only in comparison with the control group!The impact parameters of the Brainstorm Neurostimulator fully coincide with those used in the scientific and medical literature "



We collect funds for mass production, so that the device would be accessible to everyone, from student to pensioner.

story:
Short Summary

My husband plays Rugby for the Brunei Darussalam National Team and the UBD Sharks Rugby Club; and has been actively involved in the Brunei rugby community for almost 10 years. Although the sport has huge potential in Brunei, it has unfortunately grown slowly as it faces many challenges, mainly funding, in order to push it one step further. 

Every year, athletes have had to raise their own funds in order to compete in tournaments, buy their rugby kits and pay for boarding and accommodation. After many brainstorming sessions with his mates on how to sustainably support these young athletes, Headhunter Sport was born. Headhunter Sport manufactures high-quality bespoke rugby kits and $2 from every purchase of a rugby kit will be set aside to fund the Headhunter Sport Rugby Academy.

The mission of this Academy is to provide schools, clubs, and budding rugby stars with the equipment, coaching, training, the right attitude and experience they need to become professional athletes. It is hoped to be the driving force behind the growth of the sport in Brunei, Borneo and eventually South East Asia.

 

What We Need & What You Get

At the moment, Headhunter Sport is being managed and operated by a core team of rugby-passionate volunteers on a part-time basis. We do everything over the weekend, outside of working hours and with help from freelance designers (Yes, we love rugby so much, we will sacrifice whatever it takes to help the sport!).

The manufacturing of the rugby kits are done by an eco-system of established professionals partners within the clothing manufacturing industry in Brunei. Although, this has worked out thus far, the core Headhunter team is constantly facing setbacks and limitations in relation to time, manufacturing support, and pace at which kits are being manufactured (we are completely at the mercy of our partners).

With a growing number of orders, Headhunter wishes to regain some control and maintain quality assurance by being more involved in the whole process. This is hoped to limit mistakes, cut production time and provide a faster service to its clients. Any additional funds raised will go towards permanently employing staff to allow the core Headhunter team to dedicate more hours to the production of the kits.

Funds raised from Indiegogo will be prioritised to enable manufacturing and will be used towards:

1. Permanent hire of one full-time design personnel;

2. Purchase of hardware and software for designing purposes;

3. Rental of a premise for administration, designing and manufacturing; and

4. Purchase of one pair of sublimation printing and pressing machines for the manufacturing on the kit.

 

The Impact

The funds will give Headhunter Sport the ability to produce kits efficiently and allow the processing of more orders. By maximising orders, Headhunter Sport will be able to contribute more towards the Headhunter Sport Rugby Academy, and towards the growth of rugby. The success of Headhunter Sport translates directly to the success of the Academy and its athletes, and a continuous and sustainable source of income for the growth of the sport.

 

Risks & Challenges

At the moment, we are at risk of stopping operations, especially if everyone is burnt-out and stretched too thin. The goal of supporting the nation's rugby will not be achieved. 

A major challenge would be penetrating the global rugby market. Brunei has a small market and targetting locally will not be feasible. The main driver to success will be exporting the product to other rugby nations, however, the product will be subject to various import taxes and duties; and will have the added cost of shipping / freight. It will be important for Headhunter Sport to maintain a competitive price so that it is still attractive even with these taxes and shipping costs. A good network and the presence of an agreement with shipping companies will also be a good way to mitigate the high cost of shipping.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us build this sport by sharing this campaign with others and spreading the word to as many people as possible. Every dollar counts to making the sport grow and developing the youth.

story:
How do you even say it? - Its 'spurs' with a zingy start - Zpurs.

                                                                   What even is Zpurs?

 Zpurs is a unique and simple way of transporting your shoes, boots (even your high heels if you want!), to wherever you need to be. 

We have developed a super-simple clipping mechanism for just about every type of shoe -put that together with a quality carabiner and you can take your shoes and stash them anywhere you want. 

 Use them at home, work, travel - wherever you go they can go too!

                                   Zpurs are happy to hang out wherever you do.                

 

                                                                     Benefits

Shoes will always be together! No lost shoe!

Allows the shoes to breathe between use.

Increases the life span of those expensive, beloved shoes.

Helps stop bacteria growth.

Stops your gym bag from getting dirty and smelly.

Creates space in your bag.

                                               What is the best size Zpur for my shoes?

The main body of Zpurs is the same across the board, so all you need to decide on is what insert size you need to use. Every set of Zpurs comes with all 3 size inserts. 

Swap the inserts to be sure of the correct fit for the shoe.


 

                                                      1 Zpur = 1 Pair of Shoes.

                                                        What Colors are There?

                                       Fuchsia, Orange, Yellow, Green, Light Blue, White

          You will be able to pick your color after the Indiegogo campaign has ended. 

                                                                    Shipping

We ship worldwide so no one has to miss out on getting their hands on a set. And we have tried our best to ship you your order at the best rates possible. 

 

                                     If you live in the EU there are no duties to pay.  

                                                          Who is making this? 

 We are a small team based in the South West of the UK. We have always had a love of the outdoors and you will often find us cycling, running or swimming in the amazing outdoors we have here. Our primary love is cycling and that led us to create NeatCleats - a cool shoe clipping system specifically designed for the cleats that cyclists wear. 

 We had a great response to launching that product and had loads of people ask if it also worked for other sports and clip systems. Well, we were listening to you, our backers, and dived into a more universal clip system. 

After a year of testing and prototyping we were happy with what we had created and so we have decided to share it with you all now. So begins Zpurs. 

 

We Would Love Your Help: 

Making Zpurs a reality has been in the works for over a year now, designing, re-designing, tooling, re-tooling. We will be shouting it from the rooftops for the campaign and, with the link below, we hope you will too. There are images and Gifs for anyone to use on their social media sites - just don't forget to #zpurs when you do so that we can give you a thank you.

story: Education lectures on HIV prevention in the community are organized on a regular basis to teach protection knowledge and raise the awareness of the population. At the same time, through training and education to improve the survival skills of young people and women to reduce unemployment, further improve community stability, reduce crime and HIV transmission. Training resources include: basic computer technology, baking, community libraries. More than 10 families currently benefit from the project.
