Training resources include: basic computer technology, baking, community libraries. More than 10 families currently benefit from the project.

story:
atomicSol is revolutionizing the kettlebell by producing high performance, highly artistic fitness equipment built for strength and style.

atomicSol is an infusion of art and fitness that is long overdue in the traditional fitness equipment industry.

‍
Creating fitness products that encompass the perfect mix of art and functionality, while creating the first non-traditional fitness display case.

Products that have an everyday, practical use and that aren’t afterthoughts when you’re done with them.

Kettlebells you can use, and showcase in any area of your life.

 

 

Each atomicSol kettlebell is uniquely designed. All kettlebells come with a unique set of characteristics, to serve as a reminder to push past your perceived limits.

Made using a cast-iron forging process and finished in a black powder-coating, our kettlebells are chip resistant. Our engineers have designed our kettlebells to be perfectly balanced at all times. 

 

 

 

 

A spiritual maverick forges a path to their version of uncommon through connectivity, creativity, and expression.

Unifying the mind, body and soul, creates foundational building blocks crucial to one’s journey.

 

 

 

 

 

Spartan armour fortifies the mind and body as a single unit.

Committed to the mission, refusing to accept failure as a viable option and keeping a fluid mental state sustains one’s conducive well-being. 

 

 

 

 

 

The sacred bull commands respect. 

Taming one of these beasts was viewed as a feat of greatness and a demonstration of one's unwavering commitment to excellence.    

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’ve created a display case to showcase your kettlebells.

Whether you’re tight on space, ready for a change from the same old, or of the core belief fitness is a personification of one’s self.  

Engineered for perfect balance regardless of weight combination and position.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It’s difficult to say who invented the Kettlebell.

Some would argue the kettlebell goes as far back as Ancient Greece.

You can find a 315 pound kettlebell in the Archaeological Museum of Olympia in Athens.

The word ‘Kettlebell’ appeared in the dictionary for the first time 1704 in Russia. The Russians call it ‘girya’.

They were made in units and fractions of "pood", with one pood being the equivalent of 16.38 kg or 36.11 lbs.

Dr. Vladislav Kraevsky supervised the opening of Russia's first weight training facility in August 1885.

This facility used kettlebells along with other types of free weights.

The first Russian national kettlebell championship took place in 1985.

Pavel Tsatsouline introduced the Russian kettlebell to North America in 1998 and started the kettlebell revolution we currently see today. 

 

 

One of the major factors that make kettlebell exercises different from other strengthening exercises is the instability that is created from the shape of the kettlebell.

Since the kettlebell’s weight is located inches below the handle, it is harder to control than a regular dumbbell. 

Kettlebell workouts offer all the benefits of dumbbell training, with the added advantage that the super-thick handles challenge your grip.

Additionally, the weight can swing in relation to the handle, simply handling kettlebells works your core extra hard.

Kettlebells are extremely versatile.

They’re ideal for explosive exercises that work major muscles, burn body fat, and build power. They also add a new dimension to classic moves. 

You don’t need a wall-length rack of them to get a great workout—one set will suffice for most routines. 

You also can get a lot of work done in a tight space, so kettlebells are perfect for small home gyms or apartments.

Lastly, you can more naturally string together moves to create a workout flow – do a swing, then a clean, and then a press for example adding in an entirely new element to your workouts.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our mission is to empower as many individuals as possible on their journey to the best version of themselves. 

We aim to achieve this by providing high quality, uniquely designed kettlebells with a complementing display stand. 

Our hope is to grow atomicSol into more than a producer of artistic kettlebells and a stylish display stand. 

We aspire to be a leader in the human optimization space, by offering an expansive line of artistic fitness equipment, leading educational content and resources, and building a vibrant community of like-minded individuals.

We see a great deal of untapped potential within the health and wellness space. The kettlebell revolution has made tremendous strides since its mainstream introduction into North America in 1998. 

Artistically designed kettlebells are in an infancy state, with minimal selection and style variety currently available.

 Expanding on our current offerings, along with strategic collaborations with a wide range of influential individuals and organizations should continue to fuel and grow the adoption of kettlebells into people's lives.

Funding will be used solely to cover the cost of producing orders, along with tooling, shipping and packaging costs. Any funding that exceeds our goal, will be used to further expand the product line, improve efficiency within our supply chains, and grow the atomicSol brand. 

 

 

 

THANK YOU! 

 

We're extremely appreciative of you checking us out and giving your support. This journey is just starting for us and we can't wait to see atomicSol kettlebells being used and displayed.

THANK YOU! 
 
We're extremely appreciative of you checking us out and giving your support. This journey is just starting for us and we can't wait to see atomicSol kettlebells being used and displayed.

story:
#FREEYOGAFROMPLASTIC, our mission!

If you practice yoga most certainly you are already sensitive to sustainability topics. Many yogi and yogini like to practice outdoor in a natural setting. Have you ever realized that Yoga equipment is actually not genuinely friend of nature?

Natmat26 is the Italian start-up of specialized products for yoga, dedicated to you, practicing in a conscious and sustainable way. We select only environmentally sustainable raw materials, taking into account the entire life cycle of the article.

We have launched #freeyogafromplastic and created our brand to give our contribute to our environment. We have detailed our idea of sustainability to clear the meaning we give to this abused word.

 

ONꓱ!Block is our first product and this campaign will give us the opportunity to develop more and more creative solutions to let you enjoy your yoga practice and meditation in full respect of nature. There is no such thing as ONꓱ!Block

 

ONꓱ!Block

World's first sensory yoga block. The most beautiful and the most sustainable one.

 

ABOUT THE NAME

ꓱ! Is a symbol used in maths to identify something that "exists and is unique".

ONꓱ! Is our first collection named after three reasons: One, unique pieces handmade in Italy.One, life long lasting.One, limited edition.

FEATURES

A single glance to be seduced by its elegance. A caress is enough to feel the rippled texture that guarantees a stable grip during practice.

The grooves are designed for aromatherapy, we deliver it scented with wood and honey, feel free to pour your favorite essential oil, a few drops on the surface to release an amplified relaxation effect. ONꓱ!Block is also available in the package with our organic lavender ØNꓱ!Essential Oil, produced in Italy by organic agricolture.

ONꓱ!Block is a valuable piece of Italian craftsmanship, you can also use as a piece of home decor. A traveling companion that will evolve with you.

 

WOOD

Wood is the living and evolutionary material, it allows to get in touch with nature. It conveys positive vibes, warmth and well-being. Our senses draw strength from its scent, from touch, from observing its rings that are its history, from its shimmering color over time, from its vibrations.

ONꓱ!Block is made from solid Princess Tree wood from sustainable Italian arboriculture. This is a fast growing tree from controlled tree cultivation, hence is does not impact deforestation.

Our Princess Tree grows in crops where biodiversity is the watchword, because they consist of many varieties of medicinal plants and flowers.

It is also called "The anti-smog plant", as matter of fact each Princess Tree absorbs from 28 to 32 tons of CO2 per year.

It has a very light wood, ONꓱ!Block is available in two sizes regular and compact. Its weight is only 450g  (0,99 pounds)  for a size of 22.5x10x7.5CM (8,85 x 3,93 x 2,75 inch) in the compact version and 22.5x12x7.5CM (8,85 x 5,93 x 2,75 inch) in the regular one.

PROCESSING

It has only two ingredients: solid wood and beeswax.

No glue. These are not glued pieces of wood, but ONꓱ!, a single piece of solid wood. Handmade in Italy. It is sanded, brushed and polished with beeswax. Each brick is therefore unique in its appearance and craftsmanship.

 

WHAT’S BEEN ELEVATED

Yoga blocks came in foam, cork or wood.

We should stop buying plastic items as much as we can. Foam blocks production should be stopped NOW. There are sustainable alternatives, we do not need foam blocks at all. Please spread this statement among your yoga community.

Having said that wooden blocks are usually heavy and slippery, we resolved this issue using this amazing light wood and designing a rippled texture. We tested this block with several yoga teachers and we’ve got super positive feedback about the functionality of ONꓱ!Block. Also they have been surprised about the touching experience.

Cork is very commonly used and is a very noble material. Nevertheless  we want to give an alternative as cork can not be the only and unique solution, sustainability needs balance, variety. Also cork soaks up sweat, this is not too hygienic, leading to bad smell issue that might be a problem using cork yoga blocks.

 

FUNDS

According to our idea of sustainability we are not aiming to big numbers,

We set a goal of 5000€ in order to cover initial expenses we have faced related to planning, production, advertising and online associated incidentals.

Whether we will reach the goal or not we will invest raised amount to develop further sustainable solutions, for advertising to spread the word and addressing  part of it to social or environmental causes.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

ONꓱ!Block is already at the production stage, therefore there is a very short lead time from fund to delivery. Once the campaign is ended we will be able to sort out the delivery in a short time.

Main challenge is that we are not able to provide you with unlimited production in respect of sustainability and resources. We will monitor and evaluate it in due course. That said, rest assured that every eligible offer will be rewarded.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN SUPPORT

We understand that not everybody are able to make an offer, no worries. In this case we kindly ask to do shout about ONꓱ!Block with your friends and family! Share on your Social media using Indiegogo button, support Natmat26 for a genuine idea of sustainability.

Thank you.

This is a fast growing tree from controlled tree cultivation, hence is does not impact deforestation.Our Princess Tree grows in crops where biodiversity is the watchword, because they consist of many varieties of medicinal plants and flowers.It is also called "The anti-smog plant", as matter of fact each Princess Tree absorbs from 28 to 32 tons of CO2 per year.It has a very light wood, ONꓱ!Block is available in two sizes regular and compact. Its weight is only 450g  (0,99 pounds)  for a size of 22.5x10x7.5CM (8,85 x 3,93 x 2,75 inch) in the compact version and 22.5x12x7.5CM (8,85 x 5,93 x 2,75 inch) in the regular one.PROCESSINGIt has only two ingredients: solid wood and beeswax.No glue. These are not glued pieces of wood, but ONꓱ!, a single piece of solid wood. Handmade in Italy. It is sanded, brushed and polished with beeswax. Each brick is therefore unique in its appearance and craftsmanship. WHAT’S BEEN ELEVATEDYoga blocks came in foam, cork or wood.We should stop buying plastic items as much as we can. Foam blocks production should be stopped NOW. There are sustainable alternatives, we do not need foam blocks at all. Please spread this statement among your yoga community.Having said that wooden blocks are usually heavy and slippery, we resolved this issue using this amazing light wood and designing a rippled texture. We tested this block with several yoga teachers and we’ve got super positive feedback about the functionality of ONꓱ!Block. Also they have been surprised about the touching experience.Cork is very commonly used and is a very noble material. Nevertheless  we want to give an alternative as cork can not be the only and unique solution, sustainability needs balance, variety. Also cork soaks up sweat, this is not too hygienic, leading to bad smell issue that might be a problem using cork yoga blocks. FUNDSAccording to our idea of sustainability we are not aiming to big numbers,We set a goal of 5000€ in order to cover initial expenses we have faced related to planning, production, advertising and online associated incidentals.Whether we will reach the goal or not we will invest raised amount to develop further sustainable solutions, for advertising to spread the word and addressing  part of it to social or environmental causes. RISKS & CHALLENGESONꓱ!Block is already at the production stage, therefore there is a very short lead time from fund to delivery. Once the campaign is ended we will be able to sort out the delivery in a short time.Main challenge is that we are not able to provide you with unlimited production in respect of sustainability and resources. We will monitor and evaluate it in due course. That said, rest assured that every eligible offer will be rewarded. OTHER WAYS YOU CAN SUPPORTWe understand that not everybody are able to make an offer, no worries. In this case we kindly ask to do shout about ONꓱ!Block with your friends and family! Share on your Social media using Indiegogo button, support Natmat26 for a genuine idea of sustainability.Thank you.

story:
Fanionizer by SOTER is a multi-nationally patented technology and a silver medallist at the Geneva International Exhibition of Inventions (GIEI). 

It's a simple yet incredibly effective fan-driven, negative ion generator that cleans the air in your car, home or office.  

Fanionizer blocks, captures, and neutralizes airborne particulate matter, including viruses, bacteria, pollen, allergens and other pollutants which can't be seen with the naked eye. 

We developed Fanionizer to protect people, like our own families, from hidden dangers in the air, from city pollution, car emissions, and tobacco smoke to natural matter like dust, pollen and mold. We weren't satisfied that existing products were convenient or effective enough.  

Having achieved exceptional testing results and launched to the Taiwan market, we are now seeking further funds for international expansion so that people all over the world can enjoy the health benefits which Fanionizer can provide.  

Airborne particulate matter, particularly bacteria, make up a range of tiny invisible threats in our vehicles and homes. 

These ultra-fine viruses, bacteria, pollen, allergens and other pollutants harm you when they touch your skin or you breathe them in.

Face masks may not be enough.  

By trading a reactive approach for a proactive attack on these fine particles through negative ions, you can ensure a healthier personal space.

 

What are negative ions?

An ion is a atom or molecule with an electric charge. They are naturally occurring and have either a positive charge (through the loss of an electron) or a negative charge (through the gain of an extra electron).

While they're found almost everywhere, negative ions, also known as anions, are particularly common in areas with waterfalls, forests, and beaches. It's no surprise that the air in these places feels "fresher", since it's full of anions. 

But what's so special about these negatively-charged anions? 

Alongside a host of reported health benefits including stress relief, improved moods, and stronger immune response, negative ions have a well-documented effect on airborne particles. They attract these small particles, be it dust, chemicals, or pollen, into larger clumps,  which then sink to ground level or are trapped by conventional filters. 

Niagara Falls has been hailed as one of the world's best anion generators, generating 15,000 anions per cubic centimeter.

The Fanionizer generates an incredible 1,000,000/cm3 of these feel good molecules. 

How does the Fanionizer work?

NO BATTERIES - NO POWER CORDS - NO FILTERS

The compact Fanionizer by Soter is solely powered by your home or vehicle's A/C and fans. Fanionizer distributes anions evenly, around 420,000-1,200,000 anions/cm3 .

Fanionizer by Soter is easy to set up and install! It takes less than 10 seconds to start reaping the benefits of inhaling the negative ions your body needs.

FEATURES

  • POWERFUL IONIZER - 1,000,000 anions generation capacity (SGS certified)
  • OZONE FREE - Ozone is a strong oxide which is harmful to the human body and any objects near it. Fanionizer is ozone-free. (SGS certified)
  • FILTER FREE - Unlike any other HEPA devices which need replacement filters frequently, Fanionizer does not need any filters to remove odors, germs, allergens, smoke or particles as small as PM2.5. No additional cost/expenses with parts replacement.
  • NO EXTRA POWER NEEDED - Fanionizer adopts patented wind-power engineering design which makes self-driven anion generation possible. It only needs to be installed upon existing wind generating devices, such as A/C outlet, fan, heater, or even other air purifiers. No exterior power is needed and there are no batteries required. Therefore, it is not just safe, but eco-friendly.
  • HIGH-TEMPERATURE DURABILITY - Fanionizer is made of premium grade ABS so it is durable in a high-temperature environment. It is designed to be used inside a vehicle.

AVAILABLE IN THESE VIBRANT COLORS

  • OUTER CASE MATERIAL: ABS (Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene), a common thermoplastic polymer.
  • CORE PARTS: Wind Power Module (patented) and Anion Generation Module
  • APPLICABLE WIND SPEED: 2-15 m/s
    • ANION PRODUCTION RATE > 420,000 (2 m/s ; 3.9 knots)
    • ANION PRODUCTION RATE > 770,000 (3 m/s ; 5.8 knots)
    • ANION PRODUCTION RATE > 1,236,000 (4 m/s ; 7.8 knots)
  • ANION PRODUCTION VOLTAGE is -3 to -7 kV
  • PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: 72.5 mm x 42 mm x 22.2 mm
  • PRODUCT NET WEIGHT: 35 grams

The two clips included are very important to allow anions to be generated. These clips are made from a special plastic that will allow conductivity. Install Fanionizer with these clips to ensure proper results.

Every 3 months - Blow on the area near the brush tip with a puff of air as you would blow out a candle.

Every 6 months - Use a cotton swab to clean the brush. Use alcohol if possible to get better cleaning results.

CHILD SAFETY - This product is NOT a toy. Keep it out of children's reach in case of accidental ingestion or misuse.

OVERHEATED ENVIRONMENT - Even though the product is designed to be installed on heaters, when the heater is set to higher temperatures (ie. 60 degrees or higher) remove Fanionizer to prevent any fire hazards.

DOMESTIC FAN RESONANCE PROBLEM - The product is designed to be able to generate anions under low wind flow so the metal coils are made of extra fine Japanese coils. Some domestic fans (home-use fans/desktop fans) produce a specific frequency of resonance (vibrations) which may occasionally damage the fine coils.

We don't want to deprive users by recommending against use with domestic fans, however situations may occur when the resonance unfortunately matches a specific frequency.

One easy way to decide if you should use Fanionizer with domestic fans is that if you can easily feel and/or hear humming from your fans, then don't install the product upon that fan.

Fanionizer is proudly made in Taiwan. Our engineers worked intensely at every step during our prototyping period, and as demonstrated below, Fanionizer fills a vehicle with negative ions in less than a minute.

Watch the video below to see how we have measured the number of negative ions generated within a typical sedan car. Fanionizer uses your car's air-conditioning vents to effectively distribute throughout your car's interior.

Even your back seat passengers (kids and pets) will benefit from healthy negative ions!  

  • From the front seat, we generated anion measurements of 800k to 1.2M anions/cm3. 
  • From the middle seat, we generated anion measurements of 30k to 60k anions/cm3. 
  • From the back seat, we generated anion measurements of 20k to 60k anions/cm3.

 

Our team tested a leading ionizer available in the market. Watch the video below to see how negative ions are poorly generated and distributed throughout the car interior. Other ionizers are bulky and require external power and long cords to operate. They are inconvenient to use as they occupy space for other important items.

  • Regular ionizer has a high density of anions when close up. (Over 1M within 5cm)
  • Yet, its anion counts drop to ZERO when 12-13cm away.

 

We will work hard to execute our production plans and will quickly send out the first batch of Fanionizers to all our backers. We may see a few challenges with shipping to countries with strict custom guidelines for our shipment. Nonetheless, we will communicate these matters to all who will be affected.

Want to help Fanionizer?

If you're excited about the health benefits Fanionizer can realise but aren't in a position to back us at present, that's OK! We'd love for you to spread the word, share this campaign, and pass it on to anyone who might be interested. Thank you for your support! 

Who we are & why we're dedicated to Fanionizer

Our team members are all fascinated with the benefits of anions. Anions not only neutralize foul odors and fine particles, but they also let human beings (and pets, based on our observations) feel refreshed all the time. Our office was already packed with all kinds of ionizers before we decided to develop Fanionizer. But one day, a friend brought us an anion detector and we found out that 90% of the ionizers we had were basically useless! We decided then to make a effective and convenient ionizer on our own. 

After 2 years of development, the prototypes have been so successful that we are eager to introduce it to lovers of ionizers worldwide. 

That's why we have this page.

More support means lower costs

  • We have achieved pilot manufacturing so far, so we are really confident that we will achieve mass-production once the campaign finishes.
  • All we need is to have enough orders so we can reduce the unit cost to a reasonable price. 
  • Unlike many cheap ionizers that you can buy on Amazon, Fanionizer use high-quality materials and components. This makes it really effective but at a higher cost of manufacturing.  But don't worry, the SuperEarlyBird pack provides state-of-art Fanionizers at a discount even below our estimated cost. Grab one while you can!

The impact

Save the earth while enjoying the benefits.

  • There are NO other wind-driven ionizers in the world. Fanionizer saves energy by turning the output from regular fans into a beneficial anion-filled breeze.
  • Fanionizer will (as far as we know) be the lightest ionizer in the world. And your contribution makes it real. 

Risks & Challenges

  • We have made enough prototypes to be confident we can make Fanionizers at scale.
  • However, due to the current coronavirus pandemic, logistics services (including regular post office services) may be impacted. It may take a little longer for us to ship the products to you after the campaign ends.

story: Dr. R. Ravichandran, an eminent and kind-hearted doctor, was born in Karaikudi on 09-03-1957. He did his under graduation at Stanley Medical College, he completed his post Graduation in Aravind Eye Hospital and worked there for 10 years under Dr. G. Venkatasamy, under his guidance and inspiration, he started Sri Ramana Maharshi Eye hospital IN 1996 TO PROVIDE free services poor people from past two decades. He worked hard day and night, and performed 4,76,496 cataract surgeries and 65000 other eye surgeries for squint, glaucoma, eyelid and cornea diseases all over India, he also trained 126 OPHTHALMOLOGISTS all over the world. In 2001, he has received the Prestigious awards of "best citizen of India from the central government of India for conducting free eye camps and surgeries.
story_txt: Dr. R. Ravichandran, an eminent and kind-hearted doctor, was born in Karaikudi on 09-03-1957. He did his under graduation at Stanley Medical College, he completed his post Graduation in Aravind Eye Hospital and worked there for 10 years under Dr. G. Venkatasamy, under his guidance and inspiration, he started Sri Ramana Maharshi Eye hospital IN 1996 TO PROVIDE free services poor people from past two decades. He worked hard day and night, and performed 4,76,496 cataract surgeries and 65000 other eye surgeries for squint, glaucoma, eyelid and cornea diseases all over India, he also trained 126 OPHTHALMOLOGISTS all over the world. In 2001, he has received the Prestigious awards of "best citizen of India from the central government of India for conducting free eye camps and surgeries.

story:
Short Summary

Who would have thought that Testing and Vaccinations would become such a major part of our daily life?

A little more than 1 year ago, when Covid-19 became a reality, we attempted to do a realistic assessment of where this was heading and tried to see how we might be of help. As a Hi-Tech company with developers around the world it seemed reasonable to assume that there was something we could do.

*****   BREAKING NEWS   ******

Major issues have surfaced as Vaccination sites have become more prevalent: what Waiting List should I be on for this location, how can I navigate the sign up process to actually get a Vaccination, How can I possibly understand the process? 

This has become a virtual nightmare for a significant portion of our community. Oft times the explanations provided that are intended to help an individual register for a vaccination are so obtuse or are mired in so much techno babble that many of us get lost in the process - WE NEED HELP NOW! 

Couple the massive requirement that virtually everyone should be vaccinated with the fact that a vast number of locations are gearing up to offer vaccinations and they do not have any common standards or processes - a situation has arose where just getting signed up to get a vaccine has become a major source of frustration for many of us.

The solution involves identifying someone that can help navigate this quagmire. 

We have addressed this problem by implementing the only National Waitlist Volunteer/Participant Matching Program in the country. Our national reach has enabled us to tackle this problem head on and we are aggressively building out our framework of Volunteers to provide assistance to those individuals having problems navigating the bureaucratic  hodgepodge that now defines the registration process.

This is a massive undertaking and one that we are well equipped to address, but we do need your assistance in getting this program fully operational. We are in Beta in North Texas, with a plan to roll this out throughout Texas within 7-10 days and then in 20 of the most populous states by the end of the month.

Please help us make this a reality. We are incurring additional costs everyday as we ramp up this program. Any amount helps ....

***********************************

***********************************

Our initial effort concentrated on 2 problems that could be addressed with Software solutions

1. Where are Covid-19 Vaccination Sites - How can I sign up for a Vaccination

We decided early on that distribution  was going to be a key component of any solution once the manufacturers made vaccines available. Not to much of a stretch to assume that getting vaccinations in the arms of almost 300M people was going to get messy. As expected this has become somewhat of a nightmare.

We continued to work on a solution as it became apparent that one was needed. This solution had to be easy to use, have a very simple interface, and needed to provide the information that everyone is seeking. Furthermore it had to be FREE. If everyone is going to have the same chance to get their vaccine shot when it becomes available, telling that person where to go cannot be beyond their means.

While there are sites coming on line identifying vaccination locations most of them are associated with one provider (Walmart, CVS, etc) - where is the site that provides location information for all vaccination sites in each given location and even more than that tells you where they stand with new deliveries.

We homed in on identifying the specific locations where vaccines would be found but we also added the date that each location last received vaccines. Our 3-Step App provides this information.

Our National Waitlist Matching program will bring a significant number of folks to our sites and we expect rapid acceptance of our offerings.

Our COVID3Step app provides the software related solutions discussed above.

This app is now available in selected locations and is Free to the general public. Visit www.COVID3Step.com for more information.



2. And how can we individually track our Covid Journey for ourselves and our family

We need to have an Ultra Secure repository where we can save our Individual and Family Test Results, Vaccination Logs and Exposure History. Ideally this information should be saved using a Smart Phone App in an Ultra Secure Digital Vault. It should be accessible using a simple, easy to use  interface that can be easily understood by everyone. 

We have developed a solution that ensures that personal information is only accessible by the individual user – that individual should have complete access and control of their own information.

INTRODUCING COVID1Stop – An App where you can save your Covid Information

How do we know that folks that we are going to meet are following evidence-based, public health guidelines regarding COVID-19, and that they are safe to be around?  We have the solution! Save the appropriate documentation and have it available for presentation when requested.

Our COVID1Stop App provides the answer:



Maintain your Family's Covid status on our App

With a single touch, you can display your Covid Immunization card, or you can drill down and retrieve any family member’s card. Also you can retrieve a complete log of all Covid testing that you have completed, and you can recall your entire exposure history.

This is so easy - results from any lab may be displayed on any Smart Phone and results are maintained in one of the most secure Digital Vaults in the entire country. You can now retrieve your Covid information and share any information that you choose with whomever you desire.



 

NOW WE NEED YOUR HELP TO GET OUR COVID APPS TO MAINSTREAM AMERICA


We are close to releasing our Covid-19 Apps, just a little bit of work remains to finalize them, and then we need to let folks know that our 2 apps are available. Our solutions are so easy to use and are so needed.


What We Need & What You Get

OUR SOLUTIONS ARE BEING PROVIDED AT MINIMAL COST

These tools are needed by everyone, and they are needed now. The best way to get these out to the community at large is to make them available at little or no cost. These solutions can be a fantastic help in these trying times, if virtually anyone can have access to it.
 

COVID3Step is being offered at NO COST - we can't make it any more reasonable. Now we need to let folks know that it is available

In order to meet our goal of making COVID1Stop available to everyone, we have defined a very minimal pricing approach.  The app can be downloaded from the App stores for free. When a person registers and sets up his digital vault there is a $10 charge and when a Test or Vaccination is added a one time $5 charge is incurred. We also offer additional discounts for Annual and Lifetime subscriptions and for Family subscriptions.

It is in our community's best interest to bring solutions like this one to the general public, as soon as possible. We have designed  our solution to address the many concerns associated with making personal information available via a digital app. If we are to achieve the herd immunity needed to eradicate this disease, we need as many people as possible practicing  Covid Awareness solutions and our app will provide a certain degree of confidence to assist in meeting this goal.

Fund Raising Targets

We will execute this project in 3 phases – Phase I (Introduce our solutions to those in need), Phase II (Reach sufficient number of folks so that reaching the additional effort required to reach folks becomes self-sustaining), Phase 3 (Sustaining phase funded by incoming revenue).

Our ultimate goal is to make our Solutions and our Apps available to anyone that wants one and at a price that they can afford. Your help will go a long way towards making this a reality.

We will measure project success based on customer reach and functionality provided.

We have budgeted the following for this effort:

                                                                        Phase I                             Phase II

                                                                                   8 Weeks                                3 Months            

                                                                                 $125,000                         $175,000

 

Marketing                                                    $100,000                         $125,000

Waitlist Support Team

SEO Enhancements

Name Recognition

Customer Growth

Celebrity Spokesperson

Complete Phase I App Functionality        $25,000

Add Additional App Functionality                                                    $50,000

PHASE I – 8 weeks

We are using a framework similar to that used over the last 18 years to rollout our national County Research program. Today we have operations in all 50 states and have reached almost 2,000 courts since we opened our doors.  We operate in every major metropolitan area and have excellent suburban and rural area reach.

We are ramping up Our Matching solution by building a network of Volunteers to assist us in providing needed Waitlist related help. Processes have been defined, the organizational structure to be implemented has been put in place and we are ready to begin the match process.

Our Smartphone Apps are in Beta and will be production ready by the end of Feb 2021. We expect to have them in the App stores in march and until that time will make them available on our Web Sites.

Remaining development work includes a thorough QA review including final security updates as well as extensive scaling-related testing to ensure that the app scales properly as additional  users subscribe to our service. Our Apps have been thoroughly vetted throughout the development process and the remaining efforts are typical last minute development-related tasks that will ensure that they function exactly as envisioned.

Marketing

The success of our apps will depend heavily on  their acceptance with the community as a whole. Based on our experience with establishing a National presence for our parent companies we will target the 40+ MSAs with the largest metro populations knowing that this approach will put us in front of a sizable percentage of the US population.

We have defined a comprehensive marketing campaign based on an extensive Social Media Marketing effort coupled with an aggressive advertising outreach program. We will expand our marketing reach by implementing additional Facebook and Google efforts complimented by a robust set of supplemental marketing approaches including print media campaigns and influencer marketing efforts.

PHASE II – 3 Months

We will add enhancements to our Phase I solution as they are identified.  Our solution is very robust as currently developed, but as with any software solution presented to a very large number of individuals we are aware that we will need to add additional enhancements over time.

Regarding our Marketing efforts, we will continue marketing to the top 40 large MSAs since they represent ~50% of the population in the US, but we will also expand and continue to add enhancements to our Advertising and Marketing efforts and will present our solution to even more folks in a concerted effort to become self sufficient.

 

How you can Help

As you can imagine – developing solutions like these is not an inexpensive effort. To date we have borne this cost – now we need your help to push this across the finish line.

We have worked diligently to develop the processes and infrastructure to make this concept a reality. Ours is the first solution in the Covid Record Keeping Category, and we need your help in finalizing this solution.

Additionally, as of this time, there is no one solutions provider currently identifying the many Vaccination Centers that are available at a national level.

The information we are providing changes each day, but it is available through public forums. We have defined the teams needed, the steps required, and the resources necessary to gather this information. Through relationships with many of the providers of these solutions and a nationally focused research team that has assumed the role of collecting the information necessary, we can make this concept a reality.

In order to take this concept to the next level, assemble the resources needed, and implement the solutions we have envisioned, we need your help in raising additional funding.

Think of this as “priming the pump.” For those of you not aware of this concept – your grandparents & great-grandparents used to have to take a leap of faith when getting water from their well. This involved taking a certain amount of water and using it to get the well to begin pumping. Think about that – what if the last drop of water they had available had to be used to get more? This is what we are asking of you help us initiate our grand journey – Help us make our solution available to the masses.

Once we reach critical mass, revenue will be sufficient to continue to expand – our mission at this point in time is to “prime the pump”.

 

What if we do not reach our Funding Goals

We do believe that our solution will benefit so many folks and that once recognized for the help that it will bring  - funding will be forthcoming. However, if in the unlikely event we do not reach our goals we will bootstrap successive efforts and will continue to fund the rollout with revenue generated - the rollout will just be slower.

 

Our Perks – making this opportunity even more appealing

AllLT Covid Founders Community

We have created this community to provide those of you that wish to participate as a Founding Member an opportunity to be recognized for your contribution. As a founding member you will receive:

  • Your name and contribution level will be prominently displayed on our web site and will be  accessible by a link that will be available from both of our Apps
  • An engraved plaque with your name and contribution level for 1st 3 Levels

                                     Min Contribution         # Allowed

             Level

Platinum            $10,000                            35

Gold                    $5,000                               100

Silver                   $2,500                              350

Patron                 $500                                  500

Friends               $100                                  1000
 

Dinner with Our Celebrity Spokesperson

We will be identifying just the “right “ spokesperson for our movement. We will make this fun and will have a “bakeoff’ to identify the best person for the job. Visit our web sites for more information.

But for now, you can reserve your place at the table:

                                                                          Min Contribution              #  Allowed

                                                                        Level

 

Individual meal for you and your family                   $10,000                                3

Small Group Meal                                                            $5,000                                10

Large Group Meal                                                            $2,500                                50

 

And even more Perks

I Just Want to Help                                                                           $10

Free Copy COVID1Stop and TShirt                                              $25

Free Copy COVID1Stop and Hoodie                                            $50

Free 1Yr COVID1Stop Subscription + Beta Access                $100

Free 2Yr COVID1Stop Subscription + Beta Access               $150

Free 3Yr COVID1Stop Subscription + Beta Access               $200

Free Lifetime COVID1Stop Subscription + Beta Access      $250

5 Free Lifetime COVID1Stop Subscriptions to give away    $750

10 Free Lifetime COVID1Stop Subscriptions to give away  $1000

 

The Impact

 

THIS IS ONE OF THOSE OPPORTUNITES THAT WILL BE A GAME CHANGER

HELP US MAKE OUR SOLUTIONS HELP EVERYONE

As you are well aware, we are in the depths of a problem that has caused untold grief. There are solutions on the horizon, but as we are being told by the scientific community these will only work if a sufficient percentage of our populace choose to participate.

The operational phrase is “herd Immunity” and is dependent on the vast majority of us choosing to participate by washing our hands, wearing masks, practicing social distancing and being tested and vaccinated.

Our Covid App solutions are a wonderful step to help us move in the right direction. By participating in our program, you not only help yourself, but you can help all of those folks that will benefit from our solutions.

Any solution is only as good as those folks actually using it. We need your help to reach the largest number of folks possible and make our solutions available to them as soon as possible.

We know what we are doing and we are ready

Our Apps are being developed by a global team of IT professionals. Our IT solutions are housed in some of the most up to date production facilities in the world, our developers use state of art tools and databases, and our Highly Secure Data Vault is managed by one of the premier solution providers in the world. Our staff has a great deal of experience in the development of very large enterprise solutions and in the production management of very large scalable solutions. We are ready for Prime Time.

We will be providing Vaccination location information for virtually every major population center in the country. Yes – this information is available and is being presented via the web in each of these locations. Yes – it changes every day, so we have assembled a team of researchers that are reviewing and updating information as it is posted. Also we are in the process of establishing ongoing relationships with the organizations and municipalities tasked will providing these solutions so that our information is always timely. We have coupled that with online tools that allow these groups to update their information as desired.  We do know how to make this effort successful and are building the infrastructure to make it a reality.

It’s as if we have been readying for this moment for a really long time. Our company has long been one of the premier data collection and processing companies in the US. For almost 20 years we have been working with county clerks across the country and have built a national network of researchers tasked with retrieving monthly county court related data. To date, we have completed research projects in the vast majority of counties in virtually every major population center in the country. We really do understand how to manage a national effort.

For the last several years we have been refining an offering, providing services and solutions for anyone facing a major life transition. This is a massive effort and one that we are making a reality. Our parent company, All Life Transitions (www.AllLT.com), has partnered with service and solution providers at both the national and neighborhood level to provide transitional support where needed.  This is a comprehensive program involving 1,000’s of providers and has provided us the organizational expertise to bring our Covid solutions to market.

These efforts have prepared us to lead this challenging effort and now we are in the final stages of bringing our Covid-19 Apps to the general public.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have invested a great deal of time and effort in ensuring that the solutions we are providing will work as advertised. We have applied state of art QA testing methods to ensure that we have addressed every issue.

One major concern that we had to overcome was – what if we are deluged with requests for our solutions. Operating any solution at scale can be a challenge.

We mitigated those risks by bringing on a staff that is well versed in managing large scale operations ranging from major credit card solutions to massive banking and financial operations. Additionally, we have built our solutions on massively scalable platforms that routinely manage tens of millions of transactions daily.

WHAT ABOUT PRIVACY CONCERNS?

Our COVID1Stop solution has been designed to be a Personal Record Keeping solution, not a government mandated solution where your information is used to control access to various venues. Our App is a brand new category of Covid Apps – Personal Record Keeping, and it allows you to maintain complete control over your information.

Note that Passport-like tools are currently in development, and they are being called Covid Digital Passports. As such, they raise many concerns regarding individual privacy. We have chosen a radically different approach – one where you control your personal information and are the only one that can choose to make this information available -  providing it only to those you wish.

By virtue of your maintaining complete control, our approach makes our solution HIPPA compliant.



 

For us, Personal Data security is paramount and your personal control of your data is your first amendment right. Anyone using our solution will find that their data is protected in as secure a manner as possible.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to providing funding support there are many ways that you can help.

STEP 1 – SHARE OUR MESSAGE

Of course the most expedient way to help is to Tell Your Friends – Word of mouth is the best way to introduce people to our program. We encourage you to mention us on your Social Media sites – feel free to visit our Media Relations page for messages, stories, graphics, icons, etc - that you can share. Be sure to Like our pages and to forward our links to your friends and family.

We need your help. There are so many waiting to hear about our solution.

They will thank you.


STEP 2 – CONTRIBUTE TO OUR EFFORT
Your immediate assistance will go a long way towards bringing our solutions to everyone that has a need for them.

All funding provided through IndieGoGo will be used to make this dream a reality.

Here are several additional ways to help:


        1. MAKE A CONTRIBUTION ON ONE OF OUR CROWD FUNDING SITES
         Any amount is appreciated

        2. PREORDER A COPY OF OUR COVID1Stop App

        3. BECOME A 3Step VOLUNTEER
         We need help to reach every location needing our services

             a) Provide Dosage & Wait List information at the Location Level

             b) Help those needing it, scheduling a Vaccination 


Visit our websites to see other ways to help:


COVID1Stop  - Save Your Test/Vaccination Results




COVID3Step  –   Find Vaccination Locations



All Life Transitions  - Our Parent Company: Transition-related Services & Solutions

Don't forget to like and follow us on social media and share with your friends:



We appreciate your participation. These are trying times and we sincerely believe that our two apps will go a long way towards bringing our community PEACE OF MIND …
story_txt:
Short SummaryWho would have thought that Testing and Vaccinations would become such a major part of our daily life?A little more than 1 year ago, when Covid-19 became a reality, we attempted to do a realistic assessment of where this was heading and tried to see how we might be of help. As a Hi-Tech company with developers around the world it seemed reasonable to assume that there was something we could do.*****   BREAKING NEWS   ******Major issues have surfaced as Vaccination sites have become more prevalent: what Waiting List should I be on for this location, how can I navigate the sign up process to actually get a Vaccination, How can I possibly understand the process? This has become a virtual nightmare for a significant portion of our community. Oft times the explanations provided that are intended to help an individual register for a vaccination are so obtuse or are mired in so much techno babble that many of us get lost in the process - WE NEED HELP NOW! Couple the massive requirement that virtually everyone should be vaccinated with the fact that a vast number of locations are gearing up to offer vaccinations and they do not have any common standards or processes - a situation has arose where just getting signed up to get a vaccine has become a major source of frustration for many of us.The solution involves identifying someone that can help navigate this quagmire. We have addressed this problem by implementing the only National Waitlist Volunteer/Participant Matching Program in the country. Our national reach has enabled us to tackle this problem head on and we are aggressively building out our framework of Volunteers to provide assistance to those individuals having problems navigating the bureaucratic  hodgepodge that now defines the registration process.This is a massive undertaking and one that we are well equipped to address, but we do need your assistance in getting this program fully operational. We are in Beta in North Texas, with a plan to roll this out throughout Texas within 7-10 days and then in 20 of the most populous states by the end of the month.Please help us make this a reality. We are incurring additional costs everyday as we ramp up this program. Any amount helps ....***********************************
***********************************Our initial effort concentrated on 2 problems that could be addressed with Software solutions1. Where are Covid-19 Vaccination Sites - How can I sign up for a VaccinationWe decided early on that distribution  was going to be a key component of any solution once the manufacturers made vaccines available. Not to much of a stretch to assume that getting vaccinations in the arms of almost 300M people was going to get messy. As expected this has become somewhat of a nightmare.We continued to work on a solution as it became apparent that one was needed. This solution had to be easy to use, have a very simple interface, and needed to provide the information that everyone is seeking. Furthermore it had to be FREE. If everyone is going to have the same chance to get their vaccine shot when it becomes available, telling that person where to go cannot be beyond their means.While there are sites coming on line identifying vaccination locations most of them are associated with one provider (Walmart, CVS, etc) - where is the site that provides location information for all vaccination sites in each given location and even more than that tells you where they stand with new deliveries.We homed in on identifying the specific locations where vaccines would be found but we also added the date that each location last received vaccines. Our 3-Step App provides this information.Our National Waitlist Matching program will bring a significant number of folks to our sites and we expect rapid acceptance of our offerings.Our COVID3Step app provides the software related solutions discussed above.This app is now available in selected locations and is Free to the general public. Visit www.COVID3Step.com for more information.2. And how can we individually track our Covid Journey for ourselves and our familyWe need to have an Ultra Secure repository where we can save our Individual and Family Test Results, Vaccination Logs and Exposure History. Ideally this information should be saved using a Smart Phone App in an Ultra Secure Digital Vault. It should be accessible using a simple, easy to use  interface that can be easily understood by everyone. We have developed a solution that ensures that personal information is only accessible by the individual user – that individual should have complete access and control of their own information.INTRODUCING COVID1Stop – An App where you can save your Covid InformationHow do we know that folks that we are going to meet are following evidence-based, public health guidelines regarding COVID-19, and that they are safe to be around?  We have the solution! Save the appropriate documentation and have it available for presentation when requested.Our COVID1Stop App provides the answer:Maintain your Family's Covid status on our AppWith a single touch, you can display your Covid Immunization card, or you can drill down and retrieve any family member’s card. Also you can retrieve a complete log of all Covid testing that you have completed, and you can recall your entire exposure history.This is so easy - results from any lab may be displayed on any Smart Phone and results are maintained in one of the most secure Digital Vaults in the entire country. You can now retrieve your Covid information and share any information that you choose with whomever you desire. NOW WE NEED YOUR HELP TO GET OUR COVID APPS TO MAINSTREAM AMERICAWe are close to releasing our Covid-19 Apps, just a little bit of work remains to finalize them, and then we need to let folks know that our 2 apps are available. Our solutions are so easy to use and are so needed.
What We Need & What You Get
OUR SOLUTIONS ARE BEING PROVIDED AT MINIMAL COSTThese tools are needed by everyone, and they are needed now. The best way to get these out to the community at large is to make them available at little or no cost. These solutions can be a fantastic help in these trying times, if virtually anyone can have access to it. COVID3Step is being offered at NO COST - we can't make it any more reasonable. Now we need to let folks know that it is availableIn order to meet our goal of making COVID1Stop available to everyone, we have defined a very minimal pricing approach.  The app can be downloaded from the App stores for free. When a person registers and sets up his digital vault there is a $10 charge and when a Test or Vaccination is added a one time $5 charge is incurred. We also offer additional discounts for Annual and Lifetime subscriptions and for Family subscriptions.It is in our community's best interest to bring solutions like this one to the general public, as soon as possible. We have designed  our solution to address the many concerns associated with making personal information available via a digital app. If we are to achieve the herd immunity needed to eradicate this disease, we need as many people as possible practicing  Covid Awareness solutions and our app will provide a certain degree of confidence to assist in meeting this goal.Fund Raising TargetsWe will execute this project in 3 phases – Phase I (Introduce our solutions to those in need), Phase II (Reach sufficient number of folks so that reaching the additional effort required to reach folks becomes self-sustaining), Phase 3 (Sustaining phase funded by incoming revenue).Our ultimate goal is to make our Solutions and our Apps available to anyone that wants one and at a price that they can afford. Your help will go a long way towards making this a reality.We will measure project success based on customer reach and functionality provided.We have budgeted the following for this effort:                                                                        Phase I                             Phase II                                                                                   8 Weeks                                3 Months                                                                                             $125,000                         $175,000 Marketing                                                    $100,000                         $125,000Waitlist Support TeamSEO EnhancementsName RecognitionCustomer GrowthCelebrity SpokespersonComplete Phase I App Functionality        $25,000Add Additional App Functionality                                                    $50,000PHASE I – 8 weeksWe are using a framework similar to that used over the last 18 years to rollout our national County Research program. We encourage you to mention us on your Social Media sites – feel free to visit our Media Relations page for messages, stories, graphics, icons, etc - that you can share. Be sure to Like our pages and to forward our links to your friends and family.We need your help. There are so many waiting to hear about our solution.They will thank you.STEP 2 – CONTRIBUTE TO OUR EFFORTYour immediate assistance will go a long way towards bringing our solutions to everyone that has a need for them.All funding provided through IndieGoGo will be used to make this dream a reality.Here are several additional ways to help:        1. MAKE A CONTRIBUTION ON ONE OF OUR CROWD FUNDING SITES         Any amount is appreciated        2. PREORDER A COPY OF OUR COVID1Stop App        3. BECOME A 3Step VOLUNTEER         We need help to reach every location needing our services             a) Provide Dosage & Wait List information at the Location Level             b) Help those needing it, scheduling a Vaccination Visit our websites to see other ways to help:COVID1Stop  - Save Your Test/Vaccination ResultsCOVID3Step  –   Find Vaccination LocationsAll Life Transitions  - Our Parent Company: Transition-related Services & SolutionsDon't forget to like and follow us on social media and share with your friends:We appreciate your participation. These are trying times and we sincerely believe that our two apps will go a long way towards bringing our community PEACE OF MIND …

story:
Regular use of sanitizer & washing hands with soap is causing dry hands which even the best hand creams can't even fix. Just like everyone, we got tired of constantly washing hands, using hand sanitizer & then applying hand cream many times a day. We found using disposable gloves inconvenient and not environmental friendly. So, we decided to come up with a user & environment friendly solution.

After many concepts, revisions, feedback from family, friends & peers idea evolved into mittPRO:

 

NOTE: The biggest contribution one can make to support an idea, is to share it on their social media!

Design has been optimized to complete one handed tasks such as: opening a door, pressing buttons, grabbing objects, refueling vehicles etc. without contacting skin to the surface, thus reducing the use of sanitizer and soap!

 

Easy to carry:

After developing successful prototype, without wasting time & resources to develop professional marketing material, we focused on developing strategy that allows us to make mittPRO available to people as soon as possible. Funding through this campaign will enable us to raise capital required to meet the MOQ (minimum order quantity) of our supplier.

Our goal is to make mittPRO available ASAP for people to use, so they can protect themselves & their loved ones from COVID-19.

If you believe mittPRO offers convenience & safety, please share this campaign on your social media!

Pre-order your mittPRO to protect yourself, your loved ones & community.

story:
Skin Thera PMD

                Medical Grade Cosmeceutical Line

                                              "The Science to beautiful skin" 

So many people waste their time and money buying over the counter products that just don't work.  That is why Dr William Greenberg formulated a medical grade cosmeceutical  line called Skin Thera PMD.

  1. Most of the products sold in department stores and beauty stores have none to very little active biologic ingredients. That is why we need your help and backing to launch our products into the commercial market.
  2. With your help and support, we will be able to use the resources to develop new and cutting edge medical grade technologies that will change the way people take care of their skin.
  3. We will also use your investment to purchase more inventory, packaging improvements,  and set up an efficient distribution channel.

The public needs products that are real and science based, not just ones based on marketing hype. You can help us do that, and at the same time reinvent your skin using our products.

With over 25 years of medical practice, Dr William Greenberg has designed and formulated a cutting-edge science based cosmeceutical line with active biologic ingredients with patented delivery systems. From Stem cells, Peptides, Penetrating Lipids, Antioxidants, Concentrated Acids, and more, these products have a direct clinical effect on the quality and texture of the skin.

                       Choose individual products or our customized skin kits

                              Skin TheraPMD State of the art products

FACIAL DETOX  Antioxidant Facial Cleanser

Deeply cleanses away excess oil, dead skin cells, and makeup, without leaving a trace. Use it day and night to thoroughly cleanse your skin without dryness. Purifies, protects, and balances the skin. Formulated with green tea and rich botanicals, it delivers antioxidant protection to the skin, resulting in a healthy, balanced, glowing complexion. Our Facial detox cleanser is designed without harsh soaps or detergents, purifies the skin without discomfort, and does not strip the skin of its natural protective oil barrier. Suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive.

POLISH Facial Exfoliator

Thoroughly cleanses away impurities, while gently exfoliating  away dead skin cells to reveal a brighter, clarified complexion. Our medical grade product combines Glycolic and Salicylic acids with micro beads to slough off dull, damaged skin, while encouraging new cell growth.

LINE REFINE Retinol Eye Repair Cream-Medical Grade

  • Retinol is one of the most powerful anti-aging ingredients to help re-texturize skin, and dramatically reduce wrinkles. Illuminate the eye, and diminish fine lines and wrinkles.

  • Formulated with 90% green tea polyphenols to neutralize free radicals with vitamin K and arnica to diminish dark circles.

  • Cooling cucumber soothes your delicate eye area as vitamins E nourishes. Age-defying peptides address sagging skin and wrinkles to reveal a brighter, more youthful look.

  • The benefit from using Retinol is that it is a 'cell-communicating' ingredient which, in simple terms, can latch onto skin cells, and train them to be healthy again. Retinol does not only combat early signs of aging, but also corrects existing damage.

REPAIR Dermal Restructuring Therapy (Peptides)

REPAIR Peptide Dermal Therapy is an effective prescription strength therapeutic formulation designed to correct damage and create a more youthful complexion. Peptides act as tiny messengers that stimulate different responses in your skin, helping it to function, look and feel better. Because peptides are small, they can penetrate the skin’s protective barriers to get to the deeper layers. REPAIR stimulates collagen and elastin rebuilding from within while moisturizing and nourishing. Fine lines and wrinkles are reduced, the skin is plumped and smoothed with hydration, and the skin's barrier function is improved. It also protects and heals with naturally derived antioxidants.

FACE LIFT Peptide Firming Therapy

FACE LIFT is a age defying serum designed to relax fine lines and wrinkles while stimulating collagen production for a firmer skin texture.

  1. Our technology offers a Faux-tox like immediate tightening of the skin thanks to our state of the art Macrocystis Pyfifera Extract.
  2.  A blend of advanced anti-aging ingredients including peptides, botanicals, antioxidants, and moisturizing agents to help combat the visible signs of premature aging.
  3. FACE LIFT offers an instant tightening and toning effect, as well as long term benefits. With regular use, wrinkles are banished, fine lines and smoothed, and the skin takes on a firm and supple appearance. FACE LIFT rebuilds new collagen and strengthens the skin barrier to reveal a healthier, younger looking skin complexion.

  • The serum is also formulated with Green Tea Polyphenols, a well-known powerful antioxidant that’s potent properties allow it to assist in minimizing free radical induced skin damage, as well as Hyaluronic Acid that helps to heal and repair damaged skin.Together these ingredients tighten and tone mature skin, minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, stimulates collagen synthesis, and strengthens the skin barrier. With daily use of FACE LIFT you will give your face a lifted, firmer appearance resulting in an overall youthful skin complexion. 

  REVERSE Rejuvenating Nighttime Therapy


A medical grade moisture boosting, decadently rich night cream that nourishes dry skin back to optimal health. For all skin types. Paraben -Free and hypoallergenic.


What it's used for:

Skin Thera PMD Rejuvenating Nighttime Therapy - Age backwards while you sleep! Rejuvenate sun damaged and aging skin with our maximum concentration of prescription strength peptides and stem cells. REVERSE  repairs damaged skin cells, and diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.  This intense night cream helps smooth wrinkle formation due to facial expressions, and supports collagen regeneration


It soothes and nourishes dry skin back to optimum health. Resveratrol, green tea polyphenols and caffeine offer antioxidant benefits to nourish and protect against environmental stressors, promoting healthy, youthful skin. Ideal for even the most sensitive skin and those on retinoid treatments. The REVERSE night cream features an advanced trans-dermal penetrating vehicle that penetrates skin to ensure optimal delivery of active ingredients with gradual hydration, maximizing product effectiveness. It is suitable for long-term usage.

PROTECT Physical UVA/UVB  SPF 49+ sunscreen

Finally a sunscreen that not only protects but reverses the aging process!  Skin Thera PMD PROTECT Sheer Physical Sunscreen Cream SPF 49+ makes it easy to defend your skin against the sun's damaging rays, and reverse the damage at the same time.  Formulated with anti-aging antioxidants, including green tea polyphenols, resveratrol, vitamin C, emblica and Co-Q10, as well as the best physical sun blockers, your skin will stay looking younger for longer, while being protected from sunburn and other sun damage. Lightweight and residue-free, you won't even notice you're wearing it.  Our Sheer Physical Sunscreen Cream SPF 49+ makes it easy to defend your skin against the sun's damaging rays.


                                Not sure what "level" you are? 

 Use our personalized intelligent expert consultation to help you figure it out.

                              Click here for your personal consultation



                             

               Level 1 Skin kit -Prevention


     

        

                                          Level 2 Skin Kit- Age Eraser

     



               Level 3 Skin Kit- The Ultimate



 

 

Featured on CBS The Couch, Channel 11 News, The Today Show for fillers, Anderson Cooper, CNBC, The Best of Westchester, Social Life Magazine, BEST DOCS, New York Magazine, Time Out NY and more. Dr. Greenberg is almost as famous as the celebrity patients who depend on him for their flawless skin.

 



Watch Dr Greenberg featured in the news for tightening the face with Ultherapy.


          Dr Greenberg featured on Non invasive facelifting

  
 

Invest in your skin and our Skin TheraP MD Skincareline!
