story:
Short Summary

Our products are highly effective at stopping snoring and giving you a better nights sleep. We know this from being a world leader in this field for over 15 years.

All our products work by keeping the upper airway open giving you an uninterrupted flow of air while you sleep. This provides you with a better quality of sleep and is a tried-and-tested way to stop snoring. 

We continually strive to improve our designs in order to give you the best possible products. And we believe when you pledge for our new SleepPro Ultra, you are going to receive the best off-the-shelf product of its type in the world. We invite you to be among the first to experience its comfort and effectiveness.

We would greatly appreciate your support as it means we can keep the SleepPro Ultra at home in Britain. Most of our competitors make their products in China and it reflects in the quality of what they sell. Of course it is cheaper to make things on the other side of the world, but our goal has always been to offer our customers the best quality we can and that's why we are proud to have the Made in Britain stamp on our products. 


Hi, My Name is Paul Swann 


and I've spent the last 15 years designing and making both affordable and custom-made oral appliances for snoring and obstructive sleep apnoea. I'm very pleased to tell you my team and I have helped a huge number of people all over the world in the process. Not just stopping their snoring, but improving their health in a very meaningful way. And if you have a problem with snoring or other sleep related issues, it is very likely we can help you get a good nights sleep.

Right now I'm looking to make a new mould in England, making sure we use the strictest quality control we can and make our new product available in about four months. It is by far my best design yet at this price level and I think people will find it more comfortable to wear and better in other important ways.  

It would be fantastic if you could be part of making this happen and helping to keep it great by keeping it in Great Britain - making it possible for us to observe very high standards of quality one expects from a country that is rightly famous for quality with names like Rolls Royce and the BBC. And of course the benefit to you is you will get to see for yourself what a difference a  SleepPro Ultra can make to your sleep, your health and your life.


What We Need 

We need to engineer a new injection mould which we'll use to make our fantastic new mouthpiece.  We have plenty of experience in doing this and so we know what we need to do to "get it right". The cost of the mould will be £40,000 which is just under $60,000  or €50,000 and this is what the funds we raise will be used for.



What You Get

Pledgers will receive a life changing new product. We can say from experience you will quite probably stop snoring and sleep better. And if not, we'll give you your money back.

Use Your Pledge as a Credit ...

In return for supporting our campaign you are invited to pledge for any of the things we make, including our new appliance, or one of our existing appliances and a choice of other things listed on our perks page.  And if you change your mind between now and later you can use your pledge as a credit for something else offered by us - we will be happy to swap it over for you.  


The Impact

Snoring and sleep apnoea have a profound effect on people's quality of sleep as well as their happiness, well-being and general health. 

We believe that by providing affordable high quality oral-appliances we can make a huge impact on these problems. And if these things affect you, then we may be able to change your life. I know this is a big "call", but over the years we have heard it again and again from many satisfied customers.

Sleep apnoea is a hugely under-diagnosed condition that affects a surprising number of people. You may even have it without realising it. There is much written about Obstructive Sleep Apnoea (OSA) and the importance of good quality sleep, some of which you can read about on our website (the link is at the very end of this piece). 

In the meantime though, there are some simple things that you may already know about or which may be new to you and make you go "Oh Yes!". 

For example, people tend to stop snoring or snore less when their airway is open and this more likely if someone is lying on their side as opposed to their back. As an aside, this is why our oral appliances work - they open up the airway so you can breathe better while you sleep. Very simple, but very effective.

It is also known that people who have sleep apnoea are quite likely to snore, but if you snore it doesn't mean you have OSA; although there is a relationship between these two things in many people. 

You may have seen your partner stopping breathing while asleep and then gasping for air, possibly with a snorting sound; this is almost certainly an apnoea (a cessation of breathing) and it may mean they are not getting enough oxygen into their blood. This can be very bad news indeed as it can have the same effect on your major organs as being a heavy smoker. If it happens repeatedly, or for a long period of time, then it can make you feel lousy in the morning and cause some serious health issues. 

It seems to be made worse if you have put on weight as the extra body mass around the windpipe can make it smaller and cause an obstruction to the flow of air. You're basically strangling yourself while you sleep and you don't even know it. So of course the thing to do in this situation is to examine your diet and lifestyle, cut out sugar and all the other things you've heard about, but of course all this takes time. On the other hand, if you want an immediate improvement in your breathing while you sleep then one of our appliances is what you need. 

There is a good chance if your airway stays open while you sleep you will feel so much better in the morning, you won't snore and your health will be much better for it.  Oh and of course having better quality sleep will probably help reduce daytime tiredness and fatigue. 


Risks & Challenges

We believe the risks in this project are low because we have many years experience in this field and our team knows their stuff very well. We are confident that when we raise the money, we will deliver a product to you that does what we say it does and in the time-frame we promise. In fact I'm very happy to personally make that promise.

In terms of challenges, as we have done this before we know what to expect and we can anticipate where there will be problems and plan accordingly. We know this because we have encountered most problems on our previous projects and we know how to deal with them. We also work with a very fine manufacturing company with whom we have a track record and a great deal of respect. 


Other Ways You Can Help

SPREAD THE WORD

If you feel, for whatever reason, you can't pledge to our campaign, we would be very grateful if you could please help by spreading the word. I am certain you know someone who snores heavily and I would love them to know about our campaign. They will quite probably thank you later.

Without doubt, the most powerful thing you can do is to talk about us both face-to-face with friends and family and through social media. The most effective of these for us is Facebook. 

Please Like and Share Our FaceBook Page​

ENGAGE PEOPLE IN CONVERSATION - it could save their life.

Please visit our website www.SleepPro.com  and join our mailing list especially if you would like more information about our products or would like to learn more about obstructive sleep apnoea (OSA) and the health implications for poor quality sleep.


TESTIMONIALS


We have many many glowing testimonials from people who have seen a big change in their life because of SleepPro. Please visit our website www.SleepPro.com/testimonials  to see some of our testimonials or read those below to get a feel for what people think us. Of course people always ask if they are true and I can assure you every one of them is absolutely true.


 __________________________________________________________

Hi Sleeppro team,

Sleeppro Custom is an amazing success for no snoring; super comfortable and really locks teeth in and jaws together without morning soreness because I was so diligent in following instructions for fitting and had prior success with Sleeppro 1.

I'd like to order 2 more if plan is to reuse my dental mold in-hand with you.  One for spare and one for travel. I am going to try red eye flights again and use custom Sleeppro on plane without fear of snoring and it falling out of mouth. 

BTW, I used it with CPAP and I am very cheery this morning. It works! Thomas Jefferson University in Philadelphia wanted $1000 to $1200 for similar product 2 years ago after learning I had sleep apnea.  CPAP is not a mobile solution and I am glad to have circled back with Sleeppro to order the Custom mouthpiece.

Can you send me instructions to order 2 additional Custom mouthpieces, please?

Regards,

Mark Grosset

 __________________________________________________________

I have received my SleepPro Night Guard.

I wanted to write you a review - but couldn't seem to find where to do it so, I'm emailing you directly!

It's a perfect fit and has really improved my sleep and helped with my TMJ.  

A few weeks on and I no longer wake up with severe jaw ache or even headaches

Thank you for this amazing mouth guard.

I would like to order two more - the mould I sent back was a perfect fit.

How do I order one thin one and one medium thickness one?

 Gratefully yours!

Mrs Hitaishi Vaghela

 __________________________________________________________

Hi 

My wife has just purchased your Sleep Tight mouth guard which is excellent and works so well. 

I am sleeping really well and I think I have REM sleep now, and feel refreshed in the mornings due to my Sleep Tight.  My wife is sleeping so much better and loves that I am so peaceful and quiet during the night.  I have also recommended this STM to my friend.

So many thanks it really works.

Tony & Corina Parsons

 __________________________________________________________

Just to let you know that my SleepPro Custom mouth guard is just brilliant. I am now silent and do not wake up countless times in the night. I want to thank you and Professor P at the hospital for sorting me out!

Maggie Heath

 __________________________________________________________

"I finally fit the new mouthpiece this week and have used it for three nights. It is definitely an improvement over the old one. It does fit better and the snoring is much improved. ...I would say it works to relieve the snoring pretty well." Sharon

  __________________________________________________________

"The SleepTight device was extremely easy to fit based on the instructions and video. And the best news is that it is as comfortable and performs as well as my custom-fit device that I have been using for the last three years. ...Yes. I like it. ...Easy to fit and works well."Mike O.

  __________________________________________________________

"Both my husband [a Certified Respiratory Therapist] and I have been using one for the last few days and are surprised with how much better we've been sleeping. ...The device was fairly easy to fit and not all that uncomfortable to wear. Definitely worth the benefits of feeling more rested."Tami, Sierra Sleep Diagnostics

  __________________________________________________________

Thank you very much for reading our campaign. Your pledge will help enormously and in return I shall be very pleased to hear from you to say I've helped you in return.

Gratefully yours

Paul

Of course it is cheaper to make things on the other side of the world, but our goal has always been to offer our customers the best quality we can and that's why we are proud to have the Made in Britain stamp on our products. Hi, My Name is Paul Swann and I've spent the last 15 years designing and making both affordable and custom-made oral appliances for snoring and obstructive sleep apnoea. I'm very pleased to tell you my team and I have helped a huge number of people all over the world in the process. Not just stopping their snoring, but improving their health in a very meaningful way. And if you have a problem with snoring or other sleep related issues, it is very likely we can help you get a good nights sleep.Right now I'm looking to make a new mould in England, making sure we use the strictest quality control we can and make our new product available in about four months. It is by far my best design yet at this price level and I think people will find it more comfortable to wear and better in other important ways.  It would be fantastic if you could be part of making this happen and helping to keep it great by keeping it in Great Britain - making it possible for us to observe very high standards of quality one expects from a country that is rightly famous for quality with names like Rolls Royce and the BBC. And of course the benefit to you is you will get to see for yourself what a difference a  SleepPro Ultra can make to your sleep, your health and your life.What We Need We need to engineer a new injection mould which we'll use to make our fantastic new mouthpiece.  We have plenty of experience in doing this and so we know what we need to do to "get it right". The cost of the mould will be £40,000 which is just under $60,000  or €50,000 and this is what the funds we raise will be used for.What You GetPledgers will receive a life changing new product. We can say from experience you will quite probably stop snoring and sleep better. And if not, we'll give you your money back.Use Your Pledge as a Credit ...In return for supporting our campaign you are invited to pledge for any of the things we make, including our new appliance, or one of our existing appliances and a choice of other things listed on our perks page.  And if you change your mind between now and later you can use your pledge as a credit for something else offered by us - we will be happy to swap it over for you.  The ImpactSnoring and sleep apnoea have a profound effect on people's quality of sleep as well as their happiness, well-being and general health. We believe that by providing affordable high quality oral-appliances we can make a huge impact on these problems. And if these things affect you, then we may be able to change your life. I know this is a big "call", but over the years we have heard it again and again from many satisfied customers.Sleep apnoea is a hugely under-diagnosed condition that affects a surprising number of people. You may even have it without realising it. There is much written about Obstructive Sleep Apnoea (OSA) and the importance of good quality sleep, some of which you can read about on our website (the link is at the very end of this piece). In the meantime though, there are some simple things that you may already know about or which may be new to you and make you go "Oh Yes!". For example, people tend to stop snoring or snore less when their airway is open and this more likely if someone is lying on their side as opposed to their back. As an aside, this is why our oral appliances work - they open up the airway so you can breathe better while you sleep. Very simple, but very effective.It is also known that people who have sleep apnoea are quite likely to snore, but if you snore it doesn't mean you have OSA; although there is a relationship between these two things in many people. You may have seen your partner stopping breathing while asleep and then gasping for air, possibly with a snorting sound; this is almost certainly an apnoea (a cessation of breathing) and it may mean they are not getting enough oxygen into their blood. This can be very bad news indeed as it can have the same effect on your major organs as being a heavy smoker. If it happens repeatedly, or for a long period of time, then it can make you feel lousy in the morning and cause some serious health issues. It seems to be made worse if you have put on weight as the extra body mass around the windpipe can make it smaller and cause an obstruction to the flow of air. You're basically strangling yourself while you sleep and you don't even know it. So of course the thing to do in this situation is to examine your diet and lifestyle, cut out sugar and all the other things you've heard about, but of course all this takes time. On the other hand, if you want an immediate improvement in your breathing while you sleep then one of our appliances is what you need. There is a good chance if your airway stays open while you sleep you will feel so much better in the morning, you won't snore and your health will be much better for it.  Oh and of course having better quality sleep will probably help reduce daytime tiredness and fatigue. Risks & ChallengesWe believe the risks in this project are low because we have many years experience in this field and our team knows their stuff very well. We are confident that when we raise the money, we will deliver a product to you that does what we say it does and in the time-frame we promise. In fact I'm very happy to personally make that promise.In terms of challenges, as we have done this before we know what to expect and we can anticipate where there will be problems and plan accordingly. We know this because we have encountered most problems on our previous projects and we know how to deal with them. We also work with a very fine manufacturing company with whom we have a track record and a great deal of respect. Other Ways You Can HelpSPREAD THE WORDIf you feel, for whatever reason, you can't pledge to our campaign, we would be very grateful if you could please help by spreading the word. I am certain you know someone who snores heavily and I would love them to know about our campaign. They will quite probably thank you later.Without doubt, the most powerful thing you can do is to talk about us both face-to-face with friends and family and through social media. The most effective of these for us is Facebook. Please Like and Share Our FaceBook Page​ENGAGE PEOPLE IN CONVERSATION - it could save their life.Please visit our website www.SleepPro.com  and join our mailing list especially if you would like more information about our products or would like to learn more about obstructive sleep apnoea (OSA) and the health implications for poor quality sleep.TESTIMONIALSWe have many many glowing testimonials from people who have seen a big change in their life because of SleepPro. Please visit our website www.SleepPro.com/testimonials  to see some of our testimonials or read those below to get a feel for what people think us. Of course people always ask if they are true and I can assure you every one of them is absolutely true. __________________________________________________________Hi Sleeppro team,Sleeppro Custom is an amazing success for no snoring; super comfortable and really locks teeth in and jaws together without morning soreness because I was so diligent in following instructions for fitting and had prior success with Sleeppro 1.I'd like to order 2 more if plan is to reuse my dental mold in-hand with you.  One for spare and one for travel. I am going to try red eye flights again and use custom Sleeppro on plane without fear of snoring and it falling out of mouth. BTW, I used it with CPAP and I am very cheery this morning. It works! Thomas Jefferson University in Philadelphia wanted $1000 to $1200 for similar product 2 years ago after learning I had sleep apnea.  CPAP is not a mobile solution and I am glad to have circled back with Sleeppro to order the Custom mouthpiece.Can you send me instructions to order 2 additional Custom mouthpieces, please?Regards,Mark Grosset __________________________________________________________I have received my SleepPro Night Guard.I wanted to write you a review - but couldn't seem to find where to do it so, I'm emailing you directly!It's a perfect fit and has really improved my sleep and helped with my TMJ.  A few weeks on and I no longer wake up with severe jaw ache or even headachesThank you for this amazing mouth guard.I would like to order two more - the mould I sent back was a perfect fit.How do I order one thin one and one medium thickness one? Gratefully yours!Mrs Hitaishi Vaghela __________________________________________________________Hi My wife has just purchased your Sleep Tight mouth guard which is excellent and works so well. I am sleeping really well and I think I have REM sleep now, and feel refreshed in the mornings due to my Sleep Tight.  My wife is sleeping so much better and loves that I am so peaceful and quiet during the night.  I have also recommended this STM to my friend.So many thanks it really works.Tony & Corina Parsons __________________________________________________________Just to let you know that my SleepPro Custom mouth guard is just brilliant. I am now silent and do not wake up countless times in the night. I want to thank you and Professor P at the hospital for sorting me out!Maggie Heath __________________________________________________________"I finally fit the new mouthpiece this week and have used it for three nights. It is definitely an improvement over the old one. It does fit better and the snoring is much improved. ...I would say it works to relieve the snoring pretty well." Sharon  __________________________________________________________"The SleepTight device was extremely easy to fit based on the instructions and video. And the best news is that it is as comfortable and performs as well as my custom-fit device that I have been using for the last three years. ...Yes. I like it. ...Easy to fit and works well."Mike O.  __________________________________________________________"Both my husband [a Certified Respiratory Therapist] and I have been using one for the last few days and are surprised with how much better we've been sleeping. ...The device was fairly easy to fit and not all that uncomfortable to wear. Definitely worth the benefits of feeling more rested."Tami, Sierra Sleep Diagnostics  __________________________________________________________Thank you very much for reading our campaign. Your pledge will help enormously and in return I shall be very pleased to hear from you to say I've helped you in return.Gratefully yoursPaul

story:
Dental Care Made Easy!

Most people know that brushing and flossing is the best way to keep a mouth healthy. But did you know that you are supposed to change your toothbrush every 3 months? There are a lot of different dental products out on the market, but selecting the right ones for your specific needs can be quite challenging. With Dental Care Box, we select, package and ship a toothbrush, toothpaste and floss for your specific dental needs.

 

The Easy & Affordable Solution!

To better serve our patients, we believe in challenging the status quo. Good oral health should not be expensive or exclusive. The total cost of healthcare keeps increasing, making it more difficult to maintain optimum oral health. But with Dental Care Box, we make taking care of your teeth both easy and affordable.

We all know that brushing our teeth is the best way to obtain and keep a healthy mouth.  But, how do we know that our teeth are “clean” or “healthy” after we brush them?  How do we know that our toothbrush and toothpaste are helping us achieve our goal of a beautiful smile? 

The simple answer is that we don’t.  As a consumer, we are bombarded with advertisements and media swaying our choices of toothbrushes and toothpastes. Many products claim to be more effective for whitening, sensitive teeth, gum disease and other areas, but which products are the best for our specific needs?  That is where Dental Care Box can help.

 

Delivering Customized Dental Products to Each Individual

Our project is focused on bringing the right dental care products to the right individual. Imagine that you are working on a project in which you needed a saw, but you only had a hammer. It would make your job much more difficult because you would not have the right tools to accomplish the specific task at hand.

Similarly, at Dental Care Box, we know that each mouth is unique and that there are different needs and tasks that need to be accomplished for each mouth. After all, you wouldn't be using toothpaste for dry mouths if your true dental need is getting whiter teeth, right? Dental Care Box selects the right combination of products to give you the maximum benefits towards achieving healthier teeth and gums.

 

 

Creating Healthy Mouths with Expertise & Research

As dentists, our goal is to positively influence and help improve oral health in as many people as possible. Our project is to design a system that will be able to match specific oral health products to the individuals that needs them. We use the knowledge and expertise of our training from dental school, dental practice and the most updated and current research literature to understand the oral cavity, a.k.a. your mouth. Compiling all of that information, we at Dental Care Box are able to match a dental product that best help you!

With Dental Care Box, we select, package and ship a toothbrush, toothpaste and floss for your specific dental needs.

 

Types of Dental Care Needs

Do you have any of the following?

  • Sensitive Teeth
  • Gum Disease
  • Bleeding Gums
  • Braces/Orthodontics
  • Dry Mouth
  • Yellow Teeth

Whether you have one or more of the above conditions or just need a regular maintenance dental care box, we are here to help!

 

What's In The Box

  • Toothbrush
  • Toothpaste
  • Floss

 

Our Products

Dental Care Box selects products direct from leading brand manufacturers that put in millions of dollars into research and studies. All our products have the ADA (American Dental Association) Seal of Acceptance.

 

Cost Comparisons

 

How It Works

1. Take this short questionnaire.

2. Select the Indiegogo Perk that recommend or pick another one you prefer! 

3. Watch your mail for your Dental Care Box filled with a toothbrush, toothpaste & floss.

 

Indiegogo Perks

All our Indiegogo Perks are 3 month subscription services to Dental Care Box. Backers will be invited to renew and continue their subscription in May in order for us to be able to send you a new customized box in time to change out your old dental products. All backers are not automatically enrolled into a monthly subscription by backing our project, but have the option to enroll in a subscription and change their box type after the Indiegogo campaign is over.

 

Who We Are

We are two dentists that are passionate about providing easier access to at-home dental care. We love subscription services due to the convenience, time and cost savings because we are busy parents with full-time jobs ourselves!

Tina Saw, D.D.S. (Co-Founder)

Practicing private practice dentist in Carlsbad, California and a dental graduate of Loma Linda University School of Dentistry. Busy mom of a baby.

Thanh Luu, D.D.S. (Co-Founder)

Practicing general dentist of both a non-profit community clinic and private practice in San Diego, California and a dental graduate of Loma Linda University School of Dentistry.

 

Our Mission

Drs. Tina Saw and Thanh Luu believe that dental care should be both affordable and convenient, challenging the status quo. We built a beautiful private dental practice, but then broke out of our comfort zone and devoted another part of our time to a non-profit dental clinic. As dentists, we both provide our services to as many people as possible, but also believe we can do much more for our community and beyond.

Our personal goal is to positively influence and help improve oral health in as many people as possible. Our project is to design a system that will be able to match specific oral health products to the individuals that needs them. We use the knowledge and expertise of our training from dental school, dental practice and the most updated and current research literature to understand the oral cavity, a.k.a. your mouth. Compiling all of that information, we at Dental Care Box are able to match a dental product that best help you!

 

Why Dental Care Box?

 

More Than Just Toothbrushes

We select and deliver the perfect oral hygiene products to your doorstep every 3 months, the recommended frequency by dentists of when you should change your toothbrush. It couldn't be easier! 

 

Save Time & Money

Your life can get pretty busy. There is no need to go to the store or worry about running out of products. We deliver handpicked products to your doorstep at less than what you would get at the store.

 

We Simplify Things

The store can be overwhelming when it comes to selecting the correct dental products for your needs. No waiting in line at the store or confusion on selecting the right dental products on the shelf.  We customize each box to fit each individual's needs.

 

Refreshingly Simple

A healthy mouth gives you the confidence and smile you deserve. Our boxes are designed for your specific needs and meant to simplify and make oral hygiene easier. We take the expertise of a dentist and products approved by the American Dental Association to deliver the perfect products to you.

 

Delivered on Schedule

Brushing your teeth should be part of your daily routine, but running to the store every time you run out of product should not. We send you your dental products every 3 months so you don't have to think about it. It's a simple reminder that it is time to say goodbye to that old, raggedy toothbrush.

For All Your Dental Needs

From toothbrushes, toothpastes to floss, we got you covered in every aspect from an oral health care standpoint. Easy!

 

 

Shipping

We ship all over to the United States from Carlsbad, California.

Help Out By Sharing With Friends!

Have a friend who needs this? Spread the word about the convenience and time and cost savings Dental Care Box would provide you! Click the Share icons at the top of the page to let others know about our project.

story:
Running Magazine – Why It Makes Sense To Donate For It

Though the internet and other electronics and digital means of communication are growing at a rapid pace, the print media continues to be important and it attracts millions of readers. Though the age profile of this group of readers might be different, it has its own group of committed and loyal followers. It is especially strong in areas where the reach of the digital and electronic means of communication is limited and there are millions who belong to this category. While there are many magazines who start publishing with the concept of profit being only the strong point in the mind, there are a few who do it with the purpose of service to mankind in mind. One such publishing is called Running Magazine and it certainly has an interesting and touching objective to it. It would not be a bad idea to know more about this magazine.

 

It Has Service To Mankind As Its Core Value

 

As mentioned above it would be pertinent to mention that this particular magazine is being published keeping in mind the broader interests of mankind. While the subject matter of the magazine will be on jogging and the advantages it offers, it will also have quite a few interesting tips to offer. It will certainly be of use to all those who wish to keep their body and mind in good shape through jogging. It will also share some useful and meaningful information to share to those who want to excel in the field of jogging. The tips, suggestions and anecdotes are quite interesting and relevant and quite a few of them we hope will be from experts on the subject matter. 

 

It Will Be Free Of Cost

 

The best thing about Running Magazine is that it will be complete free of cost and will be available to all those who are keen on getting some useful tips on the subject matter of running and jogging. It will offer insights into the various reasons why many fail in making jogging a long term exercise to keep their body fit as a fiddle. It will also offer expert advices regarding the medical conditions for which jogging could be useful and the do’s and don’ts as far as jogging is concerned. Hence at the end of the day there is no doubt that in spite of being a free magazine it will have some of the most interesting and attractive information with regard to jogging and light running. 

 

Why We Are Making It Free

 

We are keen on making this whole project a non-profit venture and have a larger objective in mind. We have found out that there are thousands of women and children who are keen on finding out ways and means to keep their body in good shape. However they lack the right kind of information on the subject matter and do not know how to get started and how to keep the momentum going. We are trying to reach out to these sections of people and that is perhaps the biggest endeavor as far as our magazine is concerned. We are hopeful that it will help scores of women and children in particular to become active participants in jogging as far as the neighborhood and society is concerned. Beyond this objective, we do not have any commercial interests as far as the publication and running of this magazine is concerned.

 

We Seek Donations

 

There is no denying the fact that it does cost money to print the magazine and there are quite a few fixed and variable expenses that we need to be prepared to spend. Since it is a magazine being planned by not-so-wealthy individuals, we are certainly short of funds. While we have arranged to put in our own funds as a right-thinking group, we do believe that our objective will be better served if we can get donations and help from right thinking individuals. We especially look for help from those who are keen on seeing their wards and women lead a better quality of life with better health and fitness levels. We are more than confident that the information that we plan to provide in this magazine will be immense help and assistance to those who are keen on staring their day on the right note with some well thought out and planned jogging exercises. We are sure that running magazine will have a number of pictorial representations of the various aspects pertaining to jogging making it quite unique and different. It certainly will add value to all those who wish to become expert joggers over a period of time. 

 

How Will The Donations Be Used

 

We wish to point out that the donations which we are seeking for well wishers will be used for running our office. We are operating out of a rented property and therefore we will have to arrange funds for paying rent on a regular basis. Further there are other recurring expenses which have to be met on a regular basis. We are looking for donations for likeminded people only for the purpose of paying rent and other recurring expenses. 

 

The Magazine Will Be Published Weekly

 

It would be pertinent to mention here that we will be publishing the magazine on a weekly basis and it will be circulated amongst the local community with the help of volunteers and other members of the group.

 

Your Support Is Required

 

At the end of the day there is hardly any doubt that running a magazine on such a reasonably big scale with limited resources at our disposal is not an easy task. It certainly calls for support from as many quarters as possible. Hence we are reaching out to as many people as possible. We strongly believe that it will receive the required support and the response will be encouraging and perhaps even overwhelming. The donors can be rest assured that each dollar donated will be accounted for and there will be utmost transparency in our receipts and expenditure. The books of accounts will be subject to independent third party auditing and therefore donors can be sure that it will be used for the purpose for which the donation is being sought.

We are more than confident that the information that we plan to provide in this magazine will be immense help and assistance to those who are keen on staring their day on the right note with some well thought out and planned jogging exercises. We are sure that running magazine will have a number of pictorial representations of the various aspects pertaining to jogging making it quite unique and different. It certainly will add value to all those who wish to become expert joggers over a period of time.  How Will The Donations Be Used We wish to point out that the donations which we are seeking for well wishers will be used for running our office. We are operating out of a rented property and therefore we will have to arrange funds for paying rent on a regular basis. Further there are other recurring expenses which have to be met on a regular basis. We are looking for donations for likeminded people only for the purpose of paying rent and other recurring expenses.  The Magazine Will Be Published Weekly It would be pertinent to mention here that we will be publishing the magazine on a weekly basis and it will be circulated amongst the local community with the help of volunteers and other members of the group. Your Support Is Required At the end of the day there is hardly any doubt that running a magazine on such a reasonably big scale with limited resources at our disposal is not an easy task. It certainly calls for support from as many quarters as possible. Hence we are reaching out to as many people as possible. We strongly believe that it will receive the required support and the response will be encouraging and perhaps even overwhelming. The donors can be rest assured that each dollar donated will be accounted for and there will be utmost transparency in our receipts and expenditure. The books of accounts will be subject to independent third party auditing and therefore donors can be sure that it will be used for the purpose for which the donation is being sought.
campaign_city: Available for all states, United States

story:
With gratitude

Тhank you for reading our Indiegogo page. We invite you to support our project  and help us to open the Kundalini Lux Meditation Center.

 

Fair play

Our team has experience in yoga and meditation, obtained in India, Nepal, Indonesia and Spain.  Also we have a European certificate to teach yoga and an official registered company in Europe. 
To implement our project, we need you!

What we do

Our meditation center will be in a cozy and quiet place in the best traditions of  Asia  adapted for Europeans. We will offer you  individual and group classes of kundalini yoga, maximum of 10 students per class.  Approximately  duration is  90 min/class. 

Our center will have courses on meditation for two-days on weekend and five-days course from Monday to Friday.

2 days course includes: daily morning and evening meditations and yoga classes in silent.

***Accommodation, meals and all things that you need for practicing.

5 days course includes 2 days silent meditations and 3 days of dynamic meditations with daily morning and evening yoga classes. 

***Accommodation, meals and all things that you need for practicing.

Both courses are made for quick renovation of energy after the  work days.

 Also in our center will be working the invited specialists as: massage therapist , stretching trainer and coach. 

So where it is

The Kundalini Lux will be located in the beautiful and peaceful  place on the border of Belgium and Luxembourg, far from the city noise, where it is easier for you to get calm and hear yourself. Good geographical location makes easy for you to  take a short flight from  anywhere in Europe to visit us.

Up to 10 people will be able to accommodate in shared  and private rooms. At your service will be an equipped yoga room for group  classes and meditations, organic food and a huge beautiful garden outside. 

Benefits of kundalini yoga

Kundalini yoga  can be practiced by everyone.
It improves flexibility and  keeps your stress levels under control. 
Makes you feel more active and ready to see things as they really are. 
Kundalini is ideal for people who has difficulty sleeping and also it is an excellent discipline for losing weight. 
Among other benefits of kundalini yoga are: rejuvenation effect, fighting bad habits, increasing  level of concentration and ... levitation! kidding :) but who knows?...

Why us?

We love what we do and we have the quality business plan to make this project successful for next 3 years.  

We are the legal  company with all certifications and permits to manage this project. 

We ask for a reasonable amount for supporting us.

Please take a look  how we will spend your help.

Here are some numbers:

-Real Estate (rent a house)  2000 euros.

-Real estate rental guarantee (deposit) 2000 euros.

-Repair or renovation of 3000  euros.

-Accounting services,medical insurance, other operating costs  1000 euros.    

-Costs to buy training materials and  furniture 3000 euros.

-Employee 2000 euros.

-Administrative costs 1000 euros.

Reality

To start the project we need  14,000 euros. Further, the monthly expenses  will be around 5000 euros, the amount  is equivalent to 10 courses sold. 

As you see, It is the realistic project. We are sure, that with your help we will  open Kundalini Lux meditation center, that will bring the joy into your life and many others!

What you get supporting us

With  20 euros you  will preorder 1 yoga class.
With  50 euros you will preorder  3 yoga classes.
With 100 euros you will preorder 5 yoga classes.
With 200 euros you will preorder  weekend silient meditacion course with accommodation and meals.
And if you really like to go into the  deep meditation,  you can try to support us with 500 euros and book  five-day  meditation course with accommodation and meals.

 

*** You can  use your packages within one year since will start the project and  give them to your family or friends.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

    •    Share this campaign with your friends! You can use this link:  

https://igg.me/at/lfI0zfR4HkA/x/17248876

    •    'Favorite' this page to receive crowdfunding updates (click the 'heart' symbol)

    •    Follow us on Facebook and Instagram:

           https://www.facebook.com/kundaliniluxmeditationcenter/

           https://www.instagram.com/kundalinilux/

 

To get more information please  email  us: kundalinilux@gmail.com 

 

Thank you for supporting our project!

story:
Share this project with your friends and relatives to help them save their eyes!

 We have 200 free gifts for the most active people who have shared our project! 
We are able to see all public references to this page with our marketing software. Spread the word as much as you can by clicking the buttons or pasting the link igg.me/at/8seconds

The 8 Seconds Glasses reestablish a natural working rhythm to your eyes. The specially-designed adjustable demagnification lenses make the eyes look into the distance therefore helping to relieve the tension caused by viewing a monitor at very close range. It’s like looking into binoculars in reverse. The specially-molded form of the glasses flawlessly matches with the eyes’ field of view. The lamps at the edges enable the eyes to quickly and actively move at the sides, allowing them to rest naturally after intense, slow reading of small font on a computer monitor.

While other products provide only external eye massage, our 8 Seconds Glasses focus on internal eye muscles solving these issues at their source. 8 Seconds Glasses include a unique smartphone-based visual acuity test. Although this cannot replace medical testing, it is useful for estimating your visual well-being. 8 Seconds Glasses are not a medical device and cannot replace professional medical help in case of illness. However, 8 Seconds Glasses implement well-known, proven eye relaxing exercises. These glasses have been tested on many subjects and the relieving effect of their design is very noticeable. We are so confident in our product that each pair comes with a money back guarantee.

The only gadget on the market to relieve internal eye muscles

Implement standard, well-known, proven eye exercises

Utilize soft elements of color and light therapy

Include a unique smartphone-based visual acuity test

Backers will get the product much earlier than others

Much lower price compared to ordinary customers

The first one hundred backers will get the lowest possible price!

Backers will get increased memory size for more programs storage

Only our backers will get the exclusive edition with the corresponding inscription

Lifetime of free software updates for our backers

Extended two-year warranty instead of standard one-year (excl. battery)

45-day money back guarantee instead of standard 30 days (excl. s&h)

A hearty THANK YOUand your name in the honored list of backers on our website!

8GB USB stick includes viral 8 Seconds video!
Free shipping within the US!

 

 

Beautiful T-Shirt with 8 Seconds logo! Available colors are sky blue, navy and pink. Sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL. Free shipping within the US!

 

 

 

Exclusive pair of 8 Seconds Glasses - early bird special.
Only 100 first customers.

Unbelievable price!
Hurry up!

 

 

 

 

Exclusive pair of 8 Seconds Glasses. Only Indiegogo customers will get exclusive version with larger training program memory, longer warranty and corresponding inscription on the glass! Box and cover included.

 

 

Group Purchase.
Two pairs of exclusive 8 Seconds Glasses.
Simply join your friend, colleague, or relative and save $40 USD!

 

 

 

Group Purchase.
Three pairs of exclusive 8 Seconds Glasses.
If you are lucky enough to have two friends, you can easily save $90 USD and get free shipping within the US!

8 pairs. Small office pack for a very special price! Cover and box included.
Save the eyesight of your team!

 

 

8 Seconds shape is compact, durable, lightweight, pleasant to wear, and convenient to use. The high-quality plastic body is pearly-white in color with a golden hue, looks very elegant and smooth, and is enjoyable to touch. The flexible cushion, made from very soft hypoallergenic, transparent blue silicone, is illuminated by a gentle light during the training program. The cushion wraps around the face, leaving you with a pleasant feeling of softness. The tinted glass provides relaxing twilight for the eyes.

The light and lens compact system can be easily adjusted to fit the shape of your face and nose to ensure that your gadget is a perfect fit for you. The lenses light up in sparkling shades of red, blue and green. The reds, which are for morning programs, help to wake you up. Green colors, specifically for office programs, are to relax the eyes. The blue-colored evening programs are to calm you down. For maximum comfort and convenience, the 8 Seconds system has a sensitive proximity sensor that starts the eye relaxation program automatically when you put on the glasses and stops when you take them off.

The user can operate the device from a bright, colorful screen where you can select one of the 16 programs. In any situation, you can always choose the most suitable program for stress relief, sight preservation, and ultimate relaxation for your eyes. The morning programs are active and energetic. The office programs are for short relaxing breaks in between your work. The evening programs are slower to provide a calming effect. The colorful screen displays the duration, time remaining in the current program, program name, battery charge level, and time remaining before the next exercise. A smoothly running marquee displays a detailed description of the selected program.

The small button activates reminders and allows you to set the reminder interval or turn it off. There are eight convenient reminder intervals, ranging from 15 minutes to two hours. The glasses remind you that it’s time to train by blinking a light and playing a musical sound. You can also set it to flash silently so that, if you are in a quiet office, the sound doesn’t distract your colleagues. If you are a left-handed person, you can easily rotate the image by pressing the two buttons at the same time. This will make it convenient for you to operate the device with your left hand, a bonus for left-handed people who rarely find user-friendly technology.

Magnets are a convenient way to secure the soft and flexible transparent handles, for storage and while wearing. The inscriptions "left" and "right” are written on the handles, but this is for information rather than instruction, as they will not attach if you try to put them on the wrong side. 8 Seconds is fitted with a unique magnetic charging port which doesn’t break or wear out, giving you convenience, reliability, and long-term, trouble-free operation. Just like the handles, the charging port can only be connected in the correct way. It’s simply a pleasure to connect!

The eyeglasses come with a sky blue cover of soft velvet fabric for protection. The beautiful box makes the glasses a very appealing and useful gift that won’t be easily forgotten. It’s a practical way to show your friends and family how much you care about them and their health. Only Indiegogo backers will get exclusive models bearing the inscription "8 Seconds Exclusive", larger program memory and other advantages. Other buyers will have the inscription "8 Seconds. Eyestrain Relief." Imagine how remarkable you will appear at the office among your colleagues, who will then also want the eyeglasses!

The gadget has a user-friendly mobile app, where you can easily evaluate and track your visual acuity. Innovative website login allows you to start testing with your individual profile on any computer in the world - just open the 8seconds.us website and scan QR code with the mobile app. User-friendly program editor allows for creating custom exercise programs with author’s name on a screen. Then, in the form of a file, you can upload it to the eye gadget, share with other people, or upload it on the web.

Dr. Artem Muravev
3D design and software

Serge Voyteshonok
Plastic and silicone molds

Niklas Larsson
Electrical engineering and software

Svetlana Piestova
Marketing and web design

The most expensive parts are the plastic and silicone mold forms because 8 Seconds Glasses have many mechanical and silicone parts. Our goal is to produce those parts with the quality of mobile phone cases.

Crowdfunding is not our only source of funds. If we don't achieve our funding goal here, but we receive investments, then we will proceed to mass production. If we don't achieve our funding goal and don't receive investment money, we will refund all money to the backers. Depending on the outcome, you will receive either a high quality product or your money back.

We have partners with years of experience in the fields of engineering, product design, and manufacturing. We have preliminary agreements with manufacturers, but conditions vary greatly depending on production quantities. Our time estimates also have some buffers to reduce schedule risks.

In crowdfunding, there's always potential for unexpected challenges to arise, although we hope none of these come up but sometimes things happen. The road from the very first idea to the final delivery of 8 Seconds Glasses is a long one. We’re doing everything possible on this side of our campaign to make sure that everything runs correctly once it’s been funded. We want to ensure that you get a product that matches your expectations in the time frame we’re aiming for.

We’re a team of perfectionists. Thanks to the range and depth of specialized knowledge within our team, we’ve put together prototypes that are very close to the industrial product design. Because we’re striving to create something that is not only functional but nice and durable, we’ve already faced and overcome many challenges during the development stage.

We understand the importance of communicating all decisions, setbacks, or changes. We will post weekly video reports about our progress on our Indiegogo and project pages. By becoming a backer, you are not simply buying a product - you are deciding to take part in an adventure and become part of the team. Your feedback is precious and we’ll keep you up to date on what’s happening as we finish this first part of our adventure product delivery!

Ask us anything at support@8seconds.us

story:
Our Story:

Hi!  My name is Cort and this lovely lady is my wife Karli.  Together we have five kids, are essential oil users, and Wellness Advocates.  We love all things natural and things that are good for you.  As essential oil users and educators, we know there can be some barriers associated with essential oil use, especially for children.  When you consider the need for water, heat, electricity, or mechanical devices to diffuse an essential oil, and possibly skin sensitivities; there had to be a better way.  Over the past couple of years we have been working on and developing a fun, safe way to enjoy the aroma and natural health benefits of essential oils (especially for kids-but not limited to) without the need for skin contact, water, heat, electricity, or any mechanical device. We want to introduce you to MEO Pals, the first aromatherapy friend.  MEO Pal’s patent pending design allows for an individual to enjoy the essential oil of their choice in one of the safest ways possible, without the use of any of the issues mentioned above.  Contributors to this campaign will be responsible for not only helping bring MEO Pals to market, but will also help make a difference to a lot of people through the associated charities.  Every MEO Pal is named for a real person and will be connected to a charity/cause. A portion of sales from each MEO Pal will go to that charity/cause.

"Grif the Great" - Portions of the funds raised in this campaign will go Sickle Cell Anemia research and Grif’s medical expenses.  So... not only do you get an adorable aromatherapy friend, but you also can help make a difference for Grif and Sickle Cell Anemia research.

How you can help:

The funds raised in this campaign will:

1. Help develop the first and exclusive run of MEO Pals.

2. Help establish MEO Pals and launch them into the market.

3. Help with Sickle Cell Anemia research/treatment.

4. Help develop the next generation of MEO Pals.

5. Help get a safe and fun way to enjoy the aroma and health benefits of essential oils out into the world.

What you get in return for your contribution:

When you support our campaign every level receives some sort of reward.  Most rewards include at least one of the exclusive first run of MEO Pals.  The puppy (Rosie), and the kitty (Grif) will not be available for sale again after this campaign ends.  Do not miss out on your chance to own one or both of the first ever aromatherapy friends. 

Do you have a special person you would like immortalized in the form a MEO Pal?  The highest reward level actually allows you to name one of the upcoming designs after a loved one.

Are you connected to a charity that you would like MEO Pals to support?  The top reward in the campaign also allows you to collaborate with us at MEO Pals on not only the name, but also the charity associated with that MEO Pal.

Our goal:

We have spent the last 2 years perfecting the MEO Pals design, working on prototypes, and weeding our way through the necessary legal channels. Now that we have done the hard work and are in the home stretch, we need your help.  With your contribution, we can bring MEO Pals to market and help make a difference with our current cause, as well as every charity/cause to come.  We believe where much is given, much is required.  Part of our dream for MEO Pals is not just to provide a fun, safe way for individuals (especially kids) to receive aromatherapy, but to help as many people in the process as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help!

If you love MEO Pals as much as we do, please help get the word out about our campaign.  Every person you can email our campaign link to can help.  If you would post our campaign on your social media sites like Facebook and Instagram, that would help. The more people we can alert to our campaign and our desire to help, the better.

  • Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools to help us get the word out!
story_txt:
Our Story:
Hi!  My name is Cort and this lovely lady is my wife Karli.  Together we have five kids, are essential oil users, and Wellness Advocates.  We love all things natural and things that are good for you.  As essential oil users and educators, we know there can be some barriers associated with essential oil use, especially for children.  When you consider the need for water, heat, electricity, or mechanical devices to diffuse an essential oil, and possibly skin sensitivities; there had to be a better way.  Over the past couple of years we have been working on and developing a fun, safe way to enjoy the aroma and natural health benefits of essential oils (especially for kids-but not limited to) without the need for skin contact, water, heat, electricity, or any mechanical device. We want to introduce you to MEO Pals, the first aromatherapy friend.  MEO Pal’s patent pending design allows for an individual to enjoy the essential oil of their choice in one of the safest ways possible, without the use of any of the issues mentioned above.  Contributors to this campaign will be responsible for not only helping bring MEO Pals to market, but will also help make a difference to a lot of people through the associated charities.  Every MEO Pal is named for a real person and will be connected to a charity/cause. A portion of sales from each MEO Pal will go to that charity/cause.
"Grif the Great" - Portions of the funds raised in this campaign will go Sickle Cell Anemia research and Grif’s medical expenses.  So... not only do you get an adorable aromatherapy friend, but you also can help make a difference for Grif and Sickle Cell Anemia research.


How you can help:
The funds raised in this campaign will:
1. Help develop the first and exclusive run of MEO Pals.
2. Help establish MEO Pals and launch them into the market.
3. Help with Sickle Cell Anemia research/treatment.
4. Help develop the next generation of MEO Pals.
5. Help get a safe and fun way to enjoy the aroma and health benefits of essential oils out into the world.

What you get in return for your contribution:
When you support our campaign every level receives some sort of reward.  Most rewards include at least one of the exclusive first run of MEO Pals.  The puppy (Rosie), and the kitty (Grif) will not be available for sale again after this campaign ends.  Do not miss out on your chance to own one or both of the first ever aromatherapy friends. 
Do you have a special person you would like immortalized in the form a MEO Pal?  The highest reward level actually allows you to name one of the upcoming designs after a loved one.
Are you connected to a charity that you would like MEO Pals to support?  The top reward in the campaign also allows you to collaborate with us at MEO Pals on not only the name, but also the charity associated with that MEO Pal.

Our goal:

We have spent the last 2 years perfecting the MEO Pals design, working on prototypes, and weeding our way through the necessary legal channels. Now that we have done the hard work and are in the home stretch, we need your help.  With your contribution, we can bring MEO Pals to market and help make a difference with our current cause, as well as every charity/cause to come.  We believe where much is given, much is required.  Part of our dream for MEO Pals is not just to provide a fun, safe way for individuals (especially kids) to receive aromatherapy, but to help as many people in the process as possible.


Other Ways You Can Help!
If you love MEO Pals as much as we do, please help get the word out about our campaign.  Every person you can email our campaign link to can help.  If you would post our campaign on your social media sites like Facebook and Instagram, that would help. The more people we can alert to our campaign and our desire to help, the better.
Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools to help us get the word out!

story:
Summary

We have been developing SDSSOS.com for over 1 year, and we have loaded over 100,000 products from major dental suppliers like Darby, DENTSPLY, Henry Schein, Patterson, and many more.

Please support us to help us keep sales costs to a minimum, focus on developing the technology (see stretch goals below), and loading our database with as many products as possible.

Thank you!

About us

We are a very small Software shop. We solve real-world problems. We don't have sales people. We rely on referrals, and now Indiegogo, so that you can see our progress and you can help us spread the word. In return, we can offer our software for a ridiculously low price.

What We Need & What You Get

We need help to pay for hosting, maintenance, SDS acquisition, additional development. Here is where the money will go, and if we reach the $100,000 - $125,000 mark, we will be able to keep operations running for several years.

The Impact

If we can raise enough funding, we will keep this project going as long as possible. After the Indiegogo campaign, the MSRP goes up to $250 per year, but if we reach our highest stretch-goals, we will keep the price low. If things go really well, we will even provide the software free to smaller practices.

Timeline

Risks & Challenges

The software is ready, and the database is loaded with lots of products. We add products every day, and if we miss a product, we can find its SDS. If we cannot find an SDS, your supplier/vendor is required to provide it, and we can then load it in the database. We think we didn't miss anything, but you never know...

Other Ways You Can Help

The most important way to help us is to pledge to the goals and spread the word. Please send an email or post on social networks a link to this campaign.

Thank you!

We appreciate your consideration.

story:
“Imagine trying to purchase a car without knowing
... how good it is or what it will cost.
That’s the situation consumers face when choosing a doctor.” 
- Pacific Business Group on Health –

When I moved from New York to the Boston area 2 years ago, I needed to find a new doctor, hospital and health plan.  I went to the internet and was initially overwhelmed by the number the available websites and underwhelmed by their content.
It took several months to decide on a doctor and a health plan.  Most people don't have that much time to spend on a search.  So they compromise and settle on a doctor that's just OK.  There are better ways.
 
“sites like Healthgrades, RateMDs, Vital, and Yelp ...
[are] riddled with limitations.”
- Consumer Reports -
 
So I decided to write up what I learned as a guide to help consumers to quickly locate the few truly useful internet sites that will help them find the best doctors, hospitals and health plans based on objective measures of quality and cost (health plans). 
 

What Every Healthcare Consumer Should Know

After publishing the 2017 Massachusetts Edition of Finding the Best Healthcare You Can Afford, I continued to do research and became more convinced than ever that there is a need and a method for finding better quality, safer healthcare at an affordable price.  Here are some highlights of what I found:
  • Going to the best hospital can reduce death and complications rates by 2/3 or more.

  • Hospital safety ratings won’t help you find the hospitals with the lowest death rates.
  • Many consumers are unaware of their local hospital choices.
  • Few consumers consider hospital admitting privileges when choosing a physician.
  • Most doctor selection services don’t let you screen for the most important criteria.
  • Patient surveys don’t tell you which doctors provide the best quality of care.

2018 Edition

The new, improved 2018 Edition with Hospital Outcomes Scores (see below) will be national in scope, and we expect to publish in the third quarter of 2018.  This 2018 Edition will benefit from more than year of additional research, development of a better way to measure hospital safety (Hospital Outcomes Scores) and feedback from healthcare professionals, consumers, friends and family.
 
 

    Local Hospital Report

    Customized for each user, the Local Hospital Report will make it much easier to choose  a hospital, affiliated doctors and a health plan that includes your doctors and hospital.

    The Local Hospital Report combines Hospital Outcomes Scores (see below) for the top 10 hospitals (lowest death rates) in your specified area (city, county or state) together with other hospital ratings and a guide describing how to use the information. 

    Who They're For

    A US News survey found that over 60 percent of respondents are dissatisfied with one of  more of their doctors.  Even allowing for survey bias, there's a good chance that you or someone you know is looking for a new doctor, is facing surgery or has recently moved.

    Anyone who hasn’t chosen a primary care physician a specialist, a health plan or a preferred hospital or is dissatisfied with their current choice can benefit from the 2018 Edition and the Local Hospital Report.   That especially applies to people who have:

    • changed jobs,
    • moved to a different part of the country,
    • are starting a family or
    • need a new health plan, which typically restricts the doctors and hospitals you can use.   

    A Better, simpler way to choose a Doctor

    “Consumers simply don’t have the information they need to pick a doctor based on measurable quality or the expected cost of care.”
    - Pacific Business Group on Health –

    A major focus of the 2017 Mass. Edition was how to choose a doctor based on the best available criteria for quality of care .  With so many primary care doctors over 3,000 within 10 miles of downtown Boston, and many more specialists, the choices are overwhelming.  Larger metropolitan areas, such as New York, Los Angeles and Chicago, are even more so. Choosing doctors based on patient surveys has been largely discredited:

    "In ten years, none of them [sites like Healthgrades, RateMDs, Vital, and Yelp ]
    have amassed enough reviews to be useful."
    - Consumer Reports -

    “Hospital & medical group affiliation are the best available criteria to choose a doctor”
    - Finding the Best Healthcare You Can Afford –

    We offer ways to narrow down the choices using the best websites and the best available criteria for quality of care, relying, in part, on proxy measures such as medical group and hospital affiliation.  Choosing a hospital before you choose a doctor has the two major advantages:

    • There are far fewer hospitals than doctors from which to choose.
    • There are much better measures of hospital (than doctor) quality and safety that can help consumers differentiate.

    Yet a US News survey found that just 5% of those surveyed mentioned hospital affiliation (admitting privileges) as the most important factor when choosing a doctor.

      Hospital Outcomes Scores

      "Go to the Wrong Hospital and You’re 3 Times More Likely to Die"
      - New York Times 12/14/2016 -

      Our “secret sauce” is the never-before-published Hospital Outcomes Scores (HOS), a new hospital safety rating system without which it is virtually impossible to find the hospital in your area with the lowest avoidable death rate (or complications rate). 

      “negligible difference in mortality or complication rates
      ​among hospitals receiving A, B, or C grades”
      -       Hospital Safety Scores: Do Grades Really Matter?, Univ. of Michigan -

      While other hospital safety and quality rating services include death and complications data provided by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (usually blended with other information), HOS offers the following advantages over other ratings systems:

      1. Outcomes not diluted by combining them with non-outcome factors.
      2. Median Scores of 50% make it easier to tell which hospitals are better.
      3. Scores from 0% to 50% differentiate more effectively than 123 or ABC.

      And HOS can compare many hospitals in your local area or across the United States to tell you which ones have the lowest death and complication rates.

      For more information on Hospital Outcomes Scores, visit our website.

      What You'll Get

      Contributors will receive any or all of the following, depending upon the level of participation: 

      • The 2018 Edition of Finding the Best Healthcare You Can Afford.
      • A Local Hospital Report with Hospital Outcomes Scores and other safety ratings for the top 10 (lowest death rate) hospitals in your area.
      • Early birds will receive a free copy of the 2017 Massachusetts Edition.

      • Donors, Sponsors and Benefactors will receive additional benefits as described in the Perks.

      How we plan to spend the proceeds

      We need funding to update and publish the 2018 (national) Edition, develop the capability to provide Hospital Outcomes Scores as an internet service and pay for advertising and PR to spread the word. 

      Corporate & Non-profit Sponsors

      We are also seeking corporate sponsors, who would like share this approach to provider selection with their employees and/or members of the community.  Some sponsors may wish to take advantage of the positive effect on employees health and productivity, while others may see this as a public service.  In either case, we will entertain publishing private label versions of Finding the Best Healthcare with varying degrees of customization for larger donations.  In addition, the author will make time for seminars and consultations.

      The Author


      Peter A. Wadsworth

      After starting his career at IBM and McKinsey & Company, Mr. Wadsworth has devoted the majority of his professional life to healthcare, finance and information technology.  As an investment banker he raised over $2 billion for some of the most prominent HMOs and voluntary hospitals in the country. 

      Mr. Wadsworth has also been a healthcare consumer for over 70 years in Boston, New York, San Francisco and eastern Long Island. 

      Mr. Wadsworth received an undergraduate degree in operations research and an MBA from Cornell University and has done postgraduate work in public health at NYU.

      Mr. Wadsworth is an experienced writer, who has produced numerous reports for his clients and, in recent years, for public consumption.

      You can learn more about Mr. Wadsworth at LinkedIn and at www.AmoryAssociates.com

      Risks & Challenges

      There is a risk that we will be overwhelmed with requests for Local Hospital Safety reports, which could delay publication of the 2018 Edition.  But having written and published the 2017 Massachusetts Edition, we've got a pretty good prototype to work from and have been collecting information on other states for over a year.  In addition, we've pretty well documented Hospital Outcomes Scores, as demonstrated by the following article published on LinkedIn Hospital Outcomes - A Neglected Metric.

story:
Try out the posture correcting demo today!


Download here, unpack into any folder and run.  (it will take a minute to initialize all the resources)
Microsoft dlls might be required: vc_redist.x64.exe



TLDR; Walk a bit taller and be more disease resistant with the passive AI training using your laptop/PC. 

That's sounds like a quite tall order, but nevertheless that's what we are going to do. 
Interested? Watch the tech demo or keep reading!

We hear a lot of AI, automation and deep learning buzz words thrown all around. But so far it was only applicable to big projects like self driving cars, inventory automation or advertisement placement. Big Money relies on it almost everywhere now days, but what  about us, regular people?
Well, we are going to try something a bit more down to the ground. Something you can test right away. And if it's useful - so much better. 

Goal: $2000 "Testing the waters"

Core Functionality. Meet FaceNoMore - good habit and awareness forming partner.

Machine learning based tool, which uses computer vision and object detection in real time to improve your hygiene habits. (yes, we have considered calling it "ai.nanny" as well, but it sounded too applish for our taste)
The idea is pretty simple: if you have a web-camera, the video stream is analyzed by YOLOv3 (You Only Look Once) algorithm trained on a custom face-hand model and it alerts you every time you touch your face. 
A small, customizable application is  sitting in the background handling all the data flow, alerts and user interactions. We have the prototype ready, but right now it's quite dumb. Big data is not a joke. It has to be acquired, classified and processed for the tool to be applicable to the wide audience and not just us.
That's where the initial funds will go: to cover the video- image splicing, annotation and cloud computing rental. 

We plan to release the tool and the model in any case, but with your help we can make it much smarter and more robust, especially if we hit the stretch goals outlined below.

Minimal requirements: Windows 10,  Intel i5 or any processor and NVIDIA GPU with Cuda 10.2 Support. 

Stretch #1: $10,000 "Small Fish"

Let's crack the eggshell and get out.

We'll upgrade C# toolchains to the latest YOLOv4 (and release them to public) so the processing is even faster, especially on low end systems.
Plus we get good posture detection and activity reminder option to improve every day self-awareness and to prevent back pain.   

Stretch #2: $100,000 "Medium Rare"

Traction point. 

Ok, now we can have a full time programmer dealing with the technical challenges. This buys us a client-server architecture where detection part can be outsourced to a GPU rich server and client can be running on any machine, latency permits.  

Stretch #3: $1,000,000 "Big Game"

Dream big. Go anywhere. Try anything.

Now we can extend our team, pull on medical connections in Boston area and tackle cancer  prevention and aging models. We wish somebody else was doing it, but unfortunately prevention is not as sexy as a new "cure all" silver molecule.  Citizen science has to step in and perhaps we and XGBoost can tease the correlation between your regular blood-work vector and disease onset. It is beyond linear vision of mere humans, but add ML assist,  boost with extra panels (PHI,  CEA etc.) and we'll get something for everyone to use.
Best strategy for cancer is not to get it in the first place. So don't forget about good nutrition, exercise, sleep and stress management (more in our blog).
But the second best thing is to catch it as early as possible and that's where machine learning can really shine.

It is the future. But we can only get there together.   #futuretogether

 

Is it too good to be true?

Well we believe so and we will keep working on it regardless.

But with every dollar donated to the cause and every share you do right now we gain awareness as a society to disease prevention and machine learning applications, which might be much more important in the long run.

The cost of doing nothing is greater than the cost of trying and failing. 

 


Your team: 


 

UBIQ ML LLC
ml@ubiqml.com
https://ubiqml.com
https://www.facebook.com/ubiqml/
