Well we believe so and we will keep working on it regardless.
But with every dollar donated to the cause and every share you do right now we gain awareness as a society to disease prevention and machine learning applications, which might be much more important in the long run.
The cost of doing nothing is greater than the cost of trying and failing. 
 

Your team:  
UBIQ ML LLC ml@ubiqml.comhttps://ubiqml.comhttps://www.facebook.com/ubiqml/

story:
Destressed by acne problem and worried about the scar coming up? Take time on selecting expensive facial products and weekly spa trips, or doing daily skincare routine with a list of tools and procedures?

They are not necessary to do in 2020 anymore!

 

 

Simple Design. 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy.

At AttoSkin we believe simple designs make a difference and we understand the anxiety from all people with blemish-prone skin. Creating products that bring more convenience and effectiveness to the market has always been our main goal! That's why we decided to create AttoSkin Blue LED 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy, combining the potent anti-acne serum and Blue LED therapy in one device for home use, offer you the most creative, comfortable, and affordable home spa treatment… and only require 3minutes of use a day.

 

 

Powered by the latest smart tech, AttoSkin will improve your skin health layer by layer and guarantee you with clean, refresh, oil balance and firm skin.

 

 

The AttoSkin Blue LED 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy is a lightweight, hand-held device that integrates potent serum and skincare technologies, including massage, heat and blue LED, to improve your skin from the inside out in just 3 minutes a day. You don't have to bring along with different skincare products or devices, and you don't have to go for expensive and time-consuming dermatologist visits as AttoSkin Blue LED 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy resolves your acne and anti-aging issue from the deeper fascial level right up to the epidermis – and the most important is, it only comes with the same price tag as one bottle of luxurious cream. 

 

 

The 4 Unique Technology Advancements

 

MASS (Massage)

When we feel stressed, tired, or concentrated, we tense our forehead and eye area, which causes wrinkles over time. A couple of minutes of face massaging helps to relieve. The movement also helps send a surge of blood and oxygen to your skin, this increased flow deflates puffiness (especially in your under-eye area), brightens skin tone, and detoxifies your skin, resulting in a smooth, glowing complexion. Plus, it’s a good way to make your favorite serum absorb into your skin faster and effectively.

 

Heat

Without getting too scientific, heats dilate blood vessels and allow more oxygen and nutrients to move through which is essential to the regrowth of damaged skin tissue and stimulation of fibroblasts. The intelligent micro-chip serves as a skin thermal regulator between 40 – 42°c, allowing all skin types including sensitive skin to be suitable for the therapy, moderately tighten the pore and give a rosy glow. 

 

Blue LED

Blue light therapy is most used to treat sun damage and prevent cancer growth. It can also be used to improve skin texture and reduce sebaceous hyperplasia or enlarged oil glands. In turn, you may see fewer acne breakouts and inflammatory effects as blue light can kill acne-causing bacteria beneath the skin and treat severe acne pimples, cysts and nodules.

 

Potent Anti-Acne Serum

The four main ingredients are mainly herbal essence found to be successful in healing acne-prone skin: 

 

 

 

Enjoy your blissful little moment of self-care every day when you use AttoSkin Blue LED 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy and follow your own, personalized routine. It's natural, perfectly matched to your skin, and absorb fast.

 

 

When you can expect your reward

 

We have already started pre-production on AttoSkin Blue LED 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy and have produced the first 50 samples. We're confident to deliver your AttoSkin Blue LED 2-in-1 Home Use Light Therapy before the end of October.

To get you more excited, we have made our idea on the second version of Home Use Light Therapy and it will be a brand-new function to suit your needs. We are now raising $600,000 to help finance our first Blue LED version, and we hope to move further for the future new plan!

 

 

 

 

Founded in 2010, “AttoSkin” the new brand of “AttoHealth” has devoted itself to the medical field and won market reputation. Backed by medical science, we have been pioneering non-invasive cosmetic medical treatments and products using the latest, trusted and proven technology. All our products are supported by leading board-certified dermatologists. We are pleased to bring the most high-end clinical treatments to the comfort and ease of your home, breaking everyone's traditional concept and open a new era of integrated skin care.

 

Therefore, we would like to invite you to join the movement with us! Please help share with your friends and families on Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites on this new and most effective way of refreshing your skin today!

If you have any questions, please contact the fundraiser at coo@emchk.com

story:
Sterimist Trolley Sanitation Pty Ltd recommends the use of ASEPTI ACTIVE LIQUID sold by Ecolab Pty Ltd in its Q2020 Trolley Sanitation device. (TGA – ARTG 340993)

See: https://www.tga.gov.au/disinfectants-use-against-covid-19-artg-legal-supply-australia

 

What makes Sterimist stand out?

  • Ease of installation, can be placed in front of the store and only requires a regular power connection
  • Consumers can see the sanitization process.
  • Ultrasonic vibration creates the mist, the molecules of which are so small they leave the trolley feeling dry and ready to use as it exits the unit.
  • Quiet and safe operation.
  • Robust and designed to flat pack for ease of transportation, installation and export across the world.
  • Fast cycle speed (ten minutes) and inline capability so trolley supply is unaffected.
  • Proven technology already used for cleaning clean rooms and medical facilities.
  • Efficient to run with low consumption rates of a relatively inexpensive antiseptic rated to kill viruses and bacteria.
  • No requirement for drainage due to dry operation.
  • Potential to sway brand loyalty and attain opposition customers for a chain deploying the technology.
  • Works in with existing systems and processes.
  • Compliments the stores décor.
  • Cost effective.

For corporate information on purchase/lease or distribution options for the Sterimist Trolley System in Australia or Overseas, please contact  Executive Officer, Paul Nielsen at Avantia Corporate Services,  +61 7 30109711 or info@avantiacorp.com.au (Office Hours).

BACKERS CAN NOMINATE THEIR FAVOURITE SUPERMARKET WHERE THEY WOULD LIKE A STERIMIST TROLLEY SYSTEM INSTALLED – WE PLEDGE TO OFFER A  10% DISCOUNT ON DEVICE PURCHASE COSTS TO THAT FACILITY IN THE BACKERS NAME.

Risks and challenges

Our final prototype is ready and we are ready to go into production to manufacture the Sterimist Device. With your support, we will be able to commence manufacture in a timely manner and install it in shopping and transportation complexes in Australia and around the world. While we will be doing our best to execute our plan on time, the chances of unforeseen delays in manufacturing and collaborations with businesses are always there. Whilst we will do best to overcome any obstacles that may arise unforeseen and unintended consequences may cause delays.

story:
DESCRIPTION:

Baschi quick slimming capsule in pink metal box is a brand-new weight loss supplement which is very effective in weight reduction and weight management. This product is easy to use by taking only one capsule per day but the result is much more effective and faster than other products.

PURPOSE OF CAMPAIGN

My purspose of campaign,is to speedily spread this nice product for :

The reduction of fat

The slimming down of belle is few weeks

And keeping the body fit

The Impact

This product is easy to use by taking only one capsule per day but the result is much more effective and faster than other products.Take 1 capsule about 30 minutes before first meal of the day.
– Drink water during the day, at At least 8 cups to 10 cups per day.
– Get plenty of rest for better results.
– Consume 1 capsule per day continuously at least 1 month for best results.

Risks & Challenges

– Reduce intake of carbohydrates and fatty food. Replace it with more vegetables for better results.

Oth

story:
Lose Weight 3x Faster with Day/One.

With Day/One you will get a healthy diet well adapted to your lifestyle! The proven method have been potentiated for 3x faster weight loss and you still have full control over the diet. Eat everything you want, yet lose and maintain weight permanently.


 



  • Full 1s Year - Day/One Intuitive and AI System Content Update.
  • Day/One Alliance - Social Networking Platform
  • Early Bird 5% discount for all users on platforms fist day!

  • Accelerate - APP (IOS and Android) functionalities.
  • Accelerate - Gadgets Integration (Smartwatches / Home Assistante Pods Alexa  / Google Home)

 

  •  Free Access to ALL American Students (1 year Day/One GO) 
  •  Accelerate translations an localizations for Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese and Russian. 

The main goal is to address people’s needs in the simplest way possible, delivering values ​​associated with motivation and establishing the path to a lighter, healthier and more active life. We know that things are not always a bed of roses, so we are ready to help people overcome their obstacles, even when considering everything that makes each person unique.

Our motto is to make you, the user, feel part of something, with the proper autonomy to use Day/One in a customized fashion! Users will make the platform even more effective based on our direct interaction with each person in the network.

All the details deemed important for building a good digital community have been raised and applied, based on a form of support that is conceived by people to help people.

Our intention is to humanize Day/One, have it drenched in human warmth, so that mutual help allows thousands of people to reach their goals!

If you have questions or if you happen to be interested in the project, we have a team ready to answer your questions and tell you more about our project. Just submit your question using the FAQ tab or send it to faq@era.us.com. We believe that you will be our supporter!

story:
A BIG THANK YOU TO AMC MORNING NEWS FOR SUPPORTING THIS PRODUCT.

What comes to mind when we think of Heating Pads? Thick fabrics? Clunky plastic? Roughness? Inconvenience?

Keep Away From Pills

Some women use heating pads for relief from menstrual cramps and lower back pain, but while effective, they are not easy to travel with. Pills, while more convenient, are slower to take effect, and for some who have gotten used to the medication, not as effective as they used to be. The discomfort these ladies have to go through monthly might almost seem inevitable, until now.

Introducing Nu-Care, the solution for ladies who suffer pain during their menstrual cycle. Our product is convenient, user-friendly, and allows you to keep moving.

 

Nu-Care for Menstrual

Nu-Care is a lightweight, soft, wearable, and comfortable heated wrap that provides instant relief from menstrual cycle pain anytime, anywhere. It is made with a specially developed fabric called Nu-Tex.

Nu-Tex

Our company uses precision technology to knit carbon fiber inside polyester. The carbon fiber allows it to be thinner, and more stretchable/breathable, while still durable enough to handle the heat.

 

Fabric

Nu-Tex fabric is knitted into two layers. Fine denier of polyester makes the outer layer smoother; on the inner layer, we use fine yarn cotton allows for soft, comfortable, hypoallergenic contact with the skin.

 

Style

Size

Nu-Care offers two styles, each available in four different sizes: S, M, L, and XL. Lady is our simple, plain black version, while Style Cutie has pink lace accents.

 

Battery pocket 

The battery pocket sits comfortably on the lower back, and provides power for up to four hours.

 

Power Adapter

When the power adapter is plugged into an outlet, Nu-Care can be used without a battery. The power adapter has a long wire, which allows you to use it comfortably at home, the office, or anywhere with an outlet.

 

Battery

Thin and high quality, the Nu-Care battery can be re-charged as many as 500 times during its lifetime.

Battery Specification:

Model No: HG-001

Capacity: 3.7V/4000mah       Cell Type: Polymer

Input: 5V/1A        Output: 12V/1A

Battery Size: 3 ½” X 2 ½” X ½” (9cm X 6.5cm X 1.2cm)

Battery Weight: 4.25oz. (120gm)

 

Power switch

Press “power on” to switch on the battery. The battery will not be automatically activated when power adapter is plugged in.

 

Dual zone heat level controller on wrap

The Nu-Care power switch was designed to be convenient, private, and intimate. Press and hold the switch for 3 seconds until the LED light is flashing with long vibration for the preheat phase. Depending on which level you choose – low, high, or medium heat – the pad will take as few as 5 minutes to be ready. Press the switch once to adjust the level.

Once ready, the light will turn red and the switch will vibrate 3 times on the high setting, the light will turn white and vibrate 2 times on the medium setting, or it will turn blue and vibrate one time on the lowest setting. When Nu-Care is turned off, the light goes off with a long vibration. The vibration feature allows the user to turn Nu-Care on or off discreetly, without having to check the light.

With a just a click on the dual zone heat level controller, the user can choose to warm up their abdomen, lower back, or both. The 30-min auto shut-off design prevents over-heating.

 

www.Nu-Care.Life

Nu-Care is dedicated to the creation of home care products that make everyday living better. We currently specialize in heated apparel, including hoodies, down jackets, and shirts. With the invention of Nu-Tex, we are taking our next step in using heated technology to improve the lives of women everywhere.

 

Nu-Care for Menstrual Use FAQ.

  • Q: How does it feel?
  • A: It’s just like using a heating pad, only more compressed, comfortable, and with the allowance for mobility.

 

  • Q: Can I use it out in public?
  • A: Yes. You can wear it anytime, and it is invisible underneath outdoor clothes.

 

  • Q: How long does it take for me to feel the effects?
  • A: It immediately brings relief once it starts heating.

 

  • Q: Would I still need to take pills with Nu-Care Product?
  • A: No, If Nu-Care provides the relief you need, then it shouldn’t be necessary. Keep away from pills.

 

  • Q: During which part of my period should I wear Nu-Care Product?
  • A: You can wear it at any time, even off your period. Especially if you have lower back pain, our product can bring you heated relief to your back separately.

 

  • Q: How does it work?
  • A: Nu-Care use the high technology "Nu-Tex" fabric. It knitted the carbon fiber heating wire ; it is stretching and breathable, into the fabric. So it heated up in the middle of the fabric. It can bring heat immediately to relief the pain.

 

  • Q: Is it relevant for every age?
  • A: Yes. Even women who have already experienced menopause may use it for back pain relief.

 

  • Q:My menstrual pains are really bad, can Nu-Care help me?
  • A: Yes. Heat is one of the most recommended ways to ease period pain.

 

  • Q: Are there any limitations to use Nu-Care?
  • A: No. You can use Nu-Care even if you have a pacemaker or heart rhythm problem. There is no radiation given off by Nu-Care.

    However, if you are pregnant, due to the pressure applied by the device, it is not advisable to use it then.

 

  • Q: Can I sit/ move/ exercise with this?
  • A: Yes, Wearing Nu-Care you still can do anything. It is just a fabric wrap.

 

  • Q: What does the Nu-Care package include?
  • A: Nu-Care package includes:

Basic package:

1 Nu-Care for menstrual girdle.

1 Battery.

1 Charging Wire

1 Carry Bag.

Premium package 

1 Nu-Care for menstrual girdle.

1 Battery.

1 Charging Wire

1 Carry Bag.

1 Adapter with long wire.

 

  • Q: How do I pick my Style?
  • A: Nu-Care has 2 styles for you to choice. You can pick any style you like with our Basic package or Premium package.

 

  • Q: Is it safe to use?
  • A: Yes, Nu-Care is completely safe to use. We strive to meet the most stringent International standards and are near completion with the FDA and CE-Mark approval process.

 

  • Q: Can it affect my fertility?
  • A: Absolutely not. The heat  process is external and doesn't intervene with your cycle, your hormonal balance or anything like that.

 

  • Q: Are there any side effects?
  • A: Nu-Care with no any side effects. It just a stretchy heated up device. 

 

  • Q: Will I need to change batteries?
  • A: No. Nu-Care operates on an external battery. The battery life is 500+ times recharged, and this can be done with any USB cable. Charges last for about 4 hours, and Nu-Care will automatically shut off every 30 minutes as a safety precaution.

 

  • Q: Do I need to buy any extras or anything?
  • A: No. The Nu-Care Basic package comes with everything you need. 

 

  • Q: What if my Nu-Care doesn't work properly?
  • A: We don't compromise on customer satisfaction, and despite working hard to make sure every detail of Nu-Care is up to scratch, we will be providing a 1-year warranty on all devices.

 

  • Q: How do keep the Nu-Care when I don't use it
  • Unplug the fully charged battery, then put it together with the wrap inside a drawer or bag, ready for your next usage.

A: No, If Nu-Care provides the relief you need, then it shouldn’t be necessary. Keep away from pills.
 
Q: During which part of my period should I wear Nu-Care Product?

A: You can wear it at any time, even off your period. Especially if you have lower back pain, our product can bring you heated relief to your back separately.
 
Q: How does it work?

A: Nu-Care use the high technology "Nu-Tex" fabric. It knitted the carbon fiber heating wire ; it is stretching and breathable, into the fabric. So it heated up in the middle of the fabric. It can bring heat immediately to relief the pain.
 
Q: Is it relevant for every age?

A: Yes. Even women who have already experienced menopause may use it for back pain relief.
 
Q:My menstrual pains are really bad, can Nu-Care help me?

A: Yes. Heat is one of the most recommended ways to ease period pain.
 
Q: Are there any limitations to use Nu-Care?

A: No. You can use Nu-Care even if you have a pacemaker or heart rhythm problem. There is no radiation given off by Nu-Care.However, if you are pregnant, due to the pressure applied by the device, it is not advisable to use it then.

 
Q: Can I sit/ move/ exercise with this?

A: Yes, Wearing Nu-Care you still can do anything. It is just a fabric wrap.
 
Q: What does the Nu-Care package include?

A: Nu-Care package includes:
Basic package:1 Nu-Care for menstrual girdle.1 Battery.1 Charging Wire1 Carry Bag.Premium package 1 Nu-Care for menstrual girdle.1 Battery.1 Charging Wire1 Carry Bag.1 Adapter with long wire. 
Q: How do I pick my Style?

A: Nu-Care has 2 styles for you to choice. You can pick any style you like with our Basic package or Premium package.
 
Q: Is it safe to use?

A: Yes, Nu-Care is completely safe to use. We strive to meet the most stringent International standards and are near completion with the FDA and CE-Mark approval process.
 
Q: Can it affect my fertility?

A: Absolutely not. The heat  process is external and doesn't intervene with your cycle, your hormonal balance or anything like that.
 
Q: Are there any side effects?

A: Nu-Care with no any side effects. It just a stretchy heated up device. 
 
Q: Will I need to change batteries?

A: No. Nu-Care operates on an external battery. The battery life is 500+ times recharged, and this can be done with any USB cable. Charges last for about 4 hours, and Nu-Care will automatically shut off every 30 minutes as a safety precaution.
 
Q: Do I need to buy any extras or anything?

A: No. The Nu-Care Basic package comes with everything you need. 
 
Q: What if my Nu-Care doesn't work properly?

A: We don't compromise on customer satisfaction, and despite working hard to make sure every detail of Nu-Care is up to scratch, we will be providing a 1-year warranty on all devices.
 
Q: How do keep the Nu-Care when I don't use it 
Unplug the fully charged battery, then put it together with the wrap inside a drawer or bag, ready for your next usage.

story:
Safety Visor - The protective visor for everyone

In order to protect us in these difficult times, regioHELP started to produce protective visors with 3D printing for its employees some time ago. We soon noticed that there was a great demand for such visors in our environment, too. We wanted to help and produced as many visors as we could, but limited by the long printing time we could not meet the demand.

Our vision was to make protective visors available to everyone, including those who did not own a 3D printer. Therefore "regioHELP" wants to produce protective visors in mass production as cheap as possible. Together with partners from the region, we have optimized the design for production using injection molding. 

Advantages of our protective visor:

  • A well-fitted face shield that protects against droplets
  • According to the Federal Labour Inspectorate (Austria), a well-fitted face shield is one way to protect against the impact of droplets.
  • Quick and easy to use
  • Easily stowed when not in use
  • Easy replacement of the visor with standard DINA4 foils

 

Safety Visor – Das Schutzvisier für jedermann/frau

Um uns in diesen schwierigen Zeiten zu schützen, begann regioHELP für seine Mitarbeiter/innen vor einiger Zeit Schutzvisiere mit 3D-Druck herzustellen. Schnell bemerkten wir, dass auch in unserem Umfeld große Nachfrage nach solchen Visieren herrschte. Wir wollten helfen und stellten so viele Visiere her, wie wir konnten, doch begrenzt durch die lange Druckdauer konnten wir die Nachfrage nicht decken.

Unsere Vision: Schutzvisiere sollten für alle zugänglich sein, auch jenen, die keinen 3D-Drucker besitzen. Deshalb möchte „regioHELP“ Schutzvisiere in Massenproduktion so günstig wie möglich herstellen. Gemeinsam mit Partnern aus der Region haben wir das Design für die Produktion mittels Spritzgussverfahren optimiert. 

    Vorteile unseres Schutzvisiers:

    • Ein gut angepasster Gesichtsschutz, der vor Tröpfchen schützt
      Entsprechend der Arbeitsinspektion des Bundes ist ein gut angepasster Gesichtsschutz eine Möglichkeit, sich vor dem Auftreffen von Tröpfchen zu schützen.
    • Schnell und einfach im Einsatz
    • ​Bei Nichtgebrauch leicht verstaut
    • Leichter Austausch des Visiers durch handelsübliche DINA4-Klarsichtfolien

     

     

    What do we need from you? <-> What do you get from us?

    We're going through difficult times. Everyone's worried about their families and themselves. It's about health, work, money, the existence of each one of us.

    Many companies, organisations and other bodies are not only trying to take care of their own tasks, they are now also trying with full commitment to support those activities which support society in these difficult times. In this way, we also want to use our know-how for the protection of the general public.

    Every person who is out in the field today should be protected! At the cash desk, in the service, in the care, at the counter, in the hospital, in the administration. All those who are constantly in contact with many people - belong protected.

    regioHELP wants to help. The injection mould has already been purchased and we will start production at the end of April. With your orders you can help our young company to cover the costs of mass production with us and thus help the public in this difficult time and offer protection with the visors.

    Our goal is to reach many people, so that all people can use protective visors.

    The production takes place in production lines in Austria, in the Braunau region. We will gladly provide the names of the producing companies on request. The production of Safety Visors enables the companies concerned to (re)work to capacity. This ensures the creation or safeguarding of jobs or the possibility of the early return of employees from short-time work.

    Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

     

     

    Was brauchen wir von euch? <-> Was bekommt ihr von uns?

    Wir erleben gerade schwierige Zeiten. Jeder sorgt sich um seine Angehörigen und sich selbst. Es geht um die Gesundheit, die Arbeit, das Geld, um die Existenz von jedem einzelnen von uns.

    Viele Unternehmen, Organisationen und andere Stellen bemühen sich nicht nur um die eigenen Aufgaben, sie versuchen nun auch mit vollem Einsatz, jene Tätigkeiten zu unterstützen, welche die Gesellschaft in diesen schwierigen Zeiten stützen. So wollen auch wir unser Know-How für den Schutz der Allgemeinheit einsetzen.

    Jede Person die heute draußen im Einsatz ist, gehört geschützt! An der Kassa, in der Bedienung, in der Pflege, an der Theke, im Krankenhaus, in der Verwaltung. All jene, welche ständig im Kontakt mit vielen Menschen sind – gehören geschützt.

    regioHELP will helfen. Die Spritzgussform ist bereits angeschafft, mit Ende April gehen wir in die Produktion. Mit euren Bestellungen könnt ihr unserer jungen Firma helfen, die Kosten für die Massenherstellung mit uns zu stemmen und so der Allgemeinheit in dieser schweren Zeit beizustehen und mit den Visieren Schutz zu bieten.

    Unser Ziel ist es, viele Menschen zu erreichen, damit alle Menschen Schutzvisiere verwenden können.

    Die Produktion erfolgt in Produktionslinien in Österreich, in der Region Braunau. Namen der produzierenden Firmen geben wir gerne auf Anfrage bekannt. Durch die Produktion der Safety Visors wird eine (Wieder-)Auslastung der betreffenden Unternehmen ermöglicht. Dies sorgt für eine Schaffung bzw. Sicherstellung von Jobs bzw. die Möglichkeit der vorzeitigen Rückkehr von MitarbeiterInnen aus der Kurzarbeit.

     

     

    What does regioHELP stand for?

    regioHELP is a cooperative founded in 2018 whose main concern is to strengthen the rural region. Our projects range from the expansion of glass fibre to the creation of affordable living space.

    Short Facts

    • Team: regioHELP, a cooperative with limited liability
    • Production: Austrian companies in the Braunau region

     

     

    Wofür steht regioHELP?

    regioHELP ist eine im Jahre 2018 gegründete Genossenschaft, deren größtes Anliegen es ist, die ländliche Region zu stärken. Unsere Projekte reichen dabei von einem flächendeckenden Glasfaserausbau bis zur Schaffung von leistbarem Wohnraum.

    Short Facts

    • Team: regioHELP, eine Genossenschaft mit beschränkter Haftung
    • Produktion: österreichische Unternehmen in der Region Braunau

     

     

    What else you can do to help us

    Even if you are already equipped with a protective visor, allow us to tell many people about our idea. Tell others about our idea! Share our vision with your environment in the real world and also online!

     

     

    Wie du uns sonst noch helfen kannst

    Auch wenn du bereits mit einem Schutzvisier ausgestattet bist, ermögliche uns, vielen Menschen von unserer Idee zu erzählen. Erzähl unsere Idee weiter! Teile unsere Vision mit deinem Umfeld in der realen Welt und auch online!

story:
"Love thy neighbor as thyself"

                                                                        - The New Testament

 

"Encourage thy neighbor to wear a mask, to protect thySELF"

                                                                - "The COVID-19 Testament"

don:

/dän/

transitive verb: to put on (as for eyeglasses, earrings, and clothing)

 

My name is Dr. Salvatore DeRicco, and I’m here to ask that you join this “just DON it!” campaign, by ordering motivational, protective masks, wearing them, and telling your loved ones and friends about them, in an effort to prevent COVID-19 from infecting you and your loved ones, given its ability to potentially cause:

  • serious illness

  • long-term symptoms

  • organ damage

  • and, of course, and tragically, fatalities

We have all learned a LOT during this horrific pandemic, and some of the most critical things we’ve learned are that:

  • you can still get infected, even if vaccinated

  • you can still transmit COVID-19, even if vaccinated

  • my mask protects you, more than it protects me! 

As such, encouraging mask wear amongst our neighbors – in the CDC-recommended situations - with a motivational slogan, the likes of "just DON it!", is beneficial, for our OWN protection!”  And, while more and more COVID-19 studies are released and insights gained, each and every day, it seems as though there’s likely a LOT more that we DON’T know, yet, as compared to what we DO know!

I am an orthodontist, and an inventor, and, as is true for all dentists, dental patients are one of the few groups of people who are unable to wear masks, thereby putting us amongst the most obvious and susceptible targets, for COVID-19 exposure, and mandating the dental profession’s need for high-level PPE.  This consideration inspired me to enter the PPE arena, since it’s directly related to oral care.  Perhaps you’ve seen my WUNDERBRUSH for GUMS Indiegogo campaign, which was also inspired by COVID-19 – it’s the only brush engineered specifically for gums – to help the more than 200 million Americans with gingivitis or periodontitis, and it was launched in response to the report that COVID-19 is nine times more fatal, in individuals with gum disease.  Here's the link:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-wunderbrush-for-gums-ideal-care-for-gums

As more and more of America re-opens, in the face of COVID-19 and its variants, masks remain one of the few protections we have available to us, in an effort to prevent COVID-19 transmission and infection; I sincerely hope that prevention will prevail over further infection, in an effort to return to normalcy! 

Please support this campaign and let’s ALL “just DON it!”, and finally commit COVID-19 to being history. 

Thank you!

 

*Available in both ADULT and CHILD sizes*

 

PERK OPTIONS:

story:
What's Hangover Killer?

Know that feeling when you wake up after a night of heavy drinking? Headaches, drowsiness, nausea, in a word the general misery that could persist for a day? 

Hangover Killer uses spring water from the Alps, the same water used to make infant formula. Hangover Killer is 100% natural and only has herb based ingredients, made with the best water on earth. We refuse to use caffeine, taurine, chemical preservatives & stabilizers, artificial sweeteners & colors. We have many independent studies done by US and EU labs proving its effectiveness. Hangover Killer is entirely confirmed and compliant with FDA regulations and is completely ready for the US market.

What’s Inside?

Natural Spring Water -natural spring water from the Austrian Alps contains beneficial levels of calcium and magnesium, and very low levels of nitrates, nitrites, and sodium. Due to its high quality and purity, it is recommended by doctors for childhood nutrition programs, as well as for people with heart and kidney diseases.

Elderberry (Sambucus Nigra) - also known as European elder, a tall tree-like shrub native to Europe, Asia, and North Africa, and naturalized in the United States. The plant has been called "the medicine chest of country people" since Elderberry is well-known in traditional medicine.

β-Glucan (extract of Oyster Mushrooms) - β-Glucan, also known as beta-glucan, are polysaccharides found in baker's yeast, certain types of fungi, and certain mushrooms. β-Glucan activates the body's natural defense mechanism and strengthens the body's natural immune response.

Lemon Grass (Cymbopogon Citratus) - Cymbopogon Citratus is also known as lemon grass, an aromatic perennial grass native to India. Lemon grass oil contains numerous therapeutic properties that benefit the nervous system.

L-Ascorbic Acid - L-Ascorbic Acid, an antioxidant, is required for the growth and repair of tissues and helps eliminate destructive free radicals. It is an essential component of healthy enzyme reactions, strengthens blood vessel walls, helps absorb iron, and strengthens the body's immune system.

Vitamin B1 - helps convert blood sugar into energy, helps keep mucus membranes healthy and is essential for the normal functioning of the nervous system, as well as cardiovascular and muscular systems.

Vitamin B6 - essential for the metabolism of amino acids and fatty acids, for normal nerve function, and helps maintain healthy skin. Both Vitamins B1 and B6 are important components of a co-enzyme used in energy metabolism.

Vitamin B3 - required for the metabolism of carbohydrates, fats, and proteins.

Our Story

Hangover Killer was invented in 2003 by Ivan Ducko, a Slovakian inventor, who also launched a series of healthy beverages. His products, Alcohol Killer in particular, are wildly popular in Europe and are all made in Austria. Do you know that Ivan Ducko chose a manufacturing facility that sits directly above a water spring on the foot of the Austrian Alps, because of the unique ratio of minerals in the water? That's right. It's the same water they use to produce infant formula!

In 2007, Ihor and Roman Koval, a father and son duo from Cleveland, OH bought the sole distribution right of Alcohol Killer in the U.S. They became partners with Ivan Ducko and worked with him to test the consumer market in the US by gathering feedback on taste, marketing and effectiveness. After taking the product to numerous trade shows around the US, the response was overwhelming. We first featured Alcohol Killer at the Chicago National Restaurant Association Show in both 2007 & 2008. We also presented Alcohol Killer at the Atlanta National Convenient Store Show in 2007, the Cleveland Fabulous Food Show in 2008, and the Night Club & Bar Show in Las Vegas in 2008. In the Las Vegas trade show alone, 6,000 cans of Alcohol Killer were snatched immediately.

After two years of intense market research, surveys and focus groups, the US consumers responded very well to the beverage itself but the name Alcohol Killer proved to be somewhat confusing. "Why would I want to kill my buzz?", people asked. Well, it doesn't kill your buzz. It's the terrible lingering effects of a hangover that it kills. Ihor and Roman realized the problem and spent the next few years rebranding the beverage as Hangover Killer. (US only)

During the development of Hangover Killer, countless hours and effort has been put behind POS materials, product sales, and marketing. Our devotion and hard work is proof of our firm belief in this product. We cannot be more excited to finally bring this product to you!

How does it work?

For the curious minded, here is the explanation behind the effectiveness of Hangover Killer. When you consume alcohol, the majority of it is metabolized in the liver by specific enzymes. In this process, multiple harmful byproducts are created in your body, with acetate being one of the most harmful. Acetate is later converted by the body into H20 (water) and CO2 (carbon dioxide), but the short stay of this substance in your body during the process causes major harm to your liver and other organs.

If you don't remember what your high school biology teacher taught you, we’ll help refresh your memory about alcohol metabolism: After you shoot that shot of tequila, the alcohol goes into your stomach and eventually makes its way into your bloodstream, carrying alcohol to nearly every organ in your body. While it feels great to have that buzz, the buildup of alcohol can hurt your cells and organs. Being the impressive piece of machinery that our body is, it initiates several processes to reduce the harmful effects of the consumed alcohol. One of those processes is called oxidation. Simply put, oxidation detoxifies and removes alcohol from accumulating in your body, preventing further harm.

Before all the alcohol has been metabolized, it will affect the brain and other tissues of your body, and acetate is one of those bad byproducts of alcohol. Acetate increases adenosine in many tissues, including the brain. In simple English, acetate agitates your nerve cells that cause pain, resulting in those headaches. Alcohol also does a wonderful job at dehydrating your body and its organs. This too contributes to the nasty pains and nausea associated with hangovers

And that is where Hangover Killer comes in. This specially engineered beverage contains ingredients that shorten the existence of acetate, therefore speeding up the natural detoxification and recovery process. Hangover Killer also hydrates your body with the best water on earth, shortening that rehydrating process no pill or powder remedy can. Our independent studies indicate that Hangover Killer lowers your BAC on an average of 40% quicker!

Hangover BAC Challenge Videos

Our Team

IVAN DUCKO - Inventor of Hangover Killer and the line of beverages. Ivan has a degree in International Business and Marketing and has always had a passion for developing “green” and natural products that are sustainable in our daily lives. Despite being advised not to enter the beverage industry, Ivan’s passion for his dream drove him to develop a completely new category in the beverage market, the “functional beverage.”

IHOR KOVAL - Sole distributor of Hangover Killer in the U.S. market. Ihor immigrated to the US in 1993 from Ukraine with his family. He has always had a passion for startup businesses with his entrepreneurial spirit and intense optimism. Having extensive background in product development and international business, Ihor has believed in Hangover Killer’s potential since day one. Bringing Hangover Killer to you has been his lifelong dream. Ihor believes that the race is not always won by the fastest runner, but by those who just keep running.

ROMAN KOVAL - Son of Ihor Koval and Head of Product Development in Eastern US. He joined the Hangover Killer Team in 2010 and has since played a big role in the rebranding of this product, ranging from label production to POS design to promotion. Roman has an International Business degree from Baldwin Wallace University. Roman can speak 3 languages and likes to spend his free time attempting to cook.

ADRIAN ZAW - Head of Marketing and Product Development in Western US. Based in Los Angeles, Adrian's journey with Hangover Killer began as a College Brand Manager for Alcohol Killer at the University of Southern California. He later went on to produce viral commercial campaigns with the Company. In 2012, Adrian founded ZAW Inc., a multimedia production company specializing in marketing, branding, photography and film production.

Why Indiegogo?

See, we are not a multi-million dollar soft drink company. We are just a couple guys from the Midwest with a great product. We could have sold this Hangover Killer to a big company, but who knows what the corporate guys are going to do with this product? For all we know they could slap on a fancy label, cut some corners and add tons of sugar to make more money. That's all they care about, right? Not us.

We want to keep the product as pure, authentic, and high quality as possible. That's why we are doing this ourselves, mom-and-pop's way. We want to use Indiegogo to introduce this product to American consumers in its intended form without compromise, because that’s what you deserve, the best. This is why we need your help; to help us on our last leg of this amazing project. Seriously, we know you’ll love this product.

Are you on board? Great! See the different reward levels on the right.

Where does the money go?

We are dedicated to spending what we receive wisely and transparently. If we achieved the $120,000 goal, 83% of the money will cover the cost of manufacturing Hangover Killer; 7% will go to the cost of transporting the product from Austria to Cleveland. 6% will go towards 12 months of storage warehousing; and the last 4% will go to managing and marketing promotions.

Our Mission Statement

Motto

Hangover Killer For Your Killer Hangover

Mission Statement

To provide healthy, quality products to consumers that fulfills their wants and needs at the right price. Growing through superior customer service, innovation, quality, and commitment to excellence by paving the way to a new and better lifestyle. 

Perks

$1 or more...

$5 or more...

$20 or more...

$35 or more...

$50 or more...

$100 or more...

$1000 or more...
story_txt:
What's Hangover Killer?Know that feeling when you wake up after a night of heavy drinking? Headaches, drowsiness, nausea, in a word the general misery that could persist for a day? 
Hangover Killer is a lightly carbonated, refreshing beverage with a citrus taste specifically designed to lower your BAC an average of 40% quicker and prevent that nasty hangover from the get-go.

Hangover Killer uses spring water from the Alps, the same water used to make infant formula. Hangover Killer is 100% natural and only has herb based ingredients, made with the best water on earth. We refuse to use caffeine, taurine, chemical preservatives & stabilizers, artificial sweeteners & colors. We have many independent studies done by US and EU labs proving its effectiveness. Hangover Killer is entirely confirmed and compliant with FDA regulations and is completely ready for the US market.





What’s Inside?





Natural Spring Water -natural spring water from the Austrian Alps contains beneficial levels of calcium and magnesium, and very low levels of nitrates, nitrites, and sodium. Due to its high quality and purity, it is recommended by doctors for childhood nutrition programs, as well as for people with heart and kidney diseases.



Elderberry (Sambucus Nigra) - also known as European elder, a tall tree-like shrub native to Europe, Asia, and North Africa, and naturalized in the United States. The plant has been called "the medicine chest of country people" since Elderberry is well-known in traditional medicine.



β-Glucan (extract of Oyster Mushrooms) - β-Glucan, also known as beta-glucan, are polysaccharides found in baker's yeast, certain types of fungi, and certain mushrooms. β-Glucan activates the body's natural defense mechanism and strengthens the body's natural immune response.





Lemon Grass (Cymbopogon Citratus) - Cymbopogon Citratus is also known as lemon grass, an aromatic perennial grass native to India. Lemon grass oil contains numerous therapeutic properties that benefit the nervous system.



L-Ascorbic Acid - L-Ascorbic Acid, an antioxidant, is required for the growth and repair of tissues and helps eliminate destructive free radicals. It is an essential component of healthy enzyme reactions, strengthens blood vessel walls, helps absorb iron, and strengthens the body's immune system.



Vitamin B1 - helps convert blood sugar into energy, helps keep mucus membranes healthy and is essential for the normal functioning of the nervous system, as well as cardiovascular and muscular systems.
Vitamin B6 - essential for the metabolism of amino acids and fatty acids, for normal nerve function, and helps maintain healthy skin. Both Vitamins B1 and B6 are important components of a co-enzyme used in energy metabolism.
Vitamin B3 - required for the metabolism of carbohydrates, fats, and proteins.


Our Story


Hangover Killer was invented in 2003 by Ivan Ducko, a Slovakian inventor, who also launched a series of healthy beverages. His products, Alcohol Killer in particular, are wildly popular in Europe and are all made in Austria. Do you know that Ivan Ducko chose a manufacturing facility that sits directly above a water spring on the foot of the Austrian Alps, because of the unique ratio of minerals in the water? That's right. It's the same water they use to produce infant formula!



In 2007, Ihor and Roman Koval, a father and son duo from Cleveland, OH bought the sole distribution right of Alcohol Killer in the U.S. They became partners with Ivan Ducko and worked with him to test the consumer market in the US by gathering feedback on taste, marketing and effectiveness. After taking the product to numerous trade shows around the US, the response was overwhelming. We first featured Alcohol Killer at the Chicago National Restaurant Association Show in both 2007 & 2008. We also presented Alcohol Killer at the Atlanta National Convenient Store Show in 2007, the Cleveland Fabulous Food Show in 2008, and the Night Club & Bar Show in Las Vegas in 2008. In the Las Vegas trade show alone, 6,000 cans of Alcohol Killer were snatched immediately.



After two years of intense market research, surveys and focus groups, the US consumers responded very well to the beverage itself but the name Alcohol Killer proved to be somewhat confusing. "Why would I want to kill my buzz?", people asked. Well, it doesn't kill your buzz. It's the terrible lingering effects of a hangover that it kills. Ihor and Roman realized the problem and spent the next few years rebranding the beverage as Hangover Killer. (US only)



During the development of Hangover Killer, countless hours and effort has been put behind POS materials, product sales, and marketing. Our devotion and hard work is proof of our firm belief in this product. We cannot be more excited to finally bring this product to you!



How does it work?




For the curious minded, here is the explanation behind the effectiveness of Hangover Killer. When you consume alcohol, the majority of it is metabolized in the liver by specific enzymes. In this process, multiple harmful byproducts are created in your body, with acetate being one of the most harmful. Acetate is later converted by the body into H20 (water) and CO2 (carbon dioxide), but the short stay of this substance in your body during the process causes major harm to your liver and other organs.
If you don't remember what your high school biology teacher taught you, we’ll help refresh your memory about alcohol metabolism: After you shoot that shot of tequila, the alcohol goes into your stomach and eventually makes its way into your bloodstream, carrying alcohol to nearly every organ in your body. While it feels great to have that buzz, the buildup of alcohol can hurt your cells and organs. Being the impressive piece of machinery that our body is, it initiates several processes to reduce the harmful effects of the consumed alcohol. One of those processes is called oxidation. Simply put, oxidation detoxifies and removes alcohol from accumulating in your body, preventing further harm.
Before all the alcohol has been metabolized, it will affect the brain and other tissues of your body, and acetate is one of those bad byproducts of alcohol. Acetate increases adenosine in many tissues, including the brain. In simple English, acetate agitates your nerve cells that cause pain, resulting in those headaches. Alcohol also does a wonderful job at dehydrating your body and its organs. This too contributes to the nasty pains and nausea associated with hangovers
And that is where Hangover Killer comes in. This specially engineered beverage contains ingredients that shorten the existence of acetate, therefore speeding up the natural detoxification and recovery process. Hangover Killer also hydrates your body with the best water on earth, shortening that rehydrating process no pill or powder remedy can. Our independent studies indicate that Hangover Killer lowers your BAC on an average of 40% quicker!
Hangover BAC Challenge Videos







Our Team



IVAN DUCKO - Inventor of Hangover Killer and the line of beverages. Ivan has a degree in International Business and Marketing and has always had a passion for developing “green” and natural products that are sustainable in our daily lives. Despite being advised not to enter the beverage industry, Ivan’s passion for his dream drove him to develop a completely new category in the beverage market, the “functional beverage.”



IHOR KOVAL - Sole distributor of Hangover Killer in the U.S. market. Ihor immigrated to the US in 1993 from Ukraine with his family. He has always had a passion for startup businesses with his entrepreneurial spirit and intense optimism. Having extensive background in product development and international business, Ihor has believed in Hangover Killer’s potential since day one. Bringing Hangover Killer to you has been his lifelong dream. Ihor believes that the race is not always won by the fastest runner, but by those who just keep running.



ROMAN KOVAL - Son of Ihor Koval and Head of Product Development in Eastern US. He joined the Hangover Killer Team in 2010 and has since played a big role in the rebranding of this product, ranging from label production to POS design to promotion. Roman has an International Business degree from Baldwin Wallace University. Roman can speak 3 languages and likes to spend his free time attempting to cook.



ADRIAN ZAW - Head of Marketing and Product Development in Western US. Based in Los Angeles, Adrian's journey with Hangover Killer began as a College Brand Manager for Alcohol Killer at the University of Southern California. He later went on to produce viral commercial campaigns with the Company. In 2012, Adrian founded ZAW Inc., a multimedia production company specializing in marketing, branding, photography and film production.
Why Indiegogo?




See, we are not a multi-million dollar soft drink company. We are just a couple guys from the Midwest with a great product. We could have sold this Hangover Killer to a big company, but who knows what the corporate guys are going to do with this product? For all we know they could slap on a fancy label, cut some corners and add tons of sugar to make more money. That's all they care about, right? Not us.
We want to keep the product as pure, authentic, and high quality as possible. That's why we are doing this ourselves, mom-and-pop's way. We want to use Indiegogo to introduce this product to American consumers in its intended form without compromise, because that’s what you deserve, the best. This is why we need your help; to help us on our last leg of this amazing project. Seriously, we know you’ll love this product.
Are you on board? Great! See the different reward levels on the right.


Where does the money go?


We are dedicated to spending what we receive wisely and transparently. If we achieved the $120,000 goal, 83% of the money will cover the cost of manufacturing Hangover Killer; 7% will go to the cost of transporting the product from Austria to Cleveland. 6% will go towards 12 months of storage warehousing; and the last 4% will go to managing and marketing promotions.







Our Mission Statement
Motto

Mission Statement

story:
Purpose :

Would you like "Whatsapp" will work as:

  • Wikipedia,
  • As a dictionary,
  • Recipes book,
  • to get latest online coupons,
  • get sport news,
  • to get Latest news,
  • to know your PNR status (India Only)
  • as well as do Translation,
  • You can maintain your todo list.
  • Find restaurants, hotels, nearby activities of a city
  • last but not the least as calculator.

So I created a prototype, named it as I@assist. This I feel, is a useful application for every Student, . The best part of this app is nothing to install on your mobile phone. You can use this directly from your Whatsapp. To use this app you need to add one number "9591402200" in your contact list and you are ready to go.

Send “Hi” or “Hello” or “Help” on WhatsApp to above Mobile number and you will get a automated response. Containing commands to use this application.

How it works

Services :

  • Use as Wikipedia

                   wiki <keyword> : By using this you can use wiki any place, any personality, any term etc…

e.g wiki Tajmahal

  • Use as Dictionary

                 dict <keyword> : By using this you can use Whatsapp as dictionary.

                 e.g dict Permeable

  • Use as Personal Translator

                Tran <Google Language code e.g fr for french, hi for Hindi, pa for Punjabi etc..> <Message to translate in English> : Here you can use Whatsapp as personal Translator.

e.g tran fr Hello, how are you

  • Use as Calculator

                Calc <numeric Expression> : Here you can use it as personal calculator.

e.g calc 2*3+6-8.8

  • Use as Todo list

                Todo  <list to add> : Add list of tasks to your to todo items

e.g todo take grocery from nearby store

& to Retrieve Todo list just

Send “Todo” to get list of items in your todo list

  A lot of other features are there like recipe Search, Sports news, Latest News , Offers, Coupons etc... 

Future Plan :

I am planning to use this service as a personal assistant who guide us time to time e.g

When anybody at some tourist place alone just take a picture of that place and Send that picture to Whatsapp, it auto recognise that picture and send details to you about it.

Secondly Order the meal before you reach to any restaurant. So when you reach your soup is ready. Save time and queue.

Thirdly, planning to push awesome images to Pinterest, Instagram from WhatsApp only.

Last but not lease , in case you need any service like Plumbing, Baby Sitter,  Carpenter, then you just use WhatsApp to get nearby available service provider.

All this on Your tips.

Fundraising Goal:

My goal is to raise $4500.00. So I can hire team on Upwork and complete this task efficiently. I am maintaining  server expenses by my own. I also have limited funds in my hand.Your contribution would make it possible for me to do the application immediately so I can bring these features to the application as soon as possible.

Imagine for a moment, a world where all young people instead of chatting and sharing images, videos, will also use this application for enriching their knowledge using wikipedia, increase their vocabulary along with use services on their tips.

How your money will be spent:

  1. This project will need at least 150 hrs of work. And a good python programmer will cost me $20/Hr on upwork.com.
  2. $1000 is used to get licences of various APIs. 
  3. $500 I am planning to use for building a site and do proper SEO of same.
My Commitment:
I will try my best to keep you updated on the progress of the application and be transparent on accounting background.

My Background:

I Prabhjit Singh, IT professional with 12+ years of sound experience in E­commerce Domain, Building Marketplaces, Cloud Computing and CRM Application. One of the Top rated Freelancer in world best Freelancing website. Well versed of designing and developing web applications for variety of domains. Strong hand in API based applications. With lot of contribution of free tools / plugins to the world used by million of users.

A qualified MCA (Masters in Computer Application) from U.P Technical University worked will CMM level 4 Companies. 

My detailed profile at: https://www.linkedin.com/in/singhprabhjit

Thank you so much for your support and patronage!

Sincerely,

Singh

story:
Short Summary

I am 21 years old, currently creating a company on devices for biomedical engineering, I am a medical student of 4th year at Catholic University Redemptoris Mater, I am fond of electronic and electrical engineering since the age of 13 and since I was 8 years had the hobby of disarming objects and try to modify them, then create prototypes on photoelectric cells for the home, lava lamps, alarm systems, and among others, at 16 I went military for 1 year to study at the military academy, I am currently a member of IEEE SIGHT, which I have developed some projects with the student branches, this is one of the projects that I intend to elaborate which is the most impact it has had, which I am competing in national and international innovation competences in UNESCO, an idea to change the world, EO GSEA all of the year 2017.
Always my passion is to create objects or products for humanitarian aid and I am sure that a future I will do many more, when I finish studying medicine if life allows desire to study biomedical engineering.

People with visual disabilities and amnesic disorders do not have a long-range search method which allows this bracelet to access to place, to find object effectively as long as they are labeled and in the range of 20 meters, in addition to health opportunely.
It will also be useful for people who have these diseases and need to look for their lost objects, besides that when natural disasters happen and you do not have the luminous visibility, you can go to a safe place that is labeled and can survive or find the nearest exit

If you contribute to fundraising you will help create this technological and innovative revolution of object search in a fast, accessible, and entertaining way with great benefits to humanity, then your name will be marked as a contributor to this noble cause for the sake of people who have these diseases

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

We need around 200,000 dollars to create the first prototype, mass production of at least 1000 functional copies, distribute it to organizations with disabilities and do the different studies.

The majority of the world's people with visual sensory impairment and some social disturbances, allow them to become independent and obtain this low-cost, easy-to-use, multifunctional, high durability product. can create the next step of another bracelet to cover other pathologies that need primary care and attention to a damage that can use one without need of another person, thus allowing not only the person who uses it is satisfied but also the relatives because will fulfill, obtain and return lost functions thanks to this new solution.

Users will be:

Children, adolescents, and adults who lack the sensory and psychosocial functions or amnestic disorders mentioned above and healthy children, adolescents, and adults who need an independent method of placement and control of children's health.

Beneficiaries and users according to order of priority
 People with visual impairments:
 Blind people

 People with low vision: Mild or moderate or severe

 People with amnestic disorders

 People without visual diseases

However, the objectives in time according to the applicability of the bracelet are:

However, the objectives in time according to the applicability of the bracelet are:
• Short Term: For use in homes, for indoor use.

• Medium Term: For use in public places, for interiors (schools, shopping centers, hospitals, etc.)

• Long Term: For use on public roads, parks, platforms, pedestrian bridges, etc. (outside), this will require government support, NGOs, etc.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges are to finish the first prototype properly by the necessary instruments, which we must have nano electronic assemblers, which with the help of the funds will be possible to obtain them or export the model for nano construction in countries such as CHINA, Taiwan , Japan, Vietnam and later the packaging in the existing 3D model.
We have a great team of qualified work, composed of students and professionals
4 students of electronic engineering
2 tutors electronic and robotic engineers
2 students of art and digital design
2 computer engineering students
2 systems and programming engineers
1 marketing and advertising student
1 economist and lawyer
And the support of the Universidad Católica Redemptoris Mater of Nicaragua UNICA for the responsible management of the funds and the collaboration of the Foundation of Associations of people with disabilities and the association of blind people Maricela Toledo of Nicaragua for the subsequent use, pilot test and donations.

Currently IEEE SIGHT Nicaragua and worldwide is assessing the technical basis of the same, giving as a response a yes for the pro and development of humanity according to technology.

Currently the project is competing as the best 2017 UNESCO project, and in other international competitions as an idea to change the 2017 world of history channel, EO GSEA 2018 contest, and competitions of innovation in Nicaragua

story:
Short Summary

We are Kevin McComb and Devansh Tandon, fitness enthusiasts and students at the Singapore American School, and we are Krónos Nutrition! Krónos Nutrition will be a business that aims at providing low cost yet good quality products (like our showcase pre-workout supplement, Zeus) to individuals that need that extra performance boost. Our biggest competitors are notorious for overpricing and under dosing when it comes to their workout supplements. Our goal is to appeal to mainly college age athletes looking to get the effects of pre-workout at a more affordable price and at a time in their life when their budget is slim. Our design is simple and sleek, focusing around a logo that resembles power and explosive energy.

What We Need & What You Get

Kronos Nutrition is not another company with the same goal in the fitness industry. Kronos Nutrition is in the fitness industry to revolutionize the fitness industry and raise the overall standards of the consumer when it comes to price and quality. We are offering an opportunity for investors to place their faith in a product that has shown incredible potential with those who have come into contact with our products, and are asking for the capital required to expand our company to the point where our profit margins will allow us to exemplify the versatility available to companies in this industry. There are three reasons why our product is going to be a success, and these three reasons are more than enough to get the interest of the consumer - we are confident that it will be enough to draw them to switch from their current supplements to ours. Firstly, we offer our product at a significantly lower price point than the majority of the other brands in this market, allowing us to reach a demographic that may be struggling financially. Secondly, we are combining two highly sought after supplements (creatine and pre workout) into a single product, making it easy for the consumer to get their necessary supplementation at an extremely reasonable price point. Lastly, Zeus has eradicated the danger of a potential caffeine overdose by eliminating caffeine from the ingredient list and replacing it with Taurine - a much healthier alternative. Depending on the size of your contribution we will be able to send to you an item from our inventory of brand apparel as well as a container of our signature pre workout Zeus. Contributions of any size are a great help, and we are focusing on making the rewards just as great!

What exactly is in Zeus? The ingredient list is shown below:

Beta Alanine (2 grams per serving)= Beta-alanine is the building block of carnosine, a molecule that helps buffer acid in muscles, increasing physical performance in the 60–240-second range.

Citrulline Malate (6 grams per serving)= L-Citrulline supplementation results in reduced fatigue and improved endurance for both aerobic and anaerobic prolonged exercise.

Creatine Monohydrate (5 grams per serving)= Creatine is a molecule in an energy system (creatine phosphate) that can rapidly produce energy (ATP) to support cellular function. Thus its performance-enhancing and neuroprotective properties.

Taurine (1 gram per serving)= Taurine acts as both a cell protecting agent by modulating the cell membranes fluidity and health, as well as exerting anti-oxidant like effects. Taurine significantly reduces oxidative stress on cardiac muscle tissue in the presence of oxidative stress and can protect against damage from ischaemia-reperfusion injury in cardiac tissue.

L-Tyrosine (1 gram per serving)= L-Tyrosine is an amino acid that is used to produce noradrenaline and dopamine; supplemental appears to be anti-stress for acute stressors (which tend to deplete noradrenaline) and may preserve stress-induced memory deficits.

 

 

The Impact

By contributing to the growth of Krónos Nutrition, you will be helping to prove to the fitness industry that there is no need for these big brands to be overpricing their products without having the quality to match. We have spent months developing our idea and planning out our production costs and marketing techniques, and even at the low price that we will be offering our product at we will still be making good profit margins. We are here because we believe in our product and because we hope that others believe in it too. In order to break out of the fitness trap that is overpriced and ineffective supplements, we want to show the consumer that there are other healthier, cheaper, and more effective alternatives. By contributing to this campaign, you are joining the movement towards a better fitness experience for all.

Risks & Challenges

If the customer chooses to substitute our product for a similar one, there is not a lot stopping them. The same goes the other way around. In a market like this one, what keeps the customers coming to you is the strength of your brand. From the feedback we have gotten on Kronos Nutrition we have found that we are very popular amongst our audience and the people who have interacted with our company. Our product also comes in at such a low price and with such a range of beneficial ingredients that the customer would be giving up a large amount of money to switch between products.

Our competitors have a large presence both in stores and online, making our strategy key. While our competitors run a very mechanical and impersonal business, we will be interacting with our audience. Big supplement companies  who already have their brands at a level of high customer recognition and are doing sales at an increasing rate on an international basis are what we need to look out for. Our strategy should be to keep our sales on a domestic basis until we have enough capital to take it outside of the country, because when these companies hear about Kronos Nutrition and what we offer to the consumer it would be difficult to stop them from replicating our service and product and crowding us out of the market. While we are growing and trying to increase our cash inflow, it is important that we remain humble and conservative with our marketing strategies and stay in our domestic market until we are confident we can grow at a rate that will be immune to these companies trying to replicate our product.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't feel comfortable making a financial contribution to our campaign but you are interested in the idea, check out our social media pages on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram, all under the name Krónos Nutrition! Following our pages and spreading the word to anyone you think might be interested in our company will be a huge help on its own.
story_txt:
Short Summary
We are Kevin McComb and Devansh Tandon, fitness enthusiasts and students at the Singapore American School, and we are Krónos Nutrition! Krónos Nutrition will be a business that aims at providing low cost yet good quality products (like our showcase pre-workout supplement, Zeus) to individuals that need that extra performance boost. Our biggest competitors are notorious for overpricing and under dosing when it comes to their workout supplements. Our goal is to appeal to mainly college age athletes looking to get the effects of pre-workout at a more affordable price and at a time in their life when their budget is slim. Our design is simple and sleek, focusing around a logo that resembles power and explosive energy.

What We Need & What You Get
Kronos Nutrition is not another company with the same goal in the fitness industry. Kronos Nutrition is in the fitness industry to revolutionize the fitness industry and raise the overall standards of the consumer when it comes to price and quality. We are offering an opportunity for investors to place their faith in a product that has shown incredible potential with those who have come into contact with our products, and are asking for the capital required to expand our company to the point where our profit margins will allow us to exemplify the versatility available to companies in this industry. There are three reasons why our product is going to be a success, and these three reasons are more than enough to get the interest of the consumer - we are confident that it will be enough to draw them to switch from their current supplements to ours. Firstly, we offer our product at a significantly lower price point than the majority of the other brands in this market, allowing us to reach a demographic that may be struggling financially. Secondly, we are combining two highly sought after supplements (creatine and pre workout) into a single product, making it easy for the consumer to get their necessary supplementation at an extremely reasonable price point. Lastly, Zeus has eradicated the danger of a potential caffeine overdose by eliminating caffeine from the ingredient list and replacing it with Taurine - a much healthier alternative. Depending on the size of your contribution we will be able to send to you an item from our inventory of brand apparel as well as a container of our signature pre workout Zeus. Contributions of any size are a great help, and we are focusing on making the rewards just as great!
What exactly is in Zeus? The ingredient list is shown below:
Beta Alanine (2 grams per serving)= Beta-alanine is the building block of carnosine, a molecule that helps buffer acid in muscles, increasing physical performance in the 60–240-second range.
Citrulline Malate (6 grams per serving)= L-Citrulline supplementation results in reduced fatigue and improved endurance for both aerobic and anaerobic prolonged exercise.
Creatine Monohydrate (5 grams per serving)= Creatine is a molecule in an energy system (creatine phosphate) that can rapidly produce energy (ATP) to support cellular function. Thus its performance-enhancing and neuroprotective properties.
Taurine (1 gram per serving)= Taurine acts as both a cell protecting agent by modulating the cell membranes fluidity and health, as well as exerting anti-oxidant like effects. Taurine significantly reduces oxidative stress on cardiac muscle tissue in the presence of oxidative stress and can protect against damage from ischaemia-reperfusion injury in cardiac tissue.
L-Tyrosine (1 gram per serving)= L-Tyrosine is an amino acid that is used to produce noradrenaline and dopamine; supplemental appears to be anti-stress for acute stressors (which tend to deplete noradrenaline) and may preserve stress-induced memory deficits.
 
 

The Impact
By contributing to the growth of Krónos Nutrition, you will be helping to prove to the fitness industry that there is no need for these big brands to be overpricing their products without having the quality to match. In order to break out of the fitness trap that is overpriced and ineffective supplements, we want to show the consumer that there are other healthier, cheaper, and more effective alternatives. By contributing to this campaign, you are joining the movement towards a better fitness experience for all.

Risks & Challenges
If the customer chooses to substitute our product for a similar one, there is not a lot stopping them. The same goes the other way around. In a market like this one, what keeps the customers coming to you is the strength of your brand. From the feedback we have gotten on Kronos Nutrition we have found that we are very popular amongst our audience and the people who have interacted with our company. Our product also comes in at such a low price and with such a range of beneficial ingredients that the customer would be giving up a large amount of money to switch between products.
Our competitors have a large presence both in stores and online, making our strategy key. While our competitors run a very mechanical and impersonal business, we will be interacting with our audience. Big supplement companies  who already have their brands at a level of high customer recognition and are doing sales at an increasing rate on an international basis are what we need to look out for. Our strategy should be to keep our sales on a domestic basis until we have enough capital to take it outside of the country, because when these companies hear about Kronos Nutrition and what we offer to the consumer it would be difficult to stop them from replicating our service and product and crowding us out of the market. While we are growing and trying to increase our cash inflow, it is important that we remain humble and conservative with our marketing strategies and stay in our domestic market until we are confident we can grow at a rate that will be immune to these companies trying to replicate our product.

story:
Here at Sick-day Sidekicks, we have created prototypes of the first three Sidekicks (can be seen at www.sickdaysidekicks.com) but need your help in purchasing inventory!

 

Sick-day Sidekicks was founded by two doctors who recognized a common theme in children with broken bones. All of them wanted a cast for their stuffed animal! This made us think... It must be that children enjoy having a relationship with a little stuffed animal that shares their illness. To take it one step further, our Sidekicks have a scannable QR code that will give you access to the app. There, your child will learn to manage their sidekick's illness in real time through stories and games.

Sidekicks are the perfect gift to get your sick little buddy because, after all, who wouldn't want a furry little friend to share in your trials. The Sidekick will educate your child on the basics of the disease from a doctor's perspective, but in a child's language.

Our first Sidekick for sale are Lonnie (teaches childhood cancer) and Sniffles, an Elephant with a common cold which develops into an ear infection. Sniffles has a little loop on his arm so that your child can attach a removable hand-sanitizer to practice their hand hygiene. He is machine washable.

All $30 backers will receive a Sniffles plush along with the book. Our other Sidekicks in the pipeline include Lonnie the Leukemia Lion and Alex the Asthma Alligator. All funds received will go toward development of inventory for these Sidekicks. We will also use a portion of the proceeds for development of a Sick-day Sidekicks app, where children can register their Sidekick, play fun sick-day games, and learn more about their illness.
