story:
Introducing the PRG System

A new generation of bio-stimulation and monitoring technologies designed to help you reach your physical potential.

The PRG System is the next evolution in technology designed to assist you in preparing for exercise and help you recover more quickly.

The PowerCell attaches to the PowerPad

This personal health device does things no other product does

  1. Reduces muscle fatigue and discomfort after workouts by applying a unique method of electrostimulation; this can also be used before you work out to prepare your muscles for exercise. Prepare-Recover = GO!

  2. Measures your muscles’ readiness by assessing key bio-metrics: lactic acid, electrolytes, hydration levels, heart rate. Its better to know before you GO!

  3. Does all this by having your smartphone wirelessly communicate with the proprietary PowerCell that is attached to the PRG Tape or PRG Pad.

  4. Uses the cloud to analyze your bio-metrics against clinical algorithms to optimize your performance. This also allow you to compare and compete against other athletes all while helping you enjoy your workouts more than ever before.

Get the PRG System and take your fitness to the next level!


A complete solution with the PRG System

Many of us have dealt with the discomfort, inconvenience, and cost of dealing with sore and tired muscles as a result of vigorous physical activity. The PRG System enables you to assess the readiness of your muscles, better prepare them for exercise and training, and help them quickly recover—all of which can be done at your convenience using your smartphone and the proprietary PRG App.


The PRG System is the next evolution in technology designed to assist you in preparing for exercise and in helping you recover more quickly.

A proprietary interface attached to a specific muscle and connected to our proprietary PRG App enabling you to assess the readiness of your muscles, better prepare them for your next workout or training session, and help them quickly recover. This innovative technology is complementary to existing treatments such as ice, stretching, foam rollers, massage, and OTC pain relievers, but can be used as a stand-alone treatment option.


Bio-Stimulation Technology*

The PRG System uses an advanced form of proven bio-stimulation that has been used by physicians and physical therapists for many years. Unlike other products on the market, the PRG System captures key bio-metric data that is analyzed to optimize your personalized stimulation sessions.



Bio-metric Optimization*

The PRG system takes bio-stimulation to the next level. Critical parameters such as lactic acid, hydration, heart rate, and other measurements are uploaded to the cloud where your secure personal information is analyzed against a comprehensive database. Your results are then converted into personalized stimulation sessions designed to help you optimize your preparation and recovery. Its like having your own physical therapist at your fingertips. And, there is no need to change your training regimen. In fact, the goal is to help you get stronger, faster, and fitter.


Wireless Connectivity*

The PRG system uses a proprietary battery/NFC interface called a PowerCell. The PowerCell attaches to the PowerPad or PowerTape. Simply place the PowerPad or the strip of PowerTape on the selected muscle group. Then press "GO" on the PRG App on your phone. There is no need to purchase yet another device; the PRG System can be used with either an iPhone or Android smartphone. This means you can conduct your personal stimulation sessions at a time and place of your choosing. Simple, convenient, and intuitive.

* Patent pending


Current Project Status and Development Plans

We have built a proof of concept working prototype using sub-systems that were easily available for modifications. Using a common EKG conductive pad, we designed the first PowerCell using a rechargeable lithium battery. The bio-stimulation power waveforms and feedback circuits were integrated with a controller chip to perform the following functions: deliver bio-stimulation, and measure muscle clinical state. The control signal and feedback data was transmitted via Bluetooth 4.0 to an Android 4.4 LG Tablet. The App, not only provided a graphic user interface for control and monitoring, but also contained an algorithm to analyze the bio-metric status of the muscle. This feedback information is incorporated in a closed loop system to deliver the bio-stimulation regimen.

The product is ready to be optimized to meet the Voice of Customer requirements to meet our CSI (Convenient, Simple, and Intuitive) design philosophy. The funds will finance this effort to perfect it for a user ecosystem using a world famous industrial design firm with over 30 years product development experience. We are planning on taking the concept prototype and transforming it into the commercialized system shown on this web page. Additionally, we have tested other bio-variable detection techniques and will be integrating them into the final design. In summary, the funds will be used for industrial design, manufacturing ramp up, and reliability testing. We anticipate completion of the PRG System within one year.  

Help us build the PRG Nation

Have you joined the PRG Nation? You should! It’s going to be a great place to connect, compare, compete, socialize, and personalize your athletic efforts, both individually and collectively—once we're able to bring this product to market.

Our hope is that the PRG System will become something more than just a product to those who use it. Our supporters will help build the PRG Nation into a community of connected, energized, and vibrant athletes regardless of age or fitness level. Your contribution will also help develop the PRG System and the on-line game. In fact, this interactive game will reward you with some awesome gifts from some of your favorite fitness companies. You have the opportunity to play a key role in the development of the company, its products, and ultimately, help build a company you will be proud to be a part of.

story:
Short Summary

Play with the pleasure of force and intelligent us we are a smart products R & D, this product is to improve the mountain bike gear design, this product can according to our feet force to change the transmission gear, eliminating the need for the product we also equipped with a manual part, when there is no electricity, can also be used in military operations, so that we can fully feel the manual transmission, the product inside a lot of gear structure and a connecting piece, make the product better transmission effect. At the same time, this product uses Bluetooth and some more advanced transmission equipment, hope to get your favorite, and look forward to your joining.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

We need about $150000  , including $50000 for products, mold development including plastic injection mold 3 sets, suppress the abrasive 1 set, one set of stamping die. $50000 for circuit board and program design. Another $5 0000 for materials and packaging design and procurement.

Participation in the development of our products, we will give you low cost price. And give a mountain bike code table (the company's own development.）


FAQ

1.How to achieve speed change?

This transmission device is divided into left and right two, nine speed control of the left, the right to control the three speed, so it can be easily achieve the speed of 27 level. This transmission is an integrated manual and automatic device of transmission, when there is no electricity or power can be whole manual variable speed, so as not to interfere. When fully charged can adjust for automatic transmission, then as long as the motor receives a signal, will always speed to achieve the needs of automatic transmission

2.Transmission structure

Transmission we adopt the integral structure of the gearbox, so whether it is manually or automatically, can be more stable, gearbox in the superposition gear and gear speed reducer structure, so that the motor is not easy to burn out, manual easier motor. We adopt the more stable structure to fix it. Gear materials more resistant to wear and use the combination of stainless steel and POM such more firmly

3.Working principle of pedal

Because pedal take seriously with more sophisticated sensors and foot because of frequent friction, so the requirements are very high, first use of materials and other products, material requirements become more solid, abrasion resistance, collision avoidance and product requirements do waterproof. So we do in the pedal transmission structure is more delicate. Inductive data transmission through the sensor, after calculation via Bluetooth to the transmission of the IC, IC after calculation, calculate the speed, motor function

4.Pedal power supply

Power supply using Panasonic 2032 power, continuous working time of at least 3 months

5.Transmission power supply

The transmission power, the use of independent power supply. At the same time, we designed a waterproof power supply box, placed inside the power supply, the power supply output by our unique circuit design, meanwhile, the power can also be from the power supply box take charge and power supply adopts the multi interface, can charge for our mobile phones, iPad. Power supply box with tie fixed in the car in the beam, and the use of the rubber pad, so that the power is not because of the turbulence inside circuit

6.  I am a distributor. How do I contact you?

Enquiries regarding future distribution opportunities of Evapolar can be sent via email to kevin-manager@outlook.com. We will respond promptly.

7.  What countries can Evapolar be delivered to?

Evapolar can be delivered to any country. We included the cost of international shipping in all pledges. We want Evapolar to be available worldwide.

Manufacturing

We need to finish tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk we carefully select each partner and always have a Plan B. 

Revision Process

We want your feedback! Before we finalize our molding, give us feedback on what you want to see changed. Each week we will review all your requests and post updates. Just let us know!

Shipping

We've given a conservative estimate for our delivery dates. We are committed to keeping you informed of our progress both during and following our campaign. We assure you that we are all working very hard to produce a sensational product that not only arrives on time but is of optimum quality!

Thank you for your interest in EightClock!


      Exercise heart rate watch



Exercise heart rate watch, our development time early, so we will delivery immediately after the raise, we expect shipment before July 2016, charge already include the postage, we will send you to anywhere around the world, looking forward to your participation

story:
Credible-Link is embarking on a project to help rural villages in the poor African country of Zambia with Solar lights.
Challenges:
Kerosene lamps in rural Zambia contribute significantly to illness and death due to indoor air pollution and fires. They limit education, without the ability to study after dark, and they introduce significant CO2 emissions. They increase poverty, a large percentage of a village household's income is spent on kerosene, and they limit commercial activities. You can break the cycle of poverty, ignorance and disease by providing affordable solar lighting to some of the world's poorest people.

The overall national access to electricity in Zambia as at 2010 is 20.4% with 48% in urban areas and 3.1 % in rural areas.​To this end, we will connect 400 houses with thatched roofs at Mununshi village in Mwansabombwe district under the Mununshi Solar Power Project.​ We will also erect 200 units of 20w, 30w and 40w Solar street lights using 6m and 8m poles at a distance of 25m between poles. In North-Western Province, about 130 houses with grass roofs at a village in Chavuma district will also be electrified.​
This is an important programme which deserves a lot of support from government and its co-operating partners; however, the Government does not have the funds.
We are happy to note that Credible Link will be connecting the houses and street lights free of charge​. This is what development is all about. It must have a direct impact on the vulnerable citizens such as rural households who have limited sources of income.

The community youth center have volunteered to support with labour, we are therefore appealing for donations to bring this dream to reality for hundreds of families living in this 21st century without access to light.
Solutions:
African villages, blessed with sunlight all year round should be helped to tap this free and clean energy source to light up remote and isolated homes that have no immediate hope of linking to their national electricity grid.
* The sun is free and inexhaustible.
* Weather: Our lights are designed to work through rain, snow, fog, and cloudy weather
* Pole: up to 25 years of long life time.
* Battery: 5~7 years of maximum life, with a 2-year warranty
* No line voltage, trenching, or metering
* No power outages for these villagers
* No scheduled maintenance for up to 5 years
* No monthly electric bills
* Environmentally friendly - 100% powered by the sun, solar panels reduce fossil fuel consumption, eliminating pollution.
* Self-contained solution - Light on/off controlled by automatic daylight sensing or hour present, no running or maintenance cost.
* Safe 12 volt/24 volt circuit, no risk of electric shock for the villagers

Long-Term Impact:
Long-term this project benefits the health of the families, the education of the children and parents, their income potential and the planet as a whole. Just these 1500 lighting systems will result in 105 tons of avoided CO2 pollution over 5 years.
story_txt:
Credible-Link is embarking on a project to help rural villages in the poor African country of Zambia with Solar lights.Challenges:Kerosene
 lamps in rural Zambia contribute significantly to illness and death due
 to indoor air pollution and fires. They limit education, without the 
ability to study after dark, and they introduce significant CO2 
emissions. They increase poverty, a large percentage of a village 
household's income is spent on kerosene, and they limit commercial 
activities. You can break the cycle of poverty, ignorance and disease by
 providing affordable solar lighting to some of the world's poorest 
people.The overall national access to electricity in Zambia as 
at 2010 is 20.4% with 48% in urban areas and 3.1 % in rural areas.​To 
this end, we will connect 400 houses with thatched roofs at Mununshi 
village in Mwansabombwe district under the Mununshi Solar Power 
Project.​ We will also erect 200 units of 20w, 30w and 40w Solar street 
lights using 6m and 8m poles at a distance of 25m between poles. In 
North-Western Province, about 130 houses with grass roofs at a village 
in Chavuma district will also be electrified.​This is an important 
programme which deserves a lot of support from government and its 
co-operating partners; however, the Government does not have the funds.We
 are happy to note that Credible Link will be connecting the houses and 
street lights free of charge​. This is what development is all about. It
 must have a direct impact on the vulnerable citizens such as rural 
households who have limited sources of income.The community 
youth center have volunteered to support with labour, we are therefore 
appealing for donations to bring this dream to reality for hundreds of 
families living in this 21st century without access to light.Solutions:African
 villages, blessed with sunlight all year round should be helped to tap 
this free and clean energy source to light up remote and isolated homes 
that have no immediate hope of linking to their national electricity 
grid.* The sun is free and inexhaustible.* Weather: Our lights are designed to work through rain, snow, fog, and cloudy weather* Pole: up to 25 years of long life time.* Battery: 5~7 years of maximum life, with a 2-year warranty* No line voltage, trenching, or metering* No power outages for these villagers* No scheduled maintenance for up to 5 years* No monthly electric bills* Environmentally friendly - 100% powered by the sun, solar panels reduce fossil fuel consumption, eliminating pollution.*
 Self-contained solution - Light on/off controlled by automatic daylight
 sensing or hour present, no running or maintenance cost.* Safe 12 volt/24 volt circuit, no risk of electric shock for the villagersLong-Term Impact:Long-term
 this project benefits the health of the families, the education of the 
children and parents, their income potential and the planet as a whole. 
Just these 1500 lighting systems will result in 105 tons of avoided CO2 
pollution over 5 years.

story:
Product Features

 
 
 
 
  • Intelligent detection
  • One-click start
  • Digital display of air quality in real time
  • Remove harmful substances
  • Release fresh air, anti-allergens
  • Sterilization and deodorization
  • Aromatic essential oils
 
 

Function introduction

 

 

Describe the level of air cleaning or pollution. 
The more the air quality index, the more serious the pollution is, also more damage to us.
AQI digital display in real-time, touch to switch night-mode.
One click to start all functions, built-in sensors, intelligent detection, display the AQI change on the screen directly.

 

 

 

Aromatherapy function

 

1-3 drops of your favorite essential oils on the aromatherapy ingot. When you start the air purifier, you will smell the fragrance.
The fragrance can last for several days, to make your day comfortable and relaxed.

 
 

Nano silver biochemical filter

 
 

Green concept as the product design concept and use the innovative nano silver biochemical filter, which consumable-free materials and can be reused after washing, to experience the green life.

 

Inspection Report

 

 
The filter passes the professional SGS certificate, guarantee the quality and security.
 

 

Design concept

 
 
 

Every small habit, has a small danger.

How do you make sure your environment is secured?

 
Detection and digital display in real time, air quality in one-sight, no mobile app needed.

With the unique fragrance function, to drop into essential oil then you can enjoy both fragrance and fresh air.

 

Air Pollution Crisis

In our living environment, there are invisible hazards everywhere:
 
 
 
 

When people are exposed to this highly polluted environment for a short period of time, they may cause the above-mentioned related diseases. If they are exposed for a long time, they may cause cancer and death.

 

 

Automotive​

 

​

Office

 

 

 

 

Outdoor

 

 
 

 

 
 
 

Discount program

 
In order to respond to everyone's expectations, OMCARE has a total of three preferential early bird programs.
Don't worry about the miss the programs. We will still provide the preferential prices for everyone on Indiegogo.
 
 
 

SKETCH

 
 
 

Future goals

 

 
 
 
At present, we have already sold in Taiwan, and received a lot of favorable comments and feedback. Therefore, we hope to recommend good products to people all over the world. In the future, we will set up service bases around the world to expand our sales market.
 
 

Our Team

 
 
Our company was founded in 1999. We focus on research and development, design and sales and have a number of self-developed patent projects, such as artificial intelligence development, bio-tech development, appearance design patent and so on.
Our products detect and improve the quality of some life elements like air, water and food.
In the development direction of the idea of “We care what you care”,
 
 
 

Omcare Air Purifier Q&A

story:
What is the IdaLove Life Sheet

IdaLove Life Sheet is an ultra-thin and comfortable Smart Sheet that detects and verifies the breathing of your child.

It is made of natural hypoallergenic fabric.

You simply have to place the Idalove Life Sheet under the regular sheet when making your baby’s bed.

Nothing is attached to your baby.

IdaLove Life Sheet continuously monitors your baby’s breathing and quality of sleep through state-of-the-art fiber technology.

It is connected to a Smart Box that sends you and/or your babysitter real time information on your smartphone via a special app.

An immediate alarm will sound if necessary.

It can even be used without a smartphone.

IdaLove never sleeps—so you can !

Idalove Life Sheet has not been registered as a a medical device

 

Two Life Sheets per Set

 Two (2) Life Sheets are included in a set. 

So one is always available to use.

Simply because quality of life is important to us.

Washable - Reusable

A clean and safe bed for your baby is very important for it´s health and happiness.

The life sheet is washable at 130°F (60°c)

To keep it clean and safe.

Thin, Light and Comfortable

Your baby´s comfort and its quality of sleep is very important!

So we worked hard to create an ultra thin hypoalllergenic and comfortable textile to integrate our technology.

Making the bed is easy.

The IdaLove system can go anywhere you go.

 

No Contact with your Baby

Nothing is attached to your baby or your baby´s clothing.

The extreme precision and sensitivity of the smart sheet allows perfect measurements regardless of how your baby is dressed, in summer or winter.

No radio emission waves are in the baby´s bed. We also included a security battery to make the system lightweight and portable.

Easy to install. Simply plug it in. No calibration required. It even works in case of power or network failure!

IdaLove never sleeps!

An amazing High-Tech Advance

Idalove detects and records continuously with extreme precision.

It is actually accurate enough to detect the smallest breathing pattern in real time.

It can also distinguish between movements and breathing of your baby.

The design of the final product will be made by world class designers that used to work in beauty care!

You can expect simply the best.

Total Safety, Simplicity and Security

We decided to simplify the solution for the breathing detection with the best available technologies and our vast experience in cardiology monitoring.

Nothing is attached to your baby.

No radio emission waves in your baby's bed.

We included a security battery to make the system lightweight and portable. No calibration required.

It even works in case of power or network failure!

IdaLove never sleeps—so you can!

 

Key Features of the IdaLove Life Sheet

 

IDALOVE LIFE SHEET

IdaLove Life Sheet is an ultra-thin and comfortable Smart Sheet that detects and verifies the breathing of your child.

IDALOVE SMART BOX

IdaLove Life Sheet is connected to a Smart Box that sends you and/or your babysitter real time information about your baby’s breathing and quality of sleep on your smartphone.

An immediate alarm will sound if necessary

WHAT’S INCLUDED?

Two (2) IdaLove Life Sheets

One (1) long connection cable,

One (1) Smart Box

The mobile app

(iOS or Android compatible) for your tablet(s) and/or smartphone(s)

ULTRA-THIN SMART SHEET

The Smart Sheet is ultra thin and as flexible as a simple sheet

Your baby will be absolutely comfortable

TWO IDALOVE LIFE SHEETS PER SET

For your total peace of mind,

we deliver two Smart Sheets per set,

so one is always available

ALARM SYSTEM

If necessary, the alarms you define will ring in the baby's room,

as well as on your smartphone or tablet

Even in the case of a Wi-fi failure, the IdaLove system will function and you will be notified as expected

HYPOALLERGENIC FABRIC

The IdaLove Life Sheet is made of a gentle, naturally hypoallergenic fabric, so it can be used

with complete confidence

MACHINE WASHABLE 130°F (60°C)

Because the IdaLove Life Sheet is washable and reusable, you know that it's always clean and safe.

The highly durable Smart Sheet can be used for years

TRAVELING OR ON HOLIDAY

The system is lightweight and portable

so, it can be used even when you are traveling

IdaLove always cares for your baby

SECURE WI-FI

The wi-fi used with the system is not in the baby's bed,

so no radiation waves are generated in your baby's bed

Only the Smart Box is connected to the wi-fi,

and it stays far away from your baby

NO MECHANICAL PARTS

The Innovative IdaLove Life Sheet relies exclusively on high-tech ultra-sensitive fibers

There are no mechanical parts, making the system completely safe and secure

BATTERY AND/OR POWER PLUG CONNECTION

The Idalove Life Sheet always works, even in the event of a power failure

In addition to a power plug connection, the Smart Box contains an internal battery

The internal battery automatically recharges and operates for an entire day in the event of a power outage

GOOD SLEEP AND BREATHING DETECTION

The IdaLove Life Sheet monitors your baby’s breathing and sleeping patterns

So, it can check if your baby has a normal sleep

CRYING BABY DETECTION

IdaLove Life Sheet can detect the restlessness and agitation of your baby,

So you know exactly how many hours your baby is asleep even when in the care of a babysitter

You know when your baby falls sleep and wakes up

COUGHING DETECTION

IdaLove Life Sheet detects how often your baby is coughing,

so you always know if you need to take action,

like possibly indicating the need for a doctor’s advice

APNEA DETECTION

IdaLove Life Sheet can also detect sleep apnea and

helps you to determine if your baby should

need professional medical attention

AGITATED BABY

IdaLove Life Sheet can detect the restlessness and agitation of your baby, so you know how many hours your baby sleeps… even when in the care of a babysitter

And, you know when your baby falls asleep and wakes up

So, you know if your baby needs your attention

STOP BREATHING OR MOVEMENT DETECTION

If your baby stops breathing or moving normally,

IdaLove sends you an instant alarm

No unnecessary alarms are sent!

BABY OR INFANT OUT OF BED

You can monitor if your baby or toddler is in or out of bed

IdaLove can be used for anyone,

It simply works!

It’s a perfect solution for anyone whose sleeping and waking habits you want to monitor

TWINS OR SEVERAL INFANTS MONITORING

With a Twins Smart Box, you can use IdaLove Life Sheets to monitor two babies

Several Smart Boxes allow you to monitor as many infants as you want at a glance,

making it an excellent choice for nurseries and crèches, too!

One Baby, One Family, A room full of Infants

 

There's an IdaLove Solution designed for you

 
 

SMARTPHONE ONE CHILD MONITORING

The information about your baby is displayed on one simple screen to assure you of your baby’s wellbeing

 

Night parameters are also displayed so you know exactly how much time your baby slept and its quality of rest!

SMARTPHONE TWINS MONITORING

Monitoring twins is as easy as monitoring one child

Everything is on one screen

SMARTPHONE OR TABLET NURSERY OR MULTIPLE CHILDREN MONITORING

You can monitor as many children as you want

All at a glance!

You simply need one set of IdaLove Life Sheet per child

So, an entire family or a complete nursery can be monitored and checked on one screen

Video presentation

 

Key Features of the IdaLove Life Sheet



 

Contact Us

Simply by clicking here on this link
Naples, FL 34105, US
P: +1 954 806 2962 Europe : +32 1675 03 46
 

Social

The Team

You can see all the team by simply clicking on Team

 

The development steps

You can see all the detailed steps by simply clicking here

Copyright © 2018 Idaloves.com

story:
Short Summary

I am Dr. Carlo Oller, and I am an emergency physician with the YouTube channel 'DrERtv'.

My profession's worst curse is its effect on sleep. I have to work shift work that constantly changes, and includes night shifts (forcing me to sleep when the house is not dark, busiest, and warmest). I have always been fascinated with sleep mainly because I feel like I don't get enough of it or enough quality of it. Also, 3 years ago my wife was affected with encephalitis which affected my wife's memory and cognitive function. But it is her sleep patterns that have been most affected by the illness, resulting in an irritable mood, chronic fatigue, even depression. This has led me to study, and research the literature out there in search of solutions to improve sleep.

  • Through this personal search, I found that there has already been scientific evidence that has demonstrated that stimulating the brain with 'pink noise' during your deep sleep stage can actually amplify, and lengthen the duration of deep sleep stage. 
  • Various devices have been invented and are available on the market that you can place on your head. They will monitor your sleep waves and play the pink noise during this stage of sleep. However, they require the user to wear cumbersome headgear and whose cost is prohibitive for most (excess of $400-). 

  • What if we can harness the technology we already have (Fitbit and Apple watches) to hack into this pink noise ability to improve our deep sleep? NO big headgear, no big expenses.
  • This is what I am trying to create. An APP that has everything all the good "sleep" apps have, with the added benefit of NOT just monitoring your sleep. But to actually engineer it to improve it!
  • Although I am a physician I do not have the monetary resources to see this APP  turn into a reality. But with your contribution, we can all work together to see this 'dream' come true (pun intended).

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • An APP that can work for both Fitbit and Apple watch will cost $12K to build for only the most basic function. I would like to include other features like:
    • sleep monitoring graphs/reporting,
    • sleep score (with badges),
    • sleep blog (where users can post comments, questions, motivation, etc. and I can post relevant education regarding sleep),
    • white noise library (so that the user can play 'white noise'  on the background which would allow the 'pink noise' to fade in/out as the user enters and exits deep stages of sleep. 
    • the  function to create your own white noise for background playing
  • These added features would increase the cost of the APP built to an estimated $20K.
  • The sooner we raise the funds the sooner we can get to work, and launch the APP. That means the sooner we will all be hacking our deep sleep and improving it. 
  •  No matter if we reach our goal or not, the APP will be built so 100% of funds will go towards the development, launch, and promotion of the APP.

The Impact

The impact of this APP will be tremendous. It will let the users, using the social functions of the APP, to share, educate, challenge themselves and each other towards the best deep sleep of their lives. 

Risks & Challenges

The more money raised, the better APP we can create. More features, better functionalities, higher quality overall. The quicker we can raise the money, the sooner we can get the APP out and the sooner you will benefit from this scientifically proven technology to hack your deep sleep and enjoy better memory, alertness, and creativity. More contributions will mean a better promotion of the APP which will result in more people benefiting from this life/sleep changing APP. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute to this campaign, you can help:

#1 - comment, like, share the video on social media

#2 - text the video link directly to people you know who need help with their sleep

#3 - I appreciate any ideas regarding the APP itself, functions you would like to see, and ideas for a catchy name!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to invest into this APP I am going to allow anyone to buy into the APP.

$1,000 for 1% of the business for up to 30% of the business.

If you would like to contribute and be an 'owner' in this business endeavor, please reach out to me at carlooller@gmail.com

The sooner we raise the funds the sooner we can get to work, and launch the APP. That means the sooner we will all be hacking our deep sleep and improving it. 
 No matter if we reach our goal or not, the APP will be built so 100% of funds will go towards the development, launch, and promotion of the APP.


The Impact
The impact of this APP will be tremendous. It will let the users, using the social functions of the APP, to share, educate, challenge themselves and each other towards the best deep sleep of their lives. 

Risks & Challenges
The more money raised, the better APP we can create. More features, better functionalities, higher quality overall. The quicker we can raise the money, the sooner we can get the APP out and the sooner you will benefit from this scientifically proven technology to hack your deep sleep and enjoy better memory, alertness, and creativity. More contributions will mean a better promotion of the APP which will result in more people benefiting from this life/sleep changing APP. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you cannot contribute to this campaign, you can help:
#1 - comment, like, share the video on social media
#2 - text the video link directly to people you know who need help with their sleep
#3 - I appreciate any ideas regarding the APP itself, functions you would like to see, and ideas for a catchy name!
Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to invest into this APP I am going to allow anyone to buy into the APP. 
$1,000 for 1% of the business for up to 30% of the business. 
If you would like to contribute and be an 'owner' in this business endeavor, please reach out to me at carlooller@gmail.com

story:
Neo-19 by NeoHack Life Sciences LLC

We are NeoHack, a team of seasoned executives and researchers in the life sciences space. We are passionate about developing innovative, homeostatic products (patent pending) that improve people's lives. We are excited to launch our newest development, Neo-19 (OTC) reduces bacterial/viral coughing with homeostatic, patent-pending cough lozenge.

The product: Neo-19 is designed to be available and accessible without prescription  as  an anti-inflammatory and effective lozenge to mitigate coughing. Our product, Neo-19, aims to reduce intensity and frequency of bacterial or viral coughing.

The Impact of Neo-19 against coughing in general, and COVID-19 specifically

Millions of people who have already contracted COVID-19 could have benefited from additional or alternative treatment methods in order to fight the onslaught of symptoms identified as the cytokine storm. Coughing is one of the most severe symptoms of COVID-19, and maintaining clear air passageways is paramount. Neo-19 directly addresses this, in a new and efficacious way that will be accessible over-the-counter.

Neo-19 will also be effective against other bacterial and viral cough symptoms.  

Timeline 

The trial run would start within 4 weeks. A go-to-market formulation, including samples for the sponsors of this campaign, should be ready to leave our manufacturing site and available to consumers within 120 days. 

Indiegogo campaign 

We are developing a patent-pending, tried-and-tested, homeostatic cough lozenge formula for over-the-counter sales.

Our goal with this campaign is to commercialize an internally designed product to fight any COVID-associated cytokine storm and thus save lives. The first step is to produce a trial batch of Neo-19.

What you get: Sponsors of this campaign will receive free samples of Neo-19. 

Note: the lozenge may be orange, yellow, white, or turquoise in color.

The next step on our journey is to produce an initial plant run of the Neo-19 formula. We will concurrently launch and market it as an OTC cough lozenge (without claims related to COVID-19 until our testing from the first batch or successive plant runs proves successful in human use trials specifically against COVID-19).

The NeoHack Team

Our CEO with an MBA has experience in taking companies public and operating publicly traded entities (NYSE, AMEX, NASD). Our Chief Science Officer is a highly experienced PhD with 40 years R & D experience and 40 patents. Our Chief Development Officer with an MBA and MS has launched startups and guided companies from launch to advanced stages.Together we believe we can make available a very affordable, widely distributed, highly effective product.

(Image: from the lab, developing new formulations)

Risks & Challenges

(1) While the NeoHack team has successfully commercialized similar formulations in the past, Neo-19 is nonetheless a new (modified) product which has not yet been clinically proven.

(2) While our research is sound and our pending patent establishes several mechanisms supported in medical literature, testing of the cough lozenge is necessary and may require more time and money.

(3) If we are unable to establish the anticipated study results, then this will limit and weaken the claims that can be used in the marketing of Neo-19.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable at this time to financially support Neo-19, please share this information with others. Thank you!

story:
YUZ lullaby – the toothpaste that helps you sleep! 

Hello! We are YUZ and we are proud to announce our new innovation YUZ lullaby – not just a toothpaste but one that improves your sleep quality! We are well on our way with our product development and are ready for production. This is where you come in! If you are in need of better sleep, then support us with the purchase of one of our perks! 

 

 

More than just a toothpaste

Our toothpaste comes with a fresh mint aroma and important ingredients necessary for effective caries prophylaxis such as fluoride. The addition of extracts such as valerian, lemon balm, passionflower, liquorice and lavender oil have a calming effect, which improve your sleep quality and help you sleep through the night. Additionally, coconut oil will give you a natural tooth whitening effect.

No nonsense

We decided early on that we would exclude any questionable ingredients in our products. What we leave out of our products is just as important as what we put in. Therefore, we created oral care that is free of lactose, gluten, cruelty and micro plastic. Of course, it is also vegan and comes in recyclable sugar cane tubes. 

 

YUZ lullaby perfect addition to YUZ energy boost

Our YUZ lullaby oral care is the perfect addition to YUZ energy boost – Europe’s first toothpaste with caffeine. Waking up and going to sleep will never be the same! 

 

About us 

YUZ is a young start up founded in 2019. Our goal is to develop high quality oral care products that go the extra mile and have a holistic approach – as shown by our YUZ energy boost, Europe’s first toothpaste with caffeine. Our inspiration is Tradition Persian Medicine (TPM) with its preventative and holistic approach. 

If you want to get in touch with us, please feel free to email us at info@drkaschny.com.

story:
We've all heard the phrase: “Just because you can, doesn’t mean you should.” Well, living your life undernourished is a perfect example. 

Our bodies can survive harsh conditions, and sadly, this is exactly how billions of us lead our lives because we don't prioritize our micro-nutrition. 

The goal shouldn't be to merely survive; it should be to thrive.

Optimal Nutrients. Not Optimal Supplements.

We refuse to use the term “supplements” to describe our product because Optimal Nutrients offers so much more.

Let’s face it: the majority of people are likely chronically malnourished, simultaneously serving as living proof of the body’s resiliency. We are confident saying this because it was true for us at one time as well. We weren’t kind to our bodies. We were forcing our bodies to swim upstream and we never considered the consequences. By dropping the ball nutritionally, we dropped the ball in so many other areas of our lives.

 If this hits home for you, know it did for us while writing it. 

No one can make good choices for your body but you. You alone are in control of how you feel, how you think, and whether your body survives or thrives.

Add to your already malnourished body the likelihood that you are also sleep deprived, dehydrated, stressed, and/or lacking consistent physical activity, we would bet there’s a very high chance you are missing out on Optimal health. Fortunately, we found an easy way to begin rectifying that.

We aren’t offering what anyone else is... and we aren’t doing this the way anyone else has.

Have you noticed how the “health and fitness” industry has been hijacked by protein powders, pre-workout formulas, fiber powders, etc. with who-knows what inside them? The whole industry seems like one big, hypocritical, money-grab!

We're not like that. Actually, it’s partially because the industry is this way that we started Optimal.

It’s no secret our soil and mass-produced foods are nutrient-deprived. So we created a product unlike anything else on the market to finally start giving ourselves what we deserve.

1. We are fully transparent.

For starters, we have nothing to hide and nothing to be ashamed of, because nothing but the absolute best goes into our products.

Transparency is the foundational premise of our brand. We want you to know exactly what you're putting in your body. If it's in one of our products, you have a right to know why -- and because we have nothing to hide, we make it easy for you to do your due diligence. 

Simply go to our website to see for yourself the source and purpose behind each one of our Optimal ingredients. We believe in more information, not less; more education, not less; transparency, not playing off your ignorance.

Some ingredients aren't vitamins. Some ingredients aren't minerals. So why are they in our recipes? Maybe they're flavorings. Maybe they're for shelf-life. You deserve to know about each ingredient, and our ongoing commitment is that we'll always choose natural, organic, plant-based, Optimal sources.

We invite you to find all this information and more, easily accessible on our website. Because if we aren't transparent, what are we? www.optimalnutrients.com

 

2. We offer micronutrients, not macronutrients.

So the first reason we stand out from the "supplement crowd" is our radical transparency. The second is that our micronutrients offer so much more than the insufficient macro-nutrient products the industry is flooded with.

Not sure what the difference is? Well, when you hear the "S" word (supplements), you probably think of macro-nutritional supplements; those money-grabbing products we talked about before. We don't believe in those. We focus on what really matters to live Optimally: micronutrients.

In short, micronutrients are the all familiar vitamins and minerals our bodies love.

 

3. Optimal Bioavailability.

Transparency, check. Micronutrients, check. But it's really our bioavailable sources that will make Optimal Nutrients stand out.

Every single one of our products carries the Optimal Bioavailability Seal, certifying that they are made from the most bioavailable sources on the planet.

Bioavailability refers to the amount of the nutrient that is actually absorbed.

Imagine a plant. A cow comes along on a sunny day and eats the plant. Calcium is absorbed by the cow. Later on, we consume the dairy from that cow and, in turn, absorb calcium ourselves. But what happens if we bypass the dairy, pole-vault over the cow, and just eat the plant ourselves?

We end up getting calcium from its PRIMARY source! This results in a much healthier, cleaner, and more effective (dare we say OPTIMAL) absorption of calcium! This is bioavailability, and every single one of Optimal Nutrients, literally 100% of them, are from their most primary sources on the planet.

Look for the seal on all our packaging. When you find it, you know you're getting the absolute best source possible. Does your body deserve any less? 

Read more about our Optimal Plant Bioavailability Seal on our website. 

 

4. Just pure goodness.

Well, we saved the best for last. Optimal Nutrients are pure goodness: 100% Plant-based, Organic, Non-Gmo, Gluten-free, Vegan (Dairy-free, Shellfish-free, etc), Cruelty-free, and are made with 100% recycled cardboard. It really doesn’t get better than that.

We believe it is our responsibility to be thoughtful about our packaging. In addition to using 100% recycled cardboard for our tube packaging, as a gift from us to you, each initial purchase will be accompanied by a gifted glass bottle to transfer your monthly product into (or use as you please).

Ready to check out some product?

 

We will be offering (6) products, (3) of which are stretch goals.

Our first (3) products make up what we call The Optimal Triad.

 

The Optimal Triad contains the entire micronutritional spectrum needed by the mind and body for Optimal health and wellbeing. As the creators, we have to say it feels amazing to see our Optimal Triad come to life! We are ecstatic about getting these incredible products into your hands.

The first product in the Triad is our Optimal Vitamins + Minerals.

 

Optimal Vitamins + Minerals

This is the product we are most proud to present. This is a bold statement, but we truly believe our Optimal Vitamin + Mineral complex is the most advanced, most comprehensive micronutritional formula in the world. 

 

Next up:

Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond

Our second product, the Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond complex, is just as important as the Optimal Vitamin + Mineral formula. They both contain vitamins and minerals; just different ones for different purposes.

 

And finally, our Optimal EFAs.

Optimal Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs)

Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs) aren't micronutrients -- it's true -- but they're essential for a reason. The body cannot synthesize essential fatty acids. They must, therefore, be obtained through our nutritional regimen.

Fish oil supplements have become extraordinarily popular, but fish oils are secondary sources. Remember what we learned about Optimal Bioavailability? This is why we chose primary sources like algae, seaweed, and avocado to make up our Optimal EFAs formula.

 

These three incredible products -- Optimal Vitamins + Minerals, Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond, and Optimal EFAs -- complete the Optimal Triad.

Our hope is that they become a staple in your home and daily routine, as we want nothing less for you than Optimal wellness.

 

News flash: Sweating without nutrification is nutritional suicide.

We could give you a million reasons why you should be committed to a daily regimen of high quality micronutrients. For example: 

Did you know you lose a critical amount of micronutrients when you sweat? Are you diligent about replacing them? 

Check out this diagram:

So many people think sweat is just salt and water. But as you can see, it is so much more! Sweat is a multi-micronutrient cocktail containing Calcium, Magnesium, Potassium, Vitamin C, Selenium, and much more. Your goal should always be to "replace what you lose in sweat," so you're going to need far more than just water and whatever empty calories you grab from the grocery store.

But don't sweat it -- this is just one of many reasons why we've created the Optimal Nutrients line. 

Like all ambitious and enthusiastic entrepreneurs, we have stretch goals! We believe wholeheartedly in the effectiveness of these products, which is why we are so motivated to get them to you!

 

Introducing Optimal Kids

Our Optimal Kids line consists of two products, Optimal Kid's Vitamins + Minerals and Optimal Kid's Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs). These two products are also available in two sets as you'll see below; all of which are stretch goals.

Why Optimal Kids? Meeting the need of vitamins and minerals during childhood is critical, yet rarely accomplished. The younger you are, the more micronutrients you need. The constant state of growth children undergo makes optimizing their nutrition a top priority, and we want to help.

Check out our Optimal Kid's products.

Optimal Kid's Vitamins + Minerals

Available as a stretch goal for $15!

Growing is hard work, making optimized nutrition a top priority. 

The words Optimal Kids don't just speak to the names of our products... they speak to our goals. Featuring a Whole Food Blend of Kale, Flax Seed, Blueberries, Beets, and much more, we've found a comprehensive formula that we're confident your kids will love.

 

Optimal Kid's Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs)

Available as a stretch goal for $15!

We'll keep this next one short because it's pretty simple: kids need essential fatty acids just like adults do! We are sincere in wanting what’s best for your kids, so we're committed to preventing deficiencies of EFAs in your little ones.

 

And finally, perhaps the most important of all (since this is where it all begins).

Optimal Pregnancy

Available as a stretch goal for $25!

Having an Optimal pregnancy is of unparalleled importance. These are arguably the most critical (9)-months of development.

But having an Optimal pregnancy is about more than just the health of the child -- it's also about the health of the mother! The reproductive system is extraordinary. Putting our children before ourselves begins long before birth; the mother's body automatically prioritizes the health of the fetus over her own -- transferring as many micronutrients as possible through the placenta.

As an expecting mother, you now have two mouths to feed. Optimal Pregnancy will ensure there is an abundance of vitamins and minerals (and the right vitamins and minerals) to go around.

 

Optimal Upbringing

Available as a stretch goal for $25!

We want to offer a package that combines Optimal Kid's Vitamins + Minerals with the Optimal Kid's EFAs. However, what we really want to offer is an opportunity. In addition to supplying your child's body with the raw materials it needs to grow and thrive, Optimal Upbringing is an opportunity to cement a crucial behavior into habit; the habit of self-care. An Optimal lifetime may be the holy grail, but it must start somewhere. For this reason, we are working to facilitate a healthy future by making Optimal Kids more effective and affordable.

 

Optimal Family

Available as a stretch goal for $89!

This package combines the Optimal Triad (Optimal Vitamins + Minerals, Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond, and Optimal Essential Fatty Acids) with our Optimal Upbringing; taking care of you and your little ones.

 

Optimal Pregnancy Complete

Available as a stretch goal for $240!

Optimizing one's pregnancy is obviously important, but facilitating pregnancy is often overlooked. We tend to think of pregnancy as a (9) month affair, but what about the months leading up to it?

This (12) pack of Optimal Pregnancy is designed to help you create the healthiest, most hospitable environment possible, and it would be our pleasure to offer it to you at an Indiegogo special discount if we're able to reach our fundraising goal.

 

In the best case scenario, we think it is viable to have product delivered to your door in (4) months. Our manufacturer has a guaranteed (90) day lead time on initial purchase orders, and beyond that, we'll have to navigate FDA compliance. Like all realistic time-tables, though, there will be unforeseen challenges; so in the spirit of transparency, we'll update you if we run into any hiccups.

With transparency being the name of the game on Kickstarter (as well as our company motto), we want to walk you through exactly how we came up  with our budget.

MOQ

As for our minimum order quantities, we have to finance 1,500 initial units of each product from our manufacturer. If this was our only expense, our fundraising goal would be much smaller -- because in the purest form of Indiegogo spirit, we aren't looking to profit on these units at all. There are, though, additional costs we need to think about.

INSURANCE

Obviously, we'll need insurance -- and unfortunately we anticipate that cost being significant.

FDA COMPLIANCE

Understanding the web of FDA regulations should probably be made simpler (just saying). Not taking any chances, however, we have budgeted to hire an FDA Compliance Attorney.

NLEA INSPECTION

All products must pass NLEA inspection (Nutritional Labeling and Education Act). Basically, we have to prove that what we're putting on the label is an accurate representation of our products. It's a simple, but necessary process.

FULFILLMENT

We planned to do this ourselves to save money, but in terms of practicality, drop-shipping from our manufacturer is the only reliable option. If we're going to live up to the word Optimal, we can't be delaying shipments because we're busy learning on the job.

FEES

All that remains are the fees associated with all successful campaigns; one for Indiegogo for providing this awesome service, and another for the processing fees between the bank and fundraising platform. This is why the ultimate goal exceeds the $66,725 figure.

Your health is worth the investment.

We don't just say that because we want your support. We say that because it is the truth. Monthly, would you be willing to forgo a night out with friends in order to prioritize your physical and mental health? Would you be willing to scratch the lottery tickets that never win (pun intended)? Either or, that's all it would take!

With the help from Indiegogo, we can do something truly special and offer a great series of products for just over $2/day. That's less than your morning coffee on the way to work. Worth it if you ask us.

Before you read this section, we want to be perfectly clear:

100% of the dollars generously pledged through this Indiegogo campaign will go towards product development and fulfillment of our Optimal Nutrients.

However, we wanted to share something that is near and dear to our hearts. Please watch this video:

 

Once Optimal Nutrients is thriving in a sustainable way, our plan is to turn our focus (and extra profits) towards the proper funding of a charitable initiative we care deeply about -- Step Up Movement.

Years ago we began offering free exercise classes at our local homeless shelter. What started with 2 participants quickly grew to over 100, and what was simply a fitness class evolved into a transformational program focusing on physical health, psychological wellbeing, and proper nutrition.

The results have been astounding. We founded this 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization because of a responsibility we felt to help those on the margins of society, and this sense of duty only grows as we become more successful. Preventative healthcare is the future, and by virtue, we envision Step Up Movement at every homeless shelter across the country. So, as charitably motivated people, we intend to donate a significant portion of our future revenues in an effort to properly fund this program.

If you'd like to learn more or get involved, please email Guy at contact@guywaltman.com

This is either the time for a closing statement, or an invitation for more. As a closing statement, let us just briefly thank you. If you've read this far, clearly, we have your time and consideration to be grateful for. Also, thank you for caring enough about your health to think Optimally!

We thought you might like to meet the team. You can read more about each of us on our website, but our names are Guy, Meryem, Kate, and Paula. We aren't big on titles. All you really need to know is that we are fully committed to bringing you the best products humanly possible.

This isn't just the Optimal Team. This is YOUR team. We created Optimal Nutrients not just for our family's and ourselves, but for you and yours as well. When we say we are here for you, we mean it. 

As for an invitation for more; we don't want to this to stop once you get our product in your hands. Instead, we hope this will be the beginning of an amazing relationship! We are easy to get ahold of, and we hope you'll reach out.

Don't believe us? Call our bluff. Reach out to the team at www.optimalnutrients.com or try the contact portal on www.guywaltman.com to reach Guy directly. You can also send a message to connect with Paula at www.paulasitek.com. As people who enjoy meaningful conversation, we look forward to hearing from you; and hopefully, while we're at it, serving you to our greatest ability!

But what happens if we bypass the dairy, pole-vault over the cow, and just eat the plant ourselves?We end up getting calcium from its PRIMARY source! This results in a much healthier, cleaner, and more effective (dare we say OPTIMAL) absorption of calcium! This is bioavailability, and every single one of Optimal Nutrients, literally 100% of them, are from their most primary sources on the planet.Look for the seal on all our packaging. When you find it, you know you're getting the absolute best source possible. Does your body deserve any less? Read more about our Optimal Plant Bioavailability Seal on our website.  4. Just pure goodness.Well, we saved the best for last. Optimal Nutrients are pure goodness: 100% Plant-based, Organic, Non-Gmo, Gluten-free, Vegan (Dairy-free, Shellfish-free, etc), Cruelty-free, and are made with 100% recycled cardboard. It really doesn’t get better than that.We believe it is our responsibility to be thoughtful about our packaging. In addition to using 100% recycled cardboard for our tube packaging, as a gift from us to you, each initial purchase will be accompanied by a gifted glass bottle to transfer your monthly product into (or use as you please).Ready to check out some product? We will be offering (6) products, (3) of which are stretch goals.Our first (3) products make up what we call The Optimal Triad. The Optimal Triad contains the entire micronutritional spectrum needed by the mind and body for Optimal health and wellbeing. As the creators, we have to say it feels amazing to see our Optimal Triad come to life! We are ecstatic about getting these incredible products into your hands.The first product in the Triad is our Optimal Vitamins + Minerals. Optimal Vitamins + MineralsThis is the product we are most proud to present. This is a bold statement, but we truly believe our Optimal Vitamin + Mineral complex is the most advanced, most comprehensive micronutritional formula in the world.  Next up:Optimal Bones, Joints + BeyondOur second product, the Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond complex, is just as important as the Optimal Vitamin + Mineral formula. They both contain vitamins and minerals; just different ones for different purposes. And finally, our Optimal EFAs.Optimal Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs)Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs) aren't micronutrients -- it's true -- but they're essential for a reason. The body cannot synthesize essential fatty acids. They must, therefore, be obtained through our nutritional regimen.Fish oil supplements have become extraordinarily popular, but fish oils are secondary sources. Remember what we learned about Optimal Bioavailability? This is why we chose primary sources like algae, seaweed, and avocado to make up our Optimal EFAs formula. These three incredible products -- Optimal Vitamins + Minerals, Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond, and Optimal EFAs -- complete the Optimal Triad.Our hope is that they become a staple in your home and daily routine, as we want nothing less for you than Optimal wellness. News flash: Sweating without nutrification is nutritional suicide.We could give you a million reasons why you should be committed to a daily regimen of high quality micronutrients. For example: Did you know you lose a critical amount of micronutrients when you sweat? Are you diligent about replacing them? Check out this diagram:So many people think sweat is just salt and water. But as you can see, it is so much more! Sweat is a multi-micronutrient cocktail containing Calcium, Magnesium, Potassium, Vitamin C, Selenium, and much more. Your goal should always be to "replace what you lose in sweat," so you're going to need far more than just water and whatever empty calories you grab from the grocery store.But don't sweat it -- this is just one of many reasons why we've created the Optimal Nutrients line. Like all ambitious and enthusiastic entrepreneurs, we have stretch goals! We believe wholeheartedly in the effectiveness of these products, which is why we are so motivated to get them to you! Introducing Optimal KidsOur Optimal Kids line consists of two products, Optimal Kid's Vitamins + Minerals and Optimal Kid's Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs). These two products are also available in two sets as you'll see below; all of which are stretch goals.Why Optimal Kids? Meeting the need of vitamins and minerals during childhood is critical, yet rarely accomplished. The younger you are, the more micronutrients you need. The constant state of growth children undergo makes optimizing their nutrition a top priority, and we want to help.Check out our Optimal Kid's products.Optimal Kid's Vitamins + MineralsAvailable as a stretch goal for $15!Growing is hard work, making optimized nutrition a top priority. The words Optimal Kids don't just speak to the names of our products... they speak to our goals. Featuring a Whole Food Blend of Kale, Flax Seed, Blueberries, Beets, and much more, we've found a comprehensive formula that we're confident your kids will love. Optimal Kid's Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs)Available as a stretch goal for $15!We'll keep this next one short because it's pretty simple: kids need essential fatty acids just like adults do! We are sincere in wanting what’s best for your kids, so we're committed to preventing deficiencies of EFAs in your little ones. And finally, perhaps the most important of all (since this is where it all begins).Optimal PregnancyAvailable as a stretch goal for $25!Having an Optimal pregnancy is of unparalleled importance. These are arguably the most critical (9)-months of development.But having an Optimal pregnancy is about more than just the health of the child -- it's also about the health of the mother! The reproductive system is extraordinary. Putting our children before ourselves begins long before birth; the mother's body automatically prioritizes the health of the fetus over her own -- transferring as many micronutrients as possible through the placenta.As an expecting mother, you now have two mouths to feed. Optimal Pregnancy will ensure there is an abundance of vitamins and minerals (and the right vitamins and minerals) to go around. Optimal UpbringingAvailable as a stretch goal for $25!We want to offer a package that combines Optimal Kid's Vitamins + Minerals with the Optimal Kid's EFAs. However, what we really want to offer is an opportunity. In addition to supplying your child's body with the raw materials it needs to grow and thrive, Optimal Upbringing is an opportunity to cement a crucial behavior into habit; the habit of self-care. An Optimal lifetime may be the holy grail, but it must start somewhere. For this reason, we are working to facilitate a healthy future by making Optimal Kids more effective and affordable. Optimal FamilyAvailable as a stretch goal for $89!This package combines the Optimal Triad (Optimal Vitamins + Minerals, Optimal Bones, Joints + Beyond, and Optimal Essential Fatty Acids) with our Optimal Upbringing; taking care of you and your little ones. Optimal Pregnancy CompleteAvailable as a stretch goal for $240!Optimizing one's pregnancy is obviously important, but facilitating pregnancy is often overlooked. We tend to think of pregnancy as a (9) month affair, but what about the months leading up to it?This (12) pack of Optimal Pregnancy is designed to help you create the healthiest, most hospitable environment possible, and it would be our pleasure to offer it to you at an Indiegogo special discount if we're able to reach our fundraising goal. In the best case scenario, we think it is viable to have product delivered to your door in (4) months. Our manufacturer has a guaranteed (90) day lead time on initial purchase orders, and beyond that, we'll have to navigate FDA compliance. Like all realistic time-tables, though, there will be unforeseen challenges; so in the spirit of transparency, we'll update you if we run into any hiccups.With transparency being the name of the game on Kickstarter (as well as our company motto), we want to walk you through exactly how we came up  with our budget.MOQAs for our minimum order quantities, we have to finance 1,500 initial units of each product from our manufacturer. If this was our only expense, our fundraising goal would be much smaller -- because in the purest form of Indiegogo spirit, we aren't looking to profit on these units at all. There are, though, additional costs we need to think about.INSURANCEObviously, we'll need insurance -- and unfortunately we anticipate that cost being significant.FDA COMPLIANCEUnderstanding the web of FDA regulations should probably be made simpler (just saying). Not taking any chances, however, we have budgeted to hire an FDA Compliance Attorney.NLEA INSPECTIONAll products must pass NLEA inspection (Nutritional Labeling and Education Act). Basically, we have to prove that what we're putting on the label is an accurate representation of our products. It's a simple, but necessary process.FULFILLMENTWe planned to do this ourselves to save money, but in terms of practicality, drop-shipping from our manufacturer is the only reliable option. If we're going to live up to the word Optimal, we can't be delaying shipments because we're busy learning on the job.FEESAll that remains are the fees associated with all successful campaigns; one for Indiegogo for providing this awesome service, and another for the processing fees between the bank and fundraising platform. This is why the ultimate goal exceeds the $66,725 figure.Your health is worth the investment.We don't just say that because we want your support. We say that because it is the truth. Monthly, would you be willing to forgo a night out with friends in order to prioritize your physical and mental health? Would you be willing to scratch the lottery tickets that never win (pun intended)? Either or, that's all it would take!With the help from Indiegogo, we can do something truly special and offer a great series of products for just over $2/day. That's less than your morning coffee on the way to work. Worth it if you ask us.Before you read this section, we want to be perfectly clear:100% of the dollars generously pledged through this Indiegogo campaign will go towards product development and fulfillment of our Optimal Nutrients.However, we wanted to share something that is near and dear to our hearts. Please watch this video: Once Optimal Nutrients is thriving in a sustainable way, our plan is to turn our focus (and extra profits) towards the proper funding of a charitable initiative we care deeply about -- Step Up Movement.Years ago we began offering free exercise classes at our local homeless shelter. What started with 2 participants quickly grew to over 100, and what was simply a fitness class evolved into a transformational program focusing on physical health, psychological wellbeing, and proper nutrition.The results have been astounding. We founded this 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization because of a responsibility we felt to help those on the margins of society, and this sense of duty only grows as we become more successful. Preventative healthcare is the future, and by virtue, we envision Step Up Movement at every homeless shelter across the country. So, as charitably motivated people, we intend to donate a significant portion of our future revenues in an effort to properly fund this program.If you'd like to learn more or get involved, please email Guy at contact@guywaltman.comThis is either the time for a closing statement, or an invitation for more. As a closing statement, let us just briefly thank you. If you've read this far, clearly, we have your time and consideration to be grateful for. Also, thank you for caring enough about your health to think Optimally!We thought you might like to meet the team. You can read more about each of us on our website, but our names are Guy, Meryem, Kate, and Paula. We aren't big on titles. All you really need to know is that we are fully committed to bringing you the best products humanly possible.This isn't just the Optimal Team. This is YOUR team. We created Optimal Nutrients not just for our family's and ourselves, but for you and yours as well. When we say we are here for you, we mean it. As for an invitation for more; we don't want to this to stop once you get our product in your hands. Instead, we hope this will be the beginning of an amazing relationship! We are easy to get ahold of, and we hope you'll reach out.Don't believe us? Call our bluff. Reach out to the team at www.optimalnutrients.com or try the contact portal on www.guywaltman.com to reach Guy directly. You can also send a message to connect with Paula at www.paulasitek.com. As people who enjoy meaningful conversation, we look forward to hearing from you; and hopefully, while we're at it, serving you to our greatest ability!

story:
Chronic Wound Management

 I have spent over 20 years in the medical field. I have worked in and around the field of wound care as a nurse wound consultant for over 14 years. This was a field that found me wanting. Wanting to understand how this public health challenge could be so profound yet invisible to the world. The costs of treating are in the billions annually. Worst of all, this field of medicine is not included in any disciplines primary school. Hundreds-of-thousands of nurses and doctors, in the US alone, are treating people without the proper knowledge or education to do so. Thus driving up the costs, causing people to go months and even years with open, smelly, chronic wounds and worst of all, amputations. Tens-of-thousands of amputations are done annually due to non-healing chronic wounds. In some cases the incidence of chronic wounds are higher than those of breast cancer. 

Just in my short time of practice in this field, I have helped people with non-healing chronic wounds, present for as long as 18 years, heal in a matter of months. I have spent countless hours learning and educating myself in this field. I am currently a registered nurse and a Diplomate of the American Board of Wound Management along with many other current and past certifications in the field. I already have an outreach website, healthtoheal.org and a face book page; Health to Heal, where I have been a part of caring for people and educating clinicians in 10 different countries. I can say with the upmost certainty that this is also a world wide health crisis. Because there is such a knowledge deficit, I call wound care the worst field in medicine. Further, wound care can be considered just as much of an art as it is a medicine. We even lack the abundance of research that is afforded most every other area of medicine due to the ethical principles of medical research.

I have developed a tool for this field. This tool will instantly increase and improve the accuracy of chronic wound treatment in the hands of any user. By answering just a few questions my app will give a minimum of 4 recommendations of dressing types, cleansing agents and topical products that guide the user to successful management of chronic wounds. I already have a working algorithm on paper. It is ready to be written into code and published for use. Once the app is created, there will also be a corresponding website in which to contact me via email for any other information, for which I will offer at no additional cost. 

The Wound Guru, is the name of the app. I am told that this app is not complicated and will be on the lower side of typical app development costs. I am seeking $15,000.00 for this project. I plan to make this app available for a very small monetary cost. For the first 30 days the app will be free of charge. Afterwards I will establish a monthly subscription of $10.00 or less for the app's use.  Any member that downloads the app will have the ability to email me directly with any challenges they may find in there practice. I already do this for free through my Health to Heal Outreach Program, helping 4-6 people a month. The Wound Guru is another way for me to be able to reach more and more clinicians and people struggling with chronic wounds.

I am speaking with developers currently and thus far have received quotes in the range of $12,000 to $15,000. I am also proposing to the developers an opportunity to build and splitting the cost as a buy in option. Any funds afforded to me in these donations will get applied directly to the development of the app. This project is fluid and I am open to any means of assistance to move forward with The Wound Guru.

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
A hairdresser walks into a bar.

He is of Italian heritage and for twenty years has catered almost exclusively to executives and celebrities.

He takes a seat next to a marketing man and girl and up comes an idea.

So the bearded marketing man curates a list of cosmetic manufacturers across the country and hones in on the Alpha of them all.

Fifty-five hours go into developing what seems to be a better way to go blonder: all-natural, built of organic ingredients, infused with Cactus Sea Salt for the perfect fragrance.

Their twelve apostles take home small bottles of the potion and are piloting it as I write.

The bearded fellow knows a guy who knows a guy over in Hollywood who hangs with A-list celebrities — G-Wagons, Paparazzi, Popularity.

So Combs Care Cosmetics becomes a triadic sproutling working to develop and introduce this all-new, natural and organic-ingredient based purple shampoo for bold blondes. More than 50 hours of clinical work have so far gone into R&D for the debut product.

Based out of North Hollywood and collaborating with an established cosmetics developer, Combs Care is a budding start up that prioritizes health and holistics over harmful additives and unpronounceable ingredients.

It is an organic coconut milk shampoo with d-panthenol and aloe vera gel, fragranced by cactus sea salt.

Our stamina and resolve will be tested over and over as we make our entrance into a glutted market.

Valuing consumer over commerce, we aim to make our cosmetics cater to people who want look good and feel good while doing it.

Our effective formulation aims to repair, moisturize and strengthen hair from the core. To repairs split ends, condition hair to a silkiness with vitamin E and tocopherols to stimulate scalp circulation and so promoting healthy new hair growth. Infused purple pigments protect and provide toning results for bleached and blonde hair.

Combs Care. For better, bolder blondes.
