story:
For some of us, it is really annoying! For viewers, canned laughter can distort the dialogue, make it hard to hear clearly or understand, or simply insert laughs in places that you don't think are funny.

What if you could “kill” the canned laughter of your favorite sit-com?

What if you could remove audience sounds like laughter and declare yourself free of “programmed response” to laugh only when you feel like it?

Some of us really don’t like laugh tracks and wondered if a device could be built to remove the canned laughter. As scientists with expertise in image and audio signal processing, as well as speech and vocalization analysis, we were all intrigued.  Undesirable canned laughter is definitely a “sound” issue – which is right up our alley.  A survey of others revealed this was a common issue.  Over 80% of our survey audience replied that laugh tracks on television shows annoyed them.  Armed with that insight, we decided to design a simple do-it-yourself solution that anyone could use with his/her own TV.

Kill The Cann (KTC) reduces or removes laughter from the television audio using our advance signal processing algorithm (patent pending). It works with existing HDMI streaming devices like your DVR and Chromecast. Simply connect the HDMI cable of your DVR to our device and then connect it to your TV. It is very simple to use. Just turn on the switch to remove laughter in any show you are watching.

The available audio tracks of a multi-track television program are processed to remove or reduce certain components of the program, especially audience sounds.  This applies to any program which is supplied with several audio channels, whether provided by cable, DVD, Internet streaming, or otherwise.

How it Works

A single, multi-channel electronic audio stream enters from the left and is split into single channels.  The channels are collectively processed in block P above and reassembled into a multi-channel audio stream, which is output on the right.

In the middle, the audio streams are filtered in several ways to isolate the audience sounds to be removed or reduced.

To understand what we do, you need to know how audio engineers assemble the sounds of a sitcom. Generally, music/special effects get a left and right channel, the left and right sides of the audience get left and right channels, and one channel is dedicated to low-frequency sounds (bass). Finally, the performers get one channel – which they share with the middle of the audience.

In our processing, each of the audience tracks and the performance track get special attention.

Isolating Audience Sounds

First, our processing measures the two audience tracks to decide when the audience is laughing.  These audience filters are then used to "mask" the audience part of the performance track, too, to produce an improved performance track. This requires some care in order not to suppress the actors' voices as well, if the audience is not quiet enough.

Afterward, the bass and music/special effects channels are recombined with the improved performance track.  We also include the audience tracks, minus those masked parts, for better audio realism.



While You Are Watching TV

What happens "inside the box"?  Once the switch is flipped on the KTC device that is attached to your TV, audience sounds are suppressed and effectively blocked from the television show's audio, allowing you to laugh only when you  think something is funny!

The ultimate plan is to use the working prototype funded by this campaign to move to a commercial production model for the consumer market. We believe that crowd funding the development and involving our funders at various points in the development process will get us true consumer input that will help build a device with real utility for people who dislike canned laughter in their entertainment experience. 

Schedule

The product's software functionality has been in development for more than a year (with patent pending), and the underlying analysis software for almost 20 years.  Developing it to the point of manufacture will require several additional steps.  First is to produce a functional, though clunky, Kill The Cann (KTC) prototype. Yes, you will be able to see it in action and also touch the boards.  (But if you don't want to connect the wires yourself, you should wait for the next step in the process!)  $50,000 is the anticipated budget necessary to pay for the hardware and software development for this step.

Your contributions will be used to fund hardware integration with existing HDMI development boards if available (or commercial boards like the Raspberry Pi, if not) with analog stereo output.  This will take two months to select and source the boards through our design partners, Advanced Research and Development.  On the software side, funds will be used to incorporate our real time processing into the current (non-real-time) version of the algorithm, requiring two months time.  Converting the software system to run on the board will occupy the next three months.  By the end of six months, delivery of prototypes to backers and testers will commence.

If our funding goals reach or surpass $90,000, we will be able to develop HDMI splitting hardware in-house, even if convenient, reliable development boards are not available.  Should we reach the outstanding level of $120,000, work can begin on HDMI reintegration for full High-Def audio output.

Risks

It may take some time to find the right prototype HDMI board.  It's easy to find HMDI boards out there.  So, what's the hitch?  The answer is, some name-brand companies won't do business with us until after they think we'll be successful.  (Your contributions will actually help with the convincing.)  We are prepared for this, but it is still a schedule risk.

Functionally, the simplest product will pass the video through without buffering.  However, the audio processing requires a small delay.  In our experience, this delay changes the video/audio synchronization right in the "gray area" between unnoticeable and annoying, about 1/30 of a second.  So, if our first users, including those who contribute at the product-testing, like the result, the product will be ready to move to the next stage - design for manufacturing.  (No more wires!)  If the delay is annoying, a slightly more complicated and more expensive design is required, one that can buffer the video to delay it enough to stay synchronized with the audio.



Join the Kill the Cann Revolution!  

How? 

By contributing to our campaign and freeing yourself to laugh at will, NOT on demand.

Every revolution needs people who believe - help us spread the word!

To hear it in action, click here:  http://www.killthecann.com/hear-it-in-action/
story_txt:
For some of us, it is really annoying! For viewers, canned laughter can distort the dialogue, make it hard to hear clearly or understand, or simply insert laughs in places that you don't think are funny.


 What if you could “kill” the canned laughter of your favorite sit-com?

What if you could remove audience sounds like
laughter and declare yourself free of “programmed response” to laugh only when
you feel like it?



Some of us really don’t like laugh tracks and wondered if a device could be built to remove the canned laughter. As scientists with expertise in image and audio signal processing, as well as speech and vocalization analysis, we were all intrigued.  Undesirable canned laughter is definitely a “sound” issue – which is right up our alley.  A survey of others revealed this was a common issue.  Over 80% of our survey audience replied that laugh tracks on television shows annoyed them.  Armed with that insight, we decided to design a simple do-it-yourself solution that anyone could use with his/her own TV.

Kill The Cann (KTC) reduces or removes laughter from the television audio using our advance signal processing algorithm (patent pending). It works with existing HDMI streaming devices like your DVR and Chromecast. Simply connect the HDMI cable of your DVR to our device and then connect it to your TV. It is very simple to use. Just turn on the switch to remove laughter in any show you are watching.

The available audio tracks of a multi-track television program are processed to remove or reduce certain components of the program, especially audience sounds.  This applies to any program which is supplied with several audio channels, whether provided by cable, DVD, Internet streaming, or otherwise.


How it Works

A single, multi-channel electronic audio stream enters from the
left and is split into single channels.  The channels are collectively
processed in block P above and reassembled into a multi-channel audio stream,
which is output on the right.
In the middle, the audio streams are filtered in several ways to
isolate the audience sounds to be removed or reduced.
To understand what we do, you need to know how audio engineers
assemble the sounds of a sitcom. Generally, music/special effects get a left
and right channel, the left and right sides of the audience get left and right
channels, and one channel is dedicated to low-frequency sounds (bass). Finally,
the performers get one channel – which they share with the middle of the
audience.
In our processing, each of the audience tracks and the
performance track get special attention.

Isolating Audience Sounds

First, our processing measures the two audience tracks to decide
when the audience is laughing.  These audience filters are then used to
"mask" the audience part of the performance track, too, to produce an
improved performance track. This requires some care in order not to suppress
the actors' voices as well, if the audience is not quiet enough.
Afterward, the bass and music/special effects channels are
recombined with the improved performance track.  We also include the
audience tracks, minus those masked parts, for better audio realism.


While You Are Watching TV


What happens "inside the box"?  Once the switch is flipped on the KTC device that is attached to your TV, audience sounds are suppressed and effectively blocked from the television show's audio, allowing you to laugh only when you  think something is funny!
The ultimate plan is to use the working prototype funded by this campaign to move to a commercial production model for the consumer market. We believe that crowd funding the development and involving our funders at various points in the development process will get us true consumer input that will help build a device with real utility for people who dislike canned laughter in their entertainment experience. 

Schedule



The product's software functionality has been in development for more than a year (with patent pending), and the underlying analysis software for almost 20 years.  Developing it to the point of manufacture will require several additional steps.  First is to produce a functional, though clunky, Kill The Cann (KTC) prototype. Yes, you will be able to see it in action and also touch the boards.  (But if you don't want to connect the wires yourself, you should wait for the next step in the process!)  $50,000 is the anticipated budget necessary to pay for the hardware and software development for this step.
Your contributions will be used to fund hardware integration with existing HDMI development boards if available (or commercial boards like the Raspberry Pi, if not) with analog stereo output.  This will take two months to select and source the boards through our design partners, Advanced Research and Development.  On the software side, funds will be used to incorporate our real time processing into the current (non-real-time) version of the algorithm, requiring two months time.  Converting the software system to run on the board will occupy the next three months.  By the end of six months, delivery of prototypes to backers and testers will commence.
If our funding goals reach or surpass $90,000, we will be able to develop HDMI splitting hardware in-house, even if convenient, reliable development boards are not available.  Should we reach the outstanding level of $120,000, work can begin on HDMI reintegration for full High-Def audio output.


Risks


It may take some time to find the right prototype HDMI board.  It's easy to find HMDI boards out there.  So, what's the hitch?  The answer is, some name-brand companies won't do business with us until after they think we'll be successful.  (Your contributions will actually help with the convincing.)  We are prepared for this, but it is still a schedule risk.
Functionally, the simplest product will pass the video through without buffering.  However, the audio processing requires a small delay.  In our experience, this delay changes the video/audio synchronization right in the "gray area" between unnoticeable and annoying, about 1/30 of a second.  So, if our first users, including those who contribute at the product-testing, like the result, the product will be ready to move to the next stage - design for manufacturing.  (No more wires!)  If the delay is annoying, a slightly more complicated and more expensive design is required, one that can buffer the video to delay it enough to stay synchronized with the audio.






Join the Kill the Cann Revolution!  
How? 
By contributing to our campaign and freeing yourself to laugh at will, NOT on demand.
Every revolution needs people who believe - help us spread the word!

To hear it in action, click here:  http://www.killthecann.com/hear-it-in-action/

story:
Celebrity Dildo has released an exciting range of premium silicone dildos. Our personal story with Celebrity Dildo began two years ago as a general conversation between a couple of mates. Almost a bit of a joke, if you will. Soon, a little digging became extensive research, and we quickly came to learn that our concept was going to be a little tougher than initially thought to realise.


Our product and the production methods we have developed are pioneering, the result of leaving no stone unturned in our pursuit to bring peoples fantasies to life. We experimented with a number of different materials and techniques to finally achieve a result that is and truly captivating and 100% safe.

Producing a highly crafted object at scale requires tight specifications and detailed systems. We've sourced, vetted, and put in the time with many rounds of prototyping with every element of our supply chain to get the project to this point.

Buckhem - Full Colour

During a number of small production runs, we refined Celebrity Dildo further to ensure that we have the character and personality of a hand-finished product. We have been onsite working at our manufacturing facilities coordinating our final tooling and production moulds.

We love our product, but we needed real answers, so in January we turned to the AVN Expo in Las Vegas to gauge consumer interest. The response was truly overwhelming. As you can see from the images in our gallery, our products were extremely well received and enjoyed by all.

The Kock - Full Colour


We are finally ready to go into mass production.

Manufacturing projects always have risks, we've mitigated those risks by having a product that is fully ready to go. We ensure full transparency on any unforeseen issues.

To do this we need to make the steel production moulds, colour production moulds and revised packaging. Your contribution and support is so important to us, as it will help to prepare for mass production.

We look forward to introducing Celebrity Dildo to the world.

LeBoned - Full Colour


Buckhem LeBoned & The Kock - Flesh

Buckhem LeBoned & The Kock - Platinum

Buckhem LeBoned & The Kock - Gold



Stretched Goal
$75,000
Vibrator Versions (Sample)

If we raise $75,000 we will make vibrating versions of Buckhem, LeBoned and The Kock. The vibrator component will be removable and will feature the same suction cup base on both the dildo and vibrator versions. These will be sample units only, which will include steel sample mould and 10 sample units for each line.

Stretched Goal
$100,000
Vibrator Versions (Production)

If we raise $100,000 we will make the steel production moulds for the vibrating versions of Buckhem, LeBoned and The Kock. The vibrator component will be removable and will feature the same suction cup base on both the dildo and vibrator versions. These products will replace the current dildo versions available.

story:
About Us


We are two cousins who love the traditional and healthy food. Because of that, we took our grandma’s recipe and made her special Jams and Syrups. We want to keep our Romanian tradition alive so we’ve prepared for you three different flavors of Jams and Syrups. We want to invest into the preservation and promotion on a bigger scale of our Romanian traditions and old customs.

                                      

 

Yes, that’s right, the pack comes with 3 flavors: Sweet and Squishy Strawberries, Sugary and Sour Cherries and The Wild-Tart Blueberry. Do you have a favorite flavor?

Our products are made only from natural, fresh and healthy fruits. The strawberries and cherries are purchased from small local farmers and the blueberries are wild, we personally gather them from the mountains. The fruits are grown very carefully into an Eco-Friendly environment, without artificial fertilizer and into a healthy soil.

Because of that, the taste is much tastier and sweeter! You’ve never tasted something as good as our Jams and Syrups.

Made after an old and traditional recipe, our grandma’s recipe, the Jams and the Syrups are sweet, tasty, healthy and :

  • Low in Fat and Cholesterol 
  • 100% All Natural
  • Vegan 
  • GMO Free.
  • No Preservatives
  • No High Fructose Corn Syrup

·  No thickeners!

It’s 100% Vegan and 100% Organic! All of our ingredients are fresh as possible and made with no preservative. Contains Sugar!

This are the best Jams and Syrups that we’ve ever tried!! No kidding.

We love jams and Syrups , we want them to be healthy and sweet in the same time. We search and taste a lot of jams and syrups from commerce but nothing can compete with our recipe. Our grandma’s recipe!!

When you take a jam and look at his label, you find only unnatural ingredients. I think you need to know chemistry to read the label.

We are tired of all this fake products they name it “healthy GMO products”.

That’s why, we took our grandma traditional recipe, we combined the Homemade with the Handmade and we offer you our 100% healthy and natural Jams and Syrups, made at home with fresh fruits, in a clean environment and a traditional white crochet PAT, by us!!!

     

         

Looks pretty tasty, right? Just wait until you try it!

We’ve prepared for you some specials Kits! We will send you only Jam or only Syrup, it’s your choice and we give you the chance to choose your favorite flavor. You can choose only one flavor or you can get the 6 Pack of Jam and Syrup which include: 

    1X Strawberries Jam Jar 

    1X Wild Blueberry Jam Jar

    1X Cherries Jam Jar


And   

    1X Strawberries Syrup Bottle 

    1X Wild Blueberry Syrup Bottle

    1X Cherries Syrup Bottle

                                 

All the bottles and jars will include one personalized homemade crochet Bottle Pat Cover made by us.

++++ Hand written – Special stickers flavors on the jar and bottles!!!

Also, we have a kit with 3 Jam Jars or 3 Syrup Bottles. Tell us which one you wish to get it!!!

           

This is our timeline, we will do as many updates as possible and we will let you know what we do, step by step.



Our Goal

Our goal is to raise $15,000 to get this business off the ground. Our business is based right now into our kitchen, so that’s why we want to turn this into a real business, turn the product commercial.

We will use this money to move the production from our house kitchen to a commercial kitchen. We will buy fruits, jars and bottles and materials for the cover pats, also most of the money will go on shipping.

By the nature of the business we’re in its imperative that we avoid all risk of cross-contamination from day one. That’s why we’re committing the largest portion of the budget to create safe and separate work stations for the jams and syrups. We want to avoid cross contamination is something we take very seriously and so our premises will be set up to prevent this from the start. 


Risks & Challenges

The first challenge is to succeed our campaign, to reach our goal and start the production of our Jams and Syrups. The risk is that we don’t succeed with this campaign and we can’t continue, everything will be over.

Because we are from Romania, another challenge was to find the proper shipping, to find a safe way to deliver our Jams and Syrups so that you will receive them intact.

We are ready to meet our reward obligations, but we need your help to make this happen

We want anyone and everyone to be able to get their hands on our delicious JAMS and SYRUPS!

story:
As featured on...

Who is Out OFF The BOX for?

Out OFF The BOX is for all people out there who have ever considered they might spend too much time on their phones, and decided they want to develop a healthier relationship with their smartphone. It can be yourself or someone you truly care about. Out OFF The BOX is a great self-development tool, and also, an excellent gift for someone who might spend too much time on their phone. The Out OFF The BOX journey is most effective if performed together in a support group.

Out OFF The BOX is for everybody who might suffer from nomophobia. Nomophobia is a state of stress we feel when we can't get access to our phone. We can't find the phone for a couple of seconds, we ran out of battery, there's no data connection, we forgot the phone at home.  We get anxious, even if the situation lasts only for a short period of time.

Phone addiction can take many shape and form. You might spend a lot of time on social media, or checking the latest news, playing games, chatting with your friends, taking food pictures, etc. The methodology of Out OFF The BOX is applicable for all types of dependency. We believe the key to change your behavior is to become a conscious user instead of twiddling with your phone in autopilot mood, and constantly train those consciousness muscles to maintain a healthy relationship with technology.

Out OFF The BOX is the phone diet for people hungry for life. It’s especially beneficial for people who have ever considered taking part in a digital detox, digital diet, unplugging day or an offline Sabbath.

 

What is included in Out OFF The BOX?

Out OFF The BOX will lead you through a 3-step program with the help of 16 tangible tools.

Step 1: In the KICK OFF phase, first, we diagnose your starting point with the help of the How OFF are you? Survey. Then we ask you to define what you want to achieve with the program and make a pledge with Pledge OFF. Finally, we encourage you to find a buddy supporting you throughout your journey, and request his or her help by handing over the OFF buddy pin.

Step 2: The deepest part of your journey is the GO OFF phase. First of all, we invite you to take part in a 30-day OFF challenge with one task for each day. To support this, we include several tools:

  • Functional tools:
    • Alarm clock, so your phone is not the first thing you see in the morning
    • Phone hanger bag, so you can get your phone out of your sight and leave it in the lobby
    • Journal, to rediscover the joy of handwriting and self-reflection
    • Technical tips, so you can set up your phone in a way that best supports your mission
  • Inspirational tools:
    • Phone sticker, to remind you about the intent, feelings and urges you want to satisfy with your phone
    • Inspiration cube, to get some additional boost when you feel like giving up
  • Recreational tools:
    • Nonogram puzzle, to rediscover your creative self
    • Coloring book with colorful pencils to relearn how to focus
    • OFF Bookmark, to re-establish reading as a regular habit

Step 3: In the HOLD OFF phase, we celebrate and focus on maintaining all the results you have achieved. We invite you to retake the How OFF are you? Survey, celebrate your journey with a small surprise gift, and share your experiences on a handwritten postcard.

The User's guide will lead you through the whole Out OFF The BOX journey step by step. It will explain the scientific evidence why the actual step matters and how the elements of Out OFF The BOX will help you reach the given step. 

 

Who are behind Out OFF The BOX?

Out OFF The BOX was created by Bori Kovacs and Eszter Baur, a product designer and a management consultant who have been friends for almost a decade. 

Out OFF The BOX is a personal mission for us. We love technology, but also feel it is increasingly eating up our free time, overloads us with unnecessary information, and makes our human relationships more and more superficial. We realized many of our friends feel the same way.

We are the members of the last generation who still remembers life before the internet. This comes with some very precious knowledge, but also with great responsibility towards the next generations.

We are both fresh moms committed to create a happy and healthy future for our kids. Therefore we want to make sure they don’t grow up surrounded by phone addicts.

We have a history of creating packs to make people’s life better.

  • Bori is the creator and distributor of CÓKMÓK, eventually a pair of bags to allow the children in state care to create a more home-like living space for themselves and connect with children living in happy families. The project was featured at the TEDxYouth@Budapest conference.
  • Eszter created the foundations of the patient recovery pack of Care4Today Orthopaedic Solutions, which won the Innovation Award of the British Medical Association in ‘Most Valuable Patient Initiative’ category.

We have perfectly supplementing skills as a designer and a management consultant. This ensures Out OFF The BOX approaches digital detox from a revolutionary and unique perspective. Bori is a product designer with a special interest in socially responsive design. Eszter is a management consultant with an MBA from London Business School.   

We are hungry for life, so we created a phone diet first for ourselves, then for our friends, and finally for you.

 

How can you help?

After spending long hours talking to experts, reading relevant literature and testing the ideas with potential users, we finalized the concept of Out OFF The BOX and created a prototype.

Your contribution will help the Out OFF The BOX team finish the design of the product, and launch production. We’ve already contacted several potential suppliers to prepare for the production phase, we just need to push the big red button.

Now you can pre-order Out OFF The BOX at a special discount price, or support our mission by spreading the world about Out OFF The BOX. We are tremendously happy and thankful for every contribution you make.

To indicate our commitment, we opted for all-or-nothing (fixed) funding. If you want to see Out OFF The BOX coming live, please make a contribution today.

 

Very special thanks to

Out OFF The BOX could not have been born without the help of the amazing people around us. Very special thanks to Nelli Krajcso (Slow Budapest), Erna Kindli, Aron Antal and David Mihalyi for stress testing and shaping the original idea, Anita Nemes (Nemessis) for the great illustrations, Zoltan Marton for the fantastic video, Zsuzsa Bakonyi (Pogacia Photo) for the phenomenal pictures, Seth D. Meyers for the voiceover, Wouter Moerloose, Ders Nemeth, Szilvia Molnar, Mate Kovacs together with the Mono Lamp and the Feel Flux Indiegogo campaigners for their practical advice and our incredible friends and family for all their ideas and support.

 

FAQ

How can I get help with my payment process?

Contact us at info@getoutoffthebox.com and we will help you! Please remember we are conscious phone users, so it might take a few hours until we will get back to you :)

When will I get my Out OFF The BOX?

We are doing our best to ship the first Out OFF The BOX during February 2018, so you can support your New Year’s Resolution with Out OFF The BOX.

Are you shipping worldwide?

Yes. We've negotiated individual shipping quotes by country, which will be reflected in your backing total. 

Who is responsible for additional taxes, duties or VAT?

We have included VAT in the price based on our local country laws. Additional VAT/duties that may be as a result of a specific country's local tax code may be incurred upon receipt of your reward. These fees are the responsibility of each backer.

Is Out OFF The BOX an app?

No, Out OFF The BOX is a physical toolset with tangible tools.

Are all the products included in Out OFF The BOX designed by you?

No. The concept of Out OFF The Box and majority of its elements are our proprietary design. However the alarm clock, the colorful pencils and the coloring book were designed and produced by third parties.

I suffer from severe smartphone addiction. Is Out OFF The BOX for me?

Out OFF The BOX is a self-treatment for mild phone dependency. If you believe you suffer from severe addiction, please seek out professional help.

Survey, celebrate your journey with a small surprise gift, and share your experiences on a handwritten postcard.The User's guide will lead you through the whole Out OFF The BOX journey step by step. It will explain the scientific evidence why the actual step matters and how the elements of Out OFF The BOX will help you reach the given step.  Who are behind Out OFF The BOX?Out OFF The BOX was created by Bori Kovacs and Eszter Baur, a product designer and a management consultant who have been friends for almost a decade. Out OFF The BOX is a personal mission for us. We love technology, but also feel it is increasingly eating up our free time, overloads us with unnecessary information, and makes our human relationships more and more superficial. We realized many of our friends feel the same way.We are the members of the last generation who still remembers life before the internet. This comes with some very precious knowledge, but also with great responsibility towards the next generations.We are both fresh moms committed to create a happy and healthy future for our kids. Therefore we want to make sure they don’t grow up surrounded by phone addicts.We have a history of creating packs to make people’s life better.
Bori is the creator and distributor of CÓKMÓK, eventually a pair of bags to allow the children in state care to create a more home-like living space for themselves and connect with children living in happy families. The project was featured at the TEDxYouth@Budapest conference.
Eszter created the foundations of the patient recovery pack of Care4Today Orthopaedic Solutions, which won the Innovation Award of the British Medical Association in ‘Most Valuable Patient Initiative’ category.
We have perfectly supplementing skills as a designer and a management consultant. This ensures Out OFF The BOX approaches digital detox from a revolutionary and unique perspective. Bori is a product designer with a special interest in socially responsive design. Eszter is a management consultant with an MBA from London Business School.   We are hungry for life, so we created a phone diet first for ourselves, then for our friends, and finally for you. How can you help?After spending long hours talking to experts, reading relevant literature and testing the ideas with potential users, we finalized the concept of Out OFF The BOX and created a prototype.Your contribution will help the Out OFF The BOX team finish the design of the product, and launch production. We’ve already contacted several potential suppliers to prepare for the production phase, we just need to push the big red button.Now you can pre-order Out OFF The BOX at a special discount price, or support our mission by spreading the world about Out OFF The BOX. We are tremendously happy and thankful for every contribution you make.To indicate our commitment, we opted for all-or-nothing (fixed) funding. If you want to see Out OFF The BOX coming live, please make a contribution today. Very special thanks toOut OFF The BOX could not have been born without the help of the amazing people around us. Very special thanks to Nelli Krajcso (Slow Budapest), Erna Kindli, Aron Antal and David Mihalyi for stress testing and shaping the original idea, Anita Nemes (Nemessis) for the great illustrations, Zoltan Marton for the fantastic video, Zsuzsa Bakonyi (Pogacia Photo) for the phenomenal pictures, Seth D. Meyers for the voiceover, Wouter Moerloose, Ders Nemeth, Szilvia Molnar, Mate Kovacs together with the Mono Lamp and the Feel Flux Indiegogo campaigners for their practical advice and our incredible friends and family for all their ideas and support. FAQHow can I get help with my payment process?Contact us at info@getoutoffthebox.com and we will help you! Please remember we are conscious phone users, so it might take a few hours until we will get back to you :)When will I get my Out OFF The BOX?We are doing our best to ship the first Out OFF The BOX during February 2018, so you can support your New Year’s Resolution with Out OFF The BOX.Are you shipping worldwide?Yes. We've negotiated individual shipping quotes by country, which will be reflected in your backing total. Who is responsible for additional taxes, duties or VAT?We have included VAT in the price based on our local country laws. Additional VAT/duties that may be as a result of a specific country's local tax code may be incurred upon receipt of your reward. These fees are the responsibility of each backer.Is Out OFF The BOX an app?No, Out OFF The BOX is a physical toolset with tangible tools.Are all the products included in Out OFF The BOX designed by you?No. The concept of Out OFF The Box and majority of its elements are our proprietary design. However the alarm clock, the colorful pencils and the coloring book were designed and produced by third parties.I suffer from severe smartphone addiction. Is Out OFF The BOX for me?Out OFF The BOX is a self-treatment for mild phone dependency. If you believe you suffer from severe addiction, please seek out professional help.

story:
Hello,

My name is Kristin Rulon. I am a severe post partum depression and anxiety survivor. After I took the birth control shot, I developed severe PPD/PPA and was told it took take up to two years to back to myself. It's been more than three years now and I have recovered but I have PTSD and anxiety from the experience. Through my research and personal development work, I have been consulting with mental health professionals to build an app that will reward all forms of self-care, building awareness and self-compassion through every-day experiences.

With a husband in the military and a son on the spectrum, I also saw a need for people to connect solely on health concerns. Many people are afraid to share their concerns with those closest to them for fear of judgement, Mind Star will give people the chance to connect on issues and build a lifeline of true support, hopefully, pull people out of isolation and remind them that they are not alone. It's not your mental health, it's not my mental health - it's our mental health and it's time we start thinking about mental health that way. 

The average age that someone was diagnosed with depression in the 1960s was 40, now the average age of someone being diagnosed with depression is 14. One in 5 adults will experience a serious mental health concern that will affect how they live their life. One in 25 adults will experience a mental health concern in their lifetime. These statistics aren't getting any better and we need to start showing people how to love themselves because studies show that those with more self-compassion are more compassionate to others. Studies also show that people who are more giving, more altruistic lead happier lives than those who don't think of others. 

If You Support Mind Star

If you contribute toward Mind Star you will get an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at building an app, you will receive:

  • A weekly newsletter with mental health tips; 
  • A vote in some of the many awesome decisions our team will be making as we build the app; and
  • Progress reports, including my successes and frustrations, as we build. You will be with me every step of the way. 

If you donate financially to Mind Star, you are giving back to everyone, to help build an app that will change the world. I know that's bold to say but that's what I believe. People need to stop beating themselves up and taking care of themselves in a way we were meant to, not the way society teaches us. 

The Impact

I dream about taking this app to a global-level, where it can help people learn or relearn their value in the world, and take away the stigma that self-care is selfish. We can't pour (love) the way we want to from an empty tea cup. We have to refill our cup every day with our own unique self-care routine and the truth is - most people don't even think about a building a unique self-care routine that works for them. Mind Star will help people build awareness and show them it takes more than just eating healthy and going to the gym to life a full, happy life. You have to be in a good mental space to make real changes and the good news is that it doesn't take much effort to rewire the brain, we just think it does ... and Mind Star can help. 

Real talk: Many female entrepreneurs don't receive funding for their projects.

It's true, the numbers are depression but honestly, it doesn't scare me. I'm more concerned about the regret if I told give my all and build Mind Star. I've been told who I should be my entire life. And as much as it is hard to say, my darkest days brought out the warrior in me and not only showed me who I am but who I am meant to be. God made me a fighter, a stubborn woman who doesn't believe in no. When I hear the word "no," and trust me I hear it a lot, I think "onto to the next one." There are more than one way to do things and I don't give up easily.  If people gave up easily, we wouldn't have half the things we enjoy today.

I love the idea of taking other people along with me in this journey because this app is for everyone. We are targeting women first but men and teenagers won't be far behind. So will you join in building something not just for us but for the future?

story:
How long do you sit during a typical day? In the car, a chair, at your office desk or simply sitting on the couch watching TV.

On average we sit for 6 hours every day. We are just too busy to work out.

Here’s what researchers found:

1. While sitting, study subjects burned 80 calories/hour — about the same as typing or watching TV
2. While standing, the number of calories burned was only slightly higher than while Sitting — about 88 calories/hour
3. Walking burned 210 calories/hour

Other potential health benefits of walking are assumed based on the finding that long hours of sitting are linked with a higher risk of

obesity
diabetes
cardiovascular disease
cancer (especially cancers of the colon or breast)
premature death.

Introducing Egofit Walker. Delivering the NEXT GENERATION of walking devices.  We have engineered an innovative, high tech, super comfortable walking device that delivers an effective and healthy result with long-lasting quality.  It can be easily moved and will serve you and your family for many years to come.

PCT patent pending
EU & Japan & Korea &Australia Design & Invention patent pending
US design patent file No.:29674870 / US invention patent file NO.:16355799

 

Anytime - anywhere: first thing in the morning or during the busy working day. Read, Type, Talk, Watch and Drink while staying on your Egofit Walker.

It is the solution to the modern day exercise dilemma! No more excuses! With Egofit Walker you can make use of your time productively and efficiently. At home or in the office, sitting or standing, you decide what works best for your lifestyle.  Move Egofit Walker anywhere and best of all - it takes up no more space than one chair.  Now that is one small footprint!

Keep moving during the day with Egofit Walker! Perfect for any space - home or office!

Egofit Walker helps you keep moving while achieving a Healthier You!  Even when you are at your busiest.

Egofit Walker enables you to reach your walking exercise goal of 10,000 steps per day whilst relieving potential symptoms of sedentary illness such as neck pain, headache, wrist syndrome and so on!

Egofit Walker can easily fit under a desk so extra space needed for an exercise area.

When not in use - hide Egofit under your bed, sofa, desk or in a closet or even upright against the wall!

Egofit Walker is compact and light but offers a solid frame and a powerful motor that will withstand a maximum load of up to 280lbs.

Egofit Walker is whisper-quiet even at top speed (no more than 50DB). You will enjoy the smooth quiet performance of our walker.

Egofit Walker runs very quietly even at the fastest speed(no more than 50DB), you will be fond of walking along with the benefits while no disturbance breaks in.

  

The Egofit is fitted with wheels which makes it easy to move and store away.   

Compactly designed for easy usage and storage. The low profile and size makes the Egofit easy to use and store away.

With Egofit Walker, you can walk anytime, anywhere!

Keep your brain and body active while you work.

 

Walking with variable speed control for different exercise levels!

Adjust to different speed levels so you can concentrate on work while you exercise.  10 adjustable speed levels from intense to relaxed.

  • 1-2km/h /0.6-1.3MPH: Typing And Reading.
  • 2-3km/h /1.3-1.9MPH: Reading and speaking on the phone.
  • 4-5km/h /1.9-3MPH: focus on Walking and Jogging.

Innovative Walking Traction Control system

We carefully examined and tested all existing walker treadmills and found that they all exert a heavy workload on the motor which reduces the lifespan of the device.  We have engineered an innovative compensating dynamic design for our Egofit walker so that it delivers the best exercise experience possible.

Our unique patented walking traction control system makes for smooth and steady walking and comfort and increases the lifespan of the motor by a factor of 5X’s.

 

 

Easy To Move And Store!

 

The idea behind this innovative product!

Back in 2017, we launched the Egofit M2 which is a versatile treadmill that provides a device with 3 functions in 1. At  48 kgs it is a professional exercise machine that is durable and provides a quality workout with easy to read measurement display.

  • It is perfect to use whilst standing at a desk. It fits and stores away in small spaces. 
  • It serves as a great treadmill with a top speed of 12 km/h.
  • We incorporated a vibration plate into this treadmill, so you can vary your exercise regime and get the maximum benefit.

Some customers like having an all-in-one device.  Other customers needed a smaller and less expensive treadmill but they still demanded a high-quality product.  We conducted further market research and realized that weight, build quality, look and feel were important. 

So we started developing prototypes and tested more efficient designs.  We needed an attractive “sexy” design that was lightweight and could be easily moved and stored.

Our customers would easily be able to identify that the Egofit Walker could be portable, ideal for home or office and fit in a car boot.

Egofit walker takes us to the next "evolution" of walking devices, we have engineered an innovative, high tech, high comfort walking device that delivers a healthy, comfortable, and long lasting performance.

Warranty

We offer a one-year bumper to bumper warranty to ensure that you are satisfied with the product that we provide. Please back our project with this in mind. Customer satisfaction is integral to our company and brand.

Risks and challenges

Our product is fully functional and ready for production through our prioritized factory. The product is light for its product category but still much heavier than most other tech or fitness products, so if anything, we may be confronted with some shipping delays to certain countries based on regulations. In order to overcome this, we will work closely with our shipping partners across the world to prepare for these issues ahead of time and gain the necessary clearance to streamline our delivery process.

The product is light for its product category but still much heavier than most other tech or fitness products, so if anything, we may be confronted with some shipping delays to certain countries based on regulations. In order to overcome this, we will work closely with our shipping partners across the world to prepare for these issues ahead of time and gain the necessary clearance to streamline our delivery process.

story:
Xtendpro holds wefts, clip-ins, tape, and strand by strand hair extension methods!

What is it?

Xtendpro is an organizational tool made for hairstylists. It is a plastic head with comb-like horizontal rows that easily hold most hair extensions. 

By securing hair with the silicone Xtendpro Band (which is heat and chemical resistant) the stylist can easily work with the hair while it is off the clients head. 

Use the top fin to clip the horizontal sections up while looking professional and organized. 

With hair extension services growing 70% in the last 4 years more clients will be asking for hair extension services. With the service costing anywhere from $300 to $10,000, clients expect professional and efficient service.

Take your career to the next level and let Xtendpro be your Hair Extension Assistant!



Simply hang the hair extensions on the comb-like teeth, and secure with silicone heat resistant Xtendpro Band.







Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Why would I need to use the bands? 

A: Xtendpro Bands secure the hair and reduce hair falling off the Xtendpro Head. In addition, the bands are made of silicone which is heat and chemical resistant, and will last many uses.

Q: Cant I use a Styrofoam head?

A: The hair extensions fall off the Styrofoam head very easily. It is very difficult to color, wash, and style while keeping the hair in its original placement. Styrofoam is not heat or chemical resistant like the plastic Xtendpro Head.

Q: I can just use a tray, right?

A: No! The client is very aware of what is going on with her hair. She puts extreme value on her hair extensions. Without keeping proper placement, the hair will need to be re-layered, thus creating a shorter hairstyle. A huge pile of hair on a tray is not professional or efficient!

story:
Help us change social media for the better. Click here to donate. 

What makes Phaant different?

  • Save, share, collect, and enjoy your stories and memories in many formats.
  • Settings and a code of conduct that ensure respect and privacy for all.
  • Designed by a relationship expert, based on research, and motivated by love.
  • Geared toward engagement, not entertainment. There's no “like” button, no articles, no filters, no flower crowns, no invasive ads.
  • As a Social Purpose Corporation, doing good is at the core of our business.

 

Social media has distorted what socializing means. It’s gone from really getting to know someone and feeling like they know you, to marketing yourself.

Think about what we do online to try to connect:

  • give people a “thumbs up”
  • talk or rant at no one
  • communicate in memes or gifs
  • share every detail
  • put on disguises/masks/filters
  • post selfies and food pics
  • pretend we’re someone we’re not
  • share articles
  • watch people’s lives

Now, imagine what it would be like to do those things with people in person. Are you picturing it? Kind of silly or weird, right? Maybe even a little creepy?

And often algorithms decide whether our community sees what we have to share in the first place.  In general, social media is a news feed. It updates us on the parts of people’s lives that they choose to show us.

Knowing what’s going on in a person’s life is different than feeling like others know you.

Feeling known, understood, that’s what helps us feel really connected.

Rather than being curious, social beings that truly interact, we’ve had to become experts at marketing ourselves—the assumption being that we are only valuable if enough people “buy” us. Instead of building and cherishing relationships, our socializing and self-worth now focuses on the number of likes we get. We’ve traded connection—real relationships—for likeability. Likeability doesn’t sustain us, yet we’ve been made to believe that the quantity of our likes or followers will make us feel better. Instead, we should be building better quality relationships.

Social media has become exhausting and draining—often making people feel and act worse, not better.

 

Phaant’s goal is to change that.

 

How?

Phaant brings a refreshing approach to how we interact with each other on social media, through collaborative storytelling and shared memories. It’s designed to be more like what we’d expect from good in-person experiences—the kind that build us up and help us feel like a part of something bigger.

Many of our life stories go beyond our individual memories. Has a friend ever shared a fond memory about you that you had completely forgotten about? We have so many wonderful experiences hidden from memory that can be brought back while swapping stories with friends and family. We may think “How did I forget about that!?” and wish we could bring back more of those lost memories—those parts of who we are. Imagine how many of your experiences with friends and family have been forgotten by them. You may be the one person with the key to unlock those forgotten memories, and bring back those lost joys from our shared pasts. 

    Help us change social media for the better. Donate.

     

    By becoming an early supporter of Phaant, you will be a part of the story and can have a keepsake from ours.

    By achieving our goal of $30,000, we intend to put the finishing touches on our prototype and complete initial testing. Donations will cover server fees, administrative expenses, marketing, and development costs. Your support also provides vital traction that we hope will help us secure future financing to move a significant step further—the release of our beta version.

    PARTICIPATE

    Sign up here to receive an invitation when we’re ready to release our beta version.

    DONATE

    In addition to getting the warm fuzzies, your donation will be rewarded with these perks:

    • Phaant Love
    • Digital still download from animated video
    • Sticker sheet
    • Archival-quality print of art from animated video
    • Phaant tote bag
    • VIP access & recognition*
    • Original art piece used in animated video
    • VIP access for you & 5 friends*
    • Guest Curator Opportunity*

    *Disclaimer: Perks that include access or features related to use of the platform are dependent on the completion of a “beta version” of Phaant. Reaching the $30,000 goal of this campaign does not ensure the completion of the beta version, but it gets us a lot closer!

    Guided by research and designed with healthy relationships in mind, Phaant is an intentional social media platform that documents and archives the human experience. Inspired by the Indian folk tale The Blind Men and an Elephant, Phaant honors the fact that one perspective alone cannot provide the full story. With Phaant, we will tell our stories and histories through multiple viewpoints with tools, features, and settings that help you feel seen, valued, and happy, while increasing empathy and well-being.

    Phaant is the brainchild of Margaret Prescott, an artist, entrepreneur, and relationship expert who is motivated to address the growing isolation and divisiveness in the world. Margaret brings her understanding and talents for helping people feel connected to the digital space, and leads a team of creative, passionate individuals who share her vision.
     

    Our mission is informed by our values. We believe in fostering a respectful environment where people feel heard and listen to others. We promote curiosity and believe that we learn more about the world and ourselves when we consider multiple perspectives. We know that connecting with others often involves a certain amount of vulnerability—we aim to create a trustworthy space where people can be true to themselves—enabling them to learn, grow, and connect with others. Furthermore, we recognize the importance of history and preserving the memories and stories that record it.

    To ensure the success of our mission, we’ve chosen to register as a Social Purpose Corporation (SPC) instead of a traditional one. Traditional corporations, such as C Corps, exist to satisfy the demands of the stockholders and investors first. By being an SPC, Phaant can ensure that our mission comes first – taking care of you.

    Our Team

    Risks & Challenges

    While we are confident that Phaant has the capacity to be a game-changing force for good, we realize there are barriers to achieving this dream.

    Your support is a huge step. It helps validate the need for Phaant, builds our user base, and provides us the ability to test the prototype. Once we have accomplished that, our next step—building, launching, and supporting a beta version of Phaant—will require investment capital. Even if we meet our Indiegogo goal, there is a risk that we will not be able to secure the necessary financing round(s) to take us even further. We hope this isn’t the case. But with a strong start, we hope to accelerate the release of Phaant and continue our mission of making the world a better, more respectful, and connected place.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We get it. Life is expensive, and you might not have money to spare to support Phaant. That’s ok! If you care about what we’re doing and you want to use Phaant in the future, there are other ways you can help make Phaant a success.

    Sign up to be an early user on Phaant.com. Tell your friends, family, and community to do the same.

    Share this campaign with others and encourage them to support us—post about it on your social media accounts, text, email, or call your mom/uncle/grandparent/cousin/BFF, they’d love to hear from you!

    Meet up with your favorite people and spread the word together. Have a Phaant love party! (We like to call a group of Phaant enthusiasts a “Phaan Club”, get it?!)

    Share this campaign and your love for it with media outlets that may be interested in promoting it (blogs, newspapers, television, etc.).

    Video Credits

    Video Production & Animation:  Zech Johnson           

    Animation:  Amanda May       

    Music:  Andrew Joslyn            

    Voice: Adra Boo          

    Written by: Margaret Prescott, Zech Johnson, & Katelyn McCarty

     

    Endless thanks to the artists that made this video possible—so much genius, love, creativity, late nights, and colored pencils went into its making.
story_txt:
Help us change social media for the better. Click here to donate. 
What makes Phaant different?

Save, share, collect, and enjoy your stories and memories in many formats.
Settings and a code of conduct that ensure respect and privacy for all.
Designed by a relationship expert, based on research, and motivated by love.
Geared toward engagement, not entertainment. There's no “like” button, no articles, no filters, no flower crowns, no invasive ads.
As a Social Purpose Corporation, doing good is at the core of our business.



 
Social media has distorted what socializing means. It’s gone from really getting to know someone and feeling like they know you, to marketing yourself.Think about what we do online to try to connect:
give people a “thumbs up”
talk or rant at no one
communicate in memes or gifs
share every detail
put on disguises/masks/filters
post selfies and food pics
pretend we’re someone we’re not
share articles
watch people’s lives
Now, imagine what it would be like to do those things with people in person. Are you picturing it? Kind of silly or weird, right? Maybe even a little creepy?And often algorithms decide whether our community sees what we have to share in the first place.  In general, social media is a news feed. It updates us on the parts of people’s lives that they choose to show us.Knowing what’s going on in a person’s life is different than feeling like others know you.Feeling known, understood, that’s what helps us feel really connected.Rather than being curious, social beings that truly interact, we’ve had to become experts at marketing ourselves—the assumption being that we are only valuable if enough people “buy” us. Instead of building and cherishing relationships, our socializing and self-worth now focuses on the number of likes we get. We’ve traded connection—real relationships—for likeability. Likeability doesn’t sustain us, yet we’ve been made to believe that the quantity of our likes or followers will make us feel better. Instead, we should be building better quality relationships.Social media has become exhausting and draining—often making people feel and act worse, not better. Phaant’s goal is to change that. How?Phaant brings a refreshing approach to how we interact with each other on social media, through collaborative storytelling and shared memories. It’s designed to be more like what we’d expect from good in-person experiences—the kind that build us up and help us feel like a part of something bigger.Many of our life stories go beyond our individual memories. Has a friend ever shared a fond memory about you that you had completely forgotten about? We have so many wonderful experiences hidden from memory that can be brought back while swapping stories with friends and family. We may think “How did I forget about that!?” and wish we could bring back more of those lost memories—those parts of who we are. Imagine how many of your experiences with friends and family have been forgotten by them. You may be the one person with the key to unlock those forgotten memories, and bring back those lost joys from our shared pasts. Help us change social media for the better. Donate. By becoming an early supporter of Phaant, you will be a part of the story and can have a keepsake from ours.By achieving our goal of $30,000, we intend to put the finishing touches on our prototype and complete initial testing. Donations will cover server fees, administrative expenses, marketing, and development costs. Your support also provides vital traction that we hope will help us secure future financing to move a significant step further—the release of our beta version.PARTICIPATESign up here to receive an invitation when we’re ready to release our beta version.DONATEIn addition to getting the warm fuzzies, your donation will be rewarded with these perks:
Phaant Love
Digital still download from animated video
Sticker sheet
Archival-quality print of art from animated video
Phaant tote bag
VIP access & recognition*
Original art piece used in animated video
VIP access for you & 5 friends*
Guest Curator Opportunity*
*Disclaimer: Perks that include access or features related to use of the platform are dependent on the completion of a “beta version” of Phaant. story:
Alchemy - transforms plain water into Ionized Hydrogen Water to Supercharge your Immune System, Energy Level, and Lifespan.

It is the first portable Hydrogen Water Infusers made with the latest 5th generation technology that is affordable so it can benefit people worldwide.

The Japanese have long been known for their health and long lives due to their diet and lifestyle.  The younger generation have turned to science for an easier way to have health benefits that fit into their busy lifestyles,  

Trusted by Athletes - Used by Millions - Recommended by Doctors - Helping Patients

More Energy  |  Faster Recovery  |  Less Pain  |  Stronger Immunity  |  Better Skin  |  Feel & Look Younger  |  Live Longer

Research by scientists and doctors in the US and Japan (links here) have made Hydrogen Water the Latest Big Thing for Health, Fitness, and Longevity in Japan for over 10 years, but access to it has been limited to pre-packed Hydrogen Water available in $3 cans, pouches, powder, and countertop generators that cost $1,200 & up.  The only effective method is to make it and drink it right away before the hydrogen dissipates - like soda.

*The Ministry of Health recently approved hydrogen-infused saline IVs to help people recovering from infections and other conditions; and bathing in hydrogen water is becoming a popular spa treatment for fighting wrinkles and skin damage.

Hydrogen Water is supercharged with Antioxidants that go into human cells to get rid of Harmful Free Radicals and Reduce Inflammation and Health Issues.

The Hydrogen molecules attach themselves to harmful free radicals and turn them into water - to be excreted safely. 

Hydrogen is harmless and could help to improve everything from diabetes to hardening of the heart vessels to Alzheimer’s and cancer. 

But don't take our word for it - (links to research)

“I have been drinking hydrogen-rich water myself for years.”

"hydrogen’s impact on therapeutic and preventive medicine could be enormous” 

"inflammation, hydration, pain, improved skin health - can benefit from hydrogen-infused water"

"Arthritis patients claimed hydrogen-rich water has helped ease the pain and reduced inflammation"

According to selfhacked.com (list of 27 benefits):

"Hydrogen water is loaded with hydrogen molecules that can extinguish free radicals and cross the blood-brain barrier, cell membrane, mitochondria, and even the nucleus.

Because of its unique properties, molecular hydrogen has therapeutic benefits in virtually every organ in the body where it exerts antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-obesity, and anti-allergy actions with no known side effects."

Older and more common technology add byproducts such as chlorine and ozone.  Alchemy uses 5th Generation technology with SPE / PEM Membranes to separate pure hydrogen.

There are many hydrogen infusers / generators / makers on the market but only SPE / PEM technology truly works.  They make up about 5% of the market and cost $300 and up.  Alchemy - our first mass market SPE / PEM infuser sells for less than half that.  *Indiegogo backers get huge discounts! 

The Alchemy portable infuser bottle reduces the size and make it easy and affordable to drink the recommended 1.5 liters per day.  There are no expensive refills or extra things to buy.  

ReViVe your health anywhere, any time

Food Grade Quality Components

Each bottle holds 350 ml of water, and the built-in generator base has a rechargeable battery good for at least 10 cycles per charge.  The secret is in the platinum plated and titanium alloy components.  It's also the only Hydrogen infuser in this price range to have a self-cleaning mode.

Alchemy is Certified by the official Japan Osaka Hydrogen Water Promotion Association (JHPA) for quality and contents.  It's an expensive and time consuming process but shows our dedication to offering only the best.  The 1300 ppb concentration of Hydrogen is amongst the highest available.

Other Hydrogen Water Infusers / Generators / Packages

$1,200 countertop unit

http://a.co/9CaGfmh

$587 bottle

http://soososam.com/eng/page/sub20.php?Code=201...

$3 prepacked bottles / single use packs

https://h-factor-water.myshopify.com/?_ga=2.938...

https://www.perriconehydrogenwater.com/shop-hyd...

http://www.npusainc.com/us/en/products/izumio/o..

 

Stretch Goal $30,000 Adds 2 More Colors - we will take a vote from you backers to add Black, Silver, or Brown.

 

Why is Alchemy the best for the price?

There are many hydrogen infusers / generators / makers on the market but only SPE / PEM technology truly works. Alchemy is Certified by the official Japan Osaka Hydrogen Water Promotion Association (JHPA) for quality and contents. It's an expensive and time consuming process but shows our dedication to offering only the best. The 1300 ppb concentration of Hydrogen is amongst the highest available.

What's so different than other look-alike Hydrogen Bottles?

Looks are deceiving. The most important is the JHPA certification. All the components are food grade. Alchemy is also the only model under $300 to feature a self-cleaning function.

ViVe H2O is the first line of powerful portable Hydrogen Water Infusers made affordable to benefit people worldwide.

The founders of ViVe H2O only found out about the use of Hydrogen water in Japan while researching how to improve the quality of life for a friend that was undergoing radiation therapy for cancer.  But it was available only in expensive prepacked pouches or countertop generators.  Other portable hydrogen bottles were either inferior or high priced.

We set out to change that in 2017 and have sold over 100,000 portable units in Asia.  Now we would like to introduce the benefits of Hydrogen Water to the rest of the world, with a goal of 500,000 units by the end of 2019. 

How?  We will keep our quality high and use only the latest technology, and prices affordable (up to 50% less than others) by moving big volumes at low profit margins. 

Why?  Because we believe in the real health benefits of Hydrogen Water and want to make it available and affordable worldwide.

Contact us at live@ViVeH2O.com if you would like to join us on our mission.

story:
The keto diet is a low-carb, high-fat diet that shares many similarities with the Atkins and low-carb diets. The goal of keto diets is to get your body into a state of ketosis -- the metabolic process that burns stored fat for energy instead of glucose (sugar). To reach ketosis, and maintain it, you should usually monitor and track your body’s ketone levels.

However, only ketone is not enough to monitor ketosis

  • Having high ketones does not necessarily mean you are in Ketosis
  • Even ketosis status, you do not lose weight
  • Despite reducing carbohydrate intake, sometimes it is difficult to reach ketosis

 

 

There is another critical piece of the weight loss puzzle that is often overlooked and goes unmeasured when practicing a keto diet -- metabolism. Most keto meters on the market today provide you with only half of the data you need to truly understand your metabolic state and why your current diet is or isn’t working for you.

On top of that, you’ll have to go through painful finger pricks, blow into devices that give you inaccurate measurements, and manually track your progress.  

 

 

 

The days of looking at colored testing strips, blowing into a breathalyzer, or pricking your finger are over.

The KetoPlus is a keto meter that measures and tracks your body’s glucose, ketone, and pH levels, and calculates your body’s Glucose Ketone Index (GKI) to give you a full understanding of your body’s metabolic state.

 

 

After analyzing compounds in your urine using patent-pending image processing technology, the LCD touch screen on the KetoPlus provides you with clear readouts of your measurements so you can understand how your diet is affecting your metabolism. 

 

 

After a quick trip the bathroom in the morning or before bed time, which is part of your daily routine anyway, you’ll have all the information you need to quickly assess your current metabolic health.

 

 

And with the KetoPlus, you’ll have up to 365-days of historical data to reference as well. Now you’ll know why you’re not achieving your optimal health and weight loss goals. 

 

 

 

Even “ketosis” status, you do not lose weight or despite reducing carbohydrate intake, If you're having trouble getting ketosis, you should check your pH value.

If your pH value is low, increasing pH by eating alkaline foods make to reach the optimal "ketosis" state for weight management.

 

Use KetoPlus to understand how your body is responding to your diet so you can make adjustments to achieve your weight loss goals.

 

Use KetoPlus to verify that you’re doing the right things and find your ketosis sweet spot.

 

Use KetoPlus to monitor your metabolic health with accurate GKI and pH levels.

 

Use KetoPlus to track 365-days of data to gain insights into your health and body.

 

Use KetoPlus to make decisions about your health and wellness using real data calculated from quantitative results instead of looking at colored strips of paper.

 

 

The Glucose Ketone Index (GKI) is the ratio between glucose and ketones, and it’s a simple yet excellent way to measure the effectiveness of nutritional ketosis on your metabolic health.

You can use GKI as a tool to identify where you need to make adjustments to your diet, exercise routine, and lifestyle choices to achieve your weight loss goals and optimize your health.

The KetoPlus measures your GKI during every test and stores your GKI so you can track your progress over time. This way you’ll have a better understanding of what’s working for you and your body.

 

 

Make a Sustainable Keto Diet with a Balanced Health

 

Your body’s pH levels can affect your metabolism.

Low pH levels could cause you to lose your ketosis flow and miss your weight loss goals.

The KetoPlus is the only keto meter that can accurately measure your body’s pH levels and your current metabolic state.

If you want to maintain your ketosis flow and achieve your weight loss goals, measure your pH levels with the KetoPlus and then adjust your diet to be more alkaline to get a boost in your pH levels.

 

 

 

 

The KetoPlus provides measurements for GLUCOSE, pH, and KETONES. 

Each component is measured on a scale from 0 - 5 and given a different color so it’s easy to identify the indicated level for a component. The higher the indicated level, the more concentration of that component in your body. 

The KetoPlus also automatically calculates your GKI so you can quickly determine which level of ketosis your body is in.

 

 

There are 3-key areas on the historical graph: GKI, pH, and Date.

A point is plotted along the date axis to indicate your GKI and pH level for a given day. A line is then drawn between each point to show the daily progression of your GKI and pH levels.

Please note that the GKI and pH level lines on the graph are independent and do not affect the results of the other.

Your body’s pH levels can affect your metabolism.
Low pH levels could cause you to lose your ketosis flow and miss your weight loss goals.
The KetoPlus is the only keto meter that can accurately measure your body’s pH levels and your current metabolic state.
If you want to maintain your ketosis flow and achieve your weight loss goals, measure your pH levels with the KetoPlus and then adjust your diet to be more alkaline to get a boost in your pH levels.
 

 
 

 
The KetoPlus provides measurements for GLUCOSE, pH, and KETONES. 
Each component is measured on a scale from 0 - 5 and given a different color so it’s easy to identify the indicated level for a component. The higher the indicated level, the more concentration of that component in your body. 
The KetoPlus also automatically calculates your GKI so you can quickly determine which level of ketosis your body is in.
 
 
There are 3-key areas on the historical graph: GKI, pH, and Date.
A point is plotted along the date axis to indicate your GKI and pH level for a given day. A line is then drawn between each point to show the daily progression of your GKI and pH levels.
Please note that the GKI and pH level lines on the graph are independent and do not affect the results of the other.

story:
WHAT IS THE PROJECT ABOUT?

Corona@home is the first blockchain and deep learning based, distributed masternode computing project for performing molecular dynamics simulations of protein dynamics. The leading focus is on fighting SARS-CoV-2 and all the new viruses in the future, by joining research workers around the world for understanding better the 2019 Coronavirus (2019-nCoV), to accelerate the open science effort to develop new life-saving therapies.

It’s giving us the possibility for simulating protein dynamics, how the coronavirus proteins work, and how to develop therapeutics to stop them or treat.

Our project partly derives from the idea that guided the creators of the long-running project SETI@home, which is unfortunately ending the volunteer program this month. It uses distributed computing to analyze radio telescope data in the Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence. Clearly graphics cards are mainly intended for video editing, gaming and even mining of cryptocurrency. But not everyone knows that they can “donate” their AMD Radeon or Nvidia GPU’s spare compute cycles to analyze and possibly help to fight against the ongoing coronavirus pandemic?

Software that we develop uses the spare CPU and GPU cycles of thousands of game consoles, smartphones and computers, globally to simulate computational antidote design and protein folding.

Viruses include proteins that they use to repress human immune systems and multiply themselves. To follow coronavirus behavior, we want to comprehend how these viral proteins work and how we can invent therapeutics to cure it and eventually stop them.

Corona@home can make use of computer simulations to recognize a protein’s moving parts. After that, scientists have a firm grasp on how the atoms move and cooperate within a protein, they can proceed much more closer to explore therapeutics to treat it.
Simulations like that, demand massive computational power. And our project Corona@home can carry out compute power as possible at fighting SARS-CoV-2.
Because of this networked supercomputer, research workers can project proteins at the level of individual atoms in a fraction of the time, it might take even one powerful computer. Many important biological processes that proteins perform take place over milliseconds to a few seconds. A lot of important biological processes that proteins carry out take places over milliseconds to a few seconds.That might seem short, but measuring atoms as they bounce off one another depends upon time scales in femtoseconds — one quadrillionth of a second.

To model just one millisecond of folding, even average-size protein, on a top-of-the-line PC, it can take like 500 years, but thanks to the possibility of Corona@home, we can split these problems into many individual parts. At the same time we can send them for example to 1,000 people at the same time . Running those calculations in parallel, we can take these problems that would have taken 500 years and instead deal with them in months.
Corona@home serves could be a starting point for new drug design.At this time, scientists often have only one well-known protein structure to analyze. For example, Beta lactamase is a protein that some bacteria deploy to conserve themselves from antibiotics like penicillin. The protein has a long-studied and well-documented structure. But this structure is only about a single snapshot of beta lactamase at one moment in time.

That snapshot contains valuable information, but it’s kind of like seeing a picture of a construction vehicle in a parking lot and trying to guess what it does. Really, what you would like is to watch this thing move around and see how it works together with other machinery to, say, build a building. We’re interested in watching how every atom in a protein moves — as it’s being assembled for the first time and as it goes about its jobs. The atoms in a protein are never still, they’re constantly jostling and moving around. And one genetic mutation changes maybe a dozen atoms out of thousands. We want to understand what that does to the entire protein.

For example examining the movement of beta lactamase, already has revealed “cryptic pockets,” Achilles heel in the protein that could be targeted by drugs but that are not visible in the long-studied snapshot of this protein. The cryptic pockets only reveal themselves when the protein is moving. Corona@home provide scientists a look at long-studied proteins, revealing solutions to biological problems that might be not seen in the first place

As part of the client–server model network architecture, the volunteered machines each receive pieces of a simulation (work units), complete them, and return them to the project’s database servers, where the units are compiled into an overall simulation. Volunteers will track their contributions on the Corona@home website, which makes volunteers’ participation competitive and encourages long-term involvement.

Laboratories around the world are generating in an unprecedented manner, more and more genome sequences and related clinical and epidemiological data associated with the newly emerging coronavirus (hCoV-19) rapidly made available via GISAID (https://www.gisaid.org), which enabled researchers to rapidly develop tests for this novel pathogen. Other labs have shared experimentally-determined and computationally-predicted structures of some of the viral proteins, and still others have shared epidemiological data. We can benefit from improved protein structure prediction using potentials from deep learning as a part of machine learning.

To help us run scientific simulations is the primary way to contribute. These calculations are enormous and every little bit helps! Each simulation you run is like buying a lottery ticket. The more tickets we buy, the better our chances of hitting the jackpot. Usually, your computer or server will never be idle. There is a lot of valuable science to be done, and we’re getting it running as quickly as we can.

 


References:

SARS Coronavirus Membrane Gene at Two Novel
https://res.mdpi.com/d_attachment/molecules/molecules-15-07197/article_deploy/molecules-15-07197-v3.pdf
