story:
LuminoGO is 3D-printed with SHAPEWAYS, it's equipped with 3M FFP3 filters, and the UV-C module works with a light from Philips. These trusted sources enable a qualitative product, and you do not need to rely on us to be sure if the filters are certified or not (as with many other projects who build the filters by themselves which is a highly difficult task).

 

LuminoGO Features

 

 

Use of approved FFP3 3M Filters 

Many masks want to produce their own filters, this comes with a ton of problems, supply is difficult and quality must be checked for every production cycle, materials can be of very different quality and making it an approved product is almost impossible for a small company. To supply a cheap replacement part such as a filter worldwide is not feasible, therefore we are using filters by 3M, thousands of shops in 180 countries can supply these. We rely on 3M since they are the leader in filter technology worldwide and they can offer better quality than we ever could with our resources. As well important is the fact that probably a lot of projects won’t be around for the next years to come, so you can not rely on them to deliver you new filters. The LuminoGO mask, once bought, does not rely on us to produce new filters, you can simply buy certified filters online when you need new ones.

 

 

Ventilated See Through Mask

What we really love about the LuminoGO is the fresh air! The mask is equipped with a strong radial fan that makes sure you will always have enough fresh air in front of you to not breathe in your own exhaled air. The fan is so important since it is the only way to prevent your breath from condensating within seconds at the cooler mask shield. No nano coating, no special material, nothing else will work except a strong fan since the air must be replaced with fresh air inside the mask during each new breath you take.

 

Our patented sound membrane technology

LuminoGO uses a patented sound membrane technology, AT-MU50094/2020, which allows the sound to be transported from inside of the mask to the outside. We used a hard material to cover the mask, since this does not absorb the sound, but rather reflects it back, which is only useful with our proprietary membrane technology. If you use a soft material like silicon, this will absorb the sound, so it will not make understanding people with a mask easier.
With LuminoGO there will be no barrier to understanding, as you can see and hear what people with a LuminoGO mask say.

 

Working UV-C technology

We usually do not like to offend other projects or products, but when it comes to health and safety issues, we believe a bit of open information is necessary to protect people from false promises.

A UV-C LED will by no means achieve anything to help to sterilize air in a facemask. In short: The strongest UV-C LED on the market at a wholesale cost of 52 USD emits only 48 mw of UVC light. Typical projects use either one or 2 but usually weaker ones. It would need about 100 seconds to sterilize about 1 litre of air, the amount you breathe in and out with each breathing cycle. So UV-C LED simply will not work and will not do anything to the incoming or outgoing air at all since it is just not strong enough to perform the sterilization of the amount of air you in- and exhale.

 

LuminoGo uses a Philips fluorescent UV-C light with our own developed electronics and it emits 1100 mW of UV-C light, around 100x as much power as the typical UV-C LED. The light cost around 9USD and you can replace it yourself.


However, we recommend to use the UV-C module, if only, for the sterilization of the exhaled air. Use of UV-C light for the sterilization of air is well researched and many applications are in place, BUT to this day there is no facemask using this technology that has approval as a medical device. We provide the Lumino UV-C module for you to experiment and to help us to push this technology forward.

If you wish to inform yourself about the use of UV-C light for sterilization we recommend to visit the International Ultraviolet Association

 

Filtration of in-and exhaled air

Since it is not only important to protect yourself through the filtration of the inhaled air through approved FFP3 3M filters, as well others should be protected through the filtration of your exhaled air. That is why LuminoGO has the option to filter the exhaled air in various ways, through FFP3 3M filters or through the UV-C module. You have as well the option to not filter the exhaled air at all. 

 

 

 

So many masks on Indiegogo!

When you have a transparent mask that you do not want to fog up, there is only one solution to for this: use a really strong fan, which can create pressure. The transparent masks on Indiegogo, if they use a fan at all, use an axial fan, this one does not create pressure, meaning it is so weak that it does not prevent the mask from fogging up from the inside. A human can emit up to 70ml of water through his breath in 1 hour. If you do not have a very strong fan the mask will instantly fog up. This  can as well be seen in a few videos which are supposed to show how the mask work.

LuminoGO uses a 5 Watt radial fan, which is a really strong fan, able to create pressure to always deliver enough fresh air so the mask will stay transparent. As well, the pressure is important since it creates a constant excess pressure, therefore leaks are less dangerous since the excess pressure will prevent air entering from those leaks.

By the way, do not wear a mask over a beard since this would mean a lot of leaks and air leaking.

We do not promise, like a lot of other projects, features, like CO2 sensors, which alone cost around 140$ (here is the link for one) or microbatteries that can magically last for up to 10 hours.

As well, the claim of many projects to sterilize the air with UV-C light is absurd, since they are only using UV-C LEDs, which are very expensive, one with 10-18 mW radiant flux of UV-C light costs around 50$. Since around 200 mW of radiant flux are needed to sterilize the air, only the UV-C LED’s would cost around 800$ to 1000$.

The LuminoGo has an optional UV-C module, but this does not work with LED’s due to them being this expensive, but with a UV-C fluorescent light from Philipps, which doesn’t emit ozon, and only costs about 9$, with a UV-C radiant flux of 1100Watt, not 10-18mW like the LED’s. (Here is the link for our UV-C lamp at Philips)

 

 

LuminoGO versions 

 

The LuminoGO Story

We are a team of engineers and industrial designers passionate about design and functionality, we usually work for large corporations and develop industrial machinery, this our first personal project directly for you and your safety. Our team is based in Vancouver, Canada, and Vienna, Austria.

We have investigated the masks on the market and concluded that there seem to exist so many possibilities to improve the current designs. Consequently our aim was to create the perfect mask, a mask that helps to see the person wearing it, to be able to talk, to constantly have fresh air for breathing and to eliminate the need for disposable filters in order to reduce waste.

Since the LuminoGO mask is an existing mask, we want to bring this comfortable mask to as many people around the globe as possible, especially to support those who have to work long hours wearing a mask and need to travel. Our transparent mask is expacially important when communicating with the hard of hearing, eldery and children.

We have come a long way already, starting with various prototyps, our second one can be seen below in the gif.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The mask can be already produced right now, but 3D printing and custom electronics are expensive at low volume, the aim of this campaign is to mass produce the product and to source better customized parts at a better price for everyone. Therefor the funding goal is set to 10.000$ since this way we will get a better deals for all the components of the mask.

Please note that every version of the mask comes with a eye shield! 

LuminoGO - Filter: the version with 2x FFP3 3M filters and a strong fan for the freshest possible experience under a mask.

LuminoGO - UV-C Module: the package that has it all, 2x FFP3 filters, a fan as well as the future of filters, the UV-C light module for you to test and experiment. Please note that we do not advice to use the UV-C module for inhalation and we want to make sure that this experimental set is aimed at those who wish to experiment, this is not a proven product.

The LuminoGO mask has a price that resembles the quality -  a long-lasting mask that will support you during travel, long working hours and in everyday life.
The price will enable all the features we are presenting to you to actually work! We are, unlike other projects, transparent about the products we use and what the mask can and can not do!

 

  • As it can be seen on the picture below every mask comes with an eyeshield: 

  • The exact name of the FFP3 3M filters we used and that come with the mask (2x): 3M 2135 P3R. You will be able to easily buy them online once you need new ones. Please note that you can use every filter with a round bayonet. 

 

  • Sealing of LuminoGO: soft silicone foam is used for the inside of the mask, it is about 7mm thick, very confortable through its softness and does not leave air pass.

 

Sizes

LuminoGO comes in 3 different sizes, so all your family members can be equipped with a LuminoGO mask. You can choose between these after placing your order:

*Small                                                  *Medium                                            *Large
(for youngsters from 14 to 18)

 

On the picture below you can see how to measure your head size:

                                                                 

 

Colours 

If you wish you can choose a colour for your LuminoGO when ordering your Corporate Set with 5 complete LuminoGO Filter masks. Match the colour with your corporate identity!

 

The Impact

LuminoGO is not only a new type of mask, it solves several real-world problems:

  • It eliminates the effort to breathe through a filter, which causes severe headaches after 2-3 hours.
  • It always provides fresh air, you will never breathe your own exhaled air again wearing the mask.
  • Your whole face is always visible which improves communication substantially, especially for people with a hearing problem.  
  • You have great acoustics; you can be heard as if you don’t wear a mask (LuminoGO’s patented technology)
  • It is reusable, dramatic reduction of produced waste!! The UV.C version will have no wearing parts.
  • Costs are low since you can reuse it, over a year of use it is almost 90% cheaper than a regular mask.

LuminoGO improves your experience when wearing a mask significantly, you can be seen and heard much better, you can work longer hours and stay concentrated much longer.

 

Cleaning of LuminoGO

The material which is used for the 3D-print of the LuminoGO can be sterilized with common methods such as using an autoclave, steam, heat, UV-Cor vapor of sterilization liquids. The autoclave and steam options can over time harm the ventilator. To avoid this close the opening to the filter.

 

Risks & Challenges

The current LuminoGO model is provided with industry standard FFP3 filters by 3M, most of the advantages of the mask can be used and enjoyed this way. Our goal however is to have the first certified UV-C mask on the market, therefore Lumino needs to undergo a series of certifications and testing. The UV-C modules are therefore only provided for testing and we cannot claim the effectiveness or safety of the UV-C module. The use of the UV-C module happens at one’s own risk.

After this campaign this will be the main focus of the company, anyone that takes part in this campaign will be kept informed about the progress and will have an opportunity to purchase these modules as well new modules also later on at an exceptional price.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

LuminoGO is not only a tech gadget or design item, it was created to actually help people during this difficult time.

Older patients often have troubles understanding people wearing regular masks, people who are hard of hearing also need to see the face to be able to communicate.

In many situations being surrounded by people all wearing masks can be scary, recognizing und reading the expression of the faces is important and allows to stay calm.  

Working long hours with masks is tiering, first because of the effort to breath in air through a regular mask, second because of rebreathing the own air. Both cause headaches extremely fast.

LuminoGO solves these important problems, if you know an organisation or people that need our improved masks, please let us know, and share our project.


We are giving away masks for free to institutions who do need help in this matter such as the hard of hearing.

 

Shipping

We charge a flat fee of 19$ for the shipping. Since we operate from Canada and Austria, we will print and ship masks ordered from Canada, the US and Australia in the US, meaning the shipping time will be fast. If you order from Europe, Asia or Africa, your mask will be shipped from Austria.

 

The Team

story:
Perfect solution for some cool relaxation for any kind of headache or relief.

  • Fast relief of Debilitating headaches and chronic migraines.
  • Reduces the stress and anxiety associated with migraines, headaches, concussions, stress, inflammation,  handovers, chemo recovery, tension, fever, sports injuries and much more
  • Its a natural approach for pain relief
  • Perfect for the Beach, Walking, Jogging, gardening, workout, tennis. baseball, any kind of physical activities in any kind of heat.
Cold Cap Gear Has six Compartments inside the cap that holds the six gel ice packs to provide instant cooling sensation aid target all the pain points on your head.
Cold Cap Gear is a drug-free wearable cap.  Its is a non medical gear that help people with migraines and any kind of headache.
 

 

              * Migraine gel full head coverage ice hat

             *  Reusable headache ice pack and wearable cold therapy hat for tension, sinus, stress                         reliever, pressure pain relief and much more

 

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

Cold Therapy For Your Head

-Migraines are throbbing headaches in mostly one area of the head

-The pounding  or pulsing pain can last for hours or even days.

_Migraines are usually treated with pain medication, but due to their frequent and recurring nature, overuse of over the counter pain medication is concern

-Applying cold ice packs to your head have a numbing effect, which may dull the sensation of pain.

-Using ice packs for headaches and migraine isn't new.  In fact cold therapy for headaches goes back so many years ago.

-Having the Cold Cap Gear with the discreet ice pack pockets is the perfect solution for some cool relaxation in any kind of headaches or any kind of physical activity in hot weather

 

Risks & Challenges

The Manufacturing  Company is Professional and ready to fulfill this project on schedule

Great New is that we've drawn up a practicable production with our manufacturing partner

The prototype has been made and tested thoroughly and the design are all done

We have a highly qualified team

Any chnages to production and their resolution will be communicated to backers as soon as possible

Please Help Us Spread The Word

We can't  Thank You enough for checking out our project and helping us make Cold Cap Gear a reality

story:
I am a 25 year old entrepreneur from the Republic of Moldova, passionate about helping people, as much as I can. This is what spiked my interest for international healthcare and the medical tourism industry altogether. How I came about this particular interest, you might wonder? Last year, while doing an internship in Sri Lanka, I had to undergo an I&D surgery under general anaesthesia because of a large abscess on my leg. I was all by myself in a foreign country, barely understanding my surgeon's English which, to be honest, made me quite uncomfortable. This is how the idea of Health Outsourced was born. For the past 10 months, my team and I have been trying to make a change for the better regarding situations similar to mine. We’re on a quest of making the world a better place, by making sure that people going abroad for treatment or surgery will have the best international patient experience possible. And every each one of you can help us do so.

 

We truly believe everyone should have access to high-quality, affordable healthcare solutions and that is why we have chosen to be active in the medical tourism industry. However, a proper online awareness campaign and a useful, user centered website are crucial to the success of our plan. And this is where you come in. This is how you can help Health Outsourced make a difference for the enormous amount of people with low income or without health insurance. We will aid them in finding healthcare solution outside their own country that will meet their budget, without compromising the quality of the medical services.

       

         All of us together, we'll not just be selling treatments, we'll be offering a better quality of life for people who never expected that to happen!

 

       

Most medical tourism agencies have professional, multi-functional websites, that enable the patients to navigate through all the necessary information on the various hospitals available, to check and compare prices and even schedule consultations. But these medical agencies charge patients starting with basic assistance and care plans.

We want to offer our patients the same level of expertise with the added bonus of free, unlimited support before, during and after their trip. We insist on dedicated personal assistance via phone, email, as well as destination managers who will meet and greet and accompany the patient every step of the way.

Going abroad for medical treatment or surgery can be a very hard decision to make. It's always better to hear a compassionate human voice over the phone, than constantly clicking buttons on a website. That is why Health Outsourced is built around the wish of making such a trip as comfortable and secure as possible for our patients. And that’s what we’re here to do.

          

         For most of the patients going abroad for treatment or surgery is a very hard decision. It's always better to hear a compassionate human voice over the phone than constantly clicking buttons on a website. 

           

The reality we’re all painfully aware of is the following: there are millions of people out there without health insurance and even more without the possibility of covering their medical bills in their own countries. Numbers show over 100 million people falling into poverty because of health care costs worldwide. More so, 62% of all bankruptcies in the USA are due to medical bills. What we are offering is a way out, a chance to steadily breathe again.


For instance, a heart bypass that you would normally have to pay around $150,000 for in the United States, can be covered with about $27,000 in Mexico, or just $6,000 in India. Cancer treatments are some of the most expensive treatments in the US. Do you have any idea how many people need them? Probably just as many as the ones in need of knee replacements, gastric bypasses - the list is endless. Obamacare left over 29,000,000 people without health insurance. Not to mention the waiting lists in countries like Canada or the UK, where you’d have to wait for months on end for a simple consultation. Together we can change all of this.              

                

Up until now, all of our investments have gone into our own professional education and the Health Outsourced website. We have spent $1000 to build and promote our website and around $2000 in trainings and certification programs in the field. This enabled us to officially become Medical Tourism Professionals and our agency is therefor a member of the Medical Tourism Association. We’ve already partnered up with over 17 internationally accredited hospitals from Mexico, Costa Rica, Turkey, Croatia, India and Thailand - making us open for business.

                                                                

We have been meticulously planning this whole thing out. What Health Outsourced needs in order to reach the people who need it the most, is a proper awareness campaign. We have thought of a 3 to 4 month long awareness campaign, based on valuable information spread through different Internet Promotion and Social Media tools. We have estimated the necessary investment for this campaign at around $9000. We also plan on substantially improving the website, turning it into a user friendly and patient centered web platform, turning this into our second biggest expense. It will contain relevant and helpful information on medical travel altogether, and detailed information on facilities and doctors we will be working with. The website will be available in 4 different languages and we are working hard on establishing new collaborations further on.

         

We are greatly appreciative of every act of kindness coming our way, be it money or anything else people have to offer. Maybe you’re a blogger and feel like sharing our story with your audience, maybe you’re a developer and could help us out with our website, or maybe you’re into SEO or marketing and have an idea that could help us out a bunch in our awareness campaign. It’s the thought that matters. It’s the effort that went into your kind gesture that will make us thank you from the bottom of our hearts. Whatever it is your good at, however you feel you can contribute, let us know - we’ll brainstorm a way you can be of help to all the people needing it. We are all part of the same team!

Any form of support, guidance or help will be highly appreciated. Sharing this campaign with your friends, just as much :)
story_txt:
I am a 25 year old entrepreneur from the Republic of Moldova, passionate about helping people, as much as I can. This is what spiked my interest for international healthcare and the medical tourism industry altogether. How I came about this particular interest, you might wonder? Last year, while doing an internship in Sri Lanka, I had to undergo an I&D surgery under general anaesthesia because of a large abscess on my leg. I was all by myself in a foreign country, barely understanding my surgeon's English which, to be honest, made me quite uncomfortable. This is how the idea of Health Outsourced was born. For the past 10 months, my team and I have been trying to make a change for the better regarding situations similar to mine. We’re on a quest of making the world a better place, by making sure that people going abroad for treatment or surgery will have the best international patient experience possible. And every each one of you can help us do so. We truly believe everyone should have access to high-quality, affordable healthcare solutions and that is why we have chosen to be active in the medical tourism industry. However, a proper online awareness campaign and a useful, user centered website are crucial to the success of our plan. And this is where you come in. This is how you can help Health Outsourced make a difference for the enormous amount of people with low income or without health insurance. We will aid them in finding healthcare solution outside their own country that will meet their budget, without compromising the quality of the medical services.
       
         All of us together, we'll not just be selling treatments, we'll be offering a better quality of life for people who never expected that to happen! 
       
Most medical tourism agencies have professional, multi-functional websites, that enable the patients to navigate through all the necessary information on the various hospitals available, to check and compare prices and even schedule consultations. But these medical agencies charge patients starting with basic assistance and care plans.

We want to offer our patients the same level of expertise with the added bonus of free, unlimited support before, during and after their trip. We insist on dedicated personal assistance via phone, email, as well as destination managers who will meet and greet and accompany the patient every step of the way.
Going abroad for medical treatment or surgery can be a very hard decision to make. It's always better to hear a compassionate human voice over the phone, than constantly clicking buttons on a website. That is why Health Outsourced is built around the wish of making such a trip as comfortable and secure as possible for our patients. And that’s what we’re here to do.

It will contain relevant and helpful information on medical travel altogether, and detailed information on facilities and doctors we will be working with. story:
"Any man who is intelligent must, on considering that health is of the utmost value to human beings, have the personal understanding necessary to help himself in diseases." 

                                                               - Hippocrates


SPREAD THE WORD  SHARE A TWEET

                                LEARN MORE

Halean Health - The Vision 

Halean Health is founded on the vision that everyone should have access to the most innovative, accurate and practical solutions to a healthier life. Halean understands that true health involves a multifaceted and dynamic approach to incorporate wellness through all aspects of life. Our mission is to build a dynamic platform which manifests in and simplifies our busy lifestyles with solutions that foster lifelong health for everyone. 

Everyone is different... Everyone has different health needs. By analyzing key information in regards to your past medical history, current functional status and future wellness goals, Halean utilizes proprietary algorithms to provide you with innovative and scientific wellness solutions that conveniently fit your life. 

Halean also understands that wellness needs change throughout life and is designed to be customized to your wellness needs regardless of your stage of life.   By addressing your wellness in this moment Halean has two goals: to advance your current wellness to a higher level... and also to pre-emptively screen for future risks to address issues before they become a wellness concern. 


Halean Health For Your Life

Your health is the complex sum of nearly every choice you make in life. Some choices weigh more heavily than others but they all either add or deduct from your overall health. Halean Health is an innovative tool built from years of research and scientific literature which seeks to incorporate the latest technologies bringing you optimal healthy living, in its simplest form. Halean is here to help you live as the best you. By integrating the Halean platform across devices, healthy living in your life will be simplified anywhere, anytime. 

Features

#TrainWisely

Exercise to the beat of your own heart!


With Halean, take your training to the next level and make your workouts more effective and more efficient than they ever have been before. The Halean Platform delivers customized exercise tracking, and workout programs which meet your specific needs. Get the most from your wearable fitness trackers by pairing them with Halean's intelligent platform (compatible with bluetooth enabled devices). Visual, audio and tactile biofeedback in conjunction with your current wearables and heart rate monitors help keep your workouts at an ideal intensity, every time. Gradual exercise progressions allow your body to slowly adapt over time and will take your workouts to the next level as seamlessly as possible. With Halean you will achieve all of your fitness goals in  the safest and most practical manner. 


Unleash your Potential


Sample 12 week exercise progression collected during Alpha-Testing using Mio Fuse Wearable.

*Heart rate data simplifies exercise progression and allows for exercise intensity to be customized to each individual. Visual, audio and tactile biofeedback cues the individual to maintain the exercise intensity within or above their green "target zone."  

#EatWell

"Let food be thy medicine, and medicine be thy food!" - Hippocrates


Most of us know what healthy meals look like. Many of us however, don't have the time, patience, know-how or resources to regularly incorporate healthy eating into our lives. Halean understands that healthy eating is a vital component of a healthy life and has set out to revolutionize the ways you Eat Well.  From the ways you view nutrition, to tracking past meals, to planning your future meals, Halean has a better way.


#PlayFiercely #BuildCommunity

New friends, new places, and new ways to keep active!


Although exercise and nutrition are vital components of a healthy life, Halean knows that your best health requires so much more. Life is about the moments enjoyed with others. The goals achieved with those around you. That is why the Halean platform incorporates tool and resources to help you build community and play more fiercely than ever. 

#LiveAbundantly

"Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity." - Hippocrates


Living abundantly is Halean's goal for you! By carefully analyzing your key information provided in Halean's past medical history and current functional abilities forms, preventative health and the most scientific treatment options will be provided. So now, wether you currently have or are predisposed to things like back pain, poor posture, balance problems or a variety of other physical conditions, Halean has a solution. Look no further, this is where the answers find you. 

How Halean Works

Halean addresses all of your wellness needs. It is designed so that anyone can have access to the best and most accurate information and wellness resources at their fingertips. Halean removes the guesswork, problem solving and searching for a better answer to instantly give you the best solutions for your wellness. 
Halean is designed as a simple to use platform which tracks past wellness data and helps you take small but meaningful steps towards improved wellness in your future. Wellness is not cut and dry... Wellness does not boil down to doing this or avoiding that... Wellness is the complex sum of nearly every choice we make in life. Halean is here to help tilt the sum of your wellness choices into the positive direction.  

Our Story

Halean is what has become of a vision, which began nearly 3 years ago, to empower individuals with resources to effectively manage their own health and wellbeing. At the time, Jordon was a graduate student in a Doctoral of Physical Therapy program and began to observe some of those closest to him gradually experience various health concerns. Many of these health concerns were easily treatable and preventable, yet were difficult to overcome and manage.

With a medical background, an interest in technology and a desire to incorporate some of the latest resources available, Jordon began to seek ways to better empower those around him with tool to manage their health to achieve a state of complete well-being. With the recent explosion of technology, information and wearable devices it became apparent that there was no shortage of ways for individuals to "track" their habits and routines. There is a tracker for nearly anything. He did realize however, that there was a need for an effective resource, which could be proactive in nature, and that could gradually guide individuals towards their diverse wellness goals in an efficient and effective manner. Many individuals were in need of a resource which would provide unbiased, accurate information and which could provide users with tools to remain accountable to their goals. Thus the initial concept of Halean was born. 

Fast forward 3 years and a vast amount of research, collaboration and development has lead to this early stage wellness platform which has the power to revolutionize your health. Halean has the ability to guide you to a state of improved well-being, if you only let it and embark on this journey with us.

Halean 

Hale:  Free from defect, disease or infirmity. Retaining exceptional health and vigor.

Just as vigorous health and wellbeing was bestowed upon royalty, so too Halean bestows it upon you. Through the vast tools and resources available through Halean, explore life with a newfound vigor and robustness. 

Project Timeline

Risks & Challenges

Halean is a bold vision to empower everyone who seeks improved wellness, with the most innovative tools and resources to manage their own wellbeing. This journey will not be without risks and challenges. 

From the software development perspective we have already initiated relations with a large developer who can meet the complex and dynamic needs of such a platform as Halean. We are however, to a point where we need your help, good faith and support to fully bring the Halean platform to life. 

Collaboration among a number of health and wellness professionals has contributed to the eclectic nature of the Halean platform. As we continue to define Halean into the future we will only continue to further collaborate with wellness experts in their respective specialties and will always seek to build a revolutionary, vision oriented team. 


FAQ's

1. Why do I need Halean Health?

Halean Health is a 21st century platform and integrated application which will help you optimize your wellness. If you have ever failed to achieve a wellness goal, Halean is for you. The interactive platform incorporates the latest scientific research and technologies to simplify healthy living in your life. Halean removes all of the guess work. It shows you what you are doing right and helps identify areas which may need improvement. Gradual progressions slowly advance you towards your goals in a realistic manner to make a healthier life seamless and achievable. 

2. Why does Halean require me to submit my basic health information?

The Halean platform incorporates innovative algorithms to provide you with the most applicable resources and information which is customized to you. Without accurate information it is not possible for Halean to provide you with your customized wellness profile. 

3. What information does Halean require in order for me to utilize the platform?

We have spent the past years simplifying the algorithms behind Halean and have eliminated any unnecessary information needs in order to keep the platform streamlined but highly effective. Halean incorporates three short information forms to provide information on major past medical history, your current functional status, and your future wellness goals. It is recommended that you answer as many of the questions as possible. However if there is any information in which you wish not to provide, Halean will continue to provide resources, features and services which are applicable to the information which was provided. 

4. Is my health and personal information safe and secure? Will others have access to my information?

All information is encrypted and protected with appropriate security features. Information will only be used to formulate your perfect Halean wellness profile in order to provide you with the most accurate and effective wellness resources. Information is never accessed or used for any other purposes and full measures will be taken to ensure information will remain safe and secure. 

5. When will the Halean platform be completed?

Following successful funding, Halean is anticipated to be launched within 6 months - Just in time for your 2017 New Year Resolutions. 

6. How is Halean different than other applications available?

Halean is the first ever comprehensive wellness platform which seeks to proactively guide users towards a more healthy life. Current applications merely provide users with historical data to look back on. Halean is the first forward looking application which seeks to help you live a healthier life tomorrow, and every day thereafter.  Halean has also incorporated several innovative features which will help you live healthier in nearly every aspect of life. 

7. Is Halean appropriate for me? How is it customized to me?

Halean is appropriate for most individuals and seeks to be one of the most diverse wellness platforms ever created. The algorithms with which Halean operates takes special consideration to customize each and every user with a personalized experience which can help them advance towards a state of improved wellness. Halean may not be appropriate for all users and it is always recommended to consult your physician before partaking in any exercise or nutritional program. 

8. Is the Halean platform compatible with my wearable fitness device?

Halean is compatible with all bluetooth enable fitness trackers and heart rate monitoring devices. To fully take advantage of features within the Halean platform it is recommended that you utilize a fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring capabilities. The Fuse by Mio Global is our recommended fitness tracker to supplement the Halean platform due to heart rate accuracy and biofeedback capabilities. The Halean platform is also designed to integrate with your smartphone to conveniently provide fitness data, resources and biofeedback. 

Funding

As a team, we have a very bold and ambitious vision for Halean Health. We have plans to bring what is possibly the most eclectic and advanced wellness platform ever imagined to life.  We do however, need your help. As a team we have set a very ambitious goal of $300,000. This lofty goal has been set because we intend only to deliver the most innovative, comprehensive and revolutionary platform imaginable! One that will change your life from the way you exercise, to the way you eat, to how you enjoy your free time with one ultimate goal; to improve your health in ways that you never could have dreamed. Thank you in advanced for believing in Halean Health and we look forward to embarking on this journey with you!

Stretch Goal
